As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day on November 26, our defenders have repelled 12 enemy attacks in the areas of Vesely Gay, Trudove, Kostyantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka, and Rivnopil Vremivskyi settlements, and one battle is ongoing. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Gulyaipil direction. In the Orihiv direction, the invaders actively used aviation in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka and Pavlivka, dropping a total of 10 guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction, our defenders repelled two enemy attacks.

Title: The Ukraine-NATO Council discussed the Russian strike on the Dnieper with a new ballistic missile
Description: This was reported by the press service of the Alliance. The meeting was held at the level of ambassadors. Senior Ukrainian military officials held a video briefing for the members of the Council. -During the meeting, the Alliance members confirmed their support for Ukraine. The attack, which was directed at the Dnipro, is seen as another attempt by Russia to terrorize the civilian population in Ukraine and intimidate those who support Ukraine, which is defending itself from Russia's illegal and unprovoked aggression,- the message reads. As NATO spokeswoman Fara Dahlalla previously noted, -the deployment of this potential will not change the course of the conflict and will not distract NATO allies from supporting Ukraine.- The Ukraine-NATO Council is a platform for consultations between Alliance members and Ukraine on security issues of mutual interest, including Russia's aggressive war. The meeting was chaired by Acting Deputy Secretary General of NATO Boris Ruge. The next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council should take place during the meeting of foreign ministers of the Alliance member countries, which will be held on December 3-4. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a new medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex. The flight time of this Russian missile from the moment of launch in the Astrakhan region to the impact in the city of Dnipro was 15 minutes. Six combat units were installed on the rocket: each one was equipped with six sub-munitions. The speed on the final part of the trajectory is more than Mach 11. As of October of this year, Russia was supposed to produce two experimental rocket samples from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: - Behy- are destroyed, and the infantry is finished: our fighters repelled the assault of the Russia...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. It is noted that two Russian BMPs, killed by infantry, advanced towards the Ukrainian positions, and FPV drones of the Separate Presidential Brigade set out to chase them. -The -bekhs- were destroyed, and the infantry, which scattered around the landings, were caught and finished off with -Maviks- with rocket launchers. The 4th mechanized battalion of the Separate Presidential Brigade does not tolerate Russian garbage in its defense area. It should be burning,- the military said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how fighters of the Bulava attack drone unit of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi effectively piloty-rozrobyly-novu-metodyku-udariv/->burned Russian tank shed, seemingly protected from drones.

Title: MARCH is on the march: the cadets underwent an intensive 16-hour training in takmed
Description: All conditions are created here for high-quality and fast training of combat medics, paramedics and soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The cadets take the basic ASM (All service members) course with us, which is coordinated with the current Ukrainian standard of providing first aid. Here, they have the opportunity to hone their knowledge and skills directly during simulations of injuries and combat injuries, taking into account all the stress factors that accompany them,- says Diana, head of the tactical medicine center. Training takes place in full compliance with the MARCH first aid protocol (Massive bleeding, Airway Management, Respiration, Circulation, Head injury / Hypothermia / Hypovolemia) in all possible phases: -red-, -shelter-, -evacuation-. The training itself lasts 16 hours over two days. Each cadet practices this protocol independently. For this, models are used, or another cadet plays the role of the wounded. Certain marks simulate wounds (injuries) of varying complexity, according to the nature of which certain methods and means of assistance are used. Simulation of combat conditions helps cadets feel real responsibility and practice the skills of using various auxiliary medical devices (tourniquets, decompression needles, occlusive stickers, hemostatic bandages, etc.). It is also extremely important to take coordinated actions in the shortest possible time during the organization and evacuation of the wounded. In general, during the training, future officers must master the CLS (Combat Life Savior) level, which corresponds to the functionality of a medical marksman. Training takes place under the supervision of experienced combat medics. The principle -train as you will fight- applies - it educates the cadets' endurance and prepares them for actions in extreme combat situations, where the ability to save one's life and the life of a comrade is one of the most important tasks. -We work according to the MARCH protocol. First, we examine for the presence of massive bleeding, then we work with consciousness and breathing problems, tamponate, glue and carry out evacuation,- says cadet Mykola about the basic course of tactical medicine. Testing and awarding of certificates are ahead. And one more step towards receiving the rank of -lieutenant- will be taken. Vladislav Siniagovskyi for ArmiyaInform

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi: We need a new push for supplies for the defense of Ukraine
Description: He said this in the evening address. -We appreciate that the partners are now implementing the announced support packages. They are implemented in a timely manner. And it is important that the volumes of what is announced correspond to our agreements and objective needs. A new push is needed for supply for the sake of defense. And we have to ensure it in December,- he said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also said that this morning he listened to the report of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky, regarding the situation at the front. -And there will be another conversation in the evening. The priorities are obvious. Front — Pokrovsky direction, Kurakhivskyi. Also, the Kursk operation,- the head of state said. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky declared that defend against enemy airstrikes realistically only by destroying Russian weapons and Russian launchers on Russian territory.

Title: The form with -z- and escape to the Russian Federation: the traitor in the shoots was sentenced for ...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this on November 26. Prosecutors proved that during the occupation of Kozacha Lopan village, an unemployed local woman voluntarily decided to work for the enemy. She assumed the position of temporary acting precinct inspector of the so-called -Territorial police department of Kozach Lopan township-. -Law enforcement agency- issued documents in accordance with Russian legislation. It is noted that at the court hearing, the witnesses said that the suspect conducted -searches- at the residences of local residents, and also wore a uniform with a -z- mark. -The woman worked in a pseudo-position until September 10, 2022, and then fled to the Russian Federation together with the occupiers. She is wanted,- law enforcement officers said. The court found a 38-year-old woman guilty of collaborative activity for maintaining a public indictment by prosecutors of the Dergachev district prosecutor's office of Kharkiv region. She was sentenced to 14 years of imprisonment with deprivation of the right to hold positions in law enforcement agencies of Ukraine for 15 years and confiscation of property. The guilty verdict was handed down by the Dergachiv District Court of the Kharkiv Region. The period for an appeal continues. Since the convict is still hiding from Ukrainian justice on the territory of the Russian Federation, the term of her sentence will begin to be calculated from the moment of actual detention. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained a Russian agent who, on the order of enemy special services committed a terrorist attack in the center Kyiv on November 17 of this year.

Title: The enemy assault failed: the Spartans thwarted the Russian infantry attack
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. The invaders tried to advance with a group of infantry on the positions of the National Guardsmen, but their actions were detected in time by the air reconnaissance of the -Spartan- and all the plans of the enemy collapsed. 🫡 The -Spartan- brigade stopped the Russian offensive. The occupiers tried to advance with a group of infantry on the positions of the National Guardsmen, but their actions were detected in time by the -Spartan- aerial reconnaissance and all the enemy's plans failed. More videos https://t.co/E2EPYXNKjz pic.twitter.com/LGK6vsEDnr — Military Unit 3017 (@ngu_3017) November 26, 2024 -In the Zaporozhye direction, the Russians do not change their tactics and try to carry out assaults and combat reconnaissance exclusively by infantry, without using equipment,- the military said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the Russians tried to advance to Ukrainian positions, but did not take into account that the defense here is held by soldiers the -Spartan- brigade, which successfully repelled the enemy assault.

Title: The president named a method of countering Russian airstrikes
Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy announced this in his evening address. -And that is why the opportunity to strike on Russian territory is so important for us. This is the only thing that can currently limit Russian terror and, in general, Russia's ability to fight. I am grateful to all partners who understand this and explain it to others,- the head of state said. According to him, a rescue operation at the place of shelling at the service station is still ongoing in Sumy. -Unfortunately, two people died. My condolences to family and friends. There is probably another person under the rubble. A house and a kindergarten nearby were also damaged by this blow. And before that, it was shelling from a salvo missile system,- the President said. He recalled that nearly 200 Russian attack drones enemy launched last night. Most were shot down or neutralized thanks to EW. -I am grateful to all mobile fire groups, all air defense and EW calculations. It was a significant increase in pressure on Ukraine due to such terror. And it is important that we manage to protect our people, our infrastructure from most of these threats. But, unfortunately, not one hundred percent,- the head of state said. The President reported that the liquidation of the consequences of the attack is still ongoing in the Ternopil region. -Almost 200 Russian drones against Ukraine per day are almost 200 proofs that Russian desires are extremely far from any ideas about real peace,- he emphasized.

Title: Merciless attacks from the sky: Russian drones bombard residents of the Kherson region all day long
Description: informs the head of Kherson ODA Oleksandr Prokudin about this. -In Veletenskyi, the Russian army dropped explosives from a drone on a man riding a bicycle. A 65-year-old resident was hospitalized with a mine-explosive injury and leg injuries. Doctors are providing the victim with all the necessary assistance,- the message says. Also, at noon, two people were hit by a Russian UAV in Kindyitsa. As a result of dropping ammunition from a drone, a 27-year-old man received a mine-explosive injury and a shrapnel injury to his arm and leg. A 60-year-old woman was diagnosed with a shrapnel injury to the shin. In addition, the Russian occupation army attacked the residents of Antonivka from a drone. -A 61-year-old man was taken to the hospital with a mine-explosive injury and a fragmentary leg injury. At approximately 15:00, the Russian military dropped explosives from a drone on a 74-year-old man. He has a landmine-explosive injury and a fragmentary wound to his forearm,- said Oleksandr Prokudin. As ArmiyaInform reported, in the Dnipro district of Kherson, the occupiers dropped explosives from a drone on a civilian car. A 57-year-old woman received a mine-explosive injury a> and ssada head. Two other people were also injured.

Title: A Russian soldier was woken up by a mine, the SBU is hunting enemy equipment, Kurshchyna: a stream f...
Description: On the Zaporizhzhia direction 110, a separate mechanized brigade named after Colonel-General Mark Bezruchka used FPV drones to stop the Russian advance. The battle resulted in the destruction of three enemy BMPs and one BBM. The Russian soldier was sleeping so soundly that he did not hear our infantrymen sneak up on him. In order not to risk our fighters, an FPV drone was used as an alarm clock for the occupier, but even it did not disturb the Russian's sleep. Already after that, our soldiers threw an anti-tank mine at the son, after which he fell asleep forever. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: Drug addicts in the service of Russia: arsonists of post offices and military vehicles arrested
Description: About this informs November 26 SBU. -In order to commit crimes, the occupiers remotely involved two recidivists who, after -serving time- for drug trafficking and theft, were looking for money on Telegram channels,- the report says. It is noted that during the arson, the perpetrators used flammable mixtures, and the fires were recorded on phone cameras for a -report- to curators from the Russian Federation. So, a 28-year-old drug addict from Berezan was arrested in Kyiv Oblast, who burned down a local branch of a private postal service. He also planned to destroy several more administrative buildings of the community, but did not have time to do so, as he was exposed by law enforcement officers. The subversive activity of a 40-year-old recidivist, who burned a car of the Armed Forces after a -term- behind bars, was also documented in Prykarpattia. -After the arrest of the person involved, the investigation additionally established his involvement in setting fire to the turnout heating cabinet on an important railway line,- the SBU noted. On the basis of the received evidence, both perpetrators were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The extras are in custody. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained a Russian agent who, on the order of enemy special services, committed a terrorist attack in the center Kyiv on November 17 this year.

Title: Reinforced dry rations for the military: the DOT of the Ministry of Defense concluded the first supp...
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. This improved food kit provides a complete three-time meal for a serviceman in conditions where it is not possible to prepare food. -The Ministry of Defense is working on improving the quality of food for the military, because it depends not only on the effectiveness of combat missions, but also on the health and morale of our servicemen. Improving dry rations is an important step in this strategy,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The first contacts for the supply of reinforced dry rations were concluded with three suppliers. At the same time, contracts with two others — who previously won tenders for separate positions — were not concluded, because their documents, as it turned out, did not meet the tender requirements. Therefore, the DOT will soon re-announce tenders for these lots. We will remind, at the end of September - beginning of October, the Army+ application was a survey of military personnel was conducted regarding the filling and quality of dry rations. Most appreciated the quality of the set quite highly and noted that it is worth diversifying the filling and adding inclusive dry solders.

Title: A traitor in a cassock: the archimandrite of the UOC (MP) who blessed Kherson's accession to Russia ...
Description: About this informs November 26 SBU. -After the capture of the regional center, the Archimandrite went to cooperate with the occupiers and the local Gauleiter Saldo,- the report says. As the investigation established, the cleric regularly invited him to the temple for pro-Kremlin speeches to the faithful. Also, during the services, the Archimandrite blessed the pseudo-referendum of the Russian Federation regarding the -joining- of the Kherson Oblast to Russia. In addition, the cleric personally appealed to Moscow Patriarch Kirill with a request to include the local cathedral in the parish of the Russian Orthodox Church. -For supporting racism, the traitor was given real estate seized in the center of Kherson and invited to the Kremlin to participate in the -ceremony of inclusion- of the temporarily occupied regions of Ukraine into the Russian Federation,- the SBU said. During the liberation of the regional center, the cleric fled with the Russian invaders, first to the left bank of the region, and then to Crimea. On the basis of the evidence base of the Security Service, the court found the intruder guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice for the crimes committed against our state. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service detained the abbot of one of the temples of the Kharkiv diocese of the UOC (MP), who suspected of work on the enemy.

Title: Russian aviation attacked Kramatorsk with bombs: dozens of private estates were damaged in the subur...
Description: The devastating consequences of the explosion were recorded by ArmyInform. -Kramatorsk has been hit by the enemy - the private sector. Dozens of residential buildings were damaged. So far, there has been no information about the victims. We continue to record the consequences - all relevant services are working-, reported head of the Kramatorsk City Military Administration Oleksandr Honcharenko.   The shelling of the city by the military of the armed forces of the Russian Federation took place in the afternoon of November 26. The first blast occurred around 1:40 p.m., the second at around 1:45 p.m. One of the munitions hit outside the settlement, while the second hit the area of ​​a one-story manor-type residential building in the village of Yasnohirka in the suburbs of Kramatorsk. An aerial bomb hit a paved road in the middle of the street. The force of the explosion was such that several nearby structures on both sides of the street suffered catastrophic damage. It was only a miracle that there were no victims or serious injuries, because there were local residents in the houses and in the yards near the place of impact. At least three buildings are almost completely destroyed - their roofs have completely collapsed and load-bearing walls have been destroyed. A car parked next to one of the almost completely destroyed houses was completely burnt out. In several dozens of residential and commercial buildings, located further from the epicenter of the explosion, the debris and the blast wave destroyed the roofs, knocked out windows and doors. Gas furnaces were destroyed, electric wires were broken, and several poles of power lines were knocked down. All relevant services arrived at the site of the impact, provided first aid to local residents, secured power communications and recorded the effects of the shelling. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: They woke up an anti-tank mine - the occupier was sleeping very soundly
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on November 26 on the brigade channel. Our aerial scouts spotted an invader in a dugout in the middle of a forest strip. The Russian did not move, he seemed to be sleeping. First, an FPV drone was sent against the invader, which managed to fly right into the dugout. When the smoke after the explosion cleared, the aerial scouts noticed the occupant in the same position. In order not to risk it, our infantrymen brought an anti-tank mine to the dugout and threw it inside. Only after that it was possible to say with confidence that the Russian went to Kobzon's concert. -The soldier is sleeping - the service is going. The occupier fell asleep so well that he did not hear either the FPV or our fellow soldiers who threw an anti-tank mine into his dugout,- the brigade commented on the video. On the channel, the brigade is conducting a muster for the battalion of unmanned systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the crew of the tank of the 33rd mechanized brigade, together with the artillery, was able to kolonu-vorozhoyi-bronetehniky/->stop the breakthrough attempt of Russian armored vehicles.

Title: There are more than 140 combat clashes at the front today: the General Staff of the Armed Forces rep...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces as of 16:00 on November 26. The occupiers continue to use aviation, in particular KAB, and carry out attacks in almost all directions of the east and south of our country, especially actively in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions. The defense forces are holding the lines and taking the necessary measures to prevent a defense breakthrough. On the Kharkiv direction, four combat clashes took place today in the Vovchansk district. 12 assaults by invaders were repulsed by our soldiers near Hryhorivka, Zeleny Gay, Zagryzovo, Senkovo, and Andriivka in the Kupyansk direction, three clashes are still ongoing. On the Lymansky direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, is attacking in the areas of Grekivka, Druzhkivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Terniv, and Torsky. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been 17 clashes in this direction, of which seven are still ongoing. On the Siversky direction, the occupiers are attacking in the Hryhorivka area, the fighting is still ongoing. On the Toretsk direction the enemy attacked the positions of our troops near Diliivka and Toretsk three times. In the Pokrovsky direction, fierce battles are taking place in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Krasny Yar, Lysivka, Chumatsky, Pustinka and Novy Trud. So far, the enemy has made 31 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions, 25 attacks have already been repelled by our defenders. The occupiers dropped two aerial bombs in the districts of Zeleny Pol and Pokrovsk. In the Kurakhiv direction, 12 clashes continue in the areas of Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, Hanivka and Antonivka settlements. Our defenders have already repelled 23 enemy assaults. In the areas of Vesely Gai, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka and Rivnopil settlements of the Vremivskyi direction, our defenders repelled 12 enemy attacks, one skirmish is ongoing. In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations. In the Orikhov direction, the invaders actively used aviation in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka, and Pavlivka, dropping a total of 10 guided aerial bombs. In the Dnieper direction, our defenders repelled two enemy attacks.

Title: The defense forces advance in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the Russians withdraw their reserves
Description: Lieutenant Colonel Anton Bayev, Chief the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment of the National Guard -Charter-. According to Anton Baev, -Charter- carried out successful offensive actions. Now trying to gain a foothold in order to create further conditions for improving the tactical position. And also — for further advancement in the direction of Hlyboke and Lukyantsi settlements. -Because of our actions, the intensity has increased significantly. Now the enemy is starting to react and charge additional reserves, which will be advanced in the future to recapture the positions they lost. In addition, we note that we brought a special UAV unit here, which began to work actively, helping the enemy,- said Anton Baev. As reported by ArmyInform , enemy tanks, guns and howitzers did not withstand the blows of the fighters of the 13th brigade of operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine.

Title: A vice for logistics: the Russians are trying to cut the road to Kurakhovo
Description: This is what told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyni- Nazar Voloshin, spokesman operational-strategic group of troops -Khortytsia-. According to Nazar Voloshyn, the enemy is rushing to the outskirts of Kurakhovo. The enemy does not pay attention to the losses and tries to occupy the commanding heights and logistical routes that lead to the city. -Kurakhove is under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Over the past day, more than 350 occupiers were killed and wounded in that direction, in particular. Also two tanks, three motorcycles, a mortar, several cars,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that in the Kurakhiv direction the enemy is attacking — striking across the entire front with attempts to break out into the flanks.

Title: The enemy attacked Sumy
Description: This was notified by the Sumy City Council. There were no casualties or injuries as a result of the impact. The consequences of an enemy attack are clarified. Previously, the parking lot, cars, and windows of residential buildings were damaged. All relevant services are on site. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian military carried out an FPV drone strike on a civilian car in the Vasyliv district of the Zaporizhia region.

Title: More than 60 items: how Ukrainian servicemen are provided with equipment in Britain
Description: This was reported at the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Military personnel receive clothing, personal protective equipment, hygiene products and many other necessary items. In total, the list contains more than 60 names. When new recruits receive their equipment under the guidance of the British military and INTERFLEX partner countries, they have the opportunity to try everything on to ensure comfort and fit. If necessary, the equipment can be replaced with a more suitable size to ensure maximum comfort during training. It's not just a set of things - it's essential gear that matters. Every detail, from a protective vest to the most comfortable shoe, helps create comfort and increases the combat effectiveness of our military. -We thank Great Britain and the partner countries of the Interflex operation: Australia, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Lithuania, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Romania, Sweden, Kosovo for this invaluable assistance,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted.

Title: Battlefield Communication: A new training course has launched in Army+
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This is the fourth course to be launched in the last two months. The communication course will teach: -Already 12,000 soldiers have started training in Army+, and 4,000 certificates of completion of the courses have already been issued. This proves that fighters are looking for additional sources of knowledge in order to learn new things or sharpen their already acquired skills. Therefore, we continue to replenish our educational platform with relevant materials and plan to do it systematically,- said Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko. As reported by ArmiyaInform, servicemen who will submit reports for a change of place of service through Army+, in case of approval -nakaziv-pro-perevedennya/-> will see the order number for the transfer.

Title: The military man became the absolute champion of Ukraine in natural bodybuilding
Description: This was reported by /a> Ministry of Youth and Sports. In 2024, Oleksandr Omelchenko became a gold medalist and the absolute champion of Ukraine in natural bodybuilding, having won two gold medals, a cup and a WNBF Pro Card. As a teenager, he was involved in athletics, but later discovered bodybuilding for himself. While in the service, he decided not only to keep in shape, but also to reach sports heights in order to prove to himself and others: the military routine is not an obstacle to self-realization. Oleksandr's passion for bodybuilding began during his first contract service in 2019. However, he got a real boost to the professional level after returning to the army in 2022. His story is not just a personal success, but also an example for those who doubt their own abilities. Oleksandr proved that perseverance and self-belief can be the key to achieving dreams even in the most difficult conditions. Currently, Oleksandr Omelchenko continues to serve, train and show that, being in the army, you can also achieve success in other areas. As reported by ArmyInform, the army athlete chose a historical award for Ukraine.

Title: A record number of kamikaze drones: the President called for stronger sanctions against Russia
Description: This was announced by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Ukrainian air defense forces shot down about 80 drones, more than 90 are considered lost. Despite the efforts of the defenders of the sky, there is damage to critical infrastructure, in particular in Ternopil. Currently, restoration work is ongoing there, repair crews are working to restore power as soon as possible. The President emphasized the need to strengthen sanctions control. According to him, each of the 188 drones contains about 85 foreign components without which they could not function. That's nearly 16,000 parts supplied through sanctions circumvention. -Such attacks are possible only due to violation of sanctions. We need more joint work in the world to block supplies and force Russia to stop the war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He called on the international community not only to declare opposition to the war, but also to actively fight the circumvention of sanctions, which allows Russia to continue its aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ternopil, the Russians hit an energy facility .

Title: Drone attack in Zaporozhye: Russians destroyed a civilian car
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia Regional Military Administration. The incident happened in the village of Primorske. The drone hit an old car parked in a private yard. As a result, the car burned to the ground. The blast wave and debris damaged a nearby house. Fortunately, no residents were injured. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during the day the occupiers struck 285 attacks on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. As a result of Russian attacks in Pologiv district, a 74-year-old man suffered injury.

Title: Welcome to Hell: 46 Russians ended their contract with the Horde early
Description: About this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- told - lieutenant colonel Yevhenii Romanov. According to Yevgeny Romanov, enemy attacks continue. However, they are unable to advance in columns with armored vehicles. All this is due to a specific area where hostilities and defense organized by our units have been going on for a long time. -These are solid ruins. There are no roads. That which is mined. Each area is targeted, fire equipment is on duty there, aerial reconnaissance is constantly carried out in the air by unmanned systems, strike drones are circling,- Yevgeny Romanov said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the change of weather hurts the occupiers in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Art therapy at the front: chaplains and artists supported the soldiers of the hospital
Description: The project combines art, national traditions and spiritual support for the psychological rehabilitation of soldiers. As military chaplain Borys Kutovy noted, participation in such events helps to awaken something important and inspiring in the hearts of soldiers. -Something poignant and seemingly long-forgotten, but alive, exciting- This is a kind of art therapy, the strength of which lies in national spiritual, cultural and artistic traditions,- he added. As part of the project, mobile groups of chaplains, masters of folk art and performers of authentic Ukrainian singing visit places where military personnel rest or undergo treatment. Their activities are organized in the combat zone and are aimed at the psychological recovery of fighters participating in operations in the Kharkiv, Luhansk and Donetsk directions. The project is implemented by the command of the Khortytsya Armed Forces within the framework of the program of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Protecting the Life and Health of Servicemen-. Its effectiveness has already been confirmed in frontline conditions. -Get well, brothers! There is still a lot to do! With faith in God and the Armed Forces, we will win!-, the participants of -Kola Pokrova- appeal to our defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, the command of the Khortytsia Special Operations Command within the framework of the program of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Saving the Life and Health of Servicemen- introduced the project -Circle Pokrova-, which provides for the psychological rehabilitation of the military.

Title: If not the ruins, then the fires — the Defense Forces showed Toretsk destroyed by the enemy
Description: Toretsk's video appeared on November 26 on the brigade's channel. Destroyed industrial zones, private sector houses, of which walls remained at best. Panel high-rises look a little more intact, but they are almost completely burned out. This is how another city of Donetsk region looks like, where the -Russian mir- came. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the unmanned systems battalion -Perun- of the 42nd mechanized brigade were able to hit Russian anti-aircraft missile complex -Tor-.

Title: -They are killed there, and they climb several times a day- — the tactics of the enemy near Chasov Y...
Description: Mykola Zinko, the commander of the fire support company of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade, said this on the ArmyTV stream. -The orcs are running across the channel. This is, so to speak, a -brimstone- in which they are unable to gain a foothold. They are being killed there, but they continue to try several times every day to somehow sneak in, jump over this channel of ours,- Mykola Zinko reported. According to him, the Russians move in the morning or during the day, but they don't try to storm at night. -Most people go in the morning, when it's not quite light yet, but it's not dark either. They try to move during the day as well. But not at night, because the temperature dropped, the contrast became great and thermal imaging drones easily detect the enemy,- Mykola Zinko explained. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade hit a Russian bomber RBU-6000 -Smerch-2- in the Kramatorsk direction.

Title: Force the channel and die: in Chasovoy Yar, dozens of occupiers realize their dream
Description: The representative of the 24th OMBr named . King Danyla Andriy Polukhin. According to Andriy Polukhin, the reason for the popular Russian tactics of -small infantry groups- is the work of our drones. That is why from 2 to 5 stormtroopers go into attacks. -In order for their forces to be invisible, they need to form small infantry groups, no more than a few men. They try to go to the rear and impose a battle there. Such sorties are not very pleasant for our defense, but still they do not decide, this is still a small infantry group,- noted Andriy Polukhin. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians are giving up their attempts to occupy the city of Chasiv Yar, the situation remains difficult.

Title: PA NATO called to provide Ukraine with more long-range weapons for strikes on the territory of the R...
Description: This is stated in the message at site PA NATO. -Russia remains the most significant and direct threat to the security of the Alliance … this threat will persist in the long term,- says the resolution adopted at the annual session of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly in Montreal. The document emphasizes that NATO should -maintain and increase military, financial and humanitarian support to Ukraine, ensuring the timely delivery of ammunition and advanced weapons systems, including air defense systems, long-range precision weapons and multi-role fighters.- Such assistance to Ukraine should be maintained -as long as it resists Russian aggression or its threat.- The governments of NATO countries must also recognize -the right of Ukraine to strike at legitimate military targets- on the territory of Russia in accordance with the principles of self-defense of the United Nations. People's deputy and head of the permanent delegation of Ukraine to the PA NATO Yehor Chernev reported that the resolution refers to long-range missiles 1,000-5,500 kilometers, which can strike at the strategic depth of the enemy, for example, -Tomahawks-. -This decision is the first step that creates a legal basis and gives reasons for the governments of NATO member countries to make a corresponding decision. At the last session of the PA, NATO, on our initiative, called for Ukraine to be allowed to strike deep into Russia and thereby raised this issue to a political level. We hope for a positive decision this time too,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces struck the positions of the anti-aircraft missile division 1490 of the 6th anti-aircraft missile regiment of the Russian army on the territory of Kursk region

Title: Force the canal and die: in Chasovoy Yar, dozens of occupiers realize their dream
Description: The representative of the 24th OMBr named . King Danyla Andriy Polukhin. According to Andriy Polukhin, the reason for the popular Russian tactics of -small infantry groups- is the work of our drones. That is why from 2 to 5 stormtroopers go into attacks. -In order for their forces to be invisible, they need to form small infantry groups, no more than a few men. They try to go to the rear and impose a battle there. Such sorties are not very pleasant for our defense, but still they do not decide, this is still a small infantry group,- noted Andriy Polukhin. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians are giving up their attempts to occupy the city of Chasiv Yar, the situation remains difficult.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian military shot five prisoners of the Armed Forces
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. According to preliminary data, in November 2024, Russian troops stormed the positions of Ukrainian defenders near the village of Petrivka, Pokrovsky district. During the battle, five soldiers of the ZSU were forced to retreat and found shelter in a private house. After surrounding the building, the occupiers captured the Ukrainian military, forced them to leave the shelter without weapons and lie on the ground. Violating the norms of international humanitarian law, the Russian military shot the prisoners with automatic weapons. The pre-trial investigation is conducted according to h. 2 Art. 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder). Investigative actions are ongoing, the circumstances of the crime and the persons involved in its commission are being established. We remind you that the killing of prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a serious international crime. The investigation is carried out by the State Security Service of Ukraine in the Donetsk and Luhansk regions. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers shot five people near Vugledara captured soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Operation -GUR-KIT-: scouts conducted an atypical evacuation of cats from Zmiiny Island
Description: informs about this on November 26, the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the IOM. It is noted that the approach of winter frost complicates the carefree life of numerous cats and kittens living on Zmiiny Island. -The kittens were carefully brought to Sirius, one of the largest animal shelters in Ukraine, and the rescue operation took place with the support of the MacPaw Foundation,- the scouts said. They emphasized that after the adaptation of the cats rescued from the famous Snake, everyone willing will have the opportunity to shelter one of them and take care of them at the Sirius shelter. -The head of the special service is known to love animals: he has cats Gunter and Snake, frog Peter and canaries. And in April 2022, after the de-occupation of Kyiv region, volunteers of the MacPaw Foundation were the first to bring feed and everything necessary for the care of animals to the -Sirius- shelter,- the scouts noted. The HUR called on those who care to do good and support the activities of Sirius shelter in winter. This is not the first time that the Defense Forces of Ukraine have rescued animals during the war. Earlier this year, during a combat operation in Kharkiv Oblast, servicemen of the 92nd OShBr -kyyivskomu-zooparku/->discoveredin a ruined house hungry owlets locked in a cage. The birds were rescued and handed over to the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications of Ukraine Kyryl Budanov.

Title: Border guards stopped another conqueror of the Belarusian border
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. According to preliminary information, the man studied the area, laid out routes that bypassed checkpoints, and directly accompanied persons trying to evade mobilization to the state border. In addition, the organizer sold information about these routes through messengers, in particular through Telegram channels. The arrest took place at the moment when the attacker tried to smuggle one of these persons across the border. During the searches, cash, mobile phones and other evidence of illegal activities were seized from him. Documentation of criminal activity was carried out by the investigative department of the Main Directorate of the National Police in the Chernihiv region. The detainee was declared suspicious for h. 3 Art. 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (illegal transportation of persons across the state border). According to the sanction of the article, he faces punishment in the form of imprisonment for a term of seven to nine years. Currently, the suspect has been taken into custody. Operative measures took place under the procedural leadership of the Chernihiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. Border guards of the 105th detachment continue to actively work on exposing similar criminal schemes, demonstrating determination in protecting the borders and security of Ukraine. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in Kyiv and Kyiv region in cooperation with the Counterintelligence Department and together with the National Police under the procedural guidance of the Kyiv City Prosecutor's Office. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Propaganda postponed: the occupiers failed to launch the -education center-
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, head of the Luhansk OVA. According to him, on paper all the work is supposedly completed, but the occupiers have not yet decided on the final date for the start of propaganda activities. Lysohor noted that show repairs even in propaganda centers are part of the corrupt practices of the occupation regime. On the way out of Siversko-Donetsk in the direction of Luhansk, the invaders significantly increased vehicle checks. Occupiers carefully check the documents of drivers and passengers, as well as search luggage compartments. Because of this, traffic was significantly complicated, which caused long queues. The purpose of such inspections remains unknown, as the occupiers do not disclose the results of these raids. The situation in the occupied territories of Luhansk region remains difficult, and the actions of the invaders only cause new difficulties for the local population. As reported by ArmyInform, in the so-called LNR decided to reduce the number of employees of the emergency medical service, which caused the indignation of local residents.

Title: Scattered like cockroaches - our drones finished off the Russian landing force
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 26 on the brigade's channel. Enemy BMPs were stopped by mines, after which the paratroopers tried to hide in the landing. But our pilots were already waiting there, who arranged a real knockout of the enemy. -With precise strikes, we destroy the enemy BMP, and then the hunt begins for the infantry, which runs away in panic. Accurate drops from the sky and FPV remind the occupiers that there is no place for them on Ukrainian soil,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade showed the destruction of the Russians who decided to attack on -Niva- passenger cars, protected only by camouflage and EW.

Title: Donetsk is at the epicenter of the fire: shelling killed a person and destroyed infrastructure
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In the village of Dachne of the Kurakhiv community, one person died as a result of shelling, five houses were destroyed, and another 14 were damaged. Six buildings were damaged in Hannivka. Three houses were destroyed by shelling in Myrnograd. Seven buildings were damaged in Pokrovsk, three more were damaged in the village of Shevchenko. In Pishchany, shelling caused the destruction of an enterprise, and in Malynivka of the Grodiv community, two houses were damaged. In Illinivska hromad, one person was wounded by shelling, three infrastructure objects were damaged in the village of Zorya, and 18 in Popovoy Yar. Two private houses were damaged in Siversk. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 11 private houses, two high-rise buildings and a non-residential building were destroyed. Over the past day, 162 people, including 22 children, were evacuated from the front-line territories of Donetsk region. As reported by ArmyInform, the S-400 attack on Kharkiv: 26 injured, dozens of buildings damaged.

Title: The SBU detained a Russian agent who wanted to blow up a police outfit in the center of Kyiv
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. That day, a police team arrived on a call about domestic violence in an apartment building in the Pechersk district of the capital. During the attempt of the law enforcement officers to enter the house at the entrance to the premises, the so-called -stretcher- with an F-1 grenade went off. As it turned out, no one lived in the apartment, and the -call- by a female voice to the 102 line was a fake to trap and kill the police. According to SBU materials, this terrorist attack was planned by Russian special services. For its implementation, they remotely engaged a 43-year-old resident of Kyiv region, who had already served 6 sentences for robbery, theft and escaping from prison. Before installing the -stretcher-, the agent performed a -test- task: he set fire to the relay box of Ukrzaliznytsia on the outskirts of the capital and sent the relevant videos to the curator. After that, the recidivist received step-by-step instructions for committing a terrorist attack against Ukrainian law enforcement officers. The attacker rented an apartment in the center of Kyiv, installed a -stretcher- there with a live grenade, as well as video cameras that were supposed to record the detonation in real time. Thanks to the professional actions of the police, no one was injured during the explosion. Soon after, law enforcement officers arrested the person involved in hot pursuit. During searches of the detainee's premises, a mobile phone, SIM cards and clothes with evidence of criminal activities were seized. Investigators of the Security Service informed the accused about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 258 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (terrorist act). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the guard dog of the occupiers: a traitor in epaulettes who switched to the side of Russia was exposed.

Title: When scary fairy tales come to life: Russians are hunted simultaneously by -Yaga women- and -vampire...
Description: Stepan Barna, commander of the unit, told about this on the air of -Social News-. -Barney- of the 10th Separate Mountain Assault Brigade -Edelweiss-. According to Stepan Barna, the losses do not stop the occupiers — they continue to storm in small groups supported by artillery and aviation. The defenders respond to them - our drones especially annoy the occupiers. -FPV drones, Baba Yaga drones - which provide support on our side of the front. Therefore, it is obvious that the enemy is trying to find the positions of unmanned forces and destroy them. Our task is to disguise ourselves as much as possible and continue to stop the enemy on his tricks,- Stepan Barna said. How reported ArmyInform, in the Seversky direction due to the weather, -foot assaults- are becoming more difficult - the occupiers will have to use equipment and drones.

Title: Death by night - the Azovians hunt the invaders in the dark
Description: The video of combat work appeared on the brigade channel. Operators of attack drones guarantee peace to the enemy only after his final death. Therefore, work in the dark is aimed at maximum damage to any actions of the personnel of the occupiers. -Everything is flying at the heads of the Russians: from grenades and VOGs to TMok and cluster munitions,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard first force Russian soldiers to crawl into the ground, and then destroyed.

Title: A million drones for the front: Ukraine exceeded the presidential plan
Description: This declared the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. -The main task of the state is to provide the Defense Forces with everything they need. Do you need drones? So, drones. Do you need new technologies? Launching Brave1 and building a Technology Stake,- he noted. Mykhailo Fedorov emphasized that Ukrainians have proven their ability to act in concert, achieving ambitious goals. As an example, according to the President's task, it was planned to put a million drones on the front for a year, and this figure has already been exceeded. A key focus is technological superiority on the battlefield. The coordinated work of the Ministry of Digital, the Ministry of Defense, the State Special Communications, the Office of the President, the Ministry of Strategy and Industry and the General Staff is aimed at one common goal - the protection of the country. The minister emphasized that the state institutions will scale the successes in the introduction of drones to other areas of technological warfare. At the same time, he urged to avoid rumors, scandals and attempts to create conflicts between structures. -Unity has been Ukraine's greatest asset since February 24, and it will continue to be so. Our task is to work together for victory, each in his own place,- concluded Mykhailo Fedorov. Ukraine continues to strengthen its defense capabilities thanks to new technologies and cohesion. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine is looking for innovative technologies for combating the aggressor's drones.

Title: Ten Russians at the Kobzon concert — an impressive raid performed by our special forces
Description: The video of the combat work of special forces was published on the unit's channel. During a raid in a forest area, special forces encountered enemy infantry and destroyed it with aimed fire. The bodies of the slain enemies were recorded on camera. -During a light walk, UA_REG minus 10 orcs,- the unit commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces demonstrated numerous hits on Russians during the battles in the Kursk region.

Title: S-400 attack on Kharkiv: 26 injured, dozens of buildings damaged
Description: reported this by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. As a result of shelling from the S-400 complex, more than 40 buildings and 5 cars were damaged. 26 people were injured. Fragments of a downed Shahed drone were found in a field near the village of Dokuchayeva. According to the head of the OVA, in the village of Kotlyari, an enemy UAV strike caused a fire in the tire fitting building. Three private households were damaged in the Dergachiv community in the village of Slatine. In the Kupyan district, an educational institution building, four residential buildings and one administrative building were damaged as a result of an attack by guided aerial bombs (UAB). Another KAB hit an open area outside the village. In the city of Kupyansk, a drone struck near an educational institution. A 66-year-old man was injured and hospitalized. As a result of the aggravation of the situation, 51 people were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. We will remind, the number of victims as a result of the Russian attack in Kharkiv on Monday increased. As reported by ArmyInform, a man died as a result of drone attacks in the Mykolaiv Region.

Title: Ministry of Defense: An interdepartmental commission is investigating the causes of the abnormal act...
Description: About this Ministry of Defense reported November 26. -The absence of comments in the public space does not mean that the Ministry of Defense is inactive or does not respond to information that comes from the military or appears, in particular, in the mass media. At the same time, the Ministry of Defense works in a closed perimeter to ensure maximum efficiency and security. Because of the ongoing Russian aggression, information about the progress of the work is sensitive, so it remains with limited access,- the statement of the Ministry of Defense said. According to his data, the use of the specified batches of ammunition in the Defense Forces, as well as their issuance to combat units, is currently suspended until completion of determining the causes of abnormal operation. The batch of delivered ammunition has been withdrawn for further research. Instead, imported mines will be supplied. Preliminary results of the investigation of the interagency commission into the supply of low-quality 120-mm mortar mines indicate possible causes of defects, in particular, low-quality powder charges or violations of ammunition storage conditions, which led to their damage. According to this fact, the State Bureau of Investigation started criminal proceedings. According to the results of the work of the interdepartmental commission, appropriate personnel decisions will be made regarding the responsible officials. The Ministry of Defense emphasizes that it is the customer of the specified type of weapons for the Defense Forces. At the same time, the executor of the state order is the Ministry of Strategic Industries. Currently, the Ministry of Defense has defined measures to improve the quality control process. It is about strengthening the monitoring of storage conditions and improving inspection procedures at all stages: from production and storage to delivery to the front line. Also, the interagency commission will conduct an inspection of mortar mines of other calibers for compliance with production standards, quality of components and their storage conditions. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine expands tools procurement financing to provide the Armed Forces with modern and latest military equipment.

Title: Another important object of the enemy was hit by our artillery
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past 24 hours, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit the personnel concentration area, five control points and another important enemy object. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1480 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 6 tanks, 20 armored combat vehicles, 19 artillery systems, 72 operational-tactical UAVs, a cruise missile, 94 vehicles and 2 units of special equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the situation at the front is difficult: The Armed Forces stopped more than 190 Russian assaults.

Title: -Move quickly!- GUR recorded the conversations of North Korean soldiers in Kurshchyna
Description: Radio intercept recording released on November 26 by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Get out quickly! Move back quickly, quickly!- - said a military man on the radio in Korean. GUR reminds that there will be a just retribution for every war crime committed against the Ukrainian people. As reported by ArmyInform, GUR showed drones that attacks military objects of the aggressor.

Title: Russian troops shelled the critical infrastructure of the Kherson region, there are victims
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Stanislav, Berislav, Sofiivka, Tyaginka, Mykhailivka, Antonivka, Chervyn Mayak, Shiroka Balka, Tomarine, Kachkarivka, Komyshany, Olhivka, Prydniprovske, Sadove, Naddniprianske and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military hit the critical infrastructure and residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged 2 high-rise buildings, 8 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a farm building and a private car. According to information of Khersonska ODA, around seven o'clock in the morning, Russian soldiers attacked a resident of Berislav. As a result of dropping explosives from the UAV, a 59-year-old man received a mine-explosive injury, injuries to his face and head. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers struck 285 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 74-year-old man was injured as a result of Russian attacks in Pologiv district.

Title: Almost two hundred UAVs - the enemy released a record number of drones
Description: On the morning of November 26 the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported the results of the night attack of the Russians. Unfortunately, critical infrastructure objects are hit, and private and apartment buildings are damaged in several regions due to a mass UAV attack. Previously, there were no victims or victims. On the night of November 26, 2024 (from 7:30 p.m. on November 25), the invaders attacked Ukraine with Iskander-M ballistic missiles from the Voronezh and Kursk regions. During the night attack, the enemy launched a record number of Shahed-type attack UAVs and unmanned aerial vehicles of an unknown type from the directions of Orel, Bryansk, Kursk, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation. 192 air targets were detected and escorted by the radio engineering troops of the Air Force: — 4 -Iskander-M- ballistic missiles; — 188 enemy unmanned aerial vehicles. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 76 enemy drones in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, Vinnytsia, Chernivtsi, Ternopil, Rivne, Zaporizhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Odesa, and Mykolaiv regions. As reported by ArmyInform, in the South shot down the Iskander-M missile and five reconnaissance UAVs.

Title: In Ternopil, the Russians hit an energy facility
Description: This was reported on November 26 by the Ternopil Regional State Administration. -Fortunately, there are no human victims. Firefighters and police are on the scene. Relevant services are working to eliminate the problem,- said the message of the Ternopil Regional State Administration. According to data of Mayor Serhii Nadal, trolleybuses and elevators are currently not working in the city. As reported by ArmyInform, a man was killed as a result of drone attacks in Mykolayiv Oblast a>.

Title: Infernal hundreds are going to the ground: in the Pokrovsky direction, Russian invaders are being di...
Description: Serhiy Tsekhotskyi, officer 59, told about this on the air -Social News- of a separate mechanized brigade named after Yakov Handziuk. According to Serhiy Tsehotskyi, on average, the soldiers of their brigade eliminate 113 occupiers every day. At the same time, the robot against the enemy's rear is particularly effective against assaults. -Every day we liquidate one or another piece of equipment in their rear areas as close as possible. The equipment with which they try to go on assaults is used to transport personnel or to work somewhere from closed positions around us. This work in the complex is carried out constantly,- noted Serhii Tsehotskyi. How reported ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction the enemy increased the number of attacks - respectively his losses increased.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Five or six assaults per day — the Russians continue to press on the Pokrovsky direction
Description: Lieutenant Yuliya Stepaniuk, head of the communications department of the 117th heavy mechanized brigade, told on the ArmyTV stream about this. -It can be 10-15, sometimes 20 people. First, FPV drones work on them, then resets, then the infantry joins in: machine guns, mortars. And we can have 5-6 such assaults per day. One can only imagine the scale of this influx, which is approaching,- noted Yuliya Stepaniuk. According to her, from time to time the enemy also engages armored vehicles, in particular tanks, which work on our positions. But the 117th brigade in its area of ​​responsibility maintains the defense. As reported by ArmyInform, a quarter of all attacks the enemy fell on the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: A man died as a result of drone attacks in the Mykolayiv region
Description: This was reported by the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim. During the day of November 25, the enemy attacked the Kutsurub community four times with FPV drones. One of the shellings occurred in the village of Solonchaky during the distribution of humanitarian aid. As a result of the attack, six people were injured, including two representatives of the humanitarian mission and four local residents. Unfortunately, the 30-year-old man, who was in a serious condition, died at the hospital. The other victims are in stable condition. On the same day, at 4:34 p.m., the water area of ​​the Ochakiv community came under enemy artillery fire. There are no casualties. In addition, on the night of November 26, four UAVs of the Shahed 131/136 type were destroyed in the Mykolaiv Oblast by air defense forces and means. We will remind you that the enemy ->a drone attacked people during the distribution of humanitarian aid in the Mykolayiv region: there are wounded. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers struck 285 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 74-year-old man was injured as a result of Russian attacks in Pologiv district.

Title: A difficult situation at the front: the Armed Forces stopped more than 190 Russian assaults
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Yesterday, the enemy hit the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with five missile strikes, using seven missiles, as well as 65 airstrikes, dropping 96 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out more than 4,450 attacks on populated areas and the positions of our troops, 112 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and engaged about one and a half thousand kamikaze drones for destruction. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Stepok, Pavlivka, Yablunivka, Mala Rybytsia, Vovchanski Khutory, Velikiy Burluk, Pitomnyk, Mali Prohody, Chervona Zorya, Okip, Slatine, Kupyansk, Kruglyakivka, Bohuslavka, Ivanivka, Minkivka, Slov' Yansk, Grodivka, Dachne, Bogatyr, Velika Novosilka, Novy Komar, Olhivka In the Kharkiv direction Russian terrorists unsuccessfully stormed the positions of Ukrainian units five times in the Vovchansk, Kudiivka and Kozacha Lopan districts. Bomber and attack aircraft were actively engaged for strikes in the direction. In the Kupyan direction, 23 attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Synkivka, Lozova, Kruglyakivka, and Zeleny Gayu. In the Lyman direction, the invaders attacked the positions of our defenders eleven times. They tried to penetrate our defenses near Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Yampolivka, and Torsky. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked four times in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. Over the past day, in the Toretsk direction, the occupiers stormed the positions of our defenders six times in the Toretsk, Dachnoi, and Shcherbinivka districts. One battle is still going on. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 51 offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Petrivka, Dachenske, Pushkine and Pustinka settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 46 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance near Sontsivka, Berestki, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Dalny, Kurakhovo, Uspenivka, Elizavetivka, and Hannivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 13 assaults on our positions in the districts of Rivnopol, Novodarivka, Kostiantynopolski and Sukhy Yaliv. In the Orichivsk direction, the enemy twice attacked the positions of our defenders near Novoandriivka last day. Three times, the invaders unsuccessfully tried to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their positions on the Dnieper direction. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1480 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 6 tanks, 20 armored combat vehicles, 19 artillery systems, 72 operational-tactical UAVs, a cruise missile, 94 vehicles and 2 units of special equipment.

Title: Veni, vidi, twice! — two Russian soldiers were hunted in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 26 on the page of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Operators of the 73rd Maritime Center of the SSO raided enemy positions in the Kursk region. During the shooting battle, two servicemen of the Russian army were successfully eliminated. ArmyInform talked about the fact that special forces captured important prisoners.

Title: The enemy keeps a missile carrier in the Black Sea: there is a threat of a strike
Description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are no enemy ships in the Mediterranean. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, russia is forced to raise large forces for air defense and other military infrastructure to maintain control over the temporarily occupied Crimea.

Title: The occupiers hit Zaporizhzhia 285 times: there is one injured
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out an air strike on Novodarivka. In addition, 148 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Primorske, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Malynivka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olgivske. Also, 16 shellings from the MLRS covered Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka and Mala Tokmachka. According to the head of the OVA, 120 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Zaliznychny, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Novodarivka, and Olhivskyi. -We received 18 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy poraneni/->a drone attacked people during the distribution of humanitarian aid in the Mykolaiv region: there are wounded.

Title: Two dozen BBMs and almost 1,500 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 26, 2024 are estimated to be: prorvaty-oboronu-nashyh-vijsk/->The Ukrainian Armed Forces stopped 185 attempts by the Russians break through the defense of our troops.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 185 attempts by the Russians to break through the defense of our troops
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The invaders launched three missile strikes on the territory of Ukraine with three missiles, 47 airstrikes, shot down 63 anti-aircraft missiles, and also used 647 kamikaze drones. At the same time, the enemy fired 3,360 shots at the positions of our troops and settlements. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units near Vovchansk, Kudiivka and Kozacha Lopan five times. the enemy carried out an airstrike with a KAB on Pytomnik. 23 times the enemy stormed the positions of the Ukrainian military in the Kupyansk direction near Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Synkivka, Lozova, Kruglyakivka and Zeleny Gay. The enemy dropped aerial bombs in the areas of Velikiy Burluk, Kupyansk, Kruglyakivka and Boguslavka settlements. In the Lyman direction, the Russian invaders tried to advance 11 times in the districts of Grekivka, Novoyehorivka, Yampolivka, and Torsky. The defenders of Ukraine steadfastly hold the defense, inflicting significant losses on the enemy. The enemy carried out an airstrike by KABs on Ivanovka. In the Kramatorsk direction the enemy tried to advance four times in the areas of Stupochka and Chasiv Yar settlements. Minskivka and Slovyansk were hit by airstrikes. On the Toretsk direction the aggressor attacked six times near Toretsk, Dachny and Shcherbinivka. Currently, three clashes are ongoing. The Pokrovsky direction maintains a high intensity of hostilities. The number of clashes has increased to 51. The invaders continue to attack our positions near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Petrivka, Dachenske, Pushkine and Pustinka. On the outskirts of Grodivka, the enemy carried out an airstrike by NARs. Previous losses of the aggressor 350 occupiers were killed and wounded in this direction. Two tanks, three motorcycles, a mortar, four cars were also destroyed, while two more cars and a motorcycle were damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction there were 45 combat clashes of varying intensity. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the Sontsivka, Berestki, Zori, Novodmytrivka, Dalny, Kurakhovo, Uspenivka, Elizavetivka, and Hannivka districts. One skirmish continues. In the Vremivsk direction the aggressor stormed the front edge of our defense 13 times in the area of ​​Rivnopol, Novodarivka, Kostiantynopolski and Sukhy Yali. In the Orikhov direction, the enemy twice stormed our positions in the Novoandriivka area. In the Dnieper direction three attacks by the occupiers failed. However, the Defense Forces are holding back the onslaught of the Russian invaders. The department honored the soldiers of the 28th separate mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign, the 100th separate mechanized brigade, the 14th operational brigade named after Ivan Bohun, the 425th separate assault battalion, the 118th separate mechanized brigade, the 126th separate brigade of Territorial Forces defenders who bravely hold their positions, skillfully repulse enemy attacks, inflict significant losses on the invaders. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade showed footage of the recent repelling the second wave of the Russian assault using equipment and infantry.

Title: What are the advantages of the corps-brigade system: an expert on the new concept of reorganization ...
Description: This may also mean how much the military management system will improve, said military expert Petro Chernyk: -We have a major combat unit, a brigade. However, we understand that the brigade does not fight by itself, considering the fact that we have a huge section of the front with a total length of about a thousand kilometers. Some number of brigades are fighting. The next control body that appears is the so-called tactical group, which can include 7-8 combat brigades. This is where the first problem appears. The command of the tactical group is a collective mess. This is not a permanent unit, it is temporary. There is a constant rotation of officers, which can actually reduce the quality of combat management of such large units. Therefore, we came to the conclusion that a full-time corps should be organized.- A corps can be anywhere from 4 to 7 brigades with the entire command network deployed. Why did they bypass the division link? A divisional unit is 3-4 brigades and is a duplicating body. There, again, a bunch of commanders, a bunch of operatives are needed there, they will be engaged in nothing but dubbing of the corps link. Could it have gone the divisional route? No. In my opinion, this is counterproductive. The conditional corps is 6-7 brigades. These are two divisions. So, instead of one corps level, there would be two divisional levels, which in the end creates a shortage of officers for such a large number of troops. What is the world practice? And so and so. Let's say the United States has the 101st Scalloping Eagles. But it is more of a historical character, because the divisional system justified itself well in the Second World War. But there are nuances. Both the Soviet Union, Nazi Germany, and the Allies had such a gigantic number of troops, so they could afford it. We cannot afford it. Plus, we understand that this is also funding for a potential division link.

Title: From the police to the Armed Forces: the instructor - Oak - told why every policeman should pass the...
Description: ArmyInform, a military officer spoke about the choice of each police officer, the danger of a logical trap due to euphoria or despair when consuming information about the war from the media, as well as why every adult citizen of Ukraine is obliged to pass the BZVP. Dub met the large-scale invasion in the ranks of the National Police. Took part in military operations on the territory of Zhytomyr and Kyiv regions. After the enemy was pushed beyond the borders of Zhytomyr and Kyiv regions, he resigned from the National Police and joined the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Subsequently, -Dub- took part in military operations in the Zaporizhzhia, Kherson, and Donetsk regions. In particular, he fought in the Bakhmut direction in the areas of Avdiivka, Klishchiivka, and Kurdyumivka. — I was injured there, after which I learned to walk again. And after rehabilitation, I was offered a position at a training center so that I could share my practical experience and teach as many new recruits as possible to perform their duties well, says the instructor. He adds that at that time he was not sure that he would be able to perform combat tasks due to his health, so he decided to transfer. Now, after recovery, he again submitted a report for transfer to a combat unit. — Some of my former police colleagues also joined the ranks of the Armed Forces, others continue to serve in the National Police. This is a worthy choice, because if all police officers resign and go to the Armed Forces, then there will be chaos in the rear. -Policemen in the rear are necessary,- says the soldier, answering a question about whether all police officers should go to war. He adds that training as a police officer is not enough to immediately become a soldier. -Oak- points out that the specifics of the work of the National Police in the rear, and even of the special police officers, are the detention of small groups of criminals armed with small arms and the release of hostages, and not at all combat operations inherent in modern warfare. — The level of training of National Police employees is not comparable to the level required in the Armed Forces. The skills and abilities of a police officer are not enough to participate in combat operations using FPV drones, artillery, tanks and other numerous means of fire damage that they want to kill you with, the military emphasizes. He is convinced that police officers need just as much intensive training during BZVP as anyone else. After all, modern war requires fundamentally different knowledge, abilities and skills than even special police officers from specialized units have. So police officers have to retrain and relearn a lot. — Being -at zero-, I would not want to worry that something bad might happen to my family. Therefore, I rely on my police colleagues who continue to serve in the rear. Their work and labor is also needed, -Dub- emphasizes. However, at the same time, he notes that rear-line policemen must be trained for combat operations even if they continue to serve in the rear. — In my personal opinion, it may well happen when they will also have to become servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, will have to take up weapons, not just automatic weapons. Therefore, all Ukrainians should receive at least minimal military training, the instructor is convinced. Similarly, he believes, basic general military training of all civilians should be provided. This does not mean that everyone who has it will go to the front or even serve in the Armed Forces. However, everyone should have a minimum set of knowledge and skills in order to be able to defend Ukraine in case of need. -Oak- explains its position with personal experience.
