He is convinced that the availability of basic knowledge helped him a lot in the first months of the great war, becoming the basis for the further acquisition and improvement of the abilities and skills of a serviceman. — I expected that I would have to defend Ukraine with weapons in my hands, and I was preparing for it, because I understood that a big war would definitely happen. He tried to learn, learn information about weapons, about the tactics of action in small groups, studied topography, orientation on the terrain. He prepared little by little, he says. That is why everyone should be at least minimally prepared for hostilities, because with such a neighbor as the Russian Federation, there will always be a danger of new aggression and renewed hostilities. - Now our population has relaxed, started to lose the sense of danger that was in the first months of the large-scale invasion. It seems to many that the war is somewhere far away, and therefore will not affect them personally. It is very dangerous to think like that, - the former policeman is convinced, because the war is actually very close, and has already affected, and continues to determine the life of every Ukrainian. -Dub- puts a significant share of responsibility for this attitude of Ukrainians towards the war on the media and the state information policy aimed at reassuring people and the promise of a quick end to the war and easy victories. — -Two or three weeks, two or three months - and we will win. We have liberated Kherson and will soon enter the Crimea!-. After hearing this, people began to believe that they are no longer needed in the army, because what is the point of changing your life, joining the army, if victory will soon come without you? he asks rhetorically. Due to excessive optimism in the presentation of information about the war, Ukrainians began to distance themselves from the topic of the war and stopped following what was happening at the front. Because they believed that the Armed Forces of Ukraine would handle everything perfectly without their personal involvement. And then there was a -distortion- in the opposite direction - they began to tell that everything was bad and that Russia was still winning. Therefore, people began to get the impression that their participation would not change anything. In fact, the military man is convinced, only the joint efforts of the entire society, the entire country — all Ukrainians and women need to make efforts to win. - Many people are afraid to join the army because they believe that they will be thrown into the trenches, and they will, let's say, always sit in the trenches - in the mud, in the mud, in the cold. It's not like the army is functioning at all, a lot of specialists are needed, including logistics, clerks, cooks, drivers, and repairmen, the instructor explains. Therefore, in the Armed Forces there will be a place for everyone within the limits of his specialty and abilities. The decision to join the army, he believes, does not mean the end of life, but rather becomes a new stage in it. The extent to which a recruit will be able to realize himself in the Armed Forces will depend on him. - This is what I tell the servicemen who come to our unit for training - that they need to learn, to be able to do everything. But I draw their attention to the fact that not all of them will necessarily become stormtroopers or fight on the front lines, the instructor explains. At the same time, everyone who joins the army must pass the BZVP, because there can always be an urgent need to join the battle for everyone - as it was in February 2022, when everyone stood in lines for weapons, regardless of civilian profession and having military experience. - In 2022, no one paid attention to the civilian profession - it was necessary to take up arms and defend one's land. Because of this, basic general military training is now conducted to ensure that everyone has general combat skills. Then the fighters are sent to professional training depending on where they will be assigned, -Dub- explains. He emphasizes that, already during the BZVP at the training center, the instructors find out what education, skills and skills the recruits have from their previous civilian experience. This allows them to be recommended for exactly those positions where they can be most effective in the ranks of the Armed Forces, and therefore useful for the defense of Ukraine. — We can make recommendations to which position to assign a particular serviceman in order to make the most effective use of their skills that they have acquired throughout their lives working in civilian professions, so that they can be as effective as possible in the ranks of the Armed Forces, the instructor says. — We communicate directly with the brigades of the airborne assault troops that are on the front line, we exchange training recommendations. They make certain corrections, recommendations on training, on the necessary practical or theoretical knowledge that is actually needed on the front line, - says -Dub-. Thanks to this, the training is structured in such a way as to give the maximum necessary knowledge and not to overload the cadet with secondary information, not to take his time and energy for unnecessary things that will not be needed during the service. - From the statutes, we study only the most necessary, and we almost completely reject military training, since there is no practical need for it. We have instructors and officers with combat experience, they understand very well what is needed, what knowledge needs to be invested, - explains the instructor. He notes that the BZVP is the foundation on which each soldier will then be able to build his knowledge depending on the needs of his future position in the ranks of the Armed Forces. - My conscience does not allow me to teach them badly, because their lives depend on how I teach them. If one of them gets injured or dies in the future, I take it on my own account in the sense that I did not teach them well, that I did not give them a certain amount of information, a certain amount of theoretical or practical skills, did not motivate, did not brought something necessary, - says -Oak-. Currently, the soldier is already completing rehabilitation and has submitted a report for transfer to a combat position, because he believes that soon he will be able to be more effective on the front line. — My rehabilitation is already coming to an end, I understand for myself that I am ready to perform combat tasks, that I can lead people with me. Therefore, I am preparing to be transferred or seconded to a combat brigade in the near future, and there to perform my duties directly on the battlefield.

Title: All-weather beam-protector: a high-energy laser weapon system was presented to the US Army
Description: As stated in the annotation to this project, the text of which posted on the official portal of the developer firm, FIREFLY is designed to combat the growing asymmetric threats associated with with unmanned systems, and is a significant technological breakthrough in the field of air defense, ArmyInform reports. The system has a mobile and pallet (for stationary deployment) design with a modular architecture and scalable power (from 5 kW to 40 kW), specially designed to protect forward positions and critical infrastructure. The FIREFLY combat mechanism (-Svitlyak-, -Svitlyachok- in Ukrainian) is designed on the basis of a universal open architecture, optimized to balance performance, reliability, serviceability and portability. Thanks to modular replaceable units (LRUs), the system adapts to a wide range of operational applications and provides the flexibility to configure, customize and upgrade its capabilities as needs arise. This design allows FIREFLY to interact with C3S computer systems, such as FAAD (Forward Area Air Defense, -Forward Area Air Defense- - Ukrainian) and MEDUSA (Advanced Technology System for Small Unmanned Aerial Vehicles) and other autonomous detection systems (such as radars and optical sensors). The modular structure also facilitates maintenance at the intermediate and field levels, reducing operating costs by using low-cost, commercially available components. To provide target tracking, FIREFLY is equipped with an ISR (surveillance systems) payload, which includes independent visible and infrared surveillance systems, as well as advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities for remote threat detection and classification. One of the key advantages of this system, according to the experts of the Army Recognition defense portal, is its ability to work continuously for a long time. This allows the FIREFLY to neutralize multiple targets without the need for frequent reloads or reloads. Such indicators are critical when fending off massive attacks from multiple drones or other similar aerial threats. FIREFLY's functionality has undergone 34 months of rigorous testing, demonstrating its adaptability in challenging environments, including testing in temperatures from −15°C to 35°C, as well as challenging weather conditions such as heavy rain, snow, and sandstorms. The weapon was deployed on both fixed and unprepared sites, which confirmed its adaptability and ease of transport and deployment. This high-energy laser system is designed to be cost-effective with minimal logistical support thanks to simplified maintenance processes. KORD specialists focused on reducing production costs and delivery times by using commercially available components, ensuring increased reliability and rapid availability of fully ready-to-deploy units. FIREFLY is offered on competitive commercial terms, making it the perfect solution for armed forces that require modern, ready-to-deploy defense technology. The increasing use of drones in modern warfare is radically changing the battlefield, creating new threats that require innovative countermeasures. These include directed energy (DE) weapons, particularly lasers, which stand out for their accuracy and effectiveness. These technologies are becoming important tools to counter unmanned aerial systems (UAS), which play an increasingly important role in today's conflicts. UAVs pose a significant threat to military personnel and equipment. Their low production cost, ability to transport various payloads, and reduced risk of injury to operators make them particularly attractive to both state and non-state actors. Recent conflicts, such as those in Ukraine, Yemen and Gaza, have highlighted the growing importance of drones in military operations. In response to this growing threat, the military is investing heavily in counter-UAS systems (CUAS), where laser technologies, with their rapid target neutralization capabilities and long-term cost-effectiveness, will play a central role in defense strategies. Mobile High Energy Laser Weapon System FIREFLY. Video: KORD

Title: The fifth wave — higher than two meters: - Book flood - will sweep through Ukraine and distribute mo...
Description: This is the fifth wave of the initiative launched in 2015, shortly after the beginning of the open armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine. As before, it is aimed at popularizing reading and supporting libraries from different regions of Ukraine - both front-line and those that sheltered many forced migrants. This time, as part of the -Book Rush-, more than 31,000 books will be transferred to Ukrainian libraries, including books for children and teenagers, Ukrainian classics and modern literature of various genres, translations of foreign authors, popular science literature and books about the war experience, works of veterans and volunteers. The co-organizers of the -Book Rush- told the correspondent of ArmiyaInform about the action. — The National Military Historical Museum of Ukraine is a museum of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine system, a military museum. When we learned that the fifth wave of the -Book Rush- action would take place, we offered to join it, says Yuriy Bilous, deputy director of the National Military Historical Museum of Ukraine. In particular, a small exhibition was placed at the entrance to the museum, which presents all the books that will be transferred to libraries within the initiative. - This is necessary so that anyone can see the total volume of collected books. After all, there will be 300 sets of 100 books each, which will be distributed to the libraries of Kharkiv, Sumy, Poltava, Mykolaiv, Ivano-Frankivsk and Volyn regions, he explains. It is important for people to see this volume visually, because the information about 100 books that will be transferred to each library is a certain abstraction. When you collect the books together on one shelf or put them in a stack, it is already a small library of modern Ukrainian literature. - One hundred books is a lot. If it is conventionally assumed that each book is at least two centimeters thick, then the height of a column of stacked books will be more than two meters, says the deputy director of the National Military Historical Museum. Several books from the collected list relate in one way or another to military topics, talk about the modern Russian-Ukrainian war - an aggressive war on the part of the Russian Federation and a just defensive war on the part of Ukraine. - Since we are a military museum, together with the organizers of -Book Rush- we paid special attention to this, - explains Yuriy Bilous. However, since the selection is intended primarily for the average mass Ukrainian reader, the share of books on military topics is not decisive in it. In view of this, in addition to the basic standard set of books for libraries, the organizers plan to create a special selection of books specifically for the military. — There are many children's books, books for teenagers, which are less needed by the military. Therefore, there will be a separate list specifically for adults, for the military, he says. The museum owner invites everyone to visit the National Military History Museum of Ukraine, because in it you can not only see with your own eyes books from the fifth wave of the -Book Flood-, but also get acquainted with unique exhibits from the history of the Ukrainian military. — This is the fifth wave of the -Book Rush- launched by the -Information Resistance- group. The first took place back in 2015. Then, in addition to our usual activities - monitoring the situation, identifying and investigating security risks, countering aggression against Ukraine in the information sphere, we also decided to pay more attention to communication with people -on the ground-, - says the coordinator of the -Information Resistance- group. historian and museum expert Oleksiy Kopytko. One of the effective options was cooperation with libraries and the dissemination of modern Ukrainian literature, organization of scientific and educational events. — At first, emphasis was placed on literature of a historical profile. Our first waves of actions were connected with books about the Holodomor, with the distribution of the ten-volume popular science book -History without censorship- from the public educational project to popularize the history of Ukraine -likbez. Historical front-. Instead, we have now put together a universal kit aimed at popularizing Ukrainian books and reading in general, he explains. The demand from libraries for new literature, which is catastrophically lacking, is very high. Books are needed by all readers of all ages, so in the fifth wave of the -Book Rush- they tried to please every taste and preference. - This is children's literature, which includes both new classics and works on the school curriculum. It is also scientific popular literature, including several encyclopedias of a natural nature. This is literature for teenagers, this is what is called -non-fiction- - modern and classic Ukrainian and translated literature, says Oleksiy Kopytko. — A separate block consists of books related to understanding the experience of modern war. This is an experience of different regions - there are books about Okhtyrka, several books about Kharkiv, about Kherson. We want to collect such a palette of books that make up a certain -military- kit for any reader, - explains the coordinator of -Information Resistance-. Having received such a universal set, the library will be able to offer different groups of readers the latest Ukrainian publications that will be of interest to them. — Since the resources are quite limited and, so to speak, not comparable to the need, we decided to focus primarily on several regions from the East and South of Ukraine. First of all, these are Kharkiv, Sumy, Poltava and Mykolaiv regions. We also included two regions of Western Ukraine — Volynsk and Ivano-Frankivsk, because many people moved from the East and found shelter that way, as well as in the central regions, he says. Also, the -Information Resistance- group establishes contacts with the training centers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There you need literature for conducting classes - about weapons, about battle tactics, publication of motivational and psychological content, etc. — We are now preparing to form a certain set of books that will go to educational centers with an orientation primarily to instructors. We started a certain dialogue in order to understand what they specifically need and what is needed as a priority, because the needs are huge and it is necessary to understand the best way to ensure them, Oleksiy Kopytko said. public libraries, is already rolling across Ukraine. Organizers have completed accepting and selecting applications and are starting to ship books to selected libraries. The libraries of the Sumy region will be the first. — We had the following approach: formally, there are more than 10,000 public libraries in Ukraine. Unfortunately, some of them are, to put it mildly, -inanimate-. We wanted to find those libraries of various levels that are important to their communities. They can be small, but if there is life in the village around the library, some events are taking place, children come or people of all ages come - then we wanted to strengthen such libraries within the boundaries of -Book Crowd-, - explains Oleksiy Kopytko. For this review, the organizers, in addition to reviewing applications, also looked at library websites, pages and groups in social networks, which show how active and important the library is to the local community. So far, the -Information Resistance- group has collected more than 31,000 books from 26 publishing houses, more than 40 books from the set were published in the book capital of Ukraine — near the frontline, Kharkiv. Three sets of 101 books each have already gone to the first three libraries. Read also: - A book on the front: what the defenders are reading at -zero- More about the -Book Rush- action from the -Information Resistance- group and the National Military-Historical the Museum of Ukraine can be found on the project's pages in social networks Facebook and Telegram.

Title: In the swamps, counterfeiters attack computer games: why is this the enemy
Description: Plots from video games see them everywhere. For example, propagandists are spreading information on social networks that the German TV channel allegedly used footage from the American video game -Call of Duty- in the video of the assault on Russian positions by soldiers of the Azov brigade in the Pokrovsky direction. But in fact, this is not Pokrovsky direction, but Serebryansk forestry in Luhansk region. The video was shot in first person and is divided into three sections: advancing through positions, mopping up, and securing after the assault. There are no computer graphics on it. Apparently, the Russians still cannot believe that the Ukrainians are capable of defending their native land so selflessly. For them, the heroism of the military is beyond reality, so they believe in the fictions of their fakers.

Title: - Footage from drones resembles scenes from Hollywood action movies - fighters about repelling the s...
Description: A video of the combat operation appearedon the unit's page on November 25. -Thanks to the coordinated work of our units, we stopped the enemy, inflicting significant losses on him. Footage from drones, on which every moment of the battle is recorded, resembles scenes from Hollywood action movies. But this is not a movie. This is the harsh reality of today's war in Ukraine,- the fighters commented. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade showed destruction of Russians who decided to attack on -Niva- passenger cars, protected only by camouflage and electronic radar.

Title: Destroyed the Russian infantry fighting vehicle and infantry with two mines: the story of the former...
Description: His story was published by Army. Pavlo -Beton- is the commander of the mortar unit of the 60th separate mechanized Ingulets brigade. He repels enemy assaults almost every day, covering his comrades. Pavlo strikes at enemy concentrations and equipment, despite continuous fire from enemy artillery and tanks. -During one of the battles, -Beton- deliberately destroyed a stationary BMP of the enemy, under which enemy infantry was hiding. Two 120-mm mines were enough for this - the technicians tore off the tower, and the infantrymen were burned,- said the Ground Forces. Pavel admits that he wants even more such results. His main motivation is to protect his fellow vanguards. For his courage and skill, Pavlo was awarded the Golden Cross. -Beton- was born in the city of Kryvyi Rih. Before the full-scale invasion, he worked as a locksmith. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade showed destruction of the Russians who decided to attack in Niva cars protected only by camouflage and REB.

Title: - The enemy has no chance in armor - our fighters showed footage of the destruction of three BMP and...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel on November 25. -The enemy has no chance in armor when our pilots are working! 3 BMP and 1 BBM were destroyed,- Ukrainian fighters said. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the unmanned systems battalion of the 110th mechanized brigade named after Corporal General Mark Bezruchka destroyed 6 enemy transport means.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: We expect that partners will take the initiative in equipping our brigades
Description: This is stated in the minister's message on the Facebook page. -Allies' support will become faster and more effective. The defenders of Ukraine must be provided with everything necessary to put an end to Russian aggression,- said Rustem Umyerov. The ministers discussed the urgent needs of the Defense Forces, as well as the priority areas of assistance to Ukraine. -We count on the fact that partners will take the initiative in equipping our brigades and battalions. We have a successful experience of cooperation with France, which provided training for one of the Ukrainian brigades and also provided it with armored vehicles,- said Rustem Umyerov. Another area of ​​support is strengthening our anti-aircraft defenses ahead of winter. The enemy does not stop trying to destroy our critical infrastructure, so we need more air defense systems and ammunition for them. The next important issue is artillery ammunition. Rustem Umyerov thanked our European partners for providing Ukraine with 1 million artillery shells, but noted that Ukraine needs more to achieve parity with the enemy. -Together with its allies, Ukraine is already building the potential of the domestic defense industry. We invite the countries of the free world to transfer technology to us and start strategic partnerships with our industry,- he said. The minister informed the partners about the areas in which we see significant opportunities for cooperation: At the same time, it is planned to conduct an audit with the allied states of the aid provided during 2022, 2023 and 2024 in order to determine which models of support to Ukraine worked best and scale them up. Ukraine is also open to new initiatives that will help quickly meet the needs of our soldiers in 2025. -We must act boldly and coherently. Only in this way will we be able to achieve a just and lasting peace in Europe,- Rustem Umyerov stressed. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine reached specific agreements with Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Lithuania on investing directly in Ukrainian production.

Title: The enemy DRG was stopped in the north of the Kharkiv region: part of the Russian saboteurs were eli...
Description: The spokesperson of Kharkiv OTU, Lt. Col. Yevhenii Romanov, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. -It was immediately partially destroyed, partially retreated to the territory of the Russian Federation,- he said. The spokesman explained that the actions of the DRG in border areas are a common practice. - Subversive intelligence groups are a common Russian practice. They try to enter in small groups in order to find out where there is some opening for them - an opportunity to enter, start a fight or advance somewhere. But these efforts always end in the same way - with the corpses of Russians, - assured Yevhenii Romanov. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces stopped the breakthrough of Russian saboteurs in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Attack -into the heart-: our drone flew into the Russian BTR-82
Description: The video of combat operation appeared on November 25 on the unit's page. In the video, you can see how a Ukrainian drone flies into the BTR-82, as well as the destruction of 2 mortars, the Tigr, Buhanka, machine gun positions, the Urals, and several occupants. FPV FIRE POWER: ACHILLES SHOCK AIRCRAFT BATTALION DESTROYES ENEMY EQUIPMENT IN KHARKIV Oblast Thanks to the community @sternenko for the donated FPV drones. Donat on RUSORIZ - many good deeds are ahead pic.twitter.com/ySA4p6bqmn — BUBpAK “ACHILLES” 92 OSHBr (@achilles_92osbr) November 25, 2024 As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of attack unmanned air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk hit two heavy flamethrowers at once TOS-1A -Solntsepok- salvo fire system.

Title: In the battle to the slaughter or to the tribunal: in the Siverskyi direction, the Russians are moti...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . The depressed mood among Russian soldiers is due to the extremely high level of casualties and the lack of success in the Siversk region. -Already now we can say about unsuccessful operations, unsuccessful assaults in the previous period of time - for about a month they tried to storm with equipment using a large amount of equipment that was completely broken and destroyed,- the spokeswoman said. In an attempt to rectify the situation, the Russians replaced the command staff here, and deployed military police on the ranks. — As a result of this, there were big changes in the enemy group standing in the Seversky direction: the brigade commander was changed, the combatants were changed. The military police came, as far as we know, in order to -motivate- the personnel to go into battle, the officer said. However, even this does not give the desired result to the Russian invaders - the soldiers of the Russian army refuse to perform combat tasks. ArmyInform previously reported that propagandystiv/->in OTU -Luhansk- denied the statements of Russian propagandists about the advance of the occupiers to the northern part Toretska.

Title: The escape attempt ended with a call to the rescuers: three men barely survived in Tisza
Description: About this notifies November 25 State Border Service of Ukraine. -The men used the services of traders who promised to help them cross the border by land, but after paying for the -service- they were told that they would still have to go into the water,- the report said. It is noted that the shippers, traditionally disregarding the lives of their customers, directed them to the Tisza after dark, lying that the water there was knee-deep, the river itself was not wide, and therefore they would cross it with ease and would not even have time to freeze. No flotation devices or life jackets were offered to the men. -Taking off their shoes and slightly rolling up their pants, the divers went into an unknown body of water,- said the DPSU. In just a few minutes, all three were washed away by a powerful current and carried away in an unknown direction. According to the border guards, the only thing that saved the men was the fact that there was a washed-up tree in the water, which they were able to grab onto and get to the shallows in the middle of the river. Then they called the rescuers and reported that they needed help. Military personnel of the -Vylok- and -Dyakovo- border service departments of the Mukachevo border detachment were involved in the search for offenders. As a result of using a drone, the -islanders- were discovered. All three were taken to a border unit, where servicemen gave them hot tea and allowed them to warm up and dry their clothes and shoes. For an attempt to violate the state border, administrative offenses were filed against the men. -The water level in the Tisza River, which runs along the border with Hungary and Romania, has risen significantly at the moment. The water temperature is very low, which causes muscle cramps in those who try to dive into the river. Under such conditions, the human body becomes uncontrollable, which can lead to death,- the DPSU emphasized. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: There are no occupiers in the northern part of Toretsk: the OTU - Luhansk - refuted the statements o...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — In the Toretsk direction, the number of assaults did not decrease, accordingly, the losses of Russians in manpower in this direction did not decrease either. They remain consistently high, she said. The spokeswoman did not confirm the information of Russian propagandists about the advance of Russians in the northern part of the city. — In the northern part of the city, they have not yet appeared. Although I must also repeat that urban battles are one of the most difficult battles in military practice, military science. They are characterized by dynamism and require constant attention from servicemen and constant tension, she said. At the same time, the military woman noted that during battles in the city it is difficult to talk about the details of the situation, because the enemy may unexpectedly appear on a neighboring street for a while and will be forced to leave it or be destroyed just as suddenly. — It is difficult to say what the situation is in the city itself, specifically on this or that street. The enemy may run into the neighboring street, but this does not mean that he is entrenched there. They immediately destroy him, immediately make it impossible for him to move or take him prisoner, - explained Anastasia Bobovnikova. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Toretsk, the enemy loses 100 soldiers per day.

Title: President: The weapons tasks for this year will definitely be fulfilled, and for the next one as wel...
Description: He said this in his evening address. -We will definitely respond to Russia for everything it does. And it is important that such blows, each of them, do not remain without a proper response, not only ours. There should not be even a hint of normalization of Russian terror — of getting used to it,- the President said. The head of state noted the new decision of Britain regarding sanctions against the shadow tanker fleet of the Russian Federation, according to which 30 tankers came under restrictions. -This is an important step. And it would be right for European partners — at the level of the entire EU — as well as other partners to support such sanctions. The less Russian excess profits from oil, the less Russia will be able to wage war. This is an obvious connection. A relationship that must work for real peace,- he said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also announced that today at the meeting Bets were relevant reports and analysis of experience in repelling Russian strikes on energy. -The best results of specific units should be spread to all objects, to everyone who carries out protective work,- he emphasized. The production and supply of drones, missiles, and other weapons were also discussed. -All weapons tasks for this year will definitely be completed. Also for the next one. Chief of Staff Syrsky reported separately - there was a long conversation about all key parts of the front, as well as about the Kursk operation,- added the President.

Title: The motorcycle is on fire, the armored vehicle is destroyed: -deadly- accuracy of the Third Assault
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page on November 25. The video shows the destruction of an enemy armored personnel carrier, a truck, a camouflaged mortar and a motorcycle. -Enemy infantrymen who were traveling on motorcycles were discovered. Having reached this point, the enemy got rid of the equipment. To preserve the motorcycles, they decided to disguise them, hoping that we would not notice. But our FPV is already flying to the target. The operator deftly controls the drone, directing it directly to the motorcycle,- the military recalled. According to them, the drone hit the equipment and the motorcycle started burning. -The battalion of unmanned systems continues to actively work and destroy the enemy. We destroy the enemy every day!- - commented the defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Third Assault Brigade cleared the village of Kopanka, into which the invaders broke through in Kharkiv Oblast. During the sweep, part of the Russians was destroyed, a part is taken prisoner.

Title: Air defense of the Ground Forces destroyed 178 enemy drones in a week
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. Our defenders shot down 129 Shahed-131/136 attack drones, seven Orlan 10/30 UAVs and 17 Zala reconnaissance drones. Also, five Supercam UAVs, 14 Lancets and six Molniya drones will be successfully destroyed. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 25 in the South there was ta-pyat-rozviduvalnyh-bpla/->destroyed ballistic missile -Iskander-M- and five reconnaissance drones the enemy

Title: The MOU named the key factors of the modern armed conflict
Description: About this he said during a speech at the 16th International Security Forum in the Canadian city of Halifax. Serhii Boev emphasized the critical importance of increasing investments in the defense complex. Without a strong defense industrial complex, it will be difficult for democracies to withstand an enemy that is increasingly mobilizing its economy. In the current situation, the democracies should increase and speed up the production of their high-quality weapons,- the deputy minister noted. He added that, even despite the hostilities and constant Russian shelling, Ukrainian defense companies produce high-quality weapons and military equipment and are ready to increase volumes under the conditions of additional funding. -To defeat the aggressor, we need to jointly increase our capabilities,- said Serhii Boev. As reported by ArmyInform, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Serhiy Boyev held a meeting with the Deputy Minister of National Defense of Canada on Budget Matters by Stephanie Beck.

Title: Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: in the South, today they shot down an Iskander-M missile...
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Also, in the southern direction, five reconnaissance drones were destroyed - two UAVs -Orlan- and one each of -Fenix-, -Merlin-VR- and Supercam. The number of victims as a result of a rocket attack on a densely populated area of ​​Odesa osib/->increased to 11 people. Damaged and destroyed residential buildings, other objects of civil infrastructure, cars Currently, it is known that 11 citizens were injured. Information on their number is being clarified. At the scene of the incident, the work of the operational headquarters was deployed to provide assistance to the victims. All specialized services are working.

Title: The special forces are working: the fighters have written off dozens of units of Russian equipment
Description: The relevant video was released on November 25 by the SBU. -Special agents of the SBU -wrote off- another batch of enemy equipment,- the message reads. In particular, they struck: The fighters also destroyed 449 occupiers. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the soldiers of the SBU sbu-podilylysya-rezultatamy-roboty/->turn enemy equipment into scrap and destroy the occupiers.

Title: They detained men and demanded money for postponement of mobilization: employees of the Odessa TCC w...
Description: About this informsNovember 25 State Bureau of Investigation. The undercover officers stopped the men, recorded their personal data and informed them that they planned to take them to the TCC for mobilization. For money, TCC employees promised to -release- conscripts and help arrange deferment from service. This service was estimated at 4.5 thousand. US dollars. In case of refusal to pay the money, the men were threatened with a wanted notice. -Law enforcement officers, in particular, documented the fact of extorting money from a man who had relatives among the missing during combat missions. Therefore, on legal grounds, he had a postponement from mobilization,- the SBI noted. On November 21, 2024, SBI officers detained one of the middlemen while receiving payment for the -service-. The question of detention and notification of suspicion to the rest of the participants of the arrangement is being resolved. Currently, the detainee has been notified of the suspicion of receiving an illegal benefit by an official (Part 3 of Article 368 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of imprisonment for a term of up to 10 years. -During the search of the premises of one of the possible suspects, he took out a service weapon and pointed it at the DBR employees. He brought the firearm to a combat position, demanded the return of the seized mobile phone and to leave his house with threats,- the SBI said. Currently, he was detained and reported on suspicion of attempted murder of law enforcement officers in connection with the performance of official duties (Article 348 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The question of choosing a preventive measure and removal from office is being resolved. For what he has committed, he may face life imprisonment. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the State Border Service reported the suspicion to the capital's law enforcement officer, who do-ugorshhyny-cholovikiv-pryzovnogo-viku/-> crossed across the border of men of conscription age.

Title: Military personnel will receive transfer order numbers in Army+
Description: This is stated in the message of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. To access this functionality, you need to update the app to the latest version. For military personnel who are just reporting, a notification with an order number will come automatically along with the transfer approval notification. And defenders who previously received approval for the transfer, but do not have information about the formation of the corresponding order, need to contact the support service in the -Menu- section. During the 10 days of operation of the service, 4,500 reports on changing the place of service were submitted by the military to Armiya+. Of them, 4,200 have already been processed by the Personnel Center of the Armed Forces, in particular, 900 have received approval. -Thanks to the update, our defenders will now be able to immediately see the details of the order. It may seem like a small change, but having an order number speeds up the entire transfer process without the need to regularly update the information in the training room. And so we are taking another step in the direction of a more people-centric and effective Ukrainian army,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. In total, 415,000 servicemen were authorized in Army+ for more than three months of work, and they had time to submit 26,000 reports. Today, 17 types of reports are available in the application, in particular for vacation, material assistance and obtaining a certificate of completion of service. Download version 2.0.4 of Army+ app only on Play Market and App Store. Links are also available on the official page of the application. As reported by ArmiyaInform, report submission function for changing the place of service.

Title: The President held a Stavka on the production of weapons and protection of the energy industry
Description: This is stated in a message in telegram channel of the head of state. At the Stavka, there were reports from the Ministry of Energy, Naftogaz and all key participants in the industry, the progress of recovery after the Russian shelling on November 17 and the further protection of all critical facilities were discussed. -Gas infrastructure and generation: nuclear, hydro, thermal, etc. Also about our partnership with European countries to increase opportunities for electricity import, in particular, for business,- the President noted. There was also a report by the Air Force on covering critical infrastructure objects from the sky. -We are taking the most effective experience of echeloning air defense assets and spreading it to other regions,- added the President. In addition to energy, they heard the report of the Ministry of Defense on contracting and advances for Ukrainian manufacturers of weapons, shells, missiles, drones, the results for 2024 and planning for 2025.

Title: -Casetka- flew through the airfield in Kursk, one fighter repelled the attack: stream from the front...
Description: Near Kursk, eyewitnesses recorded the impact of cluster missiles in the area of ​​the military airfield. There is also information about an attack in the Bryansk region. One of our soldiers against six Russians! Battalion K-2 54 of the separate mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa showed a video showing how their fighter with the call sign -Kum- single-handedly repels an enemy assault group. On Kramatorsk direction 5, a separate Kyiv assault brigade destroyed the Russian Smerch-2 naval bomb launcher, which the occupiers had placed on the MT-LB. A photo of the destroyed radar station from the S-400 air defense complex in Kurshchyna appeared online. Information about the destruction of the S-400 launcher itself and the liquidation of its crew is also being checked. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: He called for the killing of Ukrainians and launched Russian strikes on Kharkiv Oblast, and now he i...
Description: About this informs November 25 SBU. -For this purpose, the attacker went around the area and covertly recorded the places of the largest concentration of personnel and military equipment of the Defense Forces in the Kupyan direction,- the report says. As the investigation established, the agent was transmitting the coordinates of potential targets via messenger. SBU counterintelligence detained him in July this year. According to the case materials, the agent turned out to be an unemployed resident of Chuguyiv district. The man came to the attention of Russian special services due to his activity in pro-Kremlin Telegram channels. -In the -thematic- chats of the messenger, he called for the seizure of state power and the killing of Ukrainians. After the remote recruitment, the agent communicated with the occupiers through a -liaison- - his old acquaintance from the Russian Federation,- the SBU said. During the raids, a mobile phone with evidence of work for the Russian Federation was discovered in the traitor's premises. On the basis of the evidence collected by the investigators of the Security Service, the court sentenced the attacker to 15 years of imprisonment with confiscation of property and found him guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Police detained two arsonists in different regions of Ukraine, one of which damaged TCC reception desks and service cars of the military.

Title: They turned pseudo-aid for the Armed Forces into a business: the border guards exposed a -humanitari...
Description: About this informs November 25 State Border Service of Ukraine. The investigation established that the organizers of the scheme, citizens of Ukraine and Moldova, established a channel for the import of used cars into the territory of Ukraine under the guise of humanitarian aid, allegedly for the needs of the Armed Forces. In the future, cars were sold on the territory of Ukraine for cash. During the searches, 17 vehicles, documents, computer equipment, mobile terminals, draft records were seized. -The full circle of persons involved in this scheme is currently being established. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing. Procedural management is carried out by prosecutors of the Lviv Regional Prosecutor's Office,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service and the National Policedetained two arsonists in different regions of Ukraine, one of which he damaged reception desks of the TCC and service cars of the military.

Title: The Ministry of Defense invites to a hackathon -Onslaught of machines 2.0-
Description: reported this on November 25 Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitization Catherine Chernogorenko -What awaits the winners? We are preparing a prize pool for each of the six hackathon challenges. The best technological ideas will receive significant development grants from our partners. Uklon and the Nezlamni Foundation, the technology company MyDefence and other companies and organizations volunteered to support the winners. Thank you for this contribution to the defense of the country!- — wrote Kateryna Chernogorenko. According to her, the best teams will receive support from the Ministry of Defense so that their developments can be demonstrated in the military as soon as possible. -That's why I invite experts in the fields of EW, air defense, sensor systems, anti-drone systems, fiber optic technologies, software developers to solve an important task together — to find the latest means of countering enemy air defense systems and drones with fiber optic control,- explained Kateryna Chernogorenko. She urged to register in time by filling out a simple form. -See you at the hackathon already at the beginning December Let's protect the lives of soldiers and civilians together!- - urged Kateryna Chernogorenko. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine is looking innovative technologies for combating aggressor drones.

Title: In Kurshchyna, the Defense Forces repelled ten attacks by the enemy - the General Staff of the Armed...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 November 25. Today, the communities of the settlements of Bilovody, Basivka, Nowenke, Myropilske, Zhuravka, Rozhkovichi, Volfyne and Ulanov were affected by the fire of enemy artillery and mortars in the Sumy region. Stepok was hit by airstrikes of the terrorist army. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units five times, in the Vovchansk, Kudiivka and Kozacha Lopan districts. There are still three clashes going on. Also, the enemy carried out an airstrike with a KAB on Pitomnik. In the Kupyansk direction since the beginning of the day, the Russian occupiers have carried out offensive operations 13 times near Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Kruglyakivka and Zeleny Gay. One battle is ongoing. The enemy is actively using aviation, dropped aerial bombs in the areas of Velikiy Burluk, Kupyansk, Kruglyakivka and Bohuslavka settlements. On the Lyman direction, the enemy attacked four times near Grekivka and Torsky. One battle is still going on. Conducted an air strike on Ivanovka. In the Kramatorsk direction the enemy tried to advance three times in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers tried four times to dislodge our units from their positions in the Toretsk and Dachny regions, and two battles are currently underway. In the Pokrovsky direction the enemy carried out 29 assaults in the areas of the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Petrivka, Dachenske, Pushkine and Pustinka. The defense forces of Ukraine restrained the onslaught of Russian troops and repelled 20 attacks, nine battles are still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 27 times near Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Uspenivka, Elizavetivka, and Hannivka. 23 attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The fighting continues - the hottest at the moment near Kurakhovo. Enemy aircraft struck Dachny. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders in the vicinity of Rivnopol, Novodarivka and Sukhy Yaliv nine times. Two skirmishes continue, Velika Novosilka was also hit by enemy aircraft. In the Orikhov direction the enemy twice tried to storm our positions in the Novoandriivka area. In the Dnieper direction Ukrainian soldiers repelled two enemy attacks, the enemy carried out an airstrike by NARs on Olhivka. In Kurshchyna Defense forces repelled ten enemy attacks, eight more clashes are ongoing, today the enemy launched four airstrikes, dropping six guided air bombs on its territory.

Title: The Ministry of Defense concluded the first contracts with a private manufacturer under state guaran...
Description: About this reported in the MOU. Within the framework of this policy, the first contracts under state guarantees were concluded with a Ukrainian private company. The agreements provide that the manufacturer will attract credit funds to fulfill the contract, and the state will provide appropriate guarantees for repayment of the loan from the state budget. The total amount of the first deals is UAH 4.4 billion. It is planned to manufacture and supply 100 special armored combat vehicles and 100 armored evacuation vehicles. -With these contracts, we open a new page in cooperation between the Ministry of Defense and the private sector. The conclusion of contracts with the involvement of state guarantees is an important signal for business: the state is ready to support responsible manufacturers who are able to provide the army with modern solutions and high-quality products,- stressed Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. For security reasons, the details of the deals are not disclosed. The contracts were signed for the implementation of the program to increase the state's defense capability and security. The Deputy Minister also thanked his colleagues from the Cabinet of Ministers, in particular, the Ministry of Finance, as well as people's deputies for their help in expanding the effect of state guarantees on contracts with private producers of the domestic defense industry. For his part, the Director of the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense, Hlib Kanevskyi, noted that in the state budget 2024, up to UAH 30 billion is provided for state guarantees under contracts aimed at increasing the state's defense capability and security. -State guarantees are an additional financial instrument for the purchase of military equipment for the Armed Forces with a long production cycle. With the help of such guarantees, the Ministry of Defense scales up the capabilities of the domestic defense industry,- added Hleb Kanevskyi. This step is a separate direction of the defense procurement reform, which provides for the provision of new conditions for partnership with business, which is critically important for meeting the needs of the Armed Forces in terms of repelling armed aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, the countries of the International Coalition of Drones to Support the Armed Forces of Ukraine <a href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/11/25/koalicziya-droniv-dlya-ukrayiny-otrymaye-18-milyarda-yevro/ 1.8 billion euros will be allocated this year.

Title: Ukraine and Canada discussed priority needs and military support for 2025
Description: About this notified in the MOU. The negotiations took place on the sidelines of the International Security Forum in the Canadian city of Halifax. Serhii Boev presented a detailed list of Ukraine's military needs, which Canada could meet within the next year. -Our goal is to create the most detailed and agreed-upon picture of the supply of weapons by each country, in particular Canada,- emphasized the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. Serhii Boev and Stephanie Bek agreed to regularly coordinate actions to build a clear understanding of what kind of help the Defense Forces of Ukraine can count on. Since 2022, a significant part of the agenda of the annual conference in Halifax — one of the most influential and representative global platforms for discussing global security issues — is dedicated to finding ways to counter Russia's armed aggression against Ukraine.

Title: Britain introduced large-scale sanctions against the shadow fleet of the Russian Federation
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the British government. -With half of the vessels sanctioned today carrying more than $4.3 billion worth of oil and petroleum products such as gasoline in the last year alone, this is the UK's largest sanctions package of its kind,- the statement said. It said the move would further limit the Kremlin's ability to finance its illegal war in Ukraine and its malicious activities around the world, and would also bring the total number of oil tankers under UK sanctions to 73, more than any other another country 46 countries and the EU signed the call to action against the shadow fleet, announced by the Prime Minister of Great Britain at the summit of the European Political Community in July. Revenues from oil sales are a key source of funding for the Kremlin's illegal war in Ukraine. The -shadow fleet- also poses significant risks to global trade. Many of these vessels use deceptive transportation methods and pose an environmental hazard—many tankers blatantly ignore basic safety standards, increasing the likelihood of catastrophic oil spills.

Title: RAROG breathes fire: how to get to the 24th OMBr named after King Danylo
Description: The windows of high-rise buildings are sometimes covered with fiberboard boards, film or other material, reminding that some people left their native homes and were forced to become internally displaced persons or refugees in other countries. Evacuation offers from the Donetsk regional military administration constantly come to the phone of everyone who enters the territory of the region. A typical picture of a front-line city. It is young, energetic, focused on results. This result is the destruction of the occupiers, day and night, under all circumstances and weather conditions. The fact that unmanned systems are becoming the main means of fire damage to the enemy significantly increases the role of such units in combat military units. Everyone flies: reconnaissance units, artillery fire adjusters, UAV units of mechanized and rifle battalions, and even EW units and RKBZ. But the main striking force of the brigade in the conditions of the enemy's superiority in ammunition over artillery is the battalions of unmanned systems created in the brigades. Why -RAROG- in particular? The mythical falcon of the ancient Slavs, which flies out of a fiery whirlwind and spews fire, a whirlwind, a storm on its own - isn't this a literal description of a deadly attack on the enemy from an unmanned aerial vehicle? 24th -royal- separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo, since the beginning of the war in 2014, has already entered into its history the glorious pages of the battles for Liman, Popasna, Lysychansk, the liberation of the right bank of southern Ukraine. Today, it holds the defense of Chasovoy Yar. The brigade's arm badge depicts a Galician lion with the motto -milites regum- — royal infantry. The eidetics of the new Ukrainian army organically connects the generations of our ancestors with modern heroes who defend their country from the next invaders. -Rarog- is also from those times. Only a person rooted in the history of his kind, who is aware of his responsibility both to the past and to the future, is able to consciously and effectively destroy the enemy. - We do it effectively,- the combatant claims. Some episodes of battles are particularly ostentatious. Thus, the road Verkhne Toretske - Avdiyivka was jokingly called -RAROG road- in the brigade. The enemy tried to advance along it with combat equipment at night. The operators of the battalion carried out 12 sorties with mining of advance routes. As a result, we received 11 detonations of the enemy's equipment. -After all, this is not just mining. It's practically a piece of jewelry when a mine is dropped after detonating the previous car on the likely bypass path. Sometimes almost under the tracks of an enemy tank,- explains the combatant. Service in the battalion is no less difficult than in mechanized or rifle units. Permanent shifts of UAV operators at positions with a continuous change of drones in the air; logistics and delivery of goods for infantry in positions; repair, modernization and improvement of unmanned aerial vehicles; own logistics and production of discharges and other ammunition. After all, up to 1 thousand can be dropped on the enemy during the night. kg of -surprises-. On the Facebook page of the battalion, there are photos with the latest results of defeating the enemy. From military equipment to individual invaders who met their death on Ukrainian soil. Destroyed dugouts, bridges, shelters, firing positions. Such results are comparable to the achievements of the most successful battalions of unmanned systems: Magyar Birds (deployed to a regiment), Achilles, K-2, Wild Hornets, Magura brigade battalion and others. This is the result not only of state support for capacity building The forces of unmanned systems, but also significant volunteer funds and the battalion's own funds. In a new kind of military, real development comes ahead of changes to states, state-contracted drones and typical munitions. And the constant change of the situation and the actions of the enemy force us to be more and more resourceful in order to resist and, in the end, see Victory . Up to 10 million hryvnias are spent every month on the modernization of drones received in the battalion alone. The unit needs its own cargo transport, solutions for the rapid movement of control points, modern computer equipment and drones, drones, drones... span> Everyone can become the embodiment of the power of the fiery vortex and destroy the enemy personally. This requires: – choose a position that matches your skills and abilities; – constantly learn and grow professionally; – fight for victory with ideological and motivated comrades. Find out on the website, or come to the recruiting center of the 24th OMBr named after King Danylo in Lviv at Osmomysla Square, 9. Oleg Gerasymenko, specially for ArmyInform

Title: Ambush on -golfers- - our -rangers- hunted down a group of invaders
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 25 on the channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. A Russian combat golf cart with 6 infantrymen of the Russian Federation was moving along a forest strip when it came under coordinated fire damage. As a result of a shooting battle and a kamikaze drone attack, our fighters managed to completely destroy the enemy group. After completing the combat mission, our group withdrew without losses.   As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the 8th regiment of the Special Operations Forces named after Prince Izyaslav Mstislavich conducted a successful special operation on Kurshchyna

Title: Hunters for -Shaheds- will train in -Safe Sky-: the Ministry of Defense has codified the simulator
Description: This is stated in a message on the site MoU. The device is integrated into the weapons used by anti-aircraft fighters. -Using the simulator does not require the consumption of ammunition. The calculations of enemy air target hunters can conduct training anywhere,- said Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov. During training, the program gives hints. There is also a mode of accepting credits and calculating points at each intermediate stage of training. Thus, the instructor will be able to objectively assess the skills of the student. The Ministry of Defense reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment, who have questions about the codification process, can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense codified and allowed for operation in units of the Defense Forces all-wheel drive -broneavtomobil-zubr/->armored car with increased cross-country ability -Bison- and remotely controlled module -Pernach- domestically produced.

Title: Out of 10 occupiers, two reach the front line: enemy attack aircraft are destroyed in the Kupyan reg...
Description: Yuriy Fedorenko, battalion commander, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the head of the Koshov Ivan Sirk. As for the bridgehead, according to Yuriy Fedorenko, measures are now being taken to drop Russian saboteurs in Oskil. As for other attacks, everything follows the traditional scenario — UAV operators destroy attack aircraft on approach. -In some sections, the enemy is forced to move to advanced positions 12 kilometers on foot. As you understand, out of 10 occupiers who leave, 2 reach the front line. The remaining 8 either leave the route or are destroyed by the Defense Forces,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. Previously ArmyInform reported that the enemy had no significant successes in the Kupyan region, but the losses were minimal promotions are serious.

Title: Images of the Russian S-400 air defense system, which was destroyed in Kurshchyna, appeared
Description: Photos of burned enemy equipment were published on November 25. The S-400 air defense system was deployed in the area of ​​the village of Velike Zhirovo, Kursk Region, which is 100 kilometers from the Russian border. According to Russian sources, as a result of the strike, five officers were killed (including the commander and chief of staff of the missile division), and three employees of Almaz-Antey JSC, which manufactures the S-400 air defense system, were also mortally wounded. According to the Russians, the attack on the enemy air defense system was carried out by three ATACMS missiles. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 24, units of the missile forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces delivered a group attack on anti-aircraft missile positions of the 1490th Division of the 6th Anti-Aircraft Missile Regiment of the Russian Army in the Kursk Region.

Title: -The Kurakhiv direction is the most difficult now-: The President talked about the situation at the ...
Description: The President wrote about this on the afternoon of November 25. -Long conversation, all key directions. First of all, Donetsk region. The Kurakhiv direction is the most difficult now. We are working to strengthen our positions. The Zaporozhye direction — we see the existing threats, our Defense Forces of Ukraine are controlling the situation,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. The Kursk operation was also present in the report. -Our soldiers are defending positions and inflicting very significant losses on the Russian army. Our task is to destroy the Russian potential in the border areas as much as possible. I am grateful to all Ukrainian soldiers, sergeants and officers who ensure the fulfillment of our Ukrainian tasks,- the President noted. As reported by ArmyInform, President reacted to the latest shelling.

Title: The drone coalition for Ukraine will receive 1.8 billion euros
Description: On November 25, Rustem Umyerov, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, informed about this. -Our partners from Latvia, which is leading this initiative together with Great Britain, informed us about the amount of funds. This decision will allow Ukraine to strengthen its technological advantage on the battlefield and destroy the enemy more effectively,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. He reminded that on October 31, the first meeting of the steering group of the coalition was held in Riga, which united 17 countries: Australia, Great Britain, Denmark, Estonia, Italy, Canada, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Germany, New Zealand, Poland, France, the Czech Republic, Sweden and Ukraine. Latvia will allocate 20 million euros this year for the drone coalition: at least 10 million for purchases from the domestic industry, and 5 million for joint purchases within the coalition. -In addition, we signed an agreement with our Latvian partners on the training of the Ukrainian military in the drone piloting program. Drones are the weapons of the future, which are already helping Ukraine to defend itself and save the lives of our defenders. Thank you to our partners for their contribution to the victory of Ukraine!-, said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, Rustem Umyerov talked about investments in the Ukrainian defense complex.

Title: The number of injured as a result of the rocket attack in Odesa has increased to 11 people
Description: This was reported by the National Police of Ukraine. Previously, the strike was carried out by an -Iskander-M- ballistic missile. Damaged and destroyed residential buildings, other objects of civil infrastructure, cars. Currently, it is known that 11 citizens were injured. Information on their number is being clarified. At the scene of the incident, the work of the operational headquarters was deployed to provide assistance to the victims. All specialized services are working. Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa Regional State Administration reported that 8 wounded remain in hospital treatment: one woman in in severe condition, the rest in a condition of medium severity. Also, one victim continues outpatient treatment.

Title: The drone coalition will receive 1.8 billion euros
Description: On November 25, Rustem Umyerov, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, informed about this. -Our partners from Latvia, which is leading this initiative together with Great Britain, informed us about the amount of funds. This decision will allow Ukraine to strengthen its technological advantage on the battlefield and destroy the enemy more effectively,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. He reminded that on October 31, the first meeting of the steering group of the coalition was held in Riga, which united 17 countries: Australia, Great Britain, Denmark, Estonia, Italy, Canada, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Germany, New Zealand, Poland, France, the Czech Republic, Sweden and Ukraine. Latvia will allocate 20 million euros this year for the drone coalition: at least 10 million for purchases from the domestic industry, and 5 million for joint purchases within the coalition. -In addition, we signed an agreement with our Latvian partners on the training of the Ukrainian military in the drone piloting program. Drones are the weapons of the future, which are already helping Ukraine to defend itself and save the lives of our defenders. Thank you to our partners for their contribution to the victory of Ukraine!-, said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, Rustem Umyerov talked about investments in the Ukrainian defense complex.

Title: - I love bombs! - pilot Prytsil destroyed up to a battalion of Russians
Description: The story about him was published on November 25 on the battalion channel. On account of Prytsil to the battalion of destroyed enemy infantry. It works on resets, uses different ammunition. There are those that are triggered by falling. There are home-made bombs of great power. They work so hard that it is dangerous to be a meter away from her. -I love bombs, you can't do anything about it,- says Prytsil. After restraining the enemy in Novomykhailivka, he sat down for night drones. This was the next stage in development. According to him, if it was possible to destroy the enemy at night during his preparation for the morning assault, then in the morning he had no one to fight with. The most interesting targets are enemy -earners-, mercenaries. For them, the pilot saves interesting ammunition. And the hardest thing for him is to be away from his wife. He rarely sees her because he took her abroad. The pilot's house and land are occupied, so they even got married during the war and are far from their relatives. As reported by ArmyInform, the Tavrijski paratroopers took captured by two Russians.

Title: An enemy drone attacked people during the distribution of humanitarian aid in the Mykolayiv region: ...
Description: informs about this on November 25, the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim. As a result of enemy shelling, five people were wounded, including representatives of the humanitarian mission and local residents. -Especially during the distribution of humanitarian aid, a drone was directed at people. All the wounded were taken to the hospital. Two men and a woman are in moderate condition, two men are in severe condition. All necessary medical assistance is being provided,- the statement said. We will remind you that on the morning of November 25, the Russian army shelled Kharkiv with the S-400 air defense system. As a result of shelling, 23 people were injured, more than 40 houses were damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupying Russian army also struck on the morning of November 25. in the middle of Odesa, 6 people were injured.

Title: They broke into captivity - a new batch of occupiers was captured in Kharkiv Oblast
Description: The video of the conversation with them was released on November 25 on the brigade's channel. The prisoners turned out to be soldiers of the 1st Tank Army of the Russian Federation. During the capture, the enemy covered the site with 152 caliber, but not at our soldiers, but to eliminate their own. Some of the occupiers are under investigation in the Russian Federation, some have already been convicted. -As of now, Kopanky is under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine — and this is thanks to the Karakurt Colony unit of our 2nd mechanized battalion!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 3rd Assault Brigade stopped a column of Russian armored vehicles and zrazkovo-znyshhyly-vorozhyj-vzvod/->killed the entire landing party that was driving to storm our positions.

Title: Defense forces stopped the breakthrough of Russian saboteurs in the Kharkiv region
Description: This was reported by the head of the Dergachyv city military administration Vyacheslav Zadorenko. The attempt to break through was stopped by the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Some of the saboteurs were eliminated, others retreated to the Belgorod region of the Russian Federation. Vyacheslav Zadorenko noted that from time to time the enemy tries to -probe- the positions of the Ukrainian defenders by sending their saboteurs, so this event only testifies to the strength of our defense and the coordinated actions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to eliminate the occupiers. -the Russians are not carrying out and are not trying to carry out an active offensive in the Dergachev direction, the number of forces on the border sufficient for this has not been recorded. Therefore, I ask everyone not to panic, to trust official sources and verified mass media,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, on the Siversky and Kramatorsk directions soldativ-na-dobu/->the enemy is accumulating forces, on Toretsk the invaders are advancing with incredible speed, actively using artillery and aviation.

Title: In Nikopol, a drone hit a gas station, there are injured
Description: This was announced by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration, Serhiy Lysak. As a result of the blow, a 48-year-old woman and a 54-year-old man were injured. They were hospitalized in moderate condition. A gas station and a car were also damaged. As ArmiyaInform reported, on the morning of November 25, the Russian army ->fired on Kharkiv with the S-400 air defense system. As a result of the shelling, 23 people were injured, more than 40 houses were damaged. Six people were injured in Odesa today after the Russian strike , damaged civil infrastructure.

Title: Instead of money from the Russians, detention: the arsonist of TCC buildings and military vehicles w...
Description: About this informs November 25 SBU. The main -targets- of the attackers were buildings of state institutions of Ukraine, as well as cars of Ukrainian defenders. -To commit arson, the occupiers remotely engaged two local residents who were looking for quick earnings in Telegram channels. However, instead of the money promised by the fraudsters, those involved received suspicion and the prospect of imprisonment,- the report says. A 35-year-old unemployed man was exposed in Sumy, who set fire to 2 reception halls of the TCC and 3 official cars of the Ukrainian military. An 18-year-old resident of Kagarlytskyi district was also detained in Kyiv region, who set fire to the building of the local territorial community. To commit the crime, the young man broke a metal-plastic window of a state institution and poured a flammable mixture inside the premises. The person involved then took a video of the fire on a phone camera and sent a -report- to his Russian curator. -After completing the first task, the attacker had to start the second - to burn down the building of Ukrposhta in a nearby settlement. However, he did not have time to do this, as he was detained in hot pursuit,- the SBU said. Currently, both detainees have been notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face up to 10 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service detained the abbot of one of the temples of the Kharkiv diocese of the UOC (MP), who is suspected of working for the enemy.

Title: Ministry of Defense: the government transferred about 120 real estate objects for the use of the Arm...
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. The transferred buildings became an important resource for creating proper conditions of service and execution of combat tasks by units. Relevant government decisions were prepared by the Ministry of Defense in cooperation with the Ministry of Economy. Management of transferred real estate is already carried out by the Ministry of Defense. Within the framework of cooperation on providing units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with the necessary funds and resources, the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Economy have prepared a total of 10 government orders. Government orders related to the transfer of buildings for the accommodation of military units, the creation of educational and training bases and the organization of logistics centers, which significantly strengthened the infrastructural capacity of the Armed Forces.

Title: In Odesa, six were injured after enemy shelling
Description: This was reported by Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. One woman is in a serious condition, the other injured are in a medium condition in medical facilities. Doctors provide all necessary assistance. As a result of the rocket attack, civil infrastructure was damaged: residential buildings, cars, dentistry, beauty salon, shops, flower shops, people's cars. Also, two educational institutions — a school and a sports hall of the university — were damaged. Windows and doors are broken there. Fortunately, teachers and students were in shelters at the time of the impact. All relevant emergency services are working at the scene of the attack. Utility workers are cleaning up the destruction, taking away the debris. The operational headquarters has been deployed. All necessary assistance is provided. Also, on the spot, the data of the victims are processed and the documentation for the compensation of damages is filled out. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on the morning of November 25, the Russian army ->fired on Kharkiv with S-400 air defense systems. As a result of the shelling, 23 people were injured, more than 40 houses were damaged.

Title: Consequences of the Russian shelling of Kharkiv: 23 wounded, more than 40 houses damaged
Description: reported this by the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov. Currently, 14 people are hospitalized. Among them, five patients are in the surgical department, five are treated on an outpatient basis, two are referred for neurosurgical treatment. Two more people are being examined. In the morning, around 8:30, the enemy launched a missile attack on the central part of the city, previously, from the S-400 air defense system. Enemy shelling hit the courtyards of residential high-rise buildings. More than 40 houses were damaged, three cars were on fire.

Title: These Russian attacks on Ukrainian life can be stopped — the President reacted to the latest shellin...
Description: He did this in the afternoon of November 25. -The occupiers are attacking the regions of Ukraine. A rescue operation is underway after a missile attack in Kharkiv. At this time, 19 injured people are known. Dozens of attack drones attacked Zaporozhye. A child is injured. Odesa was attacked, there is damage due to falling rocket fragments. And this is just one day of Russian terror against Ukraine,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. According to his data, since yesterday evening, Russia has used about one and a half hundred attack drones, aerial bombs, and missiles against more than ten of our regions. -Combat work on targets that remain in the air is still ongoing. Thanks to our defenders of the sky for shooting down, for working around the clock for the safety of our people. These attacks by Russia on Ukrainian life can be stopped. With pressure, sanctions, blocking the occupiers' access to the components they use to create the tools of this terror, arms packages for Ukraine and determination, which must be unwavering,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. As reported by ArmyInform, the President declared that you cannot give Putin a single week to adapt and find a countermeasure.

Title: -30% of enemy equipment is destroyed during mine assaults-: technocide of enemy -wheels- in Donbas c...
Description: About this on the air of the marathon -Edyny Novyny- spoken the spokesperson of OSU -Khortytsia- - lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn. According to Nazar Voloshyn, the enemy is -infiltrating- Ukrainian positions with infantry.
