They are afraid to use the equipment, and they drive cars, buggies and motorcycles to deliver the stormtroopers to the front line. -Columns with which the enemy is trying to deliver them to certain areas, we hit them with artillery fire or with the help of FPV drones. About 30% of the enemy's equipment during attempted assaults is destroyed thanks to our mine-explosive barriers,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Previously ArmyInform reported that in the Eastern operational zone, enemy losses amounted to more than 1,100 people - 487 killed and more than 600 injured.

Title: Defense forces of Ukraine struck three regions of the aggressor country
Description: This was reported on November 25 by the General Staff of the ZSU. According to his data, there is confirmation of the successful destruction of an oil depot in the Kaluga region. The results of combat work on other objects are being clarified. -The joint successful combat work of all components of the Defense Forces against the important targets of the Russian invaders will continue,- said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the GUR showed the drones with which attacks the military objects of the aggressor.

Title: The enemy began to use -Shahedy- in a different way - the Air Force explained what had changed
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this on November 25. On the night of November 25, 2024 (from 6:30 p.m. on November 24), the invaders will attack Ukraine with Shahed-type attack UAVs and unmanned aerial vehicles of an unknown type from the directions of Orel, Kursk, Millerovo, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation, temporarily occupied Crimea. In total, during the specified period, the Air Force's radio engineering troops detected and escorted 145 enemy UAVs. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 11:00 a.m., air defenses shot down 71 enemy drones in the Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk, Dnipropetrovsk, Odesa, Mykolaiv, and Kherson regions. 71 unmanned aerial vehicles — lost in location, presumably due to active countermeasures by the Defense Forces, one more drone flew in the direction of Belarus. Information is being updated. The Air Force reports that during November 24 from 10:00 to 17:30 the enemy struck again with drones of various types, guided aerial bombs and guided air missiles Kh-59/69. As reported by ArmyInform, 50 enemy UAVs were shot down over Ukraine last night /a>.

Title: - We are lying here in a pit with zhmurikas - - the Russians removed the consequences of their -meat...
Description: The impressive video was released on November 25. The author of the video says that he went to this position through the landing, where hundreds of killed Russians lie. He was hit by 2 rockets, but he was lucky to get there: now he has been lying among the corpses for several days. the Russians are waiting for them to come and take them to the rear, but it seems that they themselves have little faith in this. Caution, shocking footage:   As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians confirmed the hit our drones

Title: Only the more ruthless — the drones of the anti-terrorist forces massacred the enemy in Kurshchyna
Description: The video was published on November 25. In the very first scene, the Teroboron soldiers first hit a Russian armored personnel carrier, and then destroy the -loaf- that came to pick up the infantry. In other scenes, our drones destroy a large amount of enemy equipment, which is not saved by EW devices densely planted on the roof. The enemy's infantry is also under the sights. One of the Russians tried to catch our drone, for which he was instantly punished.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Ravens unit of the 129th brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces hit the Russian armored car -Tiger-, as well as several units of transport.

Title: The occupiers are buried in the ground by companies: in Toretsk, the enemy loses 100 soldiers a day
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- OTU -Luhansk-. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, the occupiers are advancing with incredible speed, actively using artillery and aviation. -Quantitatively, the enemy is losing up to 100 people a day in Toretsk itself, and you can imagine the activity of hostilities. Since 100 soldiers are approximately 5% of all enemy losses on the entire front and this is just one city of Toretsk,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. As reported by ArmyInform , in Toretsk, the Russian military killed two and wounded one civilian.

Title: -There were mental attacks when they were walking across the field at full height-: in the Pokrovsky...
Description: Serhii Tsehotskyi, officer of the 59th separate of the mechanized brigade named after Yakov Handziuk According to Serhiy Tsekhotskyi, the occupiers use various options for attacks. To break through the Ukrainian defense, they go to any lengths. -They attacked our positions on tanks with infantry, like during the Second World War, that's how it was. And we also had mental attacks once, when they were walking on the field in their full height. Having confused his Russian field with our Ukrainian one. Well, everyone immediately went to bed in principle,- said Serhii Tsehotskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction the enemy continues the tactics of -meat- assaults.

Title: GUR showed the drones used to attack the aggressor's military facilities
Description: The report on the work of a group of long-range drone operators of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, prepared by journalists of the -Donbas Realiy- program on Radio Liberty, was published on November 25. -Preparation is carried out in several stages. First of all, we analyze the targets, the possibility of reaching them, analyze the anti-aircraft defense, the means of electronic warfare of the enemy in order to find corridors, how to pass. It has been extremely difficult to do this for the past year, but it still works,- said the commander of the group of long-range UAV operators of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He added that during the full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, the use of attack drones has undergone serious changes. -We are the group that was the first to launch almost all long-range drones and those that came before them. We can see the dynamics - now we can hit targets at a distance of 2,000 km,- said the scout. For more about the Ukrainian long-range drones -Lyutyy-, -Beaver- and others, with which the operators of GUR continue to strike military targets in Russia, see the report: As ArmyInform reported, the GUR discovered in the North Korean KN-23/KN-24 missile foreign components 2023 year of graduation.

Title: He bowed, prayed and confessed to the FSB: a spy in a cassock was detained in Kharkiv
Description: notifies the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, the arrested suspect leaked information about the Defense Forces in the region. In particular, he tried to establish the approximate number of personnel and available weapons at Ukrainian checkpoints near Kharkiv. -The archpriest monitored the routes of the movement of military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the direction of the front line. The cleric sent the received information to the aggressor via messenger in the form of marks on Google maps and their detailed description,- the SBU said in a statement. According to the investigation, the 43-year-old archpriest began performing hostile tasks in October 2024. He was born in Melitopol and during 2009-2018 was on the territory of the Russian Federation. Later, he came to Kharkiv, where he worked as an IT specialist of the diocesan administration of the UOC (MP) and was appointed abbot of the local church. During the searches, a mobile phone with evidence of cooperation with the occupiers was seized from the detainee. Russian rubles and Kremlin awards were also found in his possession. Investigators of the Security Service informed the accused about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces for the possibility of their identification on the spot). He faces 8 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform , the Security Service detained another agent of the special services of the Russian Federation, who was active in the Kyiv and Vinnytsia regions. He turned out to be a 22-year-old barista from Vinnytsia, who corrected enemy fire and committed arson.

Title: A recruiting unit will be created in each brigade - the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces
Description: This was reported by 25 November General Staff of the Armed Forces. The corresponding organizational directive defines the task of forming full-time recruiting units in combat military units. This innovation will allow commanders to improve the organization and support of volunteer recruitment events. For reference: On October 1, 2024, at the initiative of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, amendments were made to Government Resolution No. 560 of May 16, 2024, the regulations of which allow commanders to call up volunteers directly to military units without contacting territorial recruitment and social support centers. Prior to that, the Armed Forces of Ukraine operated recruiting centers in the Ground Forces, Naval Forces, Airborne Assault Forces, Special Operations and Territorial Defense Forces. Today, they continue to actively develop and improve their capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, a recruiting center was opened in Sumy.

Title: Damaged equipment, piles of enemy bodies - special purpose drones worked fruitfully in Kurshchyna
Description: The video appeared on November 25 on the unit's channel. Despite attempts to use EW means, our pilots were able to accurately hit the enemy's equipment. In some areas, there were whole clusters of damaged enemy armored vehicles. Our pilots did not miss the enemy infantry either. In some places, dozens of Russians are lying down.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces during the assault on enemy positions captured three Russian soldiers.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces met with journalists
Description: The Commander-in-Chief reported this on the morning of November 25. -Today, it is extremely important to jointly counter Russian disinformation aimed at undermining Ukraine's defense capabilities. He informed media representatives about the progress of hostilities. He spoke about measures aimed at stabilizing the situation in the east, as well as about the significance of the Kursk operation and the situation in this area,- Oleksandr Syrskyi wrote. At the meeting, a wide range of issues related to the Armed Forces and the situation at the front were discussed. -He thanked Ukrainian and foreign journalists for their work in covering the topic of the Russian-Ukrainian war. In the conditions of repelling the large-scale armed aggression of the Russian Federation, the work of journalists is difficult and often involves risk to life. But this does not stop professionals in their field,- noted the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. Currently, about 7,800 representatives of foreign and Ukrainian media have the accreditation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces released footage of the destruction of the enemy.

Title: Already 13 people were injured in Kharkiv as a result of the Russian attack
Description: This was reported on the morning of November 25 by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Military Administration. According to him, civil infrastructure and cars were damaged. Emergency services are working on site to eliminate the consequences. -Hitting in the central part of the city, an area of ​​dense residential development. The flight landed in yards surrounded by multi-story buildings. Commercial buildings and cars were on fire. All relevant services and volunteers are working on the spot,- reported Mayor of Kharkiv Ihor Terekhov. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kyiv OVA reported about the consequences of the Russian attacks.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Foreign components of 2023 detected in North Korean KN-23/KN-24 missile — GUR
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on November 25. The aggressor state Russia received more than 100 such missiles from the DPRK. The enemy used this weapon for the first time in the war against Ukraine at the end of 2023. Together with the missiles, Pyongyang then sent its military specialists to Russia, who serviced the launchers and actually participated in war crimes against Ukraine. The victims of KN-23/KN-24 strikes were Ukrainian civilians both in front-line communities and in settlements far from the battle line. In particular, on January 2, 2024, four people died as a result of a North Korean missile hitting a Kyiv high-rise building. On August 11, 2024, a four-year-old boy and his father were killed by KN-23/KN-24 debris in the Kyiv region, and three more citizens were injured. The KN-23/KN-24 missile used by Russia against Ukraine contained foreign components produced by companies from five countries — China, the United States, Japan, the United Kingdom, and Switzerland. At least one of them, a voltage converter labeled -XP Power- by a British manufacturer, was made in February 2023, after the full-scale invasion had begun. In order to obtain technologies for their weapons programs, the aggressor state of Russia and its allies - the DPRK and Iran - use joint schemes to circumvent international sanctions, which requires an appropriate response, in particular - the strengthening of export control mechanisms. As reported by ArmyInform, in the GUR we talked about the tactics of using the Magura V5 attack marine drones.

Title: Marine bomb launcher in the steppes of Ukraine - in Donetsk region, a rare enemy salvo fire installa...
Description: The video of the hit was released on November 25 on the brigade's channel. The RBU-6000 -Smerch 2- was developed back in Soviet times and was intended to destroy enemy submarines and attacking torpedoes. Due to the fact that nothing is known about Ukrainian submarines in Donbas, it can be assumed that the use of such specific weapons is a sign of a certain arms crisis in the enemy. Also, the fighters of the 5th brigade destroyed the mortar and the enemy's shelter. As ArmyInform reported, fighters of the 5th assault Kyiv brigade repelled a foot assault of the invaders on Pokrovsky direction.

Title: In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked 67 times — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Uk...
Description: Operational information as of 08.00 on November 25 was published by the General Staff Armed Forces The situation at the front remains difficult. The enemy, using his advantage in manpower and equipment, attacks our positions. Ukrainian defenders steadfastly hold back the onslaught of the occupiers and inflict maximum losses on the enemy. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Khrynivka settlements of Chernihiv region; Glukhiv, Svesa, Solyaniki, Basivka, Zhuravka of the Sumy region; Graniv, Tyche, Bohuslavka of the Kharkiv region; Lyman, Velika Novosilka, Donetsk region; the city of Zaporizhzhia; Novomykolaivka, Kherson region. During the past day, the aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit twelve areas of concentration of personnel. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our troops six times near the settlements of Kozachoi Lopan, Tykhoi and Vovchansk. In the Kupyan direction, 14 attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Golubivka, Pischany, Lozova, Kruglyakivka, Novoosynovy, Kolisnyvka, and Vyshnevoy. The enemy attacked 15 times in the Lyman direction. He tried to penetrate our defense near the settlements of Novomlynsk, Kolisnikivka, Kruglyakivka, Senkove, and Lozova. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked four times in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 55 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in Myrolyubivka, Krutoy Yar, Novotoretsky, Lysivka, Krasny Yar, Mykolaivka, Sukhoi Yar and Mykhailivka districts. The main efforts of enemy attacks were concentrated in the direction of Selidove and Promin settlements. In the Toretsk direction, the aggressor made nine attempts to advance in the districts of Diliivka, Toretsk and Shcherbinivka, and was repulsed. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of this day, the enemy attacked 46 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Pustinka, and Chumatskyi. In the Kurakhiv direction, the Defense Forces repelled 67 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance near Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zori, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Hanivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 14 assaults on our positions in the districts of Trudovoy, Novosilka, and Makarivka. Actively engaged bomber aircraft for strikes in the direction. In the Dnieper direction, four fruitless attempts to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their occupied positions for the invaders ended in nothing. The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region. Over the past day, Russian planes carried out 37 airstrikes (49 air strikes) on Russian territory, Ukrainian defenders repelled 25 attacks by invaders. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation uses artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. -Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Together we will win! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, losses of the enemy per day amounted to more than 1,600 soldiers and 27 artillery systems.

Title: Explosions large and small - paratroopers continue to destroy the enemy in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of the combat work was released on November 25 on the brigade channel. The paratroopers were especially successful in destroying the enemy's ammunition depot, which spectacularly exploded. -The fighting in Kurshchyna is fierce, but victory will be for Ukraine! The paratroopers of the 95th brigade of the DSHV inflict devastating blows on the enemy and advance. Glory to Ukraine!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were defeated in the Kursk region Russians, who went on an assault with a whole convoy of -Ahmat- armored vehicles.

Title: 17 Shaheds were shot down in Sumy Oblast
Description: The Sumy Regional Military Administration reported this in the morning. A total of 593 Russian drones have been destroyed in Sumy Oblast since the beginning of the year. -We thank our anti-aircraft fighters for coordinated work, effective use of weapons, protection and saved lives. Glory to Ukraine! -Glory to the heroes!- - said in the message of Sumy OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, for the attack on Sumy the enemy used -Shakhedi- with shrapnel for the first time.

Title: More than 1,600 soldiers and 27 artillery systems — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff on the morning of November 25 Armed Forces The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 25, 2024 are estimated to be: The data is being refined. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy attacked almost 200 times a day.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces released footage of the destruction of the enemy
Description: The corresponding post was posted on the page of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the footage, Ukrainian tankers, gunners, and drone operators struck enemy equipment and manpower. -Combat work continues 24/7. Destroy the enemy. Glory to Ukraine!- Oleksandr Syrskyi wrote. As reported by ArmyInform, Oleksandr Syrskyi met with military and civilian bloggers.

Title: The enemy keeps one ship with missiles in the Black Sea
Description: as of 06:00 on November 25 the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Azov and Mediterranean seas. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 6 ships, of which 1 continued its movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 5 ships, of which 4 were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the government approved /a> implementation plan of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine, developed by the Ministry of Defense.

Title: The enemy attacked almost 200 times a day — the General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 November 24 was published by the General Staff Armed Forces The Russian invaders launched one missile strike (four missiles), 48 airstrikes, dropping 54 guided aerial bombs on the territory of Ukraine. In addition, 540 kamikaze drones were brought in to attack and more than three thousand shots were fired at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our units six times in the areas of Kozachai Lopan, Tykhoi, and Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, the aggressor carried out attacks near Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Kruglyakivka, Senkovo, and Lozova. Ukrainian defenders stopped 11 enemy attacks, four more are still ongoing. The enemy also carried out an airstrike on Bohuslavka. In the Lymansky direction, Russian invaders attacked the positions of the Defense Forces 20 times near the settlements of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terny, Yampolivka, Torske, and Serebryanka. Also, the city of Liman was hit by enemy air bombs today. In the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy tried to advance near Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky. The defense forces stopped four attacks by the invaders. In the Toretsk direction, the aggressor made nine attempts to advance in the districts of Diliivka, Toretsk and Shcherbinivka, and was repulsed. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of this day, the enemy attacked 41 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Dachensky, Pustinka, and Chumatsky. Our defenders have repelled 32 enemy assaults, nine battles are still going on. According to the available data at that time, the losses of the enemy in the direction amounted to 336 servicemen killed and wounded, Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed two tanks, two armored fighting vehicles, nine cars and the artillery system of the occupiers. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy made 57 attempts to break through our defenses near the settlements of Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Hanivka. 50 combats have been completed, seven more are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy attacked our units 14 times near Trudovoy, Novosilka, and Makarivka, and at this time two skirmishes are ongoing. Today, the occupiers attacked Velyka Novosilka with anti-aircraft missiles and unguided air missiles. In the Dnieper direction, the invading troops made four fruitless attempts to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their occupied positions. They suffered losses and retreated. The enemy hit Nikolaevka with unguided missiles. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions. The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region. Enemy aviation continues to destroy its villages and cities with guided aerial bombs, Ukrainian soldiers repelled 21 enemy attacks today, the fighting continues. Today, it is worth noting the soldiers of the 124th separate brigade of territorial defense, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces today 12 attacks in Kurshchyna were repulsed, battles continue in the Kurakhiv and Lyman directions.

Title: Enemy cesspools were dug somewhere in Odessa -Nikolai Fyodorovich-: what are you lying about
Description: However, all his words are a standard set of Kremlin narratives and clichés used by propagandists every day. It in no way reflects the opinion of the residents of all of Odessa. After all, the only country that makes the residents of Odessa and other cities and villages of Ukraine suffer is terrorist Russia and its dictator Putin. It is the Russians who launch attack drones and missiles over Ukraine every night and every day. According to social survey of the Rozumkov Center, as of September In 2024, 94% of Ukrainian citizens have a negative attitude towards the Russian Federation. By the way, as a result of a Russian missile attack on the city on November 18, 11 people died. A total of 55 people were injured, 23 of them are still in hospitals.

Title: Help has arrived: how recruits are being prepared for a real war in Donetsk region
Description: We asked who and what is taught before being sent to combat positions. The training ground is somewhere in the steppes of Donetsk region. An infantry division moves between barricades made of old tires. They keep their distance, keep their weapons at the ready. — A grenade! The instructor shouts and throws a mock-up of a hand grenade to the side of the compartment. Fighters fall amicably to the ground. They are waiting — Explosion! And we're moving! Let's move! He who does not move will die! The instructor shouts, the fighters pick themselves up and advance further. In general, all recruits have undergone a month's training in training centers, but the battalion believes that it is not enough. -Military personnel come from training centers with a low level of training. They have a small shot, weak tactical skills, everything has to be learned almost from scratch. Currently, 90 percent of the recruitment is without experience of military service. Which, after all, gave at least some initial skills,- says the commander of the department with the call sign Psych, a calm man in his 50s with a beard. According to him, 12-15 bullets are given in training centers, in the best case, up to a hundred. -We give much more. Weapons are attached to military personnel so that they get used to them. This weapon is being fired. We also allow shooting with RPGs, disposable grenade launchers, and various machine guns. Here we are already undergoing disassembly and assembly. We try to prepare as much as possible,- says Psych. -Here, a fighter can shoot more in one day than in a whole month at the training center. This is a fact. We shoot from automatic weapons, from machine guns, from RPGs, throw grenades of various types,- says the senior sergeant with the call sign Romeo, black and cheerful. -There are almost no veterans among the recruits. We have succumbed to this misconception that the army must be professional. In fact, an army can only be professional if it has to fight against a bunch of savages. And against an enemy equal in strength, a common army is needed. After all, the protection of Ukraine is the constitutional duty of its citizens. And I don't have time for civilians now. They can't even line up and march in formation. That's why they have to be taught fast,- says Norman, who is tall and looks like a wrestler. He was just throwing dummy grenades at the soldiers to teach them to immediately lie down and then move quickly. The time that the unit allocates for the training of new recruits depends on the situation at the front. -There were cases when fighters arrived by bus after training, received weapons and immediately went into battle, because the enemy was attacking and it was necessary to hold the front. Now we try to cook for at least a week,- says Romeo. Next, according to the plan, the fighters will have training on conducting combat operations in urban conditions. The department enters the site of the landfill, on which there are models of urban development. Fighters learn to sweep, cover each other, act as a team. -Tactical fighting skills in urban development, which we really need now, none. We are now teaching them this, because there is no way without it. Because what is Donbas? This is an agglomeration! More than five hundred settlements! They flow into each other! In some places, the boundaries of settlements pass along the streets! It is a continuous development. And the war in solid construction has its differences. Here, the offense requires a one-to-seven power advantage, while the field requires a one-to-three power advantage. Considering that Donetsk is almost one continuous population center, it is necessary to sharpen the preparation for this. Because if we surrender Donbas, it will be trouble. Operational space begins behind Donbas, that is, space not occupied by troops and without prepared fortifications. That's it, they go to Dnipropetrovsk region and spread in any direction like a plague or a locust. That's why we need to focus on Donbas!- says Norman. Military personnel move from wall to wall, working in pairs. One takes a position and shouts, -I'm hiding!- The second shouts: -I'm coming- and runs forward, takes the position: -I'm hiding!-. Everyone else watches the pair, the instructor explains and points out mistakes. Another couple starts working. Some try harder, some less. Someone falls when necessary, and someone just kneels so as not to get dirty. -We are trying to teach them so that they don't die stupidly on the first day. The reason some people don't give their all is because people don't fully understand where they are and what they're here for. It has not yet been understood that in war any mistake, wrong step, untimely movement can cost lives,- says Romeo. -There's nothing to do in urban combat without grenades! You should carry at least a dozen with you! And when entering the premises, do not spare a grenade for each room, but rather a few! To make sure that there is no enemy waiting for you! -Raise your hands, who doesn't have combat experience?- Norman looks at the recruits. Everyone raises their hands. This is another example of the quality of training in educational centers. You will have to learn this too. When the exercise is over, the fighters are given time to rest a little. Someone smokes, someone sits down directly on the ground to rest. Everyone is breathing heavily, because the training takes place in full equipment: body armor, helmet, discharge, first-aid kit, weapons, ammunition. A total of at least 15 kilograms. Try to run with a kettlebell, fall, stand up, squat, see if you can last long. I look at the fighters. Most are somewhere around fifty and they don't look like athletes. Fall asleep after exercises. I approach a fighter who was very active in training, did not feel sorry for himself, worked out to the full, and also caught up with his brothers who were lazy. Mykola is of medium height, thin, sinewy, from the city of Gulyaipole in Zaporozhye. Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, a front has been passing there nearby. Mykola knows what war is. Especially since he did not work anywhere, but in a funeral service. -I saw different things. People also had to be collected in parts. We are in a war zone, shelled every day: mortars, guns, tanks. It happened that you were digging a grave, and then the shelling began, and you jumped into the hole yourself to wait. Then you dig further. He was wounded twice. Once in the head a fragment, but only -combed-. The second time in the stomach, but saved the phone, a mortar fragment got stuck in it. That phone is still lying at home,- says Mykola. His family left for Zhytomyr, and he stayed to help the old and sick who remained in his hometown. In 2022, he was summoned three times to the TCC, but each time he was not taken to the army. Only now it was his turn. Mykola underwent basic military training in the Poltava region, but he says that here, in the battalion, the occupations were more intense. -We didn't have such movement in urban conditions with weapons there. It was mostly medicine, some more lectures. Well, maybe 5 times in a month they stormed the trenches. And then they tried to storm more. So that it was not so much, truly, as here, in the textbook. And here, of course, it is difficult, especially on the first day. But we are taught to go to the positions and not stay there on the first day,- says Mykola. Sergey stands a little aside. He is from Bohodukhov, Kharkiv region. I was driving from work, stood at a bus stop, the police drove up, and in a couple of days I already went to the educational center. -There's a lot of useful stuff here, it's hard to remember everything. But something must be done, because this is the army,- says Serhiy. Fighters rest before a new exercise. In the battalion, problems are recognized both with the age of recruitment and with its motivation. -Well, what could be the motivation if he was going to work and was taken to the TCC? Will he have motivation? But hardly. It was at the beginning of a large scale motivated guys, but they have either run out or there are few left. That's why you have to fight with the people who are there,- says Romeo. And Norman says that it's not about age, it's about your attitude. -I myself am already under sixty. You just don't need to drink and smoke, you need to do sports. And the boys, of course, complain that it is difficult for them. They often come here already with some kind of clinic,- sighs Norman. He himself was withdrawn from the combat team after a serious injury and has been the head of the battalion's combat training for a year. To his credit, he looks younger than most recruits. The battalion's aerial scouts raise two drones. The next point of training: work under enemy copters. The detachment moves through the territory in pairs, when a drone appears overhead, then the fighter drops to the ground, necessarily in a straight line, to maintain visual contact with the drone. If earlier the training program for new recruits included a run-in with a tank, now it is a drone flight. Because the recruits may not see an enemy tank, but an enemy drone - for sure. -The Kalashnikov assault rifle does not change, but the war has changed very much: both methods and tactics. At the beginning of the war, who would have thought that drones would play such a role? And now it is a technological war, a war of drones. Now they attach to them -lighters- and other ammunition. Drones perform very different tasks and you have to be prepared for them,- says Romeo. -We currently have the biggest losses from enemy drones. Moreover, they already have standard ammunition, thermobaric, cumulative, which allow them to perform any task on the battlefield. Because what is mortar or art? Shot and hit or missed. Because the flight of a mine or a projectile is affected by a large number of factors: the quality of ammunition, wear of the muzzle channel, wind, weather. And the drone is all about it, it can fly up and accurately drop its ammunition on the target. So the focus has now shifted and countering drones is now the main thing,- says Norman. He remembers the year 2022, when he fought near Lysychansk, and the main striking force was artillery. Shows photos on the phone of positions that look like a lunar landscape: dozens and hundreds of craters from artillery shells. -We did not see a live opponent, we were simply destroyed by his arta. A platoon entered the position, and only half left. Or simply ran away in a panic due to continuous fire exposure. But now everything has changed and it is the drones that are making the decisive fire impact. That's why we teach recruits to get used to the idea that they will constantly be in front of our eyes and the enemy's eyes,- says Norman. The copters dive at the fighters, and they learn to notice them in time and not to panic. Vlad is the youngest in the entire department. On September 2, he turned 25, it is from this age that mobilization now begins, and already on September 3 he had a summons. Vlad himself is from Cherkasy, says that since 2022 he has received summons several times, but he was not taken because of his age. -I was told that you are still young, go for a walk for now. I updated my details and waited. September 3 came, I was sent to the VLK, I passed it in two days. In two, because the tests had to be taken the next day. In the TCC, I met with a representative of the battalion, and he offered me to serve in it. I agreed, got the attitude and went to the training center, after which I got into the battalion, everything was as it should be. Is it difficult? It is difficult, but useful. I listen a lot, I try to remember everything,- says Vlad. According to Oleg, deputy chief of staff of the battalion for mobilization work, Vlad's case is not an isolated one. -Our vacancies are on many sites. Now they have also appeared on Army+. If a person is interested in them, write to us. I contact her, ask questions, send a questionnaire. A person is filling it out, and at this time I am checking it on the website of court decisions to weed out people who want to hide in the army from some administrative or criminal cases. If the person is suitable for us, then we will provide them with a letter of recommendation. This is an official document with a registration number and seal. With it, a person goes to the TCC. If he is going to sign a contract, then he will 100% come to us. As for mobilization, there are options, because the General Staff can decide that some brigade needs more replenishment. That's why I always recommend a contract. For the most part, the positions of clerks, UAV operators, and drivers are filled with us through recruiting. There are less snipers or shooters,- said Oleg. Training on the range ends with firing from a Browning machine gun. The guys come two by two, squat down, the instructors show how to prepare the machine gun for battle, how to aim and how to fire. Short bursts fly towards the targets. Some of the cartridges are tracers to make it easier to adjust the fire. -Browning- shoots loudly, out of habit it can cover your ears a little. But the work of the machine gun, it is far from the loudest thing that can happen in the positions. Recruits are animated, they are interested in shooting with a machine gun. Someone sits on a box, someone kneels, short queues, shell casings fly. Fighters listen to the advice of instructors, adjust their fire. Today they still have grenade throwing here at the training ground. And in the evening, classes on tactical medicine. The battalion tries to give its soldiers maximum skills that will help them in battle. And in just a week or two, the boys will be in combat positions. Hold the front and do not let the enemy into the operational space.

Title: Getting Closer to the Assault Rifle: Introducing the US Army's Newest 30mm Grenade Launcher
Description: As said in a release posted on the Barrett portal, the new Squad Support Rifle System (SSRS) is designed to revolutionize the battlefield with its advanced capabilities and innovative design. This marks a significant step forward in the evolution of soldier protection systems, ArmyInform reports. Manufacturers classify the weapon as a -support rifle-, which is designed to fire both at enemy infantry and vehicles, as well as at drones. -We are pleased to partner with Barrett, the world's leading manufacturer of military weapons, to further advance our 30mm support rifle for the US Army's PGS program,- said Michael Merino, president of MARS Inc. Merino added that the companies are developing a solution that will significantly improve a soldier's ability to counter a wide range of threats on the battlefield. The PGS is a magazine-fed semi-automatic weapon that provides soldiers with greater accuracy and firepower. The grenade launcher is designed to engage targets at a distance of 35 meters to over half a kilometer, including enemy manpower hiding behind shelters. The PGS aims to offer a flat firing trajectory for faster and more accurate target engagement, reducing flight time for long-range shots. In addition, the PGS will include a sophisticated fire control system capable of programming shots and ammunition families for different tactical situations. The arsenal can include rounds for counter-defilade, close combat, and even armor-piercing charges or anti-drone (Counter-UAS) munitions. As inform the authors of the defense portal Army Recognition, the program reached its final stage when several companies such as FN America and Plumb Precision Products, submitted their own projects for evaluation by military experts. The new weapon is designed to participate in the PGS (Precision Grenadier System) tender, which is expected in fiscal year 2026, when the US Army will select the final candidate after a successful technology demonstration. The key to the design of the Barrett SSRS is its comfortable assault rifle-based design. The weapon has a stock in the rear, a magazine with five cartridges in the center and a barrel length of 305 mm. The grenade launcher is compact and versatile with a total length of 861 mm and a weight of only 6.3 kg. It can fire a variety of ammunition, including anti-aircraft shells, giving soldiers a decisive advantage on the battlefield. The weapon is also equipped with a Vortex Optics XM-157 scope, similar to the sight installed on the 6.8 mm machine gun XM7 army USA. This sight is used in the marksmanship developed under the Next Generation Squad Weapons (NGSW) program. This optical enhancement further strengthens SSRS's ability to deliver precision in combat, aligning with the US Army's modernization goals. With Barrett leading a team of industry-leading partners, this next-generation grenade launcher will be a key component of future lethality systems in the U.S. Army soldier's arsenal, combining firepower, accuracy and safety on the modern battlefield. The US Army announced the launch of the PGS program in August 2024. It is worth reminding, as reported ArmyInform , the products of the arms company Barrett Firearms are on the list of about 20 samples of sniper and anti-materiel rifles, which from the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine were codified and accepted for use in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Exhibition presentation of the SSRS 30-mm semi-automatic grenade launcher Video: World military news

Title: Should we give up propaganda: a military historian on the world experience of working with human con...
Description: -We do not like to mention either the Soviet experience or the experience of other totalitarian states. But in reality, propaganda always works the same way. She worked in the same way in Ancient Rome, in European states, when the Crusades were being prepared. It worked like this in Europe during the 30 Years War. She worked like this during the First and Second World Wars. At the moment, certain democratic circles believe that the use of propaganda is unacceptable, although we see that no country in the world shies away from using propaganda. The only difference is that now the word -propaganda- has been replaced by the construct -strategic communications-. But the essence and methods have not changed from this. We can call them whatever we want, but these principles are absolutely constant, they have always worked the same way. And I don't think that Ukraine should give up on this, it's just that in the end we have to get used to the fact that evil should be called evil, and not the phrase -not everything is so clear-cut.- Good should be called good, struggle should be called struggle, one should go precisely to Victory. And then propaganda turns into just a tool. She is neither good nor bad. It is simply a tool for working with human consciousness. Likewise, someone may not like a scalpel. But the scalpel during surgery cannot be replaced by anything else. In the same way, nothing else can replace propaganda in working with consciousness.-

Title: The occupiers are threatening an offensive in the South, and they are shifting their troops to other...
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -The week is passing... under the sign of a certain hysteria in the media that the enemy is preparing a large-scale massive offensive on the regional center of Zaporizhzhia. It was again necessary, as they say, to throw the fire information team to explain to people that today the biggest threat to the Zaporizhzhia agglomeration is, of course, the actions of enemy aviation, which is engaged in terrorizing the civilian population: they drop anti-aircraft missiles, use unguided air missiles...-, - Serhii Bratchuk explained. In addition, according to him, separate enemy units are withdrawn from the Zaporizhzhia direction and transferred to the Donetsk front, the Pokrovskoe-Kurakhov direction. The spokesman also emphasized that Velika Novosilka is an important logistics point, because it is actually located on the border of three regions: Donetsk, Zaporizhzhya, and Dnipropetrovsk, although administratively it belongs to Donetsk region. -With the questions that arise around Velika Novosilka, we are talking about the fact that then the enemy will be able to become more active and threaten the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions more,- Serhiy Bratchuk said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians are using all possible forces in the South of Ukraine, from convicts to marines.

Title: All documents are burnt! — the Russians confirmed that our drones were hit
Description: Footage from the cameras of the Russians and from our drones was combined and made public on the channel of the unit. In the video, Russians drive along the road in the Pokrovsky direction and observe a pile of destroyed equipment. At some point, they notice our FPV drone, try to run away or shoot it, but they don't succeed. They are forced to run away from the car. Which is destroyed by our drone, along with weapons and documents. There are the same videos from the cameras of our drones. -The enemy fixes one of the torn -Hrads- and shows the path of death. On that day, we burned 1 -hail-, 5 -loaves-, 2 -Urals-, 3 buggies and hit 2 tanks. This is all the result of one TPO group working 24/7 to 'improve' enemy logistics,- Muramasa commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Muramasa 109th separate brigades of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces destroy enemy logistics in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: Lithuania transferred a new batch of military aid to Ukraine
Description: This is stated in messages of the Ministry of Defense of Lithuania. In response to Ukraine's requests this year, Lithuania has already transferred 155 mm ammunition, M113 armored personnel carriers, anti-drone systems to Ukraine. Ukraine also received winter equipment and sets of warm clothing, ammunition for the -Karl Gustav- anti-tank grenade launcher, RISE-1 remote detonation systems, generators, loaders, trailers, folding cabins and other auxiliary equipment. Since the beginning of the war, Lithuania has provided military aid to Ukraine in the amount of more than 705 million euros. Lithuania's overall support to Ukraine is long-term and has exceeded 1 billion euros. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine reached specific agreements with Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Lithuania on investing directly in Ukrainian defense production.

Title: Three thermobars for the dugout of the dead! — our stormtroopers showed the old school
Description: The video of the battle was released on the battalion channel. -Skaly- fighters conducted a successful assault in the Mykolaivka village area in the Pokrovsky direction. First, the Bradley infantry fighting vehicle went to the positions where the enemy was located. She brought the landing party to the positions, landed and covered our attack aircraft, mowing down the nearby landing from the cannon. Our fighters started clearing the trenches. It turned out that the occupiers were entrenched in one dugout. Ours tried to smoke them out with a smoke grenade. When the smoke did not penetrate the Russians, our fighter threw three grenades into the dugout at once, thereby contributing to the urgent demobilization of two Russian soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, our attack aircraft arranged a whole performance for the sake of a successful assault.

Title: President: Putin cannot be given a week to adapt and find a countermeasure
Description: This was stated by President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in his evening address. He emphasized that it is necessary to focus on the supply of these systems and Russia should feel that every step it takes to expand the war has consequences for it. -The consequences are in our actions at the front, our soldiers, our units. And also — consequences in the actions of the world. In how the world responds. You can't give Putin a week to adapt and find a countermeasure. It is necessary to constantly do everything so that Russia is forced to look for the possibility of peace. Real peace. And this can only be achieved by two things — aid to Ukraine and pressure on Russia,- the President said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi reported that today the Security Service of Ukraine, the Ministry of Internal Affairs showed news agencies the fragments of a Russian missile that hit our Dnipro. -Examinations, work with partners to establish all the details and all the characteristics of this missile are ongoing now. And in order to find an answer to this Russian escalating step together,- the head of state added. As ArmiyaInform reported, on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: Kyiv OVA reported on the consequences of the Russian attack
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. As a result of the fall of fragments of downed enemy targets, a fire broke out at the facility, which was promptly extinguished by rescuers. The roof of the building is partially damaged. There are no victims. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 24, according to preliminary information, attack on Chernihiv region.

Title: Run, Vanko, run - the occupier was given a running test
Description: The video was published on November 24. The invader was moving towards our positions when it was spotted by an FPV drone. The Russian did not want to die, so he ran away. Quickly realizing that he was inferior to the drone at a direct distance, the Russian tried to save himself by maneuverability. Jumping to the side, running around the bushes and other tricks gave the occupier half a minute of his worthless life. But then the inevitable payback happened. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the unmanned systems battalion Strike Drone Company of the 47th mechanized brigade made a two-part movie based on Russian classics -Crime and Punishment-.

Title: I didn't have the strength to look at it anymore - the Harpy drone about why she went to the front
Description: The story about the fight was published on November 24 on the brigade's page . -There is a war here, the enemy is in front of us, and he must be destroyed. Apart from us, no one will stop the invaders, no one will win back our lands. And if we don't need it, then someone else definitely won't do it!… The Horde has no right to simply perish. She has to take responsibility,- says the Harpy. She has her own, instructive for many -fighters of the economic front-, story of how the project manager came to the defense of Ukraine and has been fighting since the beginning of spring 2024. What do you like about work? What should -good Russians- look like? How to deal with enemy REB? What kind of relationships prevail within a small military team? Answers to these questions in the video: As reported by ArmyInform, Fighters of the 46th Airborne Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroyed three boats of the occupiers, which tried to land a landing.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi met with military and civilian bloggers
Description: This is stated in a message on the page on Facebook. -Their attention to pressing issues in the Defense Forces helps to respond quickly and find appropriate solutions,- the statement said. The Commander-in-Chief noted that at the meeting they openly discussed the situation at the front and focused in detail on the need to reform the Armed Forces, the creation of new brigades, the replacement of brigades and many other issues that concern society. -Similar meetings will take place in the future. Thank you for consistently supporting the Armed Forces of Ukraine and for reporting the truth about the heroic struggle of Ukrainians against the occupiers. We are strong when we are united,- the message reads.

Title: They turned the vegetable storage into a pilot burial ground — the destruction of the shelter of Rus...
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 24 on the unit's channel. Aerial scouts spotted Russian drones sitting on the roof of a vegetable store buried in the ground. Our FPV drone took off to meet the Russians, which was able to fly inside past the bars and caused a stir among the Russian pilots. A powerful explosion and a lot of smoke gave confidence that if any of the Russians survived, it was only in a -vegetable- state. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the platoon of the Totem 3 mechanized unmanned aerial systems battalion of the 72nd mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets showed how remotely mine enemy roads.

Title: Funding of the Ukrainian defense industry is an effective method of operational support of the Defen...
Description: He said this during a meeting with Senators Rebecca Patterson, Gwen Boniface, Peter Behm, Stanley Kutcher and David Wells on the sidelines of the International Security Forum in Halifax, Canada, reports MOU. -For us, it is extremely important that the decisions meet our needs as much as possible and that the aid provided promptly arrives in Ukraine and is felt on the battlefield,- said Serhii Boev. The deputy minister also discussed with the Canadian parliamentarians the possibility of financing the Ukrainian defense industry by the Canadian government. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine reached specific agreements with Norway, Denmark, Sweden and Lithuania on investing directly in Ukrainian production.

Title: The Defense Forces of Ukraine spoke about the blue dreams of Russians in the Dnieper region
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -The main task of the enemy is to take possession of our islands on the Dnieper, to enter small and large ones. The day before, the enemy attacked Kozatskyi Island, which is quite large. But it was not possible to carry out assault actions there, which the enemy was counting on,- said Serhiy Bratchuk. He emphasized that fire control over the islands from our right bank is the responsibility of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. -The enemy has a present plan to try to create something - this is such a -blue dream- of the Russians - to create something like our Krynyk, what we had on the left bank. That's what they say: -do it on the right bank a la Krynka in order to continue your offensive actions.- But today we are not talking about forcing the Dnieper, because we understand that the Russians do not have, first of all, the resources, because some units are also withdrawn from the Dnieper direction and transferred as reserves, in particular, to Kurakhivsko-Pokrovsky. All offensives on the right bank are also simply impossible today,- Serhii Bratchuk summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, near Kherson, Russians attack the Dnipro islands on air mattresses.

Title: The enemy struck Nikopol region six times, damaged infrastructure
Description: This was announced by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. The Russians sent kamikaze drones to the district center. Chervonogrihorivska and Pokrovsk communities were hit with heavy artillery. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Nikopol. Specialists are determining what other destructions we have in the local settlements due to the attacks of the Russians. Fortunately, there were no casualties anywhere. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 24, according to preliminary information, attack on Chernihiv region.

Title: The season of vertical navigation — another Russian crossing was bombed in Kurshchyna
Description: The video was published on the channel of Air Force fighters of the Sonyashnyk Armed Forces. the Russians had been building a crossing over the Seim near the village of Karizh for several days and had just begun to use it when SDBs arrived - American high-precision cruise bombs that hit the target precisely. At the time of the attack, there was a Russian military truck on the crossing, it seems that it went on its maiden voyage. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 39th tactical aviation brigade of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine hit guided bombs GBU-39 Small Diameter Bomb on dugouts with enemy manpower and ammunition in the Zaporizhzhia direction.

Title: The General Staff showed how Australian instructors train soldiers of the Armed Forces in Britain
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Australian instructors are hard at work training commanders of duty units, platoons and companies for the Armed Forces of Ukraine as part of the multinational initial operation INTERFLEX in Great Britain. The training was a great opportunity to exchange ideas and strengthen our relationship. As reported, in Great Britain within the scope of the Interflex operation -2025-rik/->held an international partner conference dedicated to planning the training of the Ukrainian military for 2025. ArmyInform published a series of materials about the training of Ukrainian servicemen in Great Britain as part of the Interflex operation.

Title: the Russians are afraid that the Armed Forces will force the Dnipro - they put their -northern fleet...
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -In particular, in the west, in the area of ​​the Tendrivskaya and Kinburn spits, there are representatives of the -Northern Fleet of the Russian Federation-, and they, by the way, are now increasing the number of groups in order to defend and destroy, in which case, our landing force, which will try to force these braids The Russians are afraid that we will force the Dnipro there, land and hit their left flank,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Next, according to him, are the groups of the -Southern Military District- - three combined armies. Then - representatives of the Eastern Military District, two combined armies. -In addition, there are representatives of widows here - about seven brigades and regiments. Therefore, the group is quite serious, it constantly conducts rotational activities of units that participate in assaults. In addition, they constantly bring in replenishment in order, in particular, to replenish losses. Do they transfer any new ones?... Large groups are not transferred, some units, for example, assault units or drone operators, are transferred. We have information that one of the small units was transferred from Donetsk in order to intensify their assaults,- the spokesman summarized. As ArmyInform wrote, in the Zaporizhzhia direction na-zaporizkomu-napryamku/-> Russian troops storm the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in small groups.

Title: Air defense systems, armored vehicles, plans for 2025: Serhiy Boev held a meeting with the State Sec...
Description: About this reports MOU. The negotiations took place on the sidelines of the 16th International Security Forum, which is taking place in the Canadian city of Halifax. This annual conference is one of the world's most influential and representative platforms for discussing global security and defense issues. Serhiy Boev thanked Germany for the Patriot and IRIS-T air defense systems provided, which are critically necessary in the conditions of constant Russian missile attacks on Ukrainian cities and villages. The parties exchanged information on cooperation plans in 2025 and discussed what types of weapons could be delivered. -We discussed the possibility of deeper involvement of Germany in the supply of heavy armored vehicles for Ukraine,- Serhii Boev said after the negotiations. He also suggested to his German colleague to consider the possibility of deeper cooperation between Ukrainian and German defense companies in the spheres of air defense and armored vehicles production.

Title: The Defense Forces named the reason for the decrease in the number of Shaheds
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -When it was windy yesterday, the number of drones was 40 percent less than in the previous days, when the weather was more or less favorable for UAVs and, in general, for the conduct of hostilities,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Therefore, the weather also affects the intensity of destruction of enemy equipment. -And the same number of destroyed reconnaissance drones, in particular, eagles, zalls, superkams - when the weather is good, we destroy them much more. And when less flies, we destroy less,- explained Vladyslav Voloshyn. As ArmyInform wrote, according to the data of the Defense Forces, Iranian designers have not solved the technical problem of their kamikaze drones, with which the Russians attack peaceful Ukrainian cities. It is, in particular, about the influence of weather conditions on the quality of the flight of the Shaheds.

Title: Studying the norms of international humanitarian law: the Armed Forces organized additional classes ...
Description: This was notified by the General Staff of the ZSU. According to the decision of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, in order to maximize the coverage of the personnel of military units, authoritative international organizations were also involved in such exercises. Thus, in November 2024, thanks to the support of the international humanitarian organization -Geneva Call-, six additional training sessions on IHL were provided for more than 200 sergeants of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in various military garrisons. The most valuable thing is that the educational trainings are conducted with an emphasis on practical modeling of possible problem situations in the field of application of IHL norms on the battlefield with the determination of the optimal algorithm of actions to solve them. In addition, the systematic holding of such classes contributed to the establishment of an active exchange of experience and educational practices between representatives of the legal services of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and international organizations, in particular the -Geneva Call-, which take care of training military personnel in the rules and customs of warfare. The practical implementation of the mentioned project is ensured by the NGO -League of Officers-, which is an executive partner of international organizations that cooperate with the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the field of application of IHL norms.

Title: The occupiers hit Chernihiv Oblast, there is an injured person
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. Two explosions were heard in the Koryukiv district. Farm buildings were damaged, a 28-year-old man was injured, he was hospitalized in one of the local hospitals. There are damaged houses in the Chernihiv district, a community near Chernihiv. Currently, information on the consequences of the Russian shelling is being clarified. As ArmiyaInform reported, the occupying Russian army began to strike more often the city of Slovyansk in Donetsk region. In particular, the occupiers drop guided aerial bombs on the city.

Title: Investments in the Ukrainian defense industry: Rustem Umyerov talked about agreements with 4 countri...
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov, following the results of a trip to several European countries. Each of the mentioned countries has already announced funding for our production, in particular, for our Ukrainian long-range drones and missiles. Norway has allocated 500 million kroner (45 million dollars) to finance Ukrainian production. Denmark will continue investing in the Ukrainian defense industry according to the -Danish model- in 2025, and will also increase military support to Ukraine in 2025 to 2.2 billion euros. Part of this aid will be directed to the training of brigades, joint defense projects and financing under the -Danish model 2.0-, which will speed up arms deliveries and invest in Ukrainian defense enterprises. Sweden is joining the -Danish model- to finance the production of Ukrainian long-range drones. Lithuania signed a Memorandum of Understanding , which provides for the first tranche of 10 million euros for the production of Ukrainian weapons, in particular within the framework of the -Palyanytsia- project. These funds will be transferred in the near future. Another important result is that new format of cooperation - -Nordic Group - Ukraine-, which unites 12 key countries: Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Iceland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Germany, the Netherlands, Poland and Great Britain. These are the states that provide the largest military support to Ukraine in Europe. The first meeting was held in Denmark, the next is planned in Ukraine. -During the negotiations with partners, clear directions of cooperation for 2025 were determined: training and equipping brigades, joint projects in the defense-industrial complex, procurement of drones, air defense systems and ammunition. Thanks to our partners for their support! We continue to look for new opportunities, expand cooperation and work together for a common victory!- - said Rustem Umyerov.

Title: They burned the tank, burned the barn, too — our pilots developed a new method of strikes
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 24 on the unit's channel. Our thermally charged FPV drone flew up to the immobilized Russian tank and carefully placed its ammunition on its brazier. The thermal charge began to burn, burning first the anti-drone protection of the tank, and then its turret. As a result, the tank caught fire. -Funeral of metal Katsap shit that will never go anywhere,- the video was commented on in the unit. The funeral went out with a fire: As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area Great Novosilka.

Title: Today, the defense forces repelled 12 attacks in Kurshchyna, fighting continues in the Kurakhiv and ...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces Today, the communities of settlements of Chernihiv and Sumy regions, such as Solyaniki, Khrinivka, Basivka, Zhuravka, Novenke, Oleksandria, Volfine, Obody and Timofiivka, were affected by enemy artillery and mortar fire. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice attacked the positions of our units in the area of ​​Tykhi and Vovchansk, one attack was repulsed by our soldiers, the battle is currently ongoing. Enemy aircraft also attacked Granovo with aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the Russian occupiers attacked the Defense Forces eight times in the areas of Novomlynsk, Kolisnykyvka, Kruglyakivka, Senkovo ​​and Lozova. In the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out 19 attacks on Ukrainian positions near the settlements of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terny, Yampolivka, Torske, and Serebryanka during the day, three skirmishes are still ongoing. Ukrainian soldiers steadfastly hold the defense and inflict losses on the enemy. In the Kramatorsk direction since the beginning of the day, units of the Defense Forces have repelled four attacks by Russian invaders near Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky. In the direction of Toretsk, the aggressor made six attempts to advance in the districts of Diliivka, Toretsk, and Shcherbinivka, one combat clash is ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian invaders made 16 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Dachensky, Pustinka, and Chumatsky. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repelled 12 enemy attacks, four clashes are still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy army attacked 34 times near settlements such as Berestki, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Romanivka, Elizavetivka, and Hanivka. Twenty-three attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed, and fighting continues. In the Vremivsk direction, five enemy attacks continue near Trudovoy, Novosilka and Makarivka. Ukrainian defenders have already repelled eight attacks by the occupiers in this direction. In the Dnieper direction the enemy tried unsuccessfully once to attack the positions of Ukrainian units. The operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. Enemy aviation continues to destroy their villages and cities. Since the beginning of the day, Russian planes have carried out 18 strikes, dropping 21 anti-aircraft missiles on their own territory. The defense forces repelled 12 attacks by the occupying forces of the Russian Federation in this direction today, the fighting continues. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions.

Title: - Our portraits are the most beautiful - Russian fighters were sent reinforcements in the form of Pu...
Description: Serhii, the spokesman of the volunteer Ukrainian army -South- told about this in ArmiyaTV stream Bratchuk -A corresponding directive has arrived for the Russian troops: every dugout should now have a portrait of the -bunker grandfather- and their so-called defense minister. I understand that this will certainly raise the motivation for the Russians; of course, it can make them happy. And things will go much better for them,- commented Serhiy Bratchuk ironically. He also added that there are those servicemen who still want to surrender. -And this is the best way to stay alive. But you see that the Zampolites take care of just such moral and psychological support of those troops, which, according to their moral composition, are not motivated. Because the mobilization resources that come, in particular, to these units, are poorly prepared and are thrown into battle, where they take a -ticket to a concert in Kobzon,- Serhiy Bratchuk summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine called on the world -pragne-myru/->strengthen sanctions because -Putin spits in the face of those who seek peace.-

Title: Carlson on minimalkas! — the occupier tried to take off on our drone
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. In the very first scene, the Russian tried to ride our FPV drone, and threw himself at it with his back, apparently he really wanted to fly. And it succeeded! True, complete fragmentation of the invader took place. Another Russian was able to escape from one drone, and from the second, but the third forced him to be urgently demobilized. See even more Russian death in the video:   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Madyara- as part of the marines showed their method of overcoming enemy anti-drone defense.

Title: In Toretsk, the Russian military killed two and wounded one civilian
Description: This was reported by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. Russian military personnel entered one of the apartments in the residential quarter of the city of Toretsk, where three civilians were staying. The occupiers deliberately opened fire on them from automatic weapons, as a result of which two local residents died on the spot. The man who was next to them was injured, with fractures to his shoulder and collarbone. Currently, the victim is receiving qualified medical assistance. Investigative (search) actions aimed at establishing all the circumstances of the specified event are being conducted. Under the procedural leadership of the Bakhmut district prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation was launched into the fact of committing a war crime that caused the death of people (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Tsunami- assault regiment of the -Lyut- brigade of the National Police of Ukraine captured the occupier.

Title: In the Luhansk region, our tank drove up close to the Russians and -dismantled- them in landing
Description: This is stated in the message of NSU on its Facebook page. In the video from the drone, you can see how our tank approaches the Russian positions hidden in the landing at a distance of several hundred meters. After that, he fires about ten shots at the occupants and returns to his position unharmed. -I drove in - worked - returned: all within a few minutes. Well-coordinated and professional work,- says the post to the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi /->crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area of ​​Velika Novosilka.

Title: It took off, swallowed energy, destroyed it - the everyday work of our pilots on the front lines
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. Lubart drones help stop enemy assaults near New York, destroy enemy equipment and personnel. The video captures the work from launching the drone to hitting the targets. While the drone is flying, the operator has time to drink energy to maintain concentration and reaction speed. The countdown of their lives begins for Russian attack aircraft. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard first force the Russian soldiers to climb into the ground, and -jorku/->then destroy.

Title: The number of Russian shelling of Sloviansk increased this week — MBA
Description: The head of the city's military administration, Vadym Lyakh, said this on -Society. Studio-. -As a rule, it is not one bomb, several of them arrive at a time. The problem is that it is very difficult to warn about the arrival of the KABs with the alarm signal that sounds, because they are in the sky for a short time. Enemy aviation operates both on the front line and in our cities,- said Vadym Lyakh. According to him, this week the number of shelling increased, there were casualties among civilians. The infrastructure was also affected — some neighborhoods of the city were without electricity for 15-20 hours as a result of damage to high-voltage networks outside the city. About 50,000 people remain in the city of Slovyansk, almost 5,000 of them are children. Hospitals, critical infrastructure, at least 13 points of invincibility in case of blackouts function here. In the community, about six thousand houses are not equipped with gas supply - they are helped with firewood by volunteers, local and state authorities. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on November 22, around 10:00 a.m., the Russian invaders hit the village of Krasnotorka of the Kramatorsk urban community in Donetsk region with six rockets with cluster submunitions. Read more about this in our report from the scene.

Title: the Russians are preparing to break through to the south of Donetsk region
Description: This was spoken of the Southern Defense Forces Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn on November 24. -On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions, the enemy is preparing to carry out assault operations and soon, there is a high probability that he will start assault operations, trying to wedge into our defense,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. When asked by the host about what exactly indicates this, Voloshyn said that our intelligence is transmitting information that assault groups are preparing. -These are small groups of infantry that conduct classes specifically on assault operations. In addition, in these directions, the enemy is dropping ammunition, conducting aerial reconnaissance using UAVs, engineering reconnaissance, advance routes... In addition, the enemy is actively trying to hit the previously identified ones in these directions... and scouting out where our fire equipment is located, trying to suppress and destroy them in order to make it easier for them to carry out assault actions,- says the spokesman. On the Vremivsk combined direction, the enemy uses equipment, in particular, armored. The day before yesterday, our fighters destroyed 4 enemy tanks and about a dozen and a half armored combat vehicles. During the past day, the enemy used combat equipment only to transport groups of infantry and, in the event of that, to support their assault actions with fire. -The enemy is trying to break through to the south of the Donetsk region, where the Donetsk and Dnipropetrovsk regions meet; where one of the largest settlements in this area is located — Velyka Novosilka,- concluded Vladyslav Voloshyn. As ArmyInform wrote, last day, according to the General Staff of the Armed Forces, in the Vremiv direction, the enemy carried out 26 assaults on our positions in the areas of Velika Novosilka, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Suhy Yali, Rozdolny, Kostiantynopol and Rivnopil.

Title: Epic battle - our -Vampire- defeated the Russian -Batman-
Description: The video was published on the company's channel. Our pilots on the bomber -Vampire- (the frightened Russians call it -Baboy Yaga-) were patrolling the area when they noticed a strange figure in the dark.
