According to him, there is an opportunity to join their unit both from civilian life and by desire to transfer from other military units. He notes that it is difficult to transfer from other units, but it is possible to negotiate with commanders -on horizontal communications-. -There is a large part of military personnel who, unfortunately, during the 2.5 years of war, lose their health, who receive various psychological injuries, who, for many other reasons, cannot serve directly and perform their duties precisely in the trenches , on the front lines, but they are specialists in various fields who can serve in our regiment,- Charlie emphasized. For example, as he noted, volunteers can serve in them as drivers of various categories and perform tasks related to logistics, or work in BpAK repair shops. -We now have a great need for drivers of various categories, clerks of various services, i.e. people who can work at a computer with various types of programs, do paperwork. And there is a great need for specialists who were in civilian life a master repairer of some electrical appliances, various types of gadgets, etc.,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, currently function44 recruiting centers in the regions and 3 active centers in the vertical of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. ArmyInform also reminds that you can join the army either directly at recruiting centers, and use aggregator of vacancies in the ZSU.

Title: -Together we strengthen the security of the whole of Europe-: Rustem Umierov congratulated Lithuania...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. -It is an honor for me to congratulate our Lithuanian friends on this important day,- the minister said in his address. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that Ukraine highly values ​​Lithuania's support, which is not only the transfer of drones, ammunition and equipment, but also a symbol of friendship, trust and joint struggle for freedom and independence. -Together we continue to strengthen the security not only of our countries, but also of the whole of Europe,- the minister added, expressing confidence in further cooperation between Ukraine and Lithuania. As a reminder, Ukraine and Lithuania discussed priority directions of cooperation for 2025. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania invests 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones.

Title: They are hysterically throwing new reinforcements into battle and driving additional equipment into ...
Description: About it on the air -Society. News- reported the commander of the battalion of attack unmanned aerial vehicles of the -Achilles- complexes of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Ivan Sirko, Yuriy Fedorenko. -As a result, the enemy has turned the personnel into a kamikaze mode: they hysterically throw all new and new reinforcements into battle, look for reserves, send into battle those who should not be fighting, like a stormtrooper, and drive additional equipment into battle. As a result, we have round-the-clock attack and assault actions of the enemy and their losses are colossal,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. During the past day, the enemy was not able to take a single position from the Defense Forces of Ukraine, and at the same time, only the -Achilles- battalion destroyed about 35 invaders (killed and wounded). We will remind, according to Yuriy Fedorenko, in some aspects -nemaye-inshogo-vyboru/->the enemy goes to the front line of a combat engagement up to 12 kilometers, then move in shock-assault operations. -The wounded are not taken away from such a distance. As a result, wounded occupants often commit suicide by shooting themselves in the head. Captives surrender reluctantly because of propaganda. So be it - the more we destroy, the better,- summed up the commander. Earlier, ArmyInform reported how they operate on the battlefield occupiers disguised as pixels.

Title: Ukraine lights memorial candles: the President called to remember the victims of the Holodomor
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky emphasized the importance of remembering these events. -Our duty is to remember, remember and tell the world the truth about the brutal crime, about the genocide that was committed against Ukrainians,- the head of state said. On this day, the memory of the victims is commemorated with a minute of silence, candles are lit and memorial events are held throughout the country. Special attention is paid to spreading the truth about the genocide of the Ukrainian people so that similar crimes never happen again. -Bright memory to all innocent victims, adults and children, who became victims of the Holodomor,- the President summed up. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov addressed Ukrainians on the Holodomor Memorial Day, emphasizing the importance of preserving historical memory and countering Russian aggression.

Title: Ukraine and Lithuania discussed priority areas of cooperation for 2025
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The main topics were the strengthening of Ukraine's defense capabilities, support for the Ukrainian military, and the development of the defense industry. According to Rustem Umyerov, modern challenges require new approaches, and Lithuania remains an important partner in these issues. The minister expressed his gratitude to President Nauseda and the Lithuanian people for their leadership in solving security issues at the European level. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania invests 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones.

Title: 106 creatures and 94 shelters: losses of the occupiers in the Kharkiv direction
Description: Details about the situation in the north of Kharkiv region and the losses of the Russian occupiers were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders three times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. the Russian occupiers launched 1 missile strike, 7 airstrikes using 11 guided aerial bombs and 12 unguided aerial missiles, as well as 36 kamikaze drone strikes. They carried out 346 shelling of the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian invaders. In addition to the loss of manpower in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy also lost destroyed and damaged 46 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: Earlier ArmyInform reported that Kharkiv OTU denied the information about the presence of the North Korean military in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Another day of shelling: 484 residents of Donetsk region were evacuated from dangerous zones
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA, Vadym Filashkin. 4 people were injured in Sontsivka of the Kurakhiv community. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Udachnensk hromada, and one person was injured in Shahivsk hromada, and 2 pieces of equipment were damaged. In Pokrovsk, 5 buildings and a gas pipeline were damaged as a result of shelling. Marinsk and Grodivsk communities remain under fire. One person was injured in the village of Terny of the Lyman community. One person was killed and two others were injured in Krasnotorka of the Kramatorsk hromada. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 4 private houses and 2 non-residential premises were damaged. In Siversk, shelling damaged two two-story buildings. 484 people, including 38 children, were evacuated from the front line during the day. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy dropped ammunition in front of a police car on Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Before the assault - 12 km on foot: why in Kharkiv Oblast the occupiers have no other choice
Description: The commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after Koshovo told about this on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- chieftain of Ivan Sirk, Yury Fedorenko. — In Kupyan region, in some areas, they go to the front line of a combat clash up to 12 km away. -Imagine - 12 km carrying everything, in order to then switch to shock-assault actions,- he said. The officer explained why the Russian military is forced to act in this way. — Why exactly such a shade? Because everything that appears from transport on the battlefield - two-wheeled motorcycles, buggies, lightly armored and armored vehicles - is immediately taken under fire control by our guns, anti-tank weapons and, accordingly, UAVs. As a result, it is being destroyed, the military said. The drone commander reported what percentage of Russian equipment is destroyed on the battlefield. -Statistics say that 90-95% of lightly armored and armored vehicles that end up in the affected area burn up on the battlefield or are seriously damaged,- he said. From the overview, the enemy has no choice but to go to the front on foot. -Accordingly, the enemy has no other choice but to delay on foot,- explained Yury Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported how they act on the battlefield disguised as a pixel occupier.

Title: Machine gun on a drone: the Armed Forces showed an innovative approach to the destruction of the occ...
Description: informs about this by a separate presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi. The enemy column was eliminated by the attack drone units of the Separate Presidential Brigade, including -Chimeras-, -Bulava- and -NOVA-. Thanks to coordinated work, the enemy's equipment was completely destroyed, and a significant number of the occupiers were eliminated. Those who survived the hit on the equipment were finished off with the help of mortars, kamikaze FPV drones and ammunition drops. The innovative approach of the -Bulava- unit, which used a drone equipped with a machine gun, was noted. The successful operation was made possible by the professionalism of the drone operators and competent command. Clear interaction with National Guard soldiers who provided intelligence and fire support was also noted. This operation demonstrates the effectiveness of modern drones in the hands of the Ukrainian military and their important role in modern warfare. As reported by ArmyInform, always one step ahead: -Phoenix- showed the moments of the occupiers's collapse.

Title: Lithuania will invest 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The memorandum between Ukraine and Lithuania, which was signed by the defense ministers of Lithuania and Ukraine, provides for the creation of a mechanism to support the security and defense forces of Ukraine through investments in the Ukrainian defense and industrial complex. Within the framework of the agreement, Lithuania allocated the first tranche in the amount of 10 million euros, which will be directed to the production of long-range weapons, in particular drones of the Paljanitsa project. Currently, the Lithuanian side is completing the bureaucratic procedures, and the funds will be transferred in the near future. Minister Rustem Umyerov expressed his gratitude to Lithuania for its constant support to Ukraine and to Minister Laurinas Kaschyunas personally for his leadership. -This is an agreement that opens up new opportunities for Lithuanian investments in our defense industry and contributes to the expansion of the strategic partnership between our countries,- Umierov noted. In addition to signing the memorandum, the parties discussed key priorities for 2025, including the training and equipping of Ukrainian brigades, provision of ammunition, air defense equipment, and further development of cooperation in the defense industry. Ukraine and Lithuania continue to strengthen their partnership in the defense sphere, demonstrating a joint willingness to work towards victory in the war against Russian aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, the Czech Republic will give Ukraine 500,000 shells by the end of the year.

Title: The guard dog of the occupiers: a traitor in epaulettes who switched to the side of Russia was expos...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, during the capture of the village of Dvorichna by Russian troops, the policeman voluntarily began working for the Russian occupation authorities. Initially, he was engaged in receiving applications and drafting documents in accordance with the legislation of the aggressor state. In the summer of 2022, after confirming his loyalty to the occupiers, the man received the position of -v. at. of the senior investigator of the investigative department- in the so-called -Department of Internal Affairs of the Temporary Civil Administration of the Kharkiv Region-. Later, he was reassigned as the chief of -Police Station No. 1- in Dvorichnaya. In his position, the traitor directed his subordinates, in particular during the protection of public order at propaganda events such as the -First Bell- in local educational institutions. For his activities, he received a monthly salary of 60,000 Russian rubles. After the liberation of Kupyan region, the suspect fled to Russia, where he is hiding from Ukrainian justice. The former policeman was dismissed from the ranks of the National Police of Ukraine, and he is currently wanted. The traitor will be tried in absentia in the Ordzhonikidze District Court of Kharkiv. He faces up to life in prison on all charges. As reported by ArmyInform, sentenced to 10 years of imprisonment 55-year-old resident of Donetsk region for cooperation with Russian special services. The intruder transmitted to the enemy the geolocation of Ukrainian military positions in the Slavyansk direction, targeting Russian missiles at strong points and long-range artillery of the Armed Forces.

Title: Shooting lists and mobile crematoria: Russia planned the genocide of Ukrainians long before the inva...
Description: This was announced the head of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Lieutenant General Kyrylo Budanov, during the forum -Genocidal Practices Russian Federation in Ukraine: from the Holodomor to the Russian-Ukrainian War-, which took place on November 22, 2024. According to Kirill Budanov, the preparation included the creation of firing lists, the deployment of mobile mobile crematoria and the organization of mass burials. Russian propaganda and the state machine called for the destruction of Ukrainians, based on theses voiced in Putin's article published in July 2021. In this article, the Russian dictator denied the right of Ukrainians to exist, which became the ideological basis of future crimes. Kyrylo Budanov noted that total Ukrainophobia has become not only the policy of the Russian authorities, but also a mandatory public conviction. Before the start of the invasion, the occupiers were briefed on the location of mass graves and the compilation of firing lists. They planned to include Ukrainian language and literature teachers, ATO veterans, journalists, priests, public figures and others who supported Ukrainian statehood. The head of the GUR MOU emphasized that the mass crimes of the Russian military in Buch, Borodyanka, Gostomel, Izyum, Mariupol and other cities were not chaotic, but planned and synchronous. These actions were based on the doctrinal provisions of the Russian genocidal policy. The forum, in addition to military experts, was attended by Holodomor researchers, historians, public representatives and foreign guests, who discussed the crimes of the Russian government against the Ukrainian people, which have continued since the Holodomor until today. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov addressed Ukrainians on the Holodomor Memorial Day, emphasizing the importance of preserving historical memory and countering Russian aggression.

Title: An ambulance that will not come: Russia has brought a decline in the medicine of the occupied Luhans...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. In many cities, even before, only one ambulance crew was on duty per shift, as a result of which calls often went unanswered, and patients waited for hours. Tragic cases when people did not wait for a doctor have repeatedly become a reason for criticism. Although the number of special vehicles allegedly increased on paper, the real ambulances provided by Russia disappeared without a trace. Instead, doctors, paramedics and drivers are now being cut. In Starobilsk, air alerts are regularly announced, even when there is no threat in the neighboring areas or in the entire -rear- part of the -LNR-. During such events, propaganda meetings are held in schools, during which children are moved to damp, unfurnished basements, where anti-Ukrainian lectures are organized. In addition, the occupation administration regularly organizes meetings of children with the Russian military, using them to plant propaganda. These actions of the occupiers cause increasing indignation among the population, which is faced with the decline of the medical field and aggressive propaganda in educational institutions. As reported by ArmyInform, in Alchevsk, as well as in other settlements of the temporarily occupied Luhansk region, the situation with the removal of garbage has remained critical for more than ten years. Spontaneous landfills continue to grow, and instead of solving the problem the occupation administration chose the path of repression, installing more than 100 video surveillance cameras to fine citizens for littering.

Title: The Defense Forces told how the occupiers are attacking Chasiv Yar
Description: A representative of the 24th OMBr named . King Danyla Andriy Polukhin. -They started shelling the city with all types of artillery and aviation. They are attacking from barrel artillery, from closed positions with tanks, they are very actively using drones - both skids and kamikaze, as well as anti-aircraft missiles,- said Andriy Polukhin. According to Andrii Polukhin, over the past day, the enemy tried to storm the positions of the Ukrainian military, but was unsuccessful. The enemy is now using the tactics of small groups, trying to penetrate to the rear of the positions to conduct their operational activities there. These groups, although penetrating the rear, remain blocked - unable to bring up ammunition, receive reinforcements or establish supplies. Groups reveal themselves over time and are destroyed. -Against our boys are regular units of the Russian Armed Forces - fighters who are being trained for combat operations in the conditions of urban development and drone warfare. They are well equipped and ready to carry out assaults,- noted the representative of the 24th OMBr. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the occupiers near Chasovoy Yar are blocking themselves. The main task of our units now is the defense and neutralization of enemy groups.

Title: The enemy dropped ammunition in front of a police car in the Kharkiv region
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. Three hits were recorded in the pine forest in the village of Liptsi and the village of Slobozhanske. There are no casualties. Around 6:00 p.m., in the village of Kivsharivka, Kupyan district, the occupiers dropped ammunition in front of an official car of the Main Directorate of the National Police. There were three people in the car. The car was damaged, but no one was injured. In the city of Kupyansk and the village of Doroshivka, the enemy used FPV drones. No casualties were recorded. As part of the increased evacuation measures, 32 people were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, five civilians came under the attack of the occupiers in the Kherson Oblast.

Title: Always one step ahead: -Phoenix- showed the moments of the collapse of the occupiers
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. In particular, since the beginning of November, -Phoenix- has inflicted significant losses on the enemy: destroyed 4 units of enemy armored vehicles, -Hail- and a large number of infantry.

Title: -They are activated to destabilize the situation-: how the occupiers disguised as pixels act
Description: told the commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk Yuriy Fedorenko told about this. -Now they are resorting to a new tactic, namely: dressing up as a Ukrainian pixel, trying to infiltrate through our battle formations into the rear areas,- he said. The officer explained the purpose of the Russian invaders. - They are there in a certain waiting mode, while the strike group is assembled, which begins active operations from the front. And that's when they step up to destabilize the situation, damage our reserves, mortars and other firepower, the military said. However, the Defense Forces are well aware of this insidious enemy tactic and effectively counter it. — Since we are talking about this with you, the Defense Forces are very well aware of such tactics of the enemy, since he has been using them since the beginning of an essentially full-scale war. Only now it is gaining a larger volume, said the commander of the Ukrainian drones. Ukrainian defenders timely detect the occupiers hidden in the pixel and eliminate them or capture them. - The vast majority of these groups are detected by the Defense Forces, eliminated and captured when the opportunity arises. But not all of them surrender, so they are mostly liquidated, said Yuriy Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers dressed in Ukrainian uniforms are effectively detected on the field battle.

Title: Voyage of a new generation: we take a backpack, go to Romania and return to the sound of sirens
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. Two violators were arrested immediately, but the other two tried to escape. They were quickly stopped thanks to the use of a drone that adjusted the actions of the response team. The detainees were men aged 24 to 36, residents of Donetsk, Cherkasy and Dnipropetrovsk regions. Violators are subject to administrative protocols under Articles 185-10 and 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Kupyan adventure in kamikaze mode: the Armed Forces explained how the Russians managed to jump into ...
Description: told the commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk Yuriy Fedorenko told about this. — The situation unfolded as follows: taking advantage of the unfavorable weather conditions - the fog, which was thick enough, the enemy in kamikaze mode used one unit of armored equipment, such as a tank with trawls that removes mine barriers, and two MTLB. These are combat armored vehicles for transporting, in particular, infantry units, he said. For the place of an unexpected attack, the enemy chose an area least suitable for the use of armored vehicles. -At high speed, [the Russians] jumped in at the place that is the least passable for lightly armored and armored vehicles,- explained the soldier. However, as soon as the equipment and manpower of the occupiers were discovered by the fighters of the Defense Forces, the enemy was inflicted with fire damage. The equipment was burned, and the landing party was partly destroyed, partly captured. - As soon as they crossed this line, they were detected by the Defense Forces, after which a fire was inflicted, as a result of which the tank was burned, two MTLBs were burned, and the enemy's assault infantry was eliminated, - Yuriy Fedorenko said. Those of the Russian military who were lucky enough to be captured provided important intelligence. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how in Kharkiv Oblast, a Ukrainian Paladin hit a Russian tank hiding in a garage.

Title: The defense forces hit areas where enemy personnel were concentrated
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit four areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment and three artillery systems of the Russian invaders. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,420 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 20 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 105 operational-tactical UAVs, 73 cars and 3 special equipment units of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 200 enemy assaults on the front: the enemy is concentrating efforts in two directions.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Minister of Defense: Hunger as a weapon is a crime we will not forget
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. -This day reminds us that the enemy is willing to use any means to achieve their goals. Hunger as a weapon is a crime for which millions of Ukrainians paid with their lives. We remember our ancestors and honor their memory,- the minister noted. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that Russia still uses the same methods today: spreading disinformation, denying historical facts and using economic pressure. The Kremlin, as in the past, is trying to manipulate grain, creating a threat of famine not only for Ukraine, but also for the whole world. -In the 21st century, the enemy will not go unpunished. We are destroying the Russian fleet that is blocking the grain corridor, and we are striking bases and warehouses where attacks on our agricultural infrastructure are being planned. Ukraine is already bringing the aggressor to justice,- he emphasized. The minister appealed to his compatriots to honor the memory of the Holodomor victims and to continue the struggle for independence. -We are fighting for a peaceful future of Ukraine and the world. We remember the tragedies of the past and take revenge for our tortured ancestors. Ukraine will win, and Russian evil will be punished,- Rustem Umyerov concluded.

Title: Almost 200 enemy assaults on the front: the enemy concentrates efforts in two directions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, the Ukrainian defenders steadily restrained the onslaught of the occupiers, inflicting significant losses on the enemy. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy launched two missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with the use of two missiles, as well as 67 airstrikes, dropping 97 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out 4,560 attacks, including 123 from multiple rocket launchers, and engaged 1,490 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Liptsi, Ivanivka, Bilogorivka, Zakitne, Siversk, Velyka Novosilka, Novy Komar, Mala Tokmachka, Kozatske. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders three times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, six attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Zeleny Gay, Hlushkivka, and Zagryzovy. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 19 times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Torsky, Grekivka, Terni, Novoehorivka and Makiivka. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked five times in the area of ​​Stupochki and Chasovoy Yar. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched eight attacks in the Toretsk direction. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 44 offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Promen, Lysivka, Sukhoi Yar, Pustinka, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Petrivka, and Pushkini. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 36 Russian attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the Berestki, Sontsivka, Dalny, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, Romanivka, and Antonivka districts. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 30 assaults on our positions in the districts of Trudovoy, Kostyantynopolskyi, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yali and Novodarivka. In the Orikhov direction, the occupying forces once unsuccessfully stormed the positions of the Defense Forces in the Kamiansky area. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our defenders four times. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,420 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 20 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 105 operational-tactical UAVs, 73 cars and 3 special equipment units of the occupiers.

Title: Five civilians were attacked by the occupiers in the Kherson region
Description: reported this by Oleksandr Prokudin, the head of Kherson Regional State Administration. Antonivka, Sadove, Rozlyv, Komyshany, Sofiivka, Stanislav, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Bilozerka, Kizomys, Beryslav, Kachkarivka, Osokorivka, Tyaginka, Odradokamyanka, Kozatske and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. As the head of the OVA noted, the Russian military hit the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular, they damaged 9 private houses. The occupiers also vandalized a warehouse, a garage, a trolleybus and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, numerous shelling covered Zaporizhzhia: there are victims, an injured child.

Title: The enemy keeps 20 ships in the Black Sea: there is a threat of a missile strike
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 2 enemy ships, 1 of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, The government approved the plan implementation of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine, developed by the Ministry of Defense.

Title: Dozens of artillery systems, anti-aircraft missiles and more than 1,400 infantrymen: the General Sta...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 23.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, there were 187 combat engagements on the front: u The General Staff of the Armed Forces named two directions where the enemy is attacking.

Title: Zaporizhzhia was covered by numerous shellings: there are victims, a child was injured
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. As the head of the OVA noted, the Russians struck 2 times in the Zaporizhzhia region. One blow was inflicted on one of the settlements in the region. Mutilated farming. The second blow came to Zaporizhzhia. Partially destroyed warehouses of private enterprises. Nearby houses were damaged by the blast wave and debris. In total, during the day, the occupiers fired 433 times on 16 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. Russian troops carried out 15 airstrikes on Zaporizhzhia, Tavriysk, Stepnohirsk, Lukyanivsk, Malya Tokmachka and Novopavlivka. As Ivan Fedorov noted, 233 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Primorske, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. In addition, 10 rounds of anti-aircraft missiles covered Lobkovo, Orihiv, Shcherbaki, Mala Tokmachka, and Novodarivka. Also, 185 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. 28 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the aggressor attacked Nikopolshchyna 10 times, using kamikaze drones and artillery.

Title: 187 combat engagements at the front: the General Staff of the Armed Forces named two areas where the...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy launched two rockets (two rockets), 52 air strikes (56 anti-aircraft missiles) and 748 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out more than 3,900 attacks on the positions of our troops. In the Kharkiv direction Russian terrorists unsuccessfully stormed the positions of Ukrainian units in the Vovchansk district three times. The enemy hit Liptsi and Okhrimovka with guided aerial bombs. Six times the enemy attacked our fortifications on the Kupyansk direction near Zeleny Gay, Hlushkivka and Zagryzovy. At the moment, two clashes are ongoing. Eighteen enemy attacks have so far been repelled by Ukrainian soldiers near Torskyi, Grekivka, Terniv, Novoyehorivka and Makiivka on the Lymansky direction. One battle is in progress. The enemy launched airstrikes in the Ivanivka, Dronivka, Kryva Luka and Bilogorivka districts. In the Seversk direction the enemy did not carry out offensive actions, however, it carried out airstrikes with guided aerial bombs in the Zakitny and Seversk regions. In the Kramatorsk direction, four attempts by the invaders to advance near Stupochki and in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar ended in failure. Another battle continues. On the Toretsk direction the enemy, supported by aviation, is pressing, trying to advance in the Toretsk area. Seven attacks have already been repulsed by our soldiers, one more is in progress. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders on the Pokrovsky direction. In total, carried out 40 assault and offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in the districts of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Sukhoi Yar, Pustinka, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Petrivka, and Pushkini. Four clashes are still ongoing. Sukha Balka, Valentynivka and Myrnograd were hit by airstrikes. according to estimates, our soldiers eliminated 130 and wounded 160 occupiers in this direction. Two tanks, one BMP, eight vehicles, a mortar, and two buggies were destroyed. Also, four tanks, one mortar and one ATV were damaged. It is also hot in the Kurakhiv direction, at this time of the day there are 35 combat clashes. The terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Berestki, Sontsivka, Dalniy, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, Romanivka, and Antonivka. Thirteen fights are still going on. In the Vremiv region, Ukrainian soldiers repelled 15 attacks by enemy units in the areas of Trudovoy, Kostyantynopolskyi, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yali and Novodarivka settlements. Five clashes are still ongoing. The enemy actively used aviation in the direction. In the Orikhov direction units of our troops repelled one enemy attack in the Kamiansky direction. The enemy carried out an airstrike on Malya Tokmachka. In the Dnieper direction four enemy assaults failed. The enemy was hitting Kozatskyi with NARs. In Kurshchyna Ukrainian fighters hold the defense, repelling eight enemy attacks. In total, the enemy made 28 attempts to attack our units. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. Ukrainian soldiers from the 128th separate mountain-assault Transcarpathian brigade, the 406th separate artillery brigade named after Corporal General Oleksiy Almazov, the 38th separate brigade of marines, the 68th separate hunter brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, the 425th separate assault battalion, which are steadily holding back the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces on the eastern front. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces said how the occupiers block themselves near the Chasovogo Yaru.

Title: Is it possible to freeze the war: the expert told when the new phase of the conflict will begin
Description: -There will be a great truce after all. We will not miss it. Why? In order for it not to exist, the Russian Federation must lose the war. The loss in the war of the Russian Federation, if we go to the borders of 1991, is its disintegration. It is reinforced concrete. But there is no solution to its disintegration. If there is no such solution, then in some part there will be a frozen conflict - exit from the phase of hostilities. As soon as this -freeze- or suspension of hostilities takes place, both we and they will go into military capacity building. It will be so without fail. And if at this moment of the historic truce a decision is not taken on the collapse of the Russian Federation, then the next Russian-Ukrainian war is only a matter of time. It can be in half a year, it can be in a year. I am a fan of the version that is at least five years old. Because they still have to recover. At this moment, the Russian Federation has lost within 50% of its convention potential. With the exception of nuclear. It is still very powerful - the second on the planet Earth. Because this war will only end when they are defeated or get their way. That is, they will join Ukraine to Russia. But, in my opinion, this is already impossible in this historical context. For two simple reasons. First, we are supported by the entire civilized world. And primarily the Anglo-Saxons. This is very fundamental. And the second important point is that we managed to keep the capital. There is even such a historical saying: -who owns Kyiv, owns Ukraine.- They are doomed to defeat. The only question is when this defeat will come. But they cannot refuse us, because it is part of their social ideology. Lenin has a brilliant saying for this case: -losing Ukraine is the same as losing one's head.- State identity is the most powerful feature of any human community. And their state identity sprouts from the concept of our Kyivan Rus. That's how everything will be. I am sure that in the next phase of the war we will achieve a historic victory.

Title: Ready for any mission: a surveillance drone with ultra-fast transformation properties was presented ...
Description: Presenting its aircraft, this firm, headquartered in Arlington, Virginia, on the official portal said's Group 2 eVTOL autonomous drone, the P550, redefines battlefield adaptability, setting a new standard for rapid deployment in any environment, ArmyInform reports. The goal of the new P550 project was to create an unmanned aircraft with high flight and operational characteristics. Representatives of AeroVironment note that there are already UAVs on the market that are equipped with effective reconnaissance and/or weapons, as well as devices capable of flying for several hours. Within the framework of the new project, the company sought to combine all these qualities in one drone. To simplify the design process, the design of the P550 used many ideas and components from existing products. The main sources were drones well-known in the United States military Puma and Raven by AeroVironment. At the same time, it was not possible without the introduction of new solutions and components. As a result, a medium-sized UAV was created, capable of vertical takeoff and landing, as well as a horizontal flight lasting several hours. The P550 may carry reconnaissance equipment, a communications relay, light weapons, or other equipment. Currently, the new UAV is undergoing flight tests, during which it demonstrates its capabilities and confirms the correctness of the applied technical solutions. After the tests are completed, the company will be able to offer this drone to potential customers. For obvious reasons, the main commercial hopes are tied to the Pentagon. The P550 product is an unmanned aircraft with a classic aerodynamic scheme. At the same time, its design has some features due to which additional working and operational capabilities are achieved, as well as important advantages are provided. The P550 UAV has a torpedo-shaped fuselage, complemented by a thin tubular tail beam. A mid-positioned wing with a slight sweep is combined with the fuselage. Near the centerplane on the wing are two compact nacelles of marching engines. At a distance from them, longer gondolas with lifting propeller groups are placed. Tail feathers are traditional, with stabilizer and keel. For transportation, the drone is separated into several units. All of them fit into three containers that can be transported by any vehicle. Pre-launch assembly takes minutes and is done without any tools: it takes less than 10 minutes to prepare for flight after unpacking. The total length of such a drone reaches 2.7 m, the wingspan is 4.25 m. The maximum take-off weight is set at 25 kg and includes a significant payload. For example, a drone can carry up to 7 kilograms of explosives. The AeroVironment company classifies the P550 as the 2nd group of UAVs according to the Pentagon's classification. The drone has six traction electric motors with propellers. Four are placed on wing nacelles and provide vertical take-off, landing and hovering. Two more are on the wing and provide horizontal flight. Engine types and specifications are not disclosed. The flight data of the UAV is also still unknown. It was only reported that the P550 will be able to stay in the air for up to 5 hours. The communication range is 40 km, but can be increased to 60 km. In all configurations and configurations, the drone has an autopilot and a remote control system. They must interact with the operator and carry out his commands, as well as control the payload of all types in solving any assigned tasks. The control panel reportedly has software to automatically process intelligence data. A special program based on artificial intelligence should study the picture from the cameras and look for potential targets to hit on it. Such software should simplify the operator's work and increase the speed of the entire unmanned intelligence system. The issue of installing and replacing the payload is solved in a rather interesting way. A removable part of the fuselage, which includes the nose fairing and part of the bottom, is designated for the placement of various devices. The module with the necessary equipment is attached to the centerplane of the wing, and the UAV receives the necessary functions. All module variants are equipped with optical-electronic systems. -Bullets- of various types carry video cameras, thermal imagers and/or laser rangefinders. It is possible to use other equipment. So, at the AUSA 2024 exhibition, as the Shephard publication informs, showed modules with a radio signal repeater and a weapons carrier module. The combat variant of the P550 carries a swappable module with a pair of pylons on the bottom. At the exhibition UAV on them placed Shryke-type small-scale guided bombs. The principle possibility of using other ammunition is reported. AeroVironment is currently studying such possibilities and plans to expand its range of repellents. The company AeroVironment proposes to use its new P550 UAV in military units at the tactical level. With its help, the army units will be able to effectively solve several basic tasks, and it is expected that the efficiency of such processes will increase. The successful application of the new UAV should be facilitated by its high characteristics as an aerial platform. This drone is easy to operate, able to take off from small areas and stay in the air for several hours. Not all modern drones of this class can boast of such capabilities. Three variants of variable payload modules have already been created for the P550. With their help, the drone can perform various tasks: conduct reconnaissance, target guidance, relay signals or use weapons. The ability to solve various tasks with one UAV as such is a plus. In addition, they have their own capabilities and advantages of various modules, devices and weapons. The automation of intelligence processes is of great interest. It is claimed that the software of the unmanned complex is capable of analyzing images from optical-electronic systems and finding various objects. If this feature is fully implemented, the P550 will become a much more user-friendly reconnaissance tool and give it a significant advantage over the competition. However, the P550 has its drawbacks. Its main problems are common to all such UAVs. First of all, this is the dependence on radio communication and vulnerability for modern air defense. In addition, this project implements several bold ideas that may have some technical risk. Therefore, the AeroVironment company continues to develop existing UAVs and create new models based on them. During these processes, innovative solutions and technologies are developed and implemented, aimed at improving the main characteristics and expanding working capabilities. Another result of such activity was shown in October at the exhibition AUSA 2024 . Now the new UAV P550 must go through all the necessary tests and confirm the declared potential. And even after that, future customers have to decide whether they need such a smart and versatile new drone. Reconnaissance and strike unmanned aerial vehicle P550. Video: AeroVironment

Title: - Adrenaline is going through the roof. Class!-: paintball training was included in the combat train...
Description: According to the plan of the institute's management, the training was supposed to stimulate team actions of cadets in combat groups during search and sweep in an urbanized area. Practical training is based on the scenarios of real combat experience of teachers. Reconciliation, cohesion, mutual support and mutual assistance are the main priorities in the training of future officers. -Alone in the field is not a warrior! Only the team wins. This should be the philosophy of the signalman's victory,- says the deputy head of the institute for psychological support of personnel, Colonel Oleg Petrovskyi. He is convinced that only practical work on training grounds can form a new quality of servicemen, give them the necessary skills to handle weapons in extreme combat conditions. Almost an hour of grueling confrontation between yellow and blue: conventional opponents, but with real physical and psycho-emotional stress. In addition to the tasks of destroying a hypothetical enemy, the cadets practiced the basics of first aid in the area under fire in the scope of self and mutual aid. -For the first few minutes, I couldn't calm myself down, then I was panting, I remembered what was taught at the institute during combat and psychological training, and - I rushed! - says one of the cadets. The guys willingly share their thoughts: -And even though you understand the conventionality of the fight, the adrenaline still goes through the roof. Class!- Military psychologists call this method operational stress sensitization. It is the best practical method of entering the military profession and forming combat readiness. Practicing tactical actions by cadets in the conditions of intense training combat also ensures the development of critically needed marksmanship skills. Paintball training has already been included in the combat training program of the institute and consistently arouses great interest among cadets. Vladislav Siniagovskyi for ArmiyaInform

Title: Rams interfere the most in combat shootings: about the features of BZVP at Interflex in Britain
Description: ArmyInform correspondent tells about the firing of live cartridges during the BZVP within the framework of the Interflex multinational training mission in Great Britain. Firing live rounds is the final element of the entire training course of basic general military training. By this time, the soldiers have been regularly dealing with weapons for several weeks and have fired at least 700−800, and some even 1000−1200 blank cartridges during training exercises. While we fire blanks during tactical exercises, practice changing magazines, and cleaning our assault rifles, the instructors keep a close eye on how we treat weapons and follow safety rules. Even though the grades are not reported to us, it is clear from the comments themselves that the instructors grade us quite meticulously. It is noticeable that they observe and record all our actions, discuss us among themselves and inform each other about the positive features and problematic points in the training of each cadet. So when it comes to combat shooting, no one causes I am surprised that one soldier from the platoon is not allowed to join them. Systematic indiscipline and inattention to weapons take their toll - he does not go to the range on any of the following days, during which there is intense firing with live ammunition. of us For some, they also related to the handling of weapons, but everyone tried to correct mistakes and eliminate shortcomings. It seems that he is the only one not only for the entire first platoon, but also for the entire company, because everyone else has well learned the basic rules of behavior with weapons. Some may be less skilled or accurate than others, but they certainly won't pose a danger through carelessness or sloppiness. Safety rules at British shooting ranges are quite strict and foreign instructors strictly enforce them. At the same time, the control is triple. We are watched by the British, as representatives of the host country, the instructors of the country that conduct the training, as well as the Ukrainian instructors and the platoon leader. Every time we receive a full briefing from the responsible instructor, we are in the waiting area in full protective equipment , and stores equipped with cartridges are obtained only when entering the firing line. We set up a store, load and open fire only under individual commands of instructors. Extreme responsibility and vigilance will eventually give the desired result - during the entire time of combat firing, not a single problematic, but even unfortunate incident will happen. And this is despite the fact that we shoot a lot, especially when we move from -stationary- shooting to simulated combat. During the entire time of firing live cartridges, each of us shoots at least 500−600 bullets. Those who showed increased activity easily increase this indicator to 750−800 cartridges or even double to 1000. Starting to count shots from the first day, I am already losing count on the second day. And in the last three training days, I generally shoot more than 200, 250, and 300 rounds during exercises, respectively. I will not be surprised if some of the cadets have even higher scores. — asks the instructor in the evening of the penultimate day. -Can you still shoot? Then shoot,- I answer. -Great, but this is already the last store, it has 20 cartridges,- he says and hands me the rest of today's ammunition. In 15 minutes I will regret my decision, because I will be forced to catch up with my brothers, who have already started disassembling and cleaning weapons But not now - another rehearsal of fire contact with a hypothetical enemy is ahead while patrolling the territory. Despite the fact that by the end of the evening I had already managed to get exhausted, this time everything works out as best as possible - it is difficult to do something for the tenth time and not correct the mistakes made during the first few attempts. This is one of the exercises during the execution which we shoot or the most bullets, moving between trees and changing position. More interesting and more difficult than it is only work in pairs or fours, when we alternately cover each other, firing at a hypothetical enemy at the time when the partner changes position. It is easier to practice this exercise on the training ground, however, after all, we are given the same task in the forest, where it is impossible to move in a straight line and maintain eye contact between all fighters. Forced to run between trees, we inevitably break the interval and straight line set from the beginning, and also lose sight of the other members of the group. It remains to be guided by voice commands. -Hide, hide!- — I hear from somewhere to the left. -I'm running!- - I shout back with all my might and make a dash for 20 meters forward to a rhizome that is convenient as a cover. Shots are heard on the left, but in a few seconds I, having fallen under a tree trunk, shoot and shout: -Hide, hide!- Constantly maintaining communication between fighters and duplicating commands is one of the most important requirements of instructors, and completion of training in our -small infantry groups-, we already do it without thinking. -Drone!-, -arta!-, -grenade!- - the one who first reacted to the danger shouts the loudest. Others pick up and repeat the shout, confirming that they have heard and understood the warning and passing it on. This skill will be most needed on the last day of training, when we simulate a defensive battle and must maintain contact with our nearest neighbors in the chances and between two adjacent chances. Then you have to shout very loudly, especially to the commanders of the units who have to coordinate the actions of the fighters. The simulation of mortar -arrivals-, especially when the charges explode very close, is quite convincing, and the crackle of live rounds is as loud as in real combat. It is difficult to shout over the roar of explosions and the numerous sounds of gunfire, but it is necessary , because the completion of the task and the survival of the unit depend on it. We give our all, and we do it also because we know that today is the final day of training. It was on that day that each of us managed to shoot the most rounds in one training day - sometimes by chance and along with with them, the casings lay in several layers and crunched under the berets. The number of rounds fired is the best evidence that training firings are combat rounds during BZVP at Interflex in Great Britain are extremely tense and intense. Only two circumstances can stop them. The first is a problem with one of the fighters or his weapon. Then, loudly repeated three times by the instructor or any of the participants, the command -Stop, stop, stop!- must immediately stop the shooting. This never happened during the training of our platoon. On the other hand, the second circumstance occurred several times and made us wait for several tens of minutes until the problem was solved. It concerned local residents — sheep and rams, whose herds grazed near the shooting site and occasionally wandered into the zone of possible damage. As soon as the observers noticed that the rams again approached the dangerous zone for them, the command was immediately sounded. stop shooting Soon, a specially trained dog was brought on a pickup truck, which flew out of the car window in a flash and rushed towards the violators, driving them to a safe place. From several minutes to half an hour passed, and the four-legged commander of the rams returned, jumped into the pickup truck and with the look of a winner left to return in the event of the next security breach. We, having received an unexpected break thanks to the rams, resumed shooting.

Title: Today, Ukraine commemorates the victims of the Holodomor
Description: In 1932–1933, the communist totalitarian regime committed the crime of genocide against the Ukrainian people. Today, the Rashists, as the heirs of that regime, are once again committing crimes against humanity and genocidal acts on Ukrainian soil. This year, for the third time, we honor the victims of the communist genocide in the context of the large-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine. The tragic events that we are going through testify that living memory is extremely important. Those who commit crimes against humanity must be condemned by the world community and the victims must be honored. Then, as now, the enemy's goal was to destroy the Ukrainian people as a national group. The communist totalitarian regime, due to the forcible withdrawal of food, the blockade of villages and entire districts, the ban on travel outside the borders of famine-stricken Ukraine, the curtailment of rural trade, and repression against dissenters created conditions for Ukrainians incompatible with life. The Holodomor became possible because, during the Liberation Struggle, Ukrainians could not withstand the large-scale invasion of Russian troops and establish the democratic Ukrainian People's Republic, proclaimed in 1917 in Kyiv. the Russian Bolsheviks seized the territory of the Ukrainian People's Republic by direct occupation and proclaimed the creation of their own quasi-state of the USSR with the center in Kharkiv. In the USSR, which included the territory of the Ukrainian state captured by the Bolsheviks, a totalitarian communist regime with a strict social hierarchy was established. Any expression of dissent was immediately brutally punished and suppressed. Because of this, almost the entire Ukrainian nation, which had a huge cultural and historical heritage, its own glorious traditions of state-building, and the experience of the national liberation struggle, immediately found itself -outlawed.- The occupation of Ukraine led to numerous crimes, mass repressions, terror, deportations. But the primary goal was the destruction of Ukrainians as a political nation that could raise the question of creating an independent state. To achieve this goal, the horrible tool chosen was starvation. The mechanism of forcible procurement of bread, which led to the Holodomor, was set in motion from Moscow. In less than a calendar year (1932–1933), millions of people died in Ukraine. Mortality exceeded the average level by 8-9 or more times, especially many children died. To this day, the terrible circumstances of the crime and the deliberate ban on keeping death statistics make it impossible to establish the exact number of dead. The Holodomor led to moral and psychological changes in the nation's consciousness. The consequence of the crime of genocide was the destruction of the traditional Ukrainian way of life. The year 1933 was a time of national catastrophe for Ukraine, the consequences of which are felt to this day. Today, the Russians are once again using genocidal methods against Ukrainians to destroy our identity, culture, and language. Therefore, the modern Russian-Ukrainian war is aimed not only at destroying the independence of the Ukrainian state, but also at destroying Ukrainians as an independent people, as a nation. Putin in the 21st century, like Stalin in the 20th, resorted to genocide because other methods of subjugating the Ukrainian people did not work. Stalin organized a total confiscation of food, a blockade, mass terror. Putin used a full-scale military invasion with atrocities, violations of international laws and customs of war. Terror, mass murders, deliberate attacks on shelters, evacuation routes and humanitarian corridors, bombing of residential areas, sexual violence, military sieges, deportations (forcible displacement of Ukrainians, in particular children) became the components of the genocidal policy of the Russian Federation against Ukraine. During the Holodomor, the leadership of the USSR deliberately disoriented the world public, made special statements about the absence of hunger in the country. The regime refused foreign aid, and the totalitarian Moscow government sold seized bread to other countries for foreign currency, which was used to purchase machine tools and other equipment for industrial enterprises. Today, the democratic world is well aware of what is happening in Ukraine and supports us. The security and defense forces of Ukraine are heroically resisting the enemy. And each of us, remembering the crimes of the Moscow totalitarian regime in the 20th century, directs all our efforts to support our defenders. In the conditions of ongoing Russian aggression, our memory of the Holodomor of 1932-1933 is a factor in the social mobilization of Ukrainians and the world community to oppose the aggressor. So let's remember in the National Minute of Silence on November 23 at 4:00 p.m. the millions of human lives that Ukraine lost due to the Holodomor and massive artificial famines organized on orders from Moscow. Let's visit the places of memory of the Holodomor victims in our locality, and with the onset of darkness, let's light candles of memory wherever we are. After all, every light is a manifestation of our sorrow, memory and faith in the future inevitable Victory over the aggressor. Based on the materials of the Ukrainian Institute of National Memory

Title: Rospropaganda spreads a false video: a photo helped to expose the fake
Description: As -evidence-, a video is shown where a woman, presenting herself as the wife of the deceased, claims that her husband is not on the lists of military personnel. For specialists StopFake was able to identify the person in the photo and find out the circumstances that contradict the information provided in the video. In the fake video, which is a hostile production, the woman says that she cannot receive the benefits promised by the state. According to her, she allegedly -called the headquarters-, where she was told that the man -is not on the lists-. At the same time, she does not mention her name, her husband's name, or the headquarters to which she addressed. The photograph that the woman in the video was holding helped to expose this fake. It depicts the defender of Azovstal Andriy Kainara, who was captured by the Russians in Mariupol. After a year and a half in captivity, Kainar was exchanged and he returned to serve in the 56th brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the website of the non-governmental organization Polygon 56 Berdyansk, which takes care of the families of missing prisoners and fallen soldiers, a photo of Andrii Kainara, taken on the occasion of his return from captivity, was found. On it, he is depicted with Olena Dobycha, the head of this organization. On September 18, 2024, she announced his death on her personal Facebook page. The photo featured in the fake video was published by the Ukrainian mass media in a report on the death of Andrii Kainara near Bakhmut in September 2024. StopFake contacted Olena Dobycha to view the video being circulated and to comment on the -delisting- situation. According to her, this video is an -absolute fake-, primarily because Kainara did not have a wife, but only a sister. The obvious goal of this and similar fakes is to undermine the trust of Ukrainian citizens in state institutions, in particular in the Armed Forces and authorities. Propaganda seeks to create the impression that the state allegedly does not fulfill its obligations to the families of fallen soldiers, which can sow despair and demoralization among the population.

Title: OTU -Kharkiv- denied the information about the presence of the North Korean military in the Kharkiv ...
Description: This is stated in the statement of Kharkiv OTU. -The person who is the primary source of this information is not the official speaker of Kharkiv OTU and commented on the operational situation outside of his competence,- the statement reads. The -Kharkiv- OTU called on representatives of the mass media and the public to operate with messages published on the official communication channels of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The operational situation in the Kharkiv direction has not undergone significant changes, the Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to hold back the onslaught of the Russian occupation forces,- the statement reads. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi said that the troops of North Korea boyah-na-kurshhyni/-> have already suffered losses in battles with the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation. So far, the North Korean military has been seen only on the territory of the aggressor state.

Title: The occupiers shelled Nikopolshchyna 10 times, there is destruction
Description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. Nikopol, Marganetska, Mirivska and Pokrovska communities were under attack today. Four private and nine country houses, a non-residential building, two cars and power lines were damaged by shelling. There are no dead or injured. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian strikes led to the death of the civilian population Kherson region. In addition, the Russians today hit the suburbs of Kramatorsk.

Title: The Defense Forces told how the occupiers are blocking themselves near Chasovoy Yar
Description: A serviceman of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after the King told about this on air Army TV Danyla Andrii Polukhin. -The enemy is trying to take the city of Chasiv Yar, shelling from all types of weapons has increased over the past week, and shelling from aviation has also increased. On some days, according to reports, most of the strikes were on the city of Chasiv Yar and its surroundings,- he said. At the moment, the enemy is not advancing, he is using small infantry groups, trying to get behind the position of the Defense Forces. -In this way, the enemy blocks themselves, they have no chance to turn back, as our drones work on them very quickly,- Andriy Polukhin noted. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of the day on November 22 in the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders /->repelled the attack of the occupiers in the Stupochky area.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy continues the tactics of -meat-attacks
Description: Olena, the spokeswoman of the 38th separate brigade of the marines, told about this on Army TV Salt beef. -The situation remains difficult. The enemy moves, tries to land his infantry, storm. There are up to 10 assault attempts per day. Usually the infantry are brought in by buggies or motorcycles, we try to destroy them,- said Olena Solonina. According to her, marine soldiers destroy up to 30 occupiers per day, and the occupying army loses about as many wounded. -They storm at different times of the day, the tactics of -meat- assaults are preserved. Four motorized rifle brigades, in particular the 74th brigade from the Kemerovo region, always stand against us,- the spokeswoman said. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of the day on November 22 in the Pokrovsky direction -atakuyut-na-troh-napryamkah/-> 29 times clashes of varying intensity started. Currently, five clashes are ongoing in Myrolyubivka, Sukhoi Yar, Petrivka and Pustinka districts.

Title: The Czech Republic will hand over 500,000 shells to Ukraine by the end of the year
Description: This was stated by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic Jan Lipavsky at a briefing in Kyiv. -As you know, my country has launched a munitions initiative. By the end of the year, 500,000 large-caliber projectiles will be delivered. We will not stop there. We will continue to provide support to the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- said Yan Lipavskyi. The minister also emphasized that the Czech Republic will continue to support Ukraine on its way to NATO and the European Union. The head of the Czech Foreign Ministry said that today he visited the -Okhmatdit- hospital, which was shelled by the Russians in July. -We have to stop this barbaric behavior,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, Germany handed Ukraine new package of military aid, which, in particular, included four self-propelled guns Panzerhaubitze 2000 and 41 thousand 155 mm artillery ammunition. In addition, the United States announced a new package military aid to Ukraine in the amount of $275 million.

Title: They were going to Belarus: details of the detention of risky tourists
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. Two suspects, aged 32 and 34, offered -clients- an illegal transfer to Belarus outside the official checkpoints. The cost of the service was $3,000 each. The perpetrators met the men on the outskirts of one of the farms in the Ratnivskyi district, instructed them and tried to lead them through the -greenery- to the demarcation line. They were detained while trying to cross. The fact of receiving the entire amount from one client is documented. The other two undertook to hand over the money upon arrival in Belarus. Administrative protocols have been drawn up for three potential evaders. The suspect was placed under house arrest. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Rustem Umyerov is already working with partners to obtain new air defense systems — the President
Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said this in his evening address. -I am grateful to all partners who have already reacted to this next bout of Russian madness. But, in addition to words, you need to act. And, in particular, on my assignment, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine is already holding meetings with our partners regarding new air defense systems — precisely those systems that are capable of protecting lives from new risks,- he said. The president announced that more details have been established regarding the new missile with which Russia hit the Dnieper. -And we will give all the details to journalists - international media. The world must know the truth and realize that the only one who does not want peace is Russia. That is why Russia needs escalation,- the head of state emphasized. On November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile, probably from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: The government approved the implementation plan of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine develop...
Description: About this notified the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov on his page in Facebook. -This is an important step for strengthening the maritime security of our country. The purpose of the document is to ensure the fulfillment of the tasks and goals defined by the Strategy, which was approved by the NSDC and put into effect by the Presidential Decree,- said Rustem Umyerov. The main tasks of the plan: The Minister of Defense thanked everyone who contributed to the development of this important document. -Together we are approaching the moment when the Black and Azov Seas will be completely free and safe for Ukraine again!- he emphasized.

Title: Near Vugledar, the occupiers shot five captured soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: This is stated in the message of the Prosecutor General's Office. According to operational data, on October 2, 2024, servicemen of the Soviet Union stormed the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near the city of Coal worker During the offensive, the occupiers captured 5 unarmed Ukrainian defenders. They killed one of them in a forest lane, and four were taken out on the road under the sights of automatic weapons, where they were also shot. The killing of prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a grave international crime. Under the procedural leadership of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings for the commission of a war crime that caused the death of people (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Urgent investigative and investigative actions aimed at establishing all the circumstances of the event are being conducted. Pretrial investigation — State Security Service of Ukraine in Donetsk and Luhansk regions. As reported by ArmyInform, in October-November of this year, 13 criminal cases were registered proceedings on the facts of the shooting of 54 Ukrainian prisoners of war. This is a third of all proceedings initiated in 2024 based on such facts.

Title: Rustem Umyerov met with the Prime Minister of Sweden and representatives of Swedish defense companie...
Description: This is stated in a message on the minister's page on Facebook. The meeting discussed the implementation of new projects in the spheres of production of military equipment, artillery, optics, guidance and communication systems, as well as air defense equipment. Particular attention was paid to the localization of production in Ukraine, the creation of joint ventures, the increase in the volume of supplies and the purchase of new types of weapons and advanced technologies. -I am sincerely grateful to the Swedish defense industry for its constant assistance to Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression, as well as to the Swedish government for its support,- said Rustem Umyerov. The Minister of Defense also met in Stockholm with Prime Minister of Sweden Ulf Kristersson, a true friend of Ukraine. -I thanked him and the Swedish people for their constant support of Ukraine and willingness to deepen our cooperation. For us, this is not only a matter of partnership, but also of common security,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, Sweden will finance production Ukrainian long-range drones according to the -Danish model-.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi discussed military cooperation with the Chief of Defense Staff of Great Britain
Description: This is stated in a message in the telegram channel of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. During the event, a wide range of issues to strengthen Ukraine's defense capabilities were discussed. In particular, the commanders of the Air and Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were present at the meeting. Oleksandr Syrskyi informed his British colleague about the progress of repelling Russian aggression against Ukraine and the general situation on the front line. The interlocutors also discussed the development of military cooperation, in particular, in the direction of training personnel of the Defense Forces of Ukraine on the part of Great Britain, and outlined the critical needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in weapons, military equipment and means of destruction. -I took the opportunity to thank our British partners for the provision of weapons and military equipment, for the assistance already provided and the leading role of the British side in the consolidation of international support for Ukraine,- – noted Oleksandr Syrskyi. Tony Radakin confirmed the intentions of Great Britain to continue providing material and technical assistance and train the personnel of the Defense Forces of Ukraine as part of training missions. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with the delegation of the Great Britain, which arrived in Ukraine on a visit, led by the Chief of the Defense Staff, Admiral Sir Anthony Radakin.

Title: The commission checks the documents of candidates for the new composition of the Public Anti-corrupt...
Description: About this notified in the MOU. The main purpose of the regular meeting is to check the documents submitted by the candidates for compliance with the requirements and their admission to the competition. 42 applications from representatives of public associations, whose activities are aimed at preventing and combating corruption, were submitted for consideration. An independent commission, which includes representatives of civil society institutions, carefully processes the submitted materials. The Commission is planning to consider the applications until the end of next week. Based on the results of the Commission's work, a list of candidates will be formed who will go to the next stage - voting. Identification for voting will take place through the Diya portal, and all citizens of Ukraine will be able to take part in it. 15 people who receive the most votes will be elected to the Public Anti-Corruption Council. The election results will be published on the official website of the Ministry of Defense. Anticorrada is created to strengthen public control over the activities of the Ministry of Defense and assess corruption risks. Its members, who are not employees of the department or military personnel, will have the opportunity to raise important issues and promote transparency in the work of the department. The term of office of the new board will be 2 years.

Title: Sytenky is also in prison: another gunner received a term for transferring geolocations to the enemy
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. The informant came to the attention of the Russian special services through pro-Kremlin posts on the banned Odnoklassniki social network. To transmit data, he used an anonymous chat in the messenger, regularly deleting correspondence for the conspiracy. The perpetrator was detained by SBU officers in November 2022 during counter-subversion measures in Slovyansk. During the search, a laptop and mobile phones, which were used to communicate with Russian curators, were seized from him. The court found him guilty of h. 3 Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (dissemination of information about the movement or location of the Armed Forces) and imposed a real term of imprisonment. Given his cooperation with the investigation, the sentence was 10 years. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office from /->aochno informed a 79-year-old resident of the region about the suspicion of aiding the aggressor state.

Title: The Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported the number of downed attack UAVs today
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In total, the radio engineering troops of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine identified and escorted 114 enemy air targets. As of 5:30 p.m., anti-aircraft defense shot down 64 enemy drones, mainly in the center of the country and in the northeastern regions. 41 drones — lost in location, presumably due to active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces, two more Russian UAVs left the airspace of Ukraine in the direction of Russia and Belarus. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. -Combat work continues - four enemy UAVs are still in the airspace of Ukraine! Do not ignore the alarm!-, - stressed the PS of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. We will remind you that on the night of November 22, as a result of an attack by UAVs in Sumy ->two people died, another 12 were injured of varying degrees of severity. The occupiers for the first time applied around the city of -Shahedy- with shrapnel.

Title: That Ukraine is given strikes on the territory of the enemy: the Armed Forces spoke about the effect...
Description: A source in the leadership of the Armed Forces informed the correspondent of ArmiyaInform about this. The so-called Deep strike is used, including on weapons storage bases.
