Previously ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces destroyed a tank, 2 MTLB and an enemy landing party that was flying under the cover of fog to gain a foothold on the outskirts of Kupyansk.

Title: The President honored the memory of Ukrainians who died during the Revolution of Dignity
Description: About this reported the Office of the President. The head of state installed a lamp next to the cross on the Alley of Heroes of the Heavenly Hundred in Kyiv. -Today is the Day of Dignity and Freedom. We remember the real price of freedom for Ukraine. And we don't forget all our people of different times who fought for Ukraine and became a model of dignity for the world,- says the President's message on the Telegram channel. On the eleventh anniversary of the Revolution of Dignity, eleven bells were rung in memory of the fallen. -Thanks to the people, thanks to the desire of our people to preserve freedom and independence for Ukraine, our state will always be on the political map of the world. Always free and sovereign,- the President emphasized.

Title: Air Force: the Russians launched an intercontinental ballistic missile over Ukraine
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In particular, an intercontinental ballistic missile was launched from the Astrakhan region of the Russian Federation, an Kh-47M2 -Kinzhal- aeroballistic missile from a MiG-31K fighter jet was launched from the Tambov region, and seven Kh-101 cruise missiles from Tu-95MS strategic bombers (launch area - Volgograd Region) . As a result of anti-aircraft combat, six Kh-101 missiles were destroyed by units of anti-aircraft missile forces of the Air Force. On other missiles, without significant consequences. Information about victims and victims has not yet been received. -Once again, we ask citizens not to be delayed by air warning signals! And we call on all media people and bloggers to responsibly spread this or that information about the combat work of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and any threats to the Ukrainian state,- the agency emphasized.

Title: Morning shelling of the Dnipro: the enemy used intercontinental missiles
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In particular, an intercontinental ballistic missile was launched from the Astrakhan region of the Russian Federation, an Kh-47M2 -Kinzhal- aeroballistic missile from a MiG-31K fighter jet was launched from the Tambov region, and seven Kh-101 cruise missiles from Tu-95MS strategic bombers (launch area - Volgograd Region) . As a result of anti-aircraft combat, six Kh-101 missiles were destroyed by units of anti-aircraft missile forces of the Air Force. On other missiles, without significant consequences. Information about victims and victims has not yet been received. -Once again, we ask citizens not to be delayed by air warning signals! And we call on all media people and bloggers to responsibly spread this or that information about the combat work of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and any threats to the Ukrainian state,- the agency emphasized.

Title: ATACMS, the Kursk bridgehead and the US permit: an expert on whether there will be a turning point o...
Description: For example, the media cites the position of Polish President Andrzej Duda, who says that this could be a turning point on the front. But military expert Petro Chernyk has a different position. He explained to the correspondent of ArmiyaInform why the possible US permission for Ukraine will not be a turning point. -Permission for ATACMS strikes deep into Russian territory cannot and will not be a turning point in the war. With one single exception, if these missiles are given several thousand, and this is a fantasy. There will be no fiction,- says the military expert. And he adds that our country was given somewhere in the range of a couple of hundred of these missiles: -We used a certain amount, if they give a couple of hundred more, it will be very good. ATACMS will help to really hold the Kursk bridgehead. Because it is they who are called to destroy warehouses with ammunition, warehouses with fuel and lubricants: this is if we are talking about the cassette part. And the high-explosive part is the control points and communication nodes. Chernyk emphasizes that if everything goes like this, then everything will be complicated for the enemy in terms of knocking us out of Kurshchyna. -And this is already a big geopolitics. Our task is to hold out until next year's dry weather cycle,- the expert noted.

Title: The occupiers dropped an aerial bomb on the Kostyantynivka residential quarter, wounding 6 people
Description: This was reported by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. Previously, the enemy dropped two FAB-250 aerial bombs with a UMPK module on the settlement. One of the means of destruction was aimed at a residential area. As a result of the attack, 5 women aged 18 to 75 and a 56-year-old man were injured. They were in their homes at the time of the attack. The victims were diagnosed with mine-explosive injuries, shrapnel wounds, contusions and concussions. They were provided with qualified medical assistance. 10 facades of apartment buildings, a shop, a garage and a car were damaged. Under the procedural leadership of the Kostyantyniv District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings on the fact of a war crime (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, November 20 the Russian army struck, probably with the Tornado-S anti-aircraft missile system, on the village Pershomaryivka, Kramatorsk district. Cluster munitions hit a residential building, where an 11-year-old boy died in the yard of one of the houses.

Title: Kharkiv Region: the enemy attacked residential buildings, an administrative building, and civilians
Description: This was informed by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. A private house was damaged in the Lipetsk community as a result of shelling. In addition, an administrative building in the Vysochan community came under fire. A 64-year-old woman was injured. In the city of Kupyansk, shelling injured two men aged 42 and 64. They are provided with the necessary medical care. In the village of Senkove, a private house was damaged as a result of enemy shelling. Also, near the village of Kalinove, wreckage of the -Shakhed- drone was found in a field. There are no casualties. Over the last day, 139 residents were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day Russian troops struck Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovsk region, using artillery and kamikaze drones

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Crocodile tears of prisoners near Kupyansk: what the captured occupiers are crying about
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. One of them said that on the Russian side, mostly Zeks are fighting in this direction. He clearly saw through it and began to complain about the leadership of the Russian Federation. -Nobody here understands why we are fighting against the Ukrainians, it's just that Uncle Vovochka wanted to grab more land,- said the occupier and added that it is time to end this war. -I hope that what was taken from Ukraine will be returned to Ukraine,- said the Russian, but he could not clearly answer the elementary question: -Whose Crimea?- The Russian also complained about the conditions of his stay in the occupation army. -You sit in dugouts, and we sit in damp, cold pits that look like latrines,- the invader wailed. Another prisoner turned out to be a native of the Samara region. He was sent to the assault even without identification marks. -They don't give us anything, they spit on us like they threw meat, I don't even know how to shoot,- cried the Russian invader to the Ukrainian border guards. He says that he did not serve in the army, and before being sent to attack, he was not even shown how to use a machine gun. The occupier admitted that he was going to the positions under duress, because there were blocking units behind him. The State Border Service of Ukraine is an integral part of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, which adheres to international humanitarian law and guarantees the preservation of life, the provision of medical assistance and the provision of other rights to representatives of the Russian armed forces who choose the right decision - to surrender. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st company of the 2nd battalion of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard captured by the enemy positions and prisoners in the Toretsk direction.

Title: The occupiers fired at a bread distribution point in the Kherson region, there are wounded
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day Prydniprovske, Komysany, Antonivka, Sadove, Novodmytrivka, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Beryslav, Virivka, Novovorontsovka, Burgunka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. It is noted that the Russian military hit the bread delivery point and the gas station. They also hit the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular, damaged 5 high-rise buildings and 8 private houses. In addition, the occupiers vandalized the garage and private cars. It also became known about the death of a resident of Dar'ivka due to Russian shelling the day before yesterday. A 62-year-old woman was at home at the time of the enemy attack. Unfortunately, she received non-life-threatening injuries. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian shelling in Kherson Oblast is not abating: terrible consequences of attacks.

Title: Historic day of war at sea: Navy commander spoke about the first use of naval drones
Description: This was told by the commander of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine vice admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa in a video dedicated to the 1000 days of the large-scale invasion of Russia. During this, it was possible to hit several enemy ships, in particular the flagship of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation -Admiral Makarov-. Oleksiy Neizhpapa noted that subsequent operations were also successful. Among them is joint work with the SBU on the Crimean bridge and damage to other enemy ships. -Combined with strikes by coastal missile forces and aviation, we managed to liberate the northwestern part of the Black Sea and force the enemy to leave Sevastopol,- the vice admiral explained. He also informed that by the decision of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, a special unit of unmanned maritime systems was created within the Navy, which is currently developing rapidly. As reported by ArmyInform, today in the Black Sea there are 24 enemy ships, of which 5 are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 28 missiles.

Title: At the front, there were 153 combat clashes per day, the enemy is actively storming the Vremivsk dir...
Description: This is stated in operational information General Staff of the Armed Forces as of 08:00 on November 21. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out unsuccessful assaults in the Vovchansk and Staritsa districts four times. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyansk direction reached seven. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in the areas of Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Zeleny Gayu. On the Lyman direction our troops stopped ten enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the districts of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Hryhorivka, Serebryanka, and Terni. In the Siversk and Kramatorsk directions, the enemy did not carry out assault and offensive actions, however, it carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Siversk, Chasiv Yar and Lypivka. Actively using bomber aircraft, the enemy tried to advance seven times in the area of ​​Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. 34 attacks, this number for the past day, were repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Pustinka, Promin, Krutyy Yar, Krasny Yar, Lyskivka, Yuryivka, Zhovte, Petrivka, Dachenske, Novooleksiivka, Hryhorivka, and Pushkine. Defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. Occupants tried 29 times to break through the Ukrainian defense lines in the areas of Berestka, Zorya, Sontsivka, Maksimilyanivka, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka and Antonivka settlements. The same number of enemy attacks were stopped by our defenders in the area of ​​Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, and Novodarivka as in the Vremivsk direction. On the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions the enemy did not conduct active operations last day. In the Dnieper direction our soldiers six times repelled the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army. The operational situation on the Volyn and Polissky directions has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, conducts reconnaissance and artillery fire. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction, where the enemy carried out 25 airstrikes over the past day, using 39 guided air bombs. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1510 people. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed eight tanks, 24 armored combat vehicles, 50 artillery systems, one anti-aircraft missile system, two anti-aircraft vehicles, 57 UAVs of the operational-tactical level and 97 vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: Almost 300 strikes per day: Zaporozhye suffers from Russian shelling
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 airstrikes on Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghiry and Novodarivka. In addition, 135 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Olgivske and Novodarivka. Also, 10 shelling from the anti-aircraft missile system covered Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka, Novopavlivka, and Mala Tokmachka. It is noted that 139 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Olhivskyi and Novodarivka. -We received 19 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, a child died as a result of a Russian strike with cluster munitions on a residential building in Donetsk region.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi: In the battles for the independence of Ukraine, the soldiers of the Armed Forces ...
Description: This is stated in his message on the page on Facebook. -Today, we honor the knights of Archstrategist Mykhailo - tenacious and brave soldiers of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Ukrainian paratroopers in the battles for the independence of Ukraine and the freedom of our people worthily confirm their slogan - -Always the first-, - says the greeting. Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized that already 10 years since the beginning of the Russian aggression, and especially during the large-scale invasion, the soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces have been bravely and loyally fighting on the hottest areas of the front, effectively destroying the Russian occupiers. The commander-in-chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces emphasized that the paratroopers managed to destroy the aggressor's plans to attack the Sumy direction from the Kursk region, to transfer this war to the enemy's territory, because they were at the forefront of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in operations in the Kursk region. And now they stop Russian attacks in the Kursk, Pokrovsky, Kurakhivsk and other directions and actively oppose the aggressor. -Dear Ukrainian defenders, on this day I sincerely thank each of you for your steadfastness, courage and heroism! I wish you good health, high morale, new achievements and victories! I am grateful to the fathers and mothers who raised such brave and patriotic sons and daughters. A low bow to the feat of paratroopers who gave their lives for the Motherland. Eternal honor and memory to them! Glory to DSHV! Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!-, says the greeting. As ArmiyaInform reported, our journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. More about the participation of paratroopers in this operation said its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshin.

Title: 24 enemy ships were recorded in the Black Sea, among them carriers -Calibers-
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 2 enemy ships, 1 of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine has successfully scaled up mass production of cruise missiles P-360 -Neptun- with improvements for hitting targets at longer distances. It was the Neptune missile complex that destroyed the flagship of the Russian Black Sea Fleet - the cruiser -Moskva-

Title: Fires in the Dnipro as a result of a morning massive strike
Description: This was reported by the head of the regional military administration Serhiy Lysak. Nikopol, as well as Marganetska, Mirivska and Pokrovska communities came under fire. As a result of the attacks, a garage and a power line were damaged. Fortunately, there were no casualties. On the morning of November 21, the aggressor launched a massive attack on the region. Damage to an industrial enterprise and the occurrence of two fires were recorded in Dnipro. Information on the consequences of these strikes is being clarified. In addition, at night, the Russian army continued shelling the Nikopol district, in particular the district center, Pokrovska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. Artillery and rocket salvo fire systems -Grad- were used. There are no casualties among the civilian population. Law enforcement officers and emergency services are working at the sites of the attacks to eliminate the consequences of the attacks. As reported by ArmyInform, a child died as a result of a Russian strike with cluster munitions on a residential building in Donetsk region.

Title: Paratroopers are always strength, courage and professionalism: Rustem Umyerov congratulated the sold...
Description: This is stated in the congratulations of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov on the Day of Defense Forces of the Armed Forces. -You overcome any obstacles, performing the most difficult tasks. Your contribution to the destruction of the enemy and the defense of Ukraine is invaluable,- said Rustem Umyerov. The minister added that today we bow our heads in memory of the soldiers who gave their lives for our freedom. Eternal glory to the Heroes who will forever remain in our hearts. -Paratroopers are always strength, courage and professionalism. You are the first in the offensive, indomitable in the defense, always where it is necessary for our common victory. Thank you for your devotion to Ukraine, for your courage and bravery. Together we will defeat the enemy and restore peace to our country,- the greeting reads. As ArmiyaInform reported, our journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. More about the participation of paratroopers in this operation said its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshin.

Title: Fifty artillery systems and more than 1.5 thousand occupiers: the General Staff of the Armed Forces ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 21, 2024 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy became more active in the East: most of the assaults fall on three directions .

Title: The enemy has become more active in the East: most of the assaults are in three directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy launched one missile strike, 61 air strikes using 91 anti-aircraft missiles, more than 560 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out more than 3,000 attacks on the positions of our troops and populated areas using various types of weapons. On the Kharkiv direction, there were four combat clashes with the Russian invaders in the Vovchansk and Staritsa areas, near Kozachai Lopan, the enemy dropped three guided aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried 23 times to dislodge our units from their positions near Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka, and Zeleny Gay. Ten times the enemy attacked in the Lyman direction, trying to advance in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, and Thorny. Actively used bombing and attack aircraft in the areas of settlements of Novoyehorivka and Zakitne. In the Siversk direction, the Russian occupiers dropped ten anti-tank missiles in the Siversk region. On the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy dropped five aerial bombs in the areas of the settlements of Chasiv Yar and Lypivka. The enemy tried seven times to wedge into our defenses in the Toretsk direction. The occupiers in the Toretsk and Shcherbynivka areas were fiercely repulsed by our defenders five times. Two attacks are ongoing so far. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, the aggressor carried out 33 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Pustinka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Krasniy Yar, Lyskivka, Yuryivka, Zhovte, Petrivka, Dachenske, Novooleksiivka, Hryhorivka, and Pushkine settlements. Twenty-two attacks in the direction of the Ukrainian defenders have already been repelled, eleven more clashes are ongoing. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Sukha Balka, Stara Mykolaivka, Lysivka, dropping a total of 15 guided bombs. In the Kurakhiv direction there are 23 combat clashes. The invaders remain highly active, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Berestki, Zorya, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka and Antonivka. Units of the Defense Forces repelled seven enemy attacks, 16 attacks are still ongoing. The settlements of Ulakly and Andriyivka were hit by guided bombs. In the Vremivsk direction there were 28 skirmishes. Five enemy assaults have already been stopped by our defenders in Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velikay Novosilka, and Novodarivka districts. Fierce fighting continues to this day. Also, the enemy actively used aviation in the area of ​​Oleksiivka and Novodarivka, dropping eight guided aerial bombs. Today, the enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions. Our soldiers repelled the attacks of Russian invaders five times in the Dnieper direction. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in Kursk Oblast. Enemy aviation continues to strike with guided aerial bombs on the territory of Russia. At the moment, 20 air strikes with the use of 33 anti-aircraft missiles are known. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. The department also honored the soldiers of the 39th separate anti-aircraft missile regiment and the 124th separate territorial defense brigade, who in extremely difficult conditions restrained the attacks of the enemy's superior forces, causing him serious losses. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Sivalka-VM8- flamethrower systems of the RHC-defense units of the Support Forces carried out fire damage to the enemy's manpower with special thermobaric projectiles.

Title: Encircled battles, destruction of alligators and revenge against the marines of the 155th brigade: a...
Description: ArmiyaInform journalists visited the 82nd Bukovinsk Airborne Assault Brigade, which broke through the Russian border and is still performing tasks on enemy territory. In more detail about the participation of paratroopers in this operation, its commander Colonel Dmytro Voloshyn said: -In my opinion, there were several key aspects. First of all, secrecy in the planning and preparation of the operation. And also the secret movement of troops. We had several interactions with the Commander-in-Chief and were instructed to move to a new area. We moved to the Sumy region in three days at night. But they did it in such a way that even some of our units, which should have known about it, did not know. I even had a conflict with the head of the VSP, who should have known that I was moving and should have provided me with an escort. And he found out when we moved, about three days after that. It is a real skill to move unnoticed by an organism like a brigade. You yourself understand that personnel, heavy equipment, and shells were being moved. Already on the territory of the Sumy region, we disguised ourselves as much as possible. There was no -shuffling-. No one knew that the 82nd Brigade had appeared there. And this continued for about a week after the operation began. For example, Russian media reported that the 22nd Mechanized Brigade broke through the front line and went deep. For understanding, the 22nd brigade was moving behind me. She was in our second echelon. The second aspect is who was bet on to carry out such an operation. And I think the airborne assault troops did it for once. The third aspect is the territory on which we fought. If you look at it, it is a rough terrain, full of difficult sections. I do not think that the enemy saw it as suitable for large-scale operations. And it is necessary to hit where it is weak, where the enemy does not expect. Yes, it was difficult. But we coped with it. Of course, another aspect of success was provisioning. Sometimes I think that if the Commander-in-Chief had raised problematic issues at some regular interaction, then I would have said that I need some kind of intergalactic blaster, I think that it would have been found for us somewhere within a week. To be honest, they gave literally everything. So that you only perform tasks properly. He attacked, destroyed the enemy, took possession of certain areas and borders. And all this, in fact, was successful. After all, the credo of the airborne assault troops is that we do not back down in the face of difficulties, we move to the end. And the main aspect why we have succeeded in all this is the belief in what we are doing. My immediate, faith of my subordinates. No one said: -we have to go to Russian territory anyway.- When the soldiers were told that they had to go and fight in enemy territory, the reaction was quite expected: -finally we will go and slander these bastards on their territory.- Why not? Our country is destroyed every day, children die. So let them also feel what war is like, but for them it is somewhere far away. The first day was probably the most difficult, you had to overcome a barrier in your head. After all, the introduction of such large-scale offensive actions is a very difficult task, taking into account the enemy's use of various means of fire damage. These are high-precision weapons, anti-aircraft missiles, anti-aircraft missiles, military aviation, FPV drones, and Lancets. Of course, it is like that everywhere now. It stands on the stream in them. So I had to overcome this barrier in my head. Somewhere he adjusted himself to some extent, somewhere he adjusted the commanders. There was anxiety, but they went to perform the task. I thought that if we break through the front edge now, then everything should go according to plan. And we broke through the front edge. It was something with something, how we crossed the border. The entire brigade passed through one passage made in the mine-explosive barriers by the 225th assault battalion assigned to me. The car is moving, and I am thinking: now it should be hit by ATGMs, or now the Lancet should fly into it. And nothing comes flying in… troops enter in huge columns. The noise was so loud that probably the whole of Sumy shuddered. I was puzzled, because there is such a sign that when everything is going according to plan, somewhere ahead, the enemy has prepared something. The Wisent barrier machine was the first to pass. It has no weapons, just an armored car with a big bucket. He crossed the border and went to the enemy stronghold. I think, well, that's all for him. And he turned around and drove back. I had even more questions than I had. But the units went further deep into the enemy's defenses. Why we managed to break through the border in such a way became clear when I was already on the territory of Russia. They did not see us, because, as they say, no one mowed the grass in front of their positions. Literally. The grass was taller than my Hummer. And they just didn't see what was happening. They heard explosions, the rumble of equipment, but did not see. So we slipped past them and did not storm those positions. It was also nonsense for them that we do not storm positions where the enemy is, but move on. I'll be honest, when the actions started, everything just went, and we completed the tasks as I set them for myself. The tasks of the first, second, third day, we still did. They occupied certain areas, surrounded the enemy. Somewhere they bypassed him. And perhaps one of the key decisions that led to rapid success was that I did not task my units to enter populated areas. Before that, I spoke with the participants of the campaigns on Russian territory - RDK, GUR. They said that when they entered populated areas and knocked out the enemy, then they were simply mixed up with aircraft and that was it. That's why it was a failure. I decided that the enemy would build defense nodes in populated areas. Therefore, we simply bypassed them, and it was already incomprehensible to the enemy. As we passed through the front end, we thought there were maybe 200 people at most. It is clear that there were pre-prepared positions, but they looked uninhabited. And then, when the enemy was in our rear, it turned out that there were much more of them. Apparently, on the seventh or eighth day, I think you heard, the SBU special unit -Alfa- took about 120 prisoners at just one stronghold. And just so you understand, there were 30 to 40, sometimes 50 enemy military personnel at each stronghold. That is, in general, there were about two thousand servicemen in our rear. Yes, there were mostly conscripts who did not cause us much harm, and they were then taken prisoner. But such a number of personnel were in our rear, and, in fact, our soldier did not pay attention to this, but moved forward and performed his task. Of course, there were also some -slips-. The 225th battalion fulfilled its task, entered and blocked a number of settlements. In particular, the route that went from Korenev to Suja. The second battalion was supposed to go at the same time with it, but it was not possible to make passages in it. There were failures of engineering equipment. So while we were redeploying this battalion to a neighboring route, I decided to immediately bring the second echelon into battle. These units overcame the combat formations of the 225th battalion and immediately went to the first line of enemy defense. The first is because, according to the operational construction, we first overcame the echelon of the state border cover. And behind it, at a depth of 10-12 km, there was already another boundary. Again there were -dragon's teeth-, again an anti-tank ditch, again mines. Two battalions slipped through and went all the way to Novoivanivka, where they pressed the enemy and prevented him from occupying strong points on this line. With this, I set myself the task of the day - to get behind these -dragon's teeth-. If we did not do this, there would be no point in moving forward. Overcoming such barriers under enemy fire… it would be Zaporizhzhia number two. But the staff did not disappoint.   Strong resistance was put up by the enemy's army aviation. Helicopters flew over the columns at a height of 50-100 meters. They fired from cannons, anti-tank missiles, unguided missiles. We immediately deployed anti-aircraft defenses. The first Ka-52 was destroyed with Strela MANPADS. We also damaged the Mi-8 with small arms fire. He fumed. As it turned out later, he flew a little further and also fell. That is, on the first day, we destroyed two enemy rotorcraft. They didn't fly the next day. Then they started working again. On one of these days, we destroyed another Ka-52. A paratrooper hit him with a Stinger MANPADS. The entire crew was destroyed there (ArmyInform already wrote about this episode. Read more can be read here - Ed.). About two weeks after the operation began, a large number of drones appeared here. Serious units arrived with trained crews who know how to use all this. They were constantly working on technology. Here, by the way, they encountered FPV drones in the 330 MHz frequency range for the first time. And at that time we did not have EW tools against them. But we found options. Their points were detected, fire damage was inflicted, and at this time they slipped wherever they needed. There were many different solutions that we constantly combined. While we were advancing, the enemy tried to throw at least someone to stop us. In fact, they threw their units into the tiger's mouth. The -scoop- once had such a thing as marching companies. Literally, from the wheels, they threw themselves at some boundaries with only small arms. We met such companies. They smashed them to zero. First with combat vehicles. And then the soldiers went to clean up if someone continued to resist and did not want to surrender. There were moments when our advanced units went deep into the defense, and the sweep did not have time. And the units found themselves surrounded by the enemy on all sides. But we are paratroopers. We are always in the rear of the enemy - surrounded. We were preparing for this, for a circular defense. And it does not matter whether it is a department, a company or a battalion. Everyone should be able to conduct an all-round defense. Determine dangerous directions, where to place grenade launchers or anti-tank weapons, how to -close- (mining the terrain. - Ed.). We have been trying to unblock one of the units for about a month. And they kept the defense all this time. The first real resistance was offered by the 810th Marine Corps Brigade. For understanding, its composition includes 13 battalions. And these are not security battalions at all. She arrived only by arrangement. The prisoners said that it was 96% manned and 90% equipped. My third battalion captured their APC. Yes, there was still polyethylene on the seats. New car. Only from the factory. There are also paratroopers here. 83rd, 51st, 56th, 119th Parachute Regiments. 73rd Reconnaissance. This is a Vedevesh battalion. Various -Akhmatians- are also here. Well, the most finished is the 155th Marine Corps Brigade. These are the infamous freaks who cut off heads, cut off ears, knocked out teeth, and shot prisoners. The most interesting thing is that they are so boring when they are all together. And if anything, they are afraid to admit that they are from the 155th brigade. They are called anything. I understand that this is a war. But torturing and killing an unresisting opponent is low. There are certain laws and rules of war. No normal commander would set such a task. But there are no moral boundaries in this swagger. Therefore, there is no mercy for them from our paratroopers either. We are trying to destroy them. An eye for an eye, as they say. In a certain period, units were withdrawn to rest a little. But as soon as they came out, literally in a day and a half, the enemy started his offensive actions. Of course, we were quickly brought back into battle. And so we fought for another month. For example, one of the battalions defended Lyubimivka. The enemy tried to drive in with 12 vehicles. I thought that he would just drive in and sell en masse, as was the case in some other settlements. But they immediately made mine barriers, put up a -jagoza-. The enemy blew up somewhere, started to turn around somewhere and blew up again. And the paratroopers have already finished off everyone with automatic weapons. Everything, -I wish you health-, as they say. Later, we still went for a short rest, to regroup. At that time, new personnel also arrived, because, of course, there were also losses. And we were preparing for new offensive actions. The enemy began offensive actions again to dislodge the Defense Forces from Kurshchyna. And my units returned there to carry out assault operations to dislodge the enemy from those territories where he managed to wedge himself in. Of course, it doesn't happen so fast these days. The enemy has accumulated a lot. We retook three settlements. And for the fourth one, we are -getting excited- now. Half of it has been cleared, and the enemy has been trying to attack us here all day today. In the airborne assault troops, the main thing is training and motivation. Some people say that we have some special fighters. That's not true. We take these servicemen from the same training centers as the others. We just have such an ideology - we teach them not to survive, but to kill the enemy. And we will fight to the last. Photo of the communications department of the 82nd separate amphibious assault brigade of the Bukovyna Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine

Title: How much is paid for the destruction of enemy equipment: it's all about the monetary reward
Description: According to the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, our defenders destroyed almost 100,000 units of enemy equipment during almost 3 years of large-scale invasion. The purpose of the survey is to understand how this is implemented in practice and what difficulties military personnel face. ArmyInform reminds how this reward should be paid and how much can be received, for example, for a destroyed tank or a downed plane. The payment of such remuneration is regulated by a special procedure, approved order Ministry of Defense of Ukraine dated September 18, 2020 No. 340. Yes, military personnel are paid a reward in the amount from 12,180 to 243,600 hryvnias, depending on the type of equipment. The decision to recognize the equipment as destroyed or captured is made on the basis of at least three documents. Next, a conclusion is made about the destruction (capture) of enemy equipment, and it is formalized in an administrative document (order) of the head of the troop group (forces). Confirmation of the destruction (capture) of the equipment is: An increase in the reward for the destroyed (captured) equipment is distributed by the commander's decision among the servicemen who took a direct part in the destruction (capture) of the equipment, depending on their personal contribution. Remuneration is paid to military personnel from the place of service on the basis of the orders of the commanders of military administration bodies and military units. We remind you that not only a monetary reward is provided for the destruction of enemy equipment. Also, from this year, it became possible to get additional vacation days. More about this can be read here.

Title: -Malyuk- Challenger in the service of DSHV: how a British tank beats Russians on their territory
Description: These tanks were handed over to Ukraine by Great Britain in 2023. And now they serve in the 82nd Bukovyna Assault Brigade, which operates in the Kursk direction. Tank commander Oleksandr worked as an electric and gas welder almost all his life. After BZVP, he was offered to become a tanker, and he immediately got on the Challenger II tank. That is, he did not have experience working on other machines, so it is difficult for him to compare. But he does not have such a desire: -I once sat in Abrams.- I didn't like him. It is much smaller. In my homeland, I'll be honest, I didn't even climb. I looked at the driver's seat, looked into the tower and realized that there wasn't even enough room for me,- Oleksandr says. One of the main advantages of the Challenger II tank, the commander calls its accuracy, which is achieved thanks to the 120-mm rifled gun and the fire control system, which itself, depending on the conditions, makes all the necessary corrections: -It can work at a distance of up to 10 km inclusive. But it depends on the area. He works as a sniper. For example, if you shoot at a distance of 5 kilometers from a T-shka (a series of Soviet tanks - ed.), Abrams and Challenger, then it will hit the most accurately. It has a weather sensor that transmits information about wind, humidity and other factors to the computer. And he makes these corrections himself.- In general, the on-board computer is the brain of this tank, adds Stanislav with the call sign -Patron-, who is a loader in the crew: -He programs everything himself. For example, if two tanks leave. One at 1,800 meters, the other at 2,300. The laser is aimed at both tanks and the computer remembers two targets. And when the commander decides which one to hit, the gunner can switch between targets with just one button.- The loader is the fourth crew member, which is characteristic of most Western tanks. After all, the Soviet ones have a charging machine, so there are fewer crew members there. Here, although you have to charge manually, it is not difficult. -There is nothing complicated. Yes, everything is done manually for the first shot. I lower the shutter wedge, load everything, close it and move it to the right position. And after the first shot, everything happens automatically. You just need to throw in another projectile,- Patron says. And this tank is very strong and safe for the crew, says the commander of the vehicle Oleksandr. After all, even after significant damage, it can be driven. And it already saved the boys' lives: -Somehow he withstood the impact of a cumulative projectile during missile fire by Russian helicopters. The depth of damage was 720 mm. And the boys survived. They were the ones inside. There was another commander with them at that time.- The loading -Cartridge- was just in the tank during that shelling. He remembers that it was during the approach to Kurshchyna. -As soon as we crossed the border, 2-3 helicopters were already flying over us. And we had to take a stand. They drove and shot on the go. The distance to them was about 4 km. It is quite difficult to hit a helicopter. But something had to be done,- Patron recalls. Already when the tank was in position, the first rocket arrived. -It flew into the tower. Triplexes flew at the commander and the mechanic-driver. And when they -rolled away-, they were already driving along my triplex. I told where to go. Then there were a few more hits. They knocked out 2 rinks for us, punctured a tank. We drove through it at about 30 kilometers per hour.- Despite the damage, the tank was able to drive to a safe zone. He accomplished his mission, saving the lives of the crew. And already after the repair, he returned to the line and is again destroying the enemy on his own territory. First of all, the enemy is trying to hunt for Western weapons. That's why these tanks are the No. 1 target, says driver-mechanic Maksym with the call sign -Kalyna-. -As soon as we are spotted somewhere, all the fire is directed at us. Therefore, you need to constantly maneuver. All in all, it's a very powerful machine. And her defense is cool. But there are nuances of the engine - it needs constant maintenance. If it is done on time, then everything is fine. But this is not always possible because of the intensity of the action. And it would be possible to put an even more powerful engine here. Now it has 1,200 horsepower, but it would be great if they put 1,500.- Currently, the intensity of hostilities in the direction is very high. The enemy is trying to knock our units out of Kurshchyna. Constantly deploys large amounts of vehicles and infantry to attack. This is also felt by the tankers, who almost constantly have to advance to the task - to work both on equipment and on the enemy's manpower, covering our units. -We worked on the Zaporizhzhia and Vovchansky directions before this. I can say that every time it becomes more difficult. After all, the enemy is constantly studying us, our actions. Constantly introduces something new. But thanks to the interaction between departments, we manage everything. The result is mostly positive,- says tank commander Oleksandr. He also talks about his main fear when performing tasks. -I'll be honest, it's always a little scary before leaving. And this is a normal phenomenon. Everyone has it. But when you start working, you focus on the task at hand. Adrenaline is also on the rise. And the main fear is to let the team down. Failing to do something or doing it wrong. But then, when you see the results - how many enemies we destroyed, you already feel proud. That they didn't just leave to work, but also have a result,- adds Oleksandr. The guys' motivation is simple - it's better to stop the enemy here than when he gets to your house. Because then it will be too late. Photo of the author and the communications department of the 82nd separate amphibious assault Bukovynia brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine

Title: Combat duo: what is known about the new UAV that will work together with French fighters
Description: How informs The War Zone website, this project promises to increase the effectiveness of the French Air Force by 2033, ArmyInform reports. The industrial part of the drone program will be led by Dassault Aviation, building on its previous UAV prototype nEUROn UCAV already used in trials with manned combat aircraft. The program was announced by the French Minister of the Armed Forces, Sébastien Lecornu, during a ceremony to mark the 60th anniversary of the French Strategic Air Force (FAS) at the Saint-Dizier air base. The new UCAV, which is being developed by Dassault Aviation in collaboration with the French Defense Procurement Agency (DGA), will have a number of unique characteristics, including stealth technologies, autonomous control with the participation of the operator (man-in-the-loop) and internal weapons loading. These features will allow the drone to adapt to a variety of threats, as well as perform complex combat missions in support of the French Aerospace Forces. The basis of the project is the development of the nEUROn program — the first prototype of an unmanned aerial vehicle with stealth functions in Europe. The program, launched in 2003 under the leadership of Dassault Aviation, brought together industrial partners from six European countries. nEUROn demonstrated key technologies such as stealth, autonomous flight and the ability to use internal weapons such as laser-guided bombs GBU-12. As note analysts of the defense portal Army Recognition, nEUROn weighing 7 tons, with a wingspan of 12.5 meters and a length of 9.2 meters powered by Rolls-Royce Turbomeca Adour Mk. 951, which provides a speed of up to Mach 0.8 at an altitude of 14,000. meters Since its first flight in 2012, this demonstrator has completed more than 170 test flights, which allowed to confirm its technological and financial efficiency. The experience gained within the framework of the nEUROn program will be directly used in the development of a new combat drone. For now, the drone remains nameless, but its specs are already sparking interest. It will have stealth, which will allow it to effectively perform tasks in difficult conditions. The War Zone reports that the drone will operate in tandem with a Rafale fighter jet, which will be operated by a pilot. This interaction between manned and unmanned aerial vehicles opens up new horizons for combat tactics. Dassault has already stated that the drone will be versatile and able to adapt to future threats. Experts assume that this device will be able to perform a wide range of tasks, from reconnaissance to strikes on targets. Its internal payload space also promises to be substantial, allowing for the integration of various weapon systems. As for the Rafale Standard F5, which is expected to support the new drone, the plan is to keep the multi-role combat aircraft in the forefront until 2060. Initial research for the F5 Standard began last year, and full-scale development will begin in 2026-2027. Experts of the IKK Defense Express publication reminded that the law on defense planning of France for the period from From 2024 to 2030, the upgrade of the Rafale attack aircraft to the F5 standard, which should act as a carrier of a promising cruise missile of the type ASN4G as a means of delivery nuclear weapons. The French military stipulates that the Rafale F5 must be able to overcome various prospective threats, and accordingly this aircraft must have the necessary technological options to perform its tasks. In turn, researchers from the Opex360 portal indicate that as early as 2023 the French the military has recognized one interesting point about upgrading the Rafale to the F5 standard - for this aircraft to be able to independently perform all its intended tasks, it is necessary to increase the power of the computing equipment on board, which must process -hundreds of thousands of pieces of data-. But to achieve this, it is necessary to increase the length of the cables for various types of equipment so much that they literally will not fit in the plane itself with its current geometry. It seems, according to Opex experts, that it is against this background that the French Ministry of Defense came up with the concept of -tying together- the promising Rafale F5 and guided stealth UAV. nEUROn made its first flight in 2012 and has since completed more than 170 test flights, demonstrating its ability to remain undetected by modern air defense systems. During one of the tests in 2016, the drone successfully penetrated the defenses of the Charles de Gaulle aircraft carrier, demonstrating its unique stealth capabilities. This experience will form the basis of the development of the new UCAV, which will play a key role in future joint operations. Presentation of the combat unmanned aerial vehicle nEUROn. Video: NPJ Global France has announced the development of a new unmanned combat aircraft that will work in tandem with the Rafale F5 fighter. Video: Military News

Title: How many Ukrainians are actually against territorial concessions of the Russian Federation: the enem...
Description: According to polls, the majority of Ukrainians oppose Russia's territorial concessions. As is well known, Russian and pro-Russian sources cannot be considered a reliable source of information. However, the propagandists are trying to convince that they are citing the data of a real, and not a -bought and painted- sociological survey, despite the fact that they do not indicate any source of origin of this -insider-. At the same time, the Kyiv International Institute of Sociology (KIIS) has been regularly conducting surveys since May 2022 on the readiness of Ukrainians to make territorial concessions in order to achieve peace as soon as possible. According to results a poll conducted from September 20 to October 3, 2024, the majority of Ukrainians oppose Russia's territorial concessions. 58% of respondents answered that Ukraine should not give up any of its territories, even if because of this the war would last longer and there would be threats to the preservation of independence. Sociologists note that the share of the Russian Federation ready to make concessions has not changed since May of this year - it is 32%. Instead, the share of those who oppose concessions increased from 55% to 58% from May to October this year. According to another KMIS survey conducted in the same period, 63% of Ukrainians are ready to endure the war as long as necessary.

Title: Ukraine and Great Britain discussed plans to help Ukrainian soldiers in 2025
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on November 20. -Thanked Great Britain for its active position in supporting Ukraine. Britain's allies have repeatedly demonstrated that they stand side by side with us in the struggle for freedom. Together with Lord Coaker, they discussed Great Britain's plans to provide aid to Ukrainian soldiers in 2025. Another important direction was the issue of synchronizing our interaction in the defense industry. I am grateful to our British partners for their comprehensive support and willingness to strengthen our cooperation. Together we are bringing victory closer!-, Rustem Umyerov assured. As reported by ArmyInform, immediately 12 countries unite to strengthen security and support Ukraine.

Title: -Moisey- for evaders - a man was detained in Kharkiv, who was taking him to Moldova for rough money
Description: The Prosecutor's Office of the Kharkiv Oblast reported this on November 20. According to the investigation, a resident of Kharkiv organized the departure of men of draft age abroad through Vinnytsia. He personally conducted briefings with -clients- and reported that the amount of escape from Ukraine costs $13,400. In Vinnytsia, the men had to check into a hotel and -wait- for 1-2 days. In the future, the evaders were met by accomplices of the accused and placed in a vehicle that was already transporting them across the state border to the Republic of Moldova. On November 15, during the transfer of the agreed amount from the -client- near the store in the village of Solonytsivka, law enforcement officers detained the dealer. The court granted the prosecution's request: the suspect was remanded in custody with the right to post bail in the amount of 454.2 thousand. UAH for a period of 60 days. The investigation is ongoing. All persons involved in the commission of the specified crime are identified. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Sow Death - The Defense Forces have shown the work of a rare flamethrower against the enemy
Description: Video of combat work published on November 20 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. -Sivalka-VM8- can launch from 12 to 16 unguided air missiles (UARs). According to data from open sources, the firing range of the installation is approximately 5 km. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces showed how our flamethrowers work in Kurshchyna.

Title: In Kurshchyna, the Russians shot our soldiers who were surrounded
Description: This was announced by Dmytro Lubinets on his channel on the evening of November 20. -Another war crime! I sent letters to the UN and the ICRC regarding this crime. The international community must act immediately. The occupying country has once again violated the Geneva Convention on the Treatment of Prisoners of War. Russia must be stopped. The enemy will answer for every crime,- said Dmytro Lubinets. Previously, a horrific video shot by a drone camera was released. It shows 10 unarmed people lying on the ground. At least 5 armed men stand above them. At some point, they start shooting people lying down. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians shot at least 2 prisoners of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Donetsk region.

Title: The Air Force called for restraint and prudence
Description: This was written by in the evening of November 20 the head of the communications service with Colonel Yuriy Ignat of the Air Force Command of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. -Of course, there is no smoke without fire, and it is clear that we must be vigilant during missile threats, ballistic threats, etc. The main thing is restraint and prudence! The enemy strives for that every day, in order to sow panic and despair among Ukrainians in our resistance, in our success. So while there was unrest in Ukraine all day because of the Russian IPSO, there was a -strong storm- in Kurshchyna, - they write in hostile Russian publications!-, Yuriy Ignat remarked. He assured that all forces and means of the Air Force are in constant readiness. -Everything we have in our arsenal is used to protect the country - there are no options here. Aviation, air defense, intelligence, EW, MVG, and … Natalya on the roof. Let's keep in line! Together - to victory!-, Yuriy Ignat wrote. As reported by ArmyInform, the GUR rebutted fake reports of a -massive strike-.

Title: A child died as a result of a Russian strike with cluster munitions on a residential building in Don...
Description: reported this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. The deceased's sister (12 years old) and grandfather (63 years old) were also injured, who received landmine-explosive injuries, injuries to the head, chest, arms and legs. The injured were treated and qualified medical assistance was provided. As a result of the enemy attack, residential buildings and motor vehicles were damaged in the settlement. Under the procedural leadership of the Slavyansk District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings on the fact of a war crime (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy -> shelling a border village in Chernihiv Oblast with tanks and artillery for two days.

Title: Ukraine and Poland discussed deepening cooperation in the defense industry
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on November 20. -Poland is one of our most important partners and closest friends. He thanked for the next aid package, which was announced during today's conversation between the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi and the Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk,- said Rustem Umyerov. During the conversation, issues of bilateral cooperation were discussed. In particular, it was about the training of the Ukrainian military and the deepening of cooperation in the field of the defense industry. -We agreed to hold a meeting in the near future to discuss in detail all issues of interaction between our defense departments. I thank Poland for its constant support and sincere partnership,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, immediately 12 countries unite to strengthen security and support Ukraine.

Title: Posing as locals: in Toretsk, the occupiers change into civilian clothes
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the Suspilne Novosti telethon. — In Toretsk, the situation is difficult now, there are very heavy urban battles. The enemy lost about 70 killed and wounded [last day]. You can imagine the intensity of these hostilities. That is, the enemy literally attacks our servicemen with meaty assaults, she said. The spokeswoman said that local residents remain in the city, and Russian servicemen change into civilian clothes to mislead Ukrainian soldiers. — As for the civilians, they still remain there. This makes the job of our military members incredibly difficult. Because the enemy disguises himself in civilian clothes, trying to deceive our servicemen in this way, she said. Fighters of the Defense Forces try to identify and counter the enemy. — We are trying to detect such attempts, but it is very difficult both from a moral and military point of view. Because a military serviceman has to think twice every time who is in front of him - a civilian or an enemy disguised in civilian clothes, - explained Anastasia Bobovnikova. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Chasovoy Yar, Russians run to -meat- intelligence under the threat of being shot.

Title: The information injection that took place today helps the enemy - the President
Description: About this declared on November 20 Volodymyr Zelenskyi in his evening address. -Today there were a lot of nerves and questions about some special danger. Although we have already experienced how many cruel and vile blows from Russia during this time... We must always pay attention to the air alarm. We have such a neighbor who is crazy. Today, on the 1001st day of full-scale war, Russia is just as crazy as it was on the 1000th day, and on February 24th. The information injection that took place today, some panic messages that were sent - all this only helps Russia. Please take care of yourself, help our army and make sure, in particular, that no one can use your emotions for their own interests. And we continue to strengthen air defense,- the President assured. He announced a new support package from America in the amount of $275 million. -The package includes drones, highmars shells and artillery, and very importantly, mines to stop Russian assaults. It will really strengthen our guys at the front. And this is already the 70th defense package from the United States of America. Ukraine appreciates America's bipartisan support and President Biden's decision. Thank you!- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. He said that he spoke today with the Prime Minister of Poland, Donald Tusk. -Thanked for all the support provided since the first days of the invasion. We discussed the preparation of a new package from Poland for Ukraine. And also — the presidency of Poland in the European Union, which will begin in the new year. Together, we can do significant things for our peoples and for the whole of Europe,- the President expressed hope. He also talked about the meeting with the director of the World Bank on issues of operational activity. -They talked about our financial stability, about our support programs and about funds from frozen Russian assets. It is absolutely fair that Russian funds should work to protect against Russian aggression. The perpetrator of the war must pay for it. Pay and answer. I thank everyone who helps us bring a just peace closer! Glory to Ukraine!- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky conducted a> telephone conversation with the Prime Minister of Poland, Donald Tusk.

Title: I came - you are gone: our pilots destroyed all the Russians before the arrival of their attack airc...
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 20. A group of 5 enemy infantry tried to secure a position in landing -Alastor- pilots began to work on the enemy, after which our assault group should finish the job. But there was no one to storm them, because our drones did not leave anyone alive in the trenches. -After our work, our assault group came, but there was no one to storm. Everyone is in the plus: both the occupiers were destroyed and the lives of our infantry were saved,- the unit commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Alastor- unit of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade hit a significant number of enemy armored vehicles during attempts attack the Russians.

Title: Ukraine and Estonia signed a Memorandum between the defense departments
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on November 20. This document is an important step in the implementation of the -Agreement on cooperation in the field of security and long-term support-, which was signed in June by Prime Minister of Estonia Kaia Kallas and President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The memorandum expands the possibilities of using Estonian military aid to Ukraine in 2024-2027. Support in the amount of 0.25% of Estonia's GDP will be aimed at: ​•​ material assistance for the Ukrainian military ​•​ funding of the IT coalition under the chairmanship of Estonia ​•​ training of Ukrainian military personnel. -This is not only help to Ukraine, but also an exchange of experience. Ukraine will share combat knowledge that will strengthen the defense capabilities of Estonia and our partners. I thank Estonia for its constant support, which brings our joint victory closer,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, immediately 12 countries unite to strengthen security and support Ukraine.

Title: $20,000 for evasion of duty: Greed kills dudes in four areas
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the law enforcement officers, the detainees helped the evaders to avoid the draft and illegally leave Ukraine, using fictitious documents. The cost of such -services- reached 20 thousand US dollars. In Kyiv, a 35-year-old boxing coach and a student were detained for trying to organize the -employment- of conscripts at a critical infrastructure enterprise that has the right to reserve workers. The deals involved personal connections in the company. In Khmelnytskyi, the former deputy head of the regional TCC received suspicion. He sold fake certificates of mental health disorders that allowed him to be removed from the military registration. In Zaporizhzhia during the transfer of money, a local resident was detained, who organized false conclusions of the Military Medical Commission (MMC) about unfitness for service due to health conditions. In Ivano-Frankivsk region a 66-year-old man was detained, who, through connections in the MSEK, ensured the receipt of disability certificates for postponement of mobilization. Detainees were notified of suspicion under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. Offenders face up to 9 years in prison with confiscation of property. Operational measures were carried out in Kyiv, Khmelnytskyi, Zaporizhzhia, and Ivano-Frankivsk regions with the participation of the Svyatoshyn District Prosecutor's Office, the Khmelnytskyi Specialized Prosecutor's Office in the Defense of the Western Region, as well as the Zaporizhia and Ivano-Frankivsk Regional Prosecutor's Offices. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Lithuania will provide another 10 million euros for the reconstruction of Ukraine
Description: About notified the Ministry of Finance of Lithuania. The fund will contribute to the restoration of damaged energy infrastructure, housing, schools, hospitals and other urgent financing needs. This will be Lithuania's second contribution to the Fund, EUR 5 million will be allocated in December 2022. Funds will be transferred to the Fund in the coming days, as soon as the necessary legal procedures are completed. Since the launch of the Fund in December 2022, 17 donor countries have joined it, including Lithuania. For the period 2022-2024, the Fund mobilized almost $2 billion euros, of which $1.2 billion was mobilized from donors during 2022-2022. USD 2.2 billion of donor support was disbursed for projects. Since the beginning of Russia's war against Ukraine, Lithuania has provided Ukraine with military, financial and humanitarian aid in the total amount of more than 1.5 billion euros.

Title: At least two - the Russians shot again the prisoners of the Armed Forces
Description: This was reported by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office on November 20. A pre-trial investigation has been started in criminal proceedings for the commission of a war crime that caused the death of people (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). In addition, the fact of the killing by the occupiers of three more wounded defenders of Ukraine at the indicated position is being checked. Urgent investigative (search) actions aimed at establishing all the circumstances of the event are being conducted. -Killing prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and qualifies as a serious international crime,- the prosecutor's office reminds. As reported by ArmyInform, an investigation has been launched due to the alleged shooting of Ukrainian soldiers in Kurshchyna.

Title: -Incredible number of personnel-: who are the Russians fighting in Toretsk
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the Suspilne Novosti telethon. — These are personnel units, motorized rifle brigades and regiments of the Central Military District of the Russian Federation. These are personnel units staffed by contractors, she said. The spokeswoman emphasized that the occupiers are well prepared, have an advantage in manpower, weapons and ammunition. - These are prepared units. We cannot underestimate the enemy, we still have to admit that they have an advantage in manpower, weapons, ammunition, and shells, said the officer. Voiskova emphasized that the enemy is attacking with an -unbelievable number of personnel- - therefore, the enemy should not be underestimated, and these are combat-ready brigades. If we speak in civilian language, this is simply an incredible number of personnel who are attacking, unfortunately, in the Toretsk direction, our defenders, said Anastasia Bobovnikova. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Toretsk, the occupiers change into civilian clothes to pass themselves off as local civilians.

Title: New support alliance: the first meeting of the Northern Group — Ukraine format took place
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine announced this on November 20. -We are expanding our horizons: we are launching cooperation within the framework of the Northern Group-Ukraine,- said the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the -Nordic Group- will include the following countries: Germany, the Netherlands, Poland and Great Britain. -Today we had the first meeting in this format. I am grateful to my friend, the Minister of Defense of Denmark, for his leadership and hospitality. We agreed that the next meeting in the Northern Group-Ukraine format will be held in Ukraine,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, he had a frank, sincere and constructive conversation with his colleagues. During it, they discussed plans for 2025, urgent needs of Ukraine and how to provide them together as quickly as possible. They focused on common threats, as well as equipping combat brigades with heavy equipment. -Investments in the Ukrainian defense industry are a separate priority. More and more countries are joining the financing of Ukrainian production, in particular within the framework of the Danish model: Sweden, Norway, Lithuania. I expressed my sincere gratitude to the allies for the help they provide,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. He reminded that these countries are leaders in supporting Ukraine. They are the first: -Together with our partners, we are making the Ukrainian army stronger, and therefore, bringing victory closer. Thank you for your trust, support and unity!-, Rustem Umyerov concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, Poland is preparing 45 th package of military aid to Ukraine.

Title: - Here is his head! Goodbye! - hunting for Russian attack aircraft in our trenches
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the Primus channel. Two enemy stormtroopers entered our trenches, but could not advance further and tried to hide. Maybe they were waiting for reinforcements. But our FPV drones flew in instead. First, they struck one, and then the second invader. -The enemy constantly carries out assault actions in small groups in an attempt to achieve success, but receives only absolute -burnout at work-. The video shows the coordinated work of the Primus calculation — as a result of effective assistance to our infantrymen and one-way tickets for the enemy,- the unit commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Totentanz.Group 2nd assault battalion of the 3rd assault brigade collected a selection of epic air attacks and Russian losses from the brigade's FPV drones.

Title: Brother for brother: a veteran gave a million hryvnias for prosthetics to a friend
Description: About the State Border Service of Ukraine informs. Serhiy joined the ranks of border guards in 2022. During the defense of Kostyantynivka in the summer of 2023, as a result of rocket fire, he was seriously injured, due to which doctors had to amputate both legs. After being wounded, Serhiy underwent long-term rehabilitation in a Kyiv hospital, where he met another veteran, Oleksandr, who also had one leg amputated. Their communication grew into a real friendship. Serhiy's wife started fundraising for electronic prostheses, and with joint efforts, it was possible to collect almost a million hryvnias. However, on the eve of the purchase of prostheses, a charitable organization appeared and found a donor to fully pay for Serhiy's prosthetics. Grateful for the help, Serhiy decided without hesitation to transfer the collected funds to his brother Oleksandr so that he could also get the necessary electronic prosthesis. This gesture became an example of sincere support and brotherhood among veterans who, despite their own trials, find the strength to help others. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Sharp Cartouches- unit of the National Guard during a change of positions -vorozhogo-fpv-drona/->were attacked by the enemy kamikaze drone, which was stopped only by a backpack with EW equipment.

Title: The DOT announced the purchase of tangible property for the Armed Forces of Ukraine for 2025
Description: About this reported 20 November Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Early procurement planning for 2025 is a step towards improving the effectiveness of the provision of the Armed Forces. The Ministry of Defense is also carrying out material support reform, introducing new elements of equipment and equipment that meet the requirements of modern combat,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. Currently, the DOT has already announced purchases of the following goods: Due to advance planning, servicemen will be able to receive material support in a timely and uninterrupted manner. And suppliers can prepare in advance to participate in tenders and plan the loading of production capacities. -Long-term planning of procurement of physical support is especially critical in the conditions of warfare. Thanks to the joint efforts of all relevant security authorities, it was possible to implement such an approach, which allows suppliers to plan the production cycle and personnel management for the whole year. It will also help attract new suppliers to procurement, as manufacturers can plan in advance the supply of raw materials and fittings for the manufacture of tangible assets. Also, long-term signed contracts eliminate the risks of late delivery. And, accordingly, guarantees for the military that they will receive full basic provision of property from the state,- noted Viktoriya Vynogradova, director of the material support program of the DOT. The day before, the State operator of the rear presented to the market the changes and plans for the procurement of physical support for 2025. In particular, potential suppliers familiarized themselves with changes in contracting conditions and qualification requirements, features of simplified procedures and framework agreements in defense procurement. Also, for the convenience of suppliers, the State Operator's website has posted a calendar plan for purchases until the end of 2024 in all three directions. From now on, companies will be able to see in advance the dates of the start of purchases and deliveries. The main goal is to give potential suppliers for the Armed Forces time to better prepare for purchases. By 2025, the DOT plans to focus on the localization of material production. You can view the announcement on the Prozorro website by following the link . As reported by ArmyInform, the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense -State rear operator- -tendery-na-2025-rik/->announced procurement of food for the Armed Forces of Ukraine for the first half of the year 2025 year.

Title: - Do as we do! - 26 prisoners in one battle in Kurshchyna, the Russians appealed to their fellow cit...
Description: A video of a conversation with smart people who decided to save their lives was released by the brigade channel on November 20. During one of the unsuccessful enemy assaults, the paratroopers of the 80th brigade destroyed a considerable number of the enemy, and those who miraculously survived decided to surrender, saving their lives. The video tells the story of two fighters of the -z storm- unit, former prisoners who, after signing a contract and ten days of training, were left to die like cannon fodder. However, after meeting with the Ukrainian paratroopers, they decided to surrender and recommend that their fellow citizens do the same.   As reported by ArmyInform, a fighter of the 80th Airborne Assault Brigade of the Galician Airborne Forces of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with the call sign Mazai, received a serious injury, but continued to perform a combat mission for two more days.

Title: With their hands tied and without weapons - captured Russian prisoners told how they were forced to ...
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the brigade's channel. Thanks to careful planning, our soldiers imperceptibly approached the enemy positions, immediately eliminated the commander of the Russian detachment and his deputy and captured three occupants. Former -convicts- say: the contract was signed in prison without their consent - no one asked. And they rushed to the assault with their hands tied and without weapons. They untied their hands and handed out machine guns a minute before disembarking from the armored personnel carrier and told them to secure themselves in the landing. The occupiers say: paratroopers of the 79th brigade worked so competently that they did not even understand how they ended up in captivity. They immediately dropped their weapons, raised their hands and left the dugout. It saved their lives. On its channel, the brigade conducts a large collection of drones and the necessary equipment for their effective operation. Get involved. As reported by ArmyInform, the President highlighted courage a> Taurian paratroopers.

Title: It seems to be love: the occupiers begin to undress when our drones approach
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the unit's channel. The invaders also tried to shoot at our drones, escape on a -loaf-, a pickup truck, and several armored personnel carriers at once. However, our FPV drones proved to be faster. All these drone hits by The Ravens were made in one day!   As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the 129th Brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian SSU on the first snow hit two Russian attack aircraft.

Title: Rustem Umyerov met with representatives of the Parliament of the Kingdom of Denmark
