Description: This was announced by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on the evening of November 20. -During the meeting, he talked about the Victory Plan of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi. In particular, he emphasized that it is critically important for Ukraine to receive an invitation to NATO and become a full member of the EU. These are key steps to strengthen our security and restore stability in the region,- said the Minister. He emphasized that the coalition of authoritarian countries led by Russia should receive a decisive response from the free world. -Together we have to force the aggressor to peace. For this, Ukraine needs long-range weapons and the ability to strike the enemy's military facilities,- Rustem Umyerov noted. Particular attention was paid to deepening cooperation with Denmark and other Scandinavian countries within the framework of the Victory Plan. This is the training and equipping of Ukrainian units, the development of the defense industry, the exchange of technologies and experience. -I thanked him for the successful implementation of the Danish investment model in the Ukrainian defense-industrial complex. They discussed the possibility of expanding this cooperation: from the purchase of foreign weapons to the creation of joint enterprises for the production of equipment and ammunition. Thank you to our Danish partners for their support and willingness to work together to achieve victory,- Rustem Umyerov concluded. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Denmark finansuvannya-opk/->discussed the increase of military support and financing of the defense industry.

Title: With their hands tied and without weapons - captured Russian prisoners told how they were forced to ...
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the brigade's channel. Thanks to careful planning, our soldiers imperceptibly approached the enemy positions, immediately eliminated the commander of the Russian detachment and his deputy, and captured three occupiers. Former -convicts- say: the contract was signed in prison without their consent - no one asked. And they rushed to the assault with their hands tied and without weapons. They untied their hands and handed out machine guns a minute before disembarking from the armored personnel carrier and told them to secure themselves in the landing. The occupiers say: the paratroopers of the 79th brigade worked so competently that they did not even understand how they ended up in captivity. They immediately dropped their weapons, raised their hands and left the dugout. It saved their lives. On its channel, the brigade conducts a large collection of drones and the necessary equipment for their effective operation. Get involved. As reported by ArmyInform, President noted the courage of the Tavrijsky paratroopers.

Title: Attack on a drone factory in Russia, -Shkval- eliminates Russians near Toretsk: stream from the fron...
Description: The occupiers tried to stop our attack with drones, but to no avail. The positions of the Russians were captured, two occupiers were eliminated, two more surrendered, the rest fled. The Efko oil and fat plant was attacked twice in Belgorod Oblast yesterday. Six UAVs arrived there at once. It is interesting that, in addition to dairy products, the plant manufactures cargo drones, which are used by the Russian army for military purposes. Soldiers of the 63rd brigade showed how their EW works. The enemy drone tried to attack the brigade's tank while it was working on the enemy's position. However, the means of radio-electronic warfare on the tank worked and the Russian drone simply fell to the ground next to the tank. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andriy Makarenko and Lieutenant Colonel Serhii Misyura.

Title: Because he's an idiot - Russian actor Volodymyr Mashkov was given 10 years and his apartment in Odes...
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 20. Since the perpetrator is hiding in the Russian Federation, the trial took place in a special court proceeding, in the absence of the accused. Mashkov is part of the pool of Kremlin propagandists and often speaks at mass rallies in support of a full-scale war against Ukraine. In December 2023, the figure was appointed co-head of Putin's -election headquarters- in the so-called presidential elections of the Russian Federation. Then Mashkov traveled around Russia and the temporarily captured regions of Ukraine, where he promoted racism and glorified the occupation groups of the aggressor country. Among other things, during pro-Kremlin -concert-meetings-, he called for the continuation of rocket-bomb attacks on the civilian infrastructure of our country. Based on the evidence gathered by the investigators of the Security Service, the court found Mashkov guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Currently, comprehensive measures are underway to bring the convict to justice for crimes against our state. Volodymyr Mashkov played many roles in the cinema, in particular in the Russian TV series -Idiot-. As reported by ArmyInform, thanks to the evidence base of the Security Service, the real term of imprisonment received by another agent of Russian military intelligence (better known as game) who operated in Kharkiv.

Title: The USA announced a $275 million military aid package to Ukraine
Description: This is stated in the message at websites of the Pentagon. The new package includes, in particular, ammunition for missile systems, artillery and anti-tank weapons. The list of weapons provided reads: -The United States will continue to work with approximately 50 Alliance members and partners through the Defense Contact Group of Ukraine and related coalition forces and assets to meet Ukraine's urgent needs on the battlefield and to defend against Russian aggression,- the Pentagon said. As reported by ArmyInform, Germany handed Ukraine new package of military aid, which, in particular, included four self-propelled guns Panzerhaubitze 2000 and 41 thousand 155 mm artillery ammunition.

Title: Parents with many children can now apply for a deferment in the -Rezerv+- application
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. Currently, this applies to families raising three minor children in a joint marriage. The process is as simple and convenient as possible: If you meet the requirements, the deferment information will automatically appear in your electronic military document. Rustem Umyerov noted that the Ministry of Defense is working to ensure that all types of deferments for parents with many children will soon become available in Reserve+. -We also want to make it possible for other categories of citizens to apply for deferrals online. Digitization is about convenience and transparency, bringing us closer to a more modern and efficient system,- he added. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine already has three and a half million citizens updated their data through the -Rezerv+- application.

Title: Ukraine received an aid package from Germany: Panzerhaubitze 2000 self-propelled guns, shells and hu...
Description: This is stated in the message at website of the German government. According to the updated information on the assistance provided, Ukraine received 47 mine-resistant ambush protected vehicles (MRAP), one TRML-4D radar and 20 VECTOR reconnaissance drones with spare parts. Germany also transferred 12 HORNET XR reconnaissance drones, 60 Golden Eagle reconnaissance drones, two VT-4 Rochen reconnaissance drones, 100 RQ-35 HEIDRUN reconnaissance drones and 120 SONGBIRD reconnaissance drones. The new aid package included a Beaver armored bridge-laying vehicle, three WISENT 1 demining systems with spare parts, three mine plows, 8 Caracal tactical airborne vehicles, 20 Border Guard vehicles and 6 M1070 Oshkosh heavy-duty semi-trailers. Ukraine received 8,000 cartridges of 40 mm caliber, 74,000 cartridges for high-precision HLR 338 rifles, 100,000 cartridges for small arms, 55,000 tourniquets and 100,000 occlusive bandages. As ArmyInform reported, by the end of the year Ukraine will receive from Germany sixth air defense system IRIS-T.

Title: The enemy attacked the most in the south of Donetsk region - the General Staff of the Armed Forces o...
Description: Operational information as of 16:00 on November 20 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces . The occupiers continue to use aviation, in particular dropping air defense systems, and carry out attacks in all directions of the east and south of our country. The defense forces are holding the lines and taking the necessary measures to prevent a defense breakthrough. The occupiers do not stop using artillery on the territory of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. Areas of Yablunivka, Sydorivka, Oleksandria, Velyka Pisarivka, and Volfine settlements of the Sumy region came under enemy fire; Lemishchyne, Kharkiv region; Leonivka, Chernihiv region. According to currently available information, Russia carried out 9 airstrikes on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, using 15 anti-aircraft missiles. Today, in the Kharkiv direction, our troops repelled two Russian attacks in the Vovchansk and Staritsa areas. Five assault actions of the invaders were stopped by our soldiers near Zagryzovy, Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Zeleny Gayu in the Kupyansk direction. On the Lymansky direction, the enemy is attacking in the areas of Cherneshchyna, Zarychny, and Terni. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been 6 clashes in this direction, one of which is still ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy actively used bomber aircraft, in the area of ​​the village of Chervone, they dropped four anti-aircraft missiles. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops four times in the area of ​​the Toretsk settlement. The enemy also dropped two aerial bombs in the Kostyantynivka area. Today, in the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders 15 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Krasny Yar, Lyskivka, Yuryivka, Zhovte, Petrivka, Dachenske, Hryhorivka and Pushkine settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction, our defenders repelled 12 skirmishes in the areas of Berestki, Zorya, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka settlements. Nine enemy assaults have already been repulsed by our defenders, three more battles are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, 20 enemy assaults were stopped near Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, and Novodarivka, and four more assaults are still ongoing. Today, the enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orihiv, Gulyaipil, and Siver directions. In the Dnieper direction, our soldiers repulsed the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army three times. As reported by ArmyInform, last day at the front was recorded 139 combat clashes.

Title: Come out without a weapon! — our special forces captured three occupiers
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 20 on the unit's channel. Our assault group advanced through the forest to the positions of the Russians. A dugout was spotted in which the Russians were sitting. Our sniper took a place from which he could control the entrance to the dugout. After that he opened fire. The Russians tried to shoot back, but soon expressed their desire to surrender. Under the control of our sniper, the occupiers left the dugout and replenished the exchange fund.   As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -kurshhyni/->hit dozens of units of enemy armored vehicles.

Title: The enemy has been shelling a border village in the Chernihiv region for two days with tanks and art...
Description: This was reported by Vyacheslav Chaus, the head of the Chernihiv ODA. The occupiers hit the village with mortars and use drones, inflicting tank attacks. As a result of the enemy's attack, two houses were destroyed, the buildings of the church and the kindergarten were damaged. There was no information about the victims. According to ArmyInform, in the evening of November 19, a Russian missile hit to the administrative building in Pryluky. At the beginning of the week, another provocation by the occupiers was defeated. Enemy saboteurs set up their flags near the border in Chernihiv Oblast, on the destroyed bridge over the Sudost River. After detecting the Russian symbols, the border guards promptly directed the drones at the target, which destroyed the -rags- with precise strikes.

Title: On the -fields- behind the -laws- — the occupiers tried to attack in cars
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the brigade's channel. -When the enemy runs out of BMPs and tanks, even -fields- begin to move during his banzai attacks. But no matter what they invent, the result is always the same - destruction. High-quality work of the 98th battalion,- commented personnel in the brigade. The video shows that the -fields- were equipped with EW systems, but this did not save them. After the column stopped, the infantry were methodically knocked out with resets. Thus, Russians lost their lives and -fields-, but their relatives will be able to buy -lads-. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 97th battalion of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade showed the consequences of enemy -meat assaults- on their positions.

Title: Reward for destroyed enemy equipment: a new survey has started in the Army+ application
Description: About this notified Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov on his Facebook page . -We are investigating how one of the key social guarantees is implemented - a reward for destroyed or captured enemy equipment,- he noted. According to the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, during almost 3 years of large-scale invasion, our defenders destroyed almost 100,000 units of enemy equipment. For this, military personnel are entitled to a cash bonus or additional leave. The purpose of the survey is to understand whether the military knows about this right, how it is implemented in practice, and what difficulties they face. -Previous surveys in Armiya+ have already shown their effectiveness: the opinions of the military influenced changes in training, food and service conditions. Now we want to hear you about important social guarantees,- the minister said. The survey will last 14 days. Based on its results, the Department will prepare specific recommendations to improve the implementation of the military's right to remuneration and leave.

Title: To fly into the air with landing - guided bombs hit the positions of the Russians in the South
Description: The video of the attack was released on the Internet. Light bombs GBU-39 have a weight of 130 kg and can be hung up to eight units per aircraft. The warhead of the bomb is 90 kg. The bomb is guided by an inertial system or GPS. The video shows the accuracy of the bombs, which fly right into the landing.   As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 114th tactical aviation brigade interacted with the drones of the 422nd battalion of unmanned systems of the SBS of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces strike on the equipment storage and shelters of the occupiers on one of the operational directions.

Title: Poland is preparing the 45th package of military aid to Ukraine
Description: This was announced by the head of state in his Telegram channel. The President thanked the Polish people for their solidarity with Ukraine since the first days of the full-scale war. Separately, he expressed his gratitude to Donald Tusk for his principled position regarding the latest Russian shelling and Russia's attempts to break out of international isolation. The parties discussed the continuation of defense cooperation. The Prime Minister of Poland said that his country is preparing the 45th package of military aid to Ukraine and is already working on the next one. The topic of Poland's presidency of the EU Council in the first half of 2024 was also touched upon in the conversation. Zelensky expressed hope for Poland's support in opening the first cluster of negotiations on Ukraine's accession to the EU and advancing this process. The President separately thanked Tusk for advocating Ukraine's accession to NATO and efforts to ensure further defense support. The leaders agreed to meet before the end of this year to further discuss key issues of cooperation. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Denmark discussed an increase in military support and financing of the military opk.

Title: Russian shelling does not stop in Kherson Oblast: the terrible consequences of the attacks
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. At night, the occupiers shelled a residential building in the Shumen district. One of the shells hit an apartment building, destroying one of the houses. The windows of the neighboring apartments were broken. In addition, a garage and a private car came under fire. The Russians attacked Novovorontsovka with the help of drones. As a result of the explosion, a 56-year-old man received a shrapnel wound to his leg and an explosion injury. At the same time, Bilozerka was hit by rocket artillery - more than a dozen shells damaged about twenty residential buildings, a shop, a pharmacy, as well as critical infrastructure. In the morning, the enemy attacked the humanitarian aid delivery point in Novodmitrivka. The shell hit the roof of a building where volunteers were distributing bread. The facade, roof were damaged, windows were broken. A Russian drone also tried to attack the benefactors' car, but was hit nearby. Russian troops used artillery, mortars, drones, helicopters and cluster munitions, striking about 70 of the population. Residential buildings, commercial structures and vehicles were damaged. A 52-year-old local resident died as a result of shelling in Tokarivka. His body was found at the impact site. A 17-year-old girl and a 48-year-old woman were injured in Kherson, who received explosive injuries and contusions. Another victim - a 59-year-old man with an explosion injury - is under the supervision of doctors. Also, around 2:00 p.m., occupation forces attacked Komysany. Two people who were in the yard of the house were injured due to enemy shelling. The -ambulance- brigade took a 59-year-old woman to the hospital, who received an explosive injury and contusion. Another 73-year-old woman was treated by medics on the spot. She has an explosive injury and a contusion. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day, two people, another 15 were injured.

Title: Payments during gatherings and those released from service: social protection of conscripts and rese...
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is about payments to those released from military service, guarantees during military service and simplification of the change of residence. The relevant resolution initiated by the Ministry of Defense was adopted by the government at its meeting. Intelligence agencies will pay a monthly stipend to those released from military service due to age, health, downsizing or organizational measures without pension rights. Payments will be made within a year after dismissal in the amount of salary for a military (special) rank. Also, the intelligence agencies will reimburse the average salary to enterprises, institutions and organizations in which the citizens summoned to the meeting work. And conscripts who did not work on the day of the draft will receive payments in the amount of the subsistence minimum. In addition, persons who are on military registration in intelligence agencies are given the right to change their declared place of residence through the Diya portal.

Title: The GUR refuted fake reports about -massive strike-
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. A message about the threat of a -particularly massive- rocket-bomb attack on Ukrainian cities today is being spread through messengers and social networks, allegedly on behalf of the GUR. This message is a fake, it contains grammatical errors typical for Russian information and psychological operations. The department urged to trust information only from official resources and from spokespeople of the Ministry of Education and Culture. -The enemy, unable to subdue Ukrainians by force, resorts to measures of intimidation and psychological pressure on society. Please be vigilant and persistent. Do not ignore air raid signals - it is safer to wait in shelter. However, we urge you not to panic,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy Fakers increasingly refer to the American think tank -Institute for the Study of War- in their fictional stories -for convincing-.

Title: Time for revenge — drones destroyed 69 enemy shelters and carried out 72 remote mines
Description: The video of the combat work was released on November 20 by the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which was called the battalion -one of the most effective divisions of unmanned systems in Ukraine.- In general, during the period from 12.11 to 18.11, the unit destroyed or damaged:   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 412th battalion of Nemesis unmanned systems of the Forces of unmanned systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -vizytu-nashogo-drona/->aimed at an enemy truck that was moving through the field.

Title: The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Denmark discussed increasing military support and financing ...
Description: This is stated in the minister's message on the Facebook page. -First of all, I thanked Denmark as one of our key defense partners. Yesterday, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Prime Minister of Denmark Mette Frederiksen announced a new military aid package for Ukraine. This is another strong evidence of Denmark's solidarity with our struggle for freedom,- the minister noted. Rustem Umyerov and Troels Lund Poulsen discussed further cooperation for 2025, in particular, increasing the amount of military support to 2.2 billion euros. This assistance will be the basis for training our teams and equipping them with modern equipment. Special attention was paid to joint projects in the field of defense industry. Ukraine continues to demonstrate the effectiveness of its own developments, in particular its missile program, such as the Neptune, and attack drones, which allow for precision strikes thousands of kilometers deep into enemy territory. -We highly appreciate Denmark's support through the -Danish model- of financing the Ukrainian defense and industrial complex. This initiative has already proven its effectiveness, and we agreed to continue its development. Denmark's leadership in this matter is an example for other countries!- said Rustem Umyerov. The key focus of the negotiations was the new investment initiative - -Danish Model 2.0-. This format provides for mutually beneficial cooperation, which will include investments in defense and technological companies of Ukraine, acceleration of the supply of weapons, as well as Denmark's access to modern technologies. As reported by ArmyInform, Denmark will provide Ukraine 130 million euros for the development of the defense industry.

Title: -On character- they retook their positions and captured the Russians: a successful assault near Tore...
Description: The commander of one of the assault groups recorded on video the dynamic sweep and capture of the prisoner. The enemy desperately tried to stop our soldiers with drones, but to no avail. High-quality training, planning and motivation of the knights played a decisive role. As a result of the successful operation, the positions remained under the control of our defenders, two occupiers were eliminated, two more surrendered, and the rest fled. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of the day on November 20, actively using bomber aircraft in the Toretsk direction, -38-atak-voroga-genshtab-zsu/-> the enemy carried out eight attacks near Toretsk, Druzhba and Shcherbinivka.

Title: In Odesa, the number of dead as a result of the Russian attack on November 18 has increased
Description: This was notified by the mayor of Odesa, Gennady Terekhov. Doctors desperately fought for his life, but the injuries were very severe. Thus, the number of dead has increased to 11. Earlier it became known that among the dead were 7 policemen, a medic and two local residents. Civilian infrastructure in the middle of the city was damaged: residential buildings, educational institutions and motor vehicles. The day before, it was reported that the number of people injured as a result of a Russian missile strike had increased to 47 people. According to the information of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the enemy attacked Odesa ->ballistic missile -Iskander-M-, which was shot down by anti-aircraft defense. Debris of the rocket fell into the residential sector.

Title: Firewood for hell — our drones discovered the good combustibility of Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video was released on November 20 on the brigade's channel. The invaders were hiding in the building where our drone arrived. After the explosion, another drone conducted reconnaissance and filmed the bodies of the Russians, some of which were engulfed in flames. -As practice shows, the Rusna burns very well,- commented personnel in the brigade.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Shershni Dovbush- strike drone company of the 68th Yegeri Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush nipped in the bud the attempt of an enemy assault.

Title: A new award was introduced for the soldiers of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -For ...
Description: This was reported to the DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The award is called -For Assault- and will be awarded exclusively to servicemen who have participated in a combat mission two or more times as part of assault groups in the conditions of close combat to capture enemy objects, while showing personal courage, determination and professionalism. This award is a distinction of the commander of the Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It has an oval shape, the perimeter of which covers a classic wreath of laurel branches one leaf wide, symbolizing victory and honor. In the center of the insignia is a trench knife, which pierces the enemy's defense line and symbolizes that assault actions are carried out (take place) in direct contact with the enemy, in close combat, in a trench, etc. A silver-colored trench knife that pierces the line of defense symbolizes the success of assault (offensive) actions. At the bottom of the badge is a plaque with the inscription -For the assault-. This inscription emphasizes that the award is given for personal participation in assault actions. The commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk, has already approved the Regulations on the new award -For Assault- by his order.

Title: Intelligence and defeat at strategic depth: Brave1 hosts a hackathon for developers
Description: This was notified by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to the results of the hackathon, the winning teams will be determined, which will receive support for further development and implementation of their own solutions. Participants can be IT specialists, engineers, developers, scientists and everyone who has ideas and desire to create technological solutions. Registration for the hackathon link. The deadline for registration is November 30. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the platform of the Brave1 cluster is already over 3000 registered developments from over 1400 Ukrainian developers. The cluster is actively developing innovations at the front and has already issued 373 grants worth more than UAH 382 million for scaling up development.

Title: Barista-palium: in Vinnytsia they detained an agent who -reported- in the messenger
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the military counterintelligence of the SBU, the agent was gathering information about one of the Kyiv thermal power plants, on which the occupiers planned to carry out a combined attack using missile weapons and kamikaze drones. He also tried to identify the radar stations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which protect the airspace of the capital region, in particular over thermal power plants. In addition to carrying out enemy missions in Kyiv region, the traitor tried to set fire to transformer substations on the railway in Vinnytsia region. However, the military counter-intelligence of the SBU exposed the perpetrator, documented his crimes and arrested him in hot pursuit after trying to set the transformer on fire. As the investigation established, the young man was remotely recruited to the Russian game in October of this year. During the searches, a mobile phone with an anonymous chat in the messenger, through which he -reported- to his Russian curator, was seized from the traitor. Investigators of the Security Service informed the agent of suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Vinnytsia Regional Prosecutor's Office. As reported by ArmyInform, from the department to the camera: associate professor--guy- received a personal residence for 15 years, but there is a nuance.

Title: Such a greeting from Kim: the State Security Service spoke about the dubious combat capability of me...
Description: Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Igor Skybyuk, if it is 10,000 soldiers, it is a -resource- for no more than 10 days. In general, Koreans in the Kursk region testify to only one thing. -About the crisis. I think they had to agree on this under difficult conditions, making concessions, giving some bonuses, humiliating themselves openly. The combat capability of these military units is rather questionable, given the specifics of North Korea. Let's see what they are worth,- said the commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Earlier ArmyInform reported about increasing shelling of the Ukrainian border, building up minefields along the northern border of Ukraine and reckless assaults with the aim of knocking out units Defense Forces of Ukraine from the Kursk region - these are the symptoms of the -disease- of the Russian troops as a result of the Kursk operation.

Title: Ruins and wounded: the consequences of enemy strikes on populated areas of Donetsk region
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky District: Kramatorskyi District: Bakhmutskyi District: According to the head of OVA, it was possible to evacuate 158 people from the front line, of which 16 are children. As reported by ArmyInform, Kharkiv is on fire: 10 injured as a result of the attack on the gas station.

Title: The WZT-3 armored recovery and evacuation vehicle was put into operation in the Armed Forces
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The armored vehicle is designed for the evacuation of heavy armored vehicles from the battlefield and its repair in the field. BREM WZT-3 was made on the basis of the T-72 tank, a powerful crane, a winch, an electric welding machine and other repair equipment were installed instead of the tower. In addition, BREM can carry out fencing, carry out earthworks for the arrangement of positions. From the armament, the WZT-3 has two machine guns of 12.7 and 7.62 mm, tracking systems. The Ministry of Defense reminded that manufacturers and developers of anti-aircraft samples with additional questions regarding the process of codification of products can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense codified and allowed for operation in units of the Defense Forces all-wheel drive -broneavtomobil-zubr/->armored car with increased cross-country ability -Zubr- and remotely controlled module -Pernach- /a> domestically produced.

Title: Unified register of servicemen: the Ministry of Defense explained the advantages
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Minister of digitization Kateryna Chernogorenko. -When the Ministry of Defense did not have a Reserve+, there was already a register of Military Conscripts. Now that the Ministry of Defense has the Army+ application, the need for a full-fledged registry for military personnel has finally arisen,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. The Verkhovna Rada today voted on draft law No. 12066, which provides for the creation of a register. She explained that the registry will store all the necessary, but for security, limited information about the military in one place and will be able to quickly provide it on request from other state registries. Military ID will be used to exchange information within the systems of the Ministry of Defense. This is a digital number that ensures the confidentiality of the military's personal data and is already used in the Army+ application. In addition, all data collected in the registry will not contain sensitive details of your life. Only the most important minimum to allow you to quickly issue a vacation or submit a report for financial assistance. -The creation of such registers is the first and most important step in the digitalization of any sphere of life. A reliable electronic foundation must be laid in order for the military to be able to do their service, not with papers,- the Ministry of Defense explained. As reported by ArmiyaInform, last week a service was launched in the Army+ application, which makes it possible to change the place of service for soldiers in the Armed Forces. During this time, more than 1,500 relevant reports. Of these, more than 500 were fully approved.

Title: -A slap to Putin's regime-: the State Security Service explained what the Kursk Offensive is
Description: Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Igor Skybyuk, in addition to the fact that the Kursk operation shackled the 50,000-strong enemy group, it is important because it showed the enemy's weakness. -When we started our operation, their reserves were so slow. They did not roll over with regular vehicles, but in some collective car convoys, groups. This showed the insufficient amount of combat equipment in their units. It was such an assessment. I didn't expect that. This is such a slap in the face to Putin's regime,- Ihor Skybyuk said. As reported by ArmyInform , how Russian troops changed their tactics in Kurshchyna.

Title: The Verkhovna Rada clarified the rules for deferment for the families of fallen soldiers
Description: This was reported by People's Deputy Yaroslav Zheleznyak. Bill No. 12104 eliminates legal uncertainty regarding the granting of deferment from military service to those citizens whose close relatives died or went missing during hostilities. 304 People's Deputies voted for the relevant decision. The draft law No. 11531 provides equal rights for female military servicemen, equating them with men in terms of the right to deferment or exemption from military service. The law applies to cases of the death or disappearance of their half-brothers or sisters during hostilities. The bill was supported by 308 people's deputies. According to the people's deputy, this is the third correction of errors in the legislation on mobilization, which arose due to inconsistency of wording in previously adopted laws. As reported by ArmyInform, the Verkhovna Rada in the second reading adopted draft law No. 12023 on amendments to the procedure for military service under contract by foreigners and stateless persons. 276 deputies voted for it.

Title: Air defense forces stopped a large-scale attack: Russia released 122 -Shahedy- over Ukraine
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The occupiers also fired guided aerial bombs and released 122 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of an unspecified type from the regions of Kursk, Orel, Primorsko-Akhtarsk — Russian Federation. The air attack was repulsed by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 11:00, two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles and 56 enemy UAVs have been shot down in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Poltava, Kirovohrad, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, Sumy, Mykolaiv, Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Donetsk, and Kharkiv regions. As a result of active countermeasures, 58 enemy UAVs were lost in various regions. Six drones left the airspace of Ukraine: five — to Russia, one — to Belarus. As reported by ArmyInform, The Minister of Defense awarded female defenders, which shot down the Kh-101 missile.

Title: In the Kyiv region, a new movie theater was opened for military personnel undergoing rehabilitation
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the event, the defenders watched the film -House of the Word- and talked with director Taras Tomenko, actors Nina Naboka and Gennady Popenka. Kinoprostyr will allow defenders to systematically watch Ukrainian tapes on a large screen with high-quality sound and image and communicate with the stars of Ukrainian cinema. The opening of movie theaters for Ukrainian soldiers in hospitals and rehabilitation centers is an initiative of the -Look Ukrainian!- Association, the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the -MHP Community- Charitable Foundation. As of November 2024, cinema spaces have been created in four medical institutions of Vinnytsia Zaporizhzhya, Khmelnytskyi and Kyiv regions.

Title: Servicemen of the Ukrainian Armed Forces became the first laureates of an international award from B...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the ZSU. The decision on the award was supported by the Chief of the Defense Staff of Great Britain, and the award itself was personally presented by the Ambassador of Great Britain, Martin Harris. Among the representatives who had the honor to attend the presentation were: -This recognition is an important step in supporting women in defense and we are proud to of our heroines!- — noted in the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov presented awards to the female calculation of the MVG for the downed Kh-101 missile with MANPADS.

Title: More suppliers of high-quality property for the Armed Forces: almost 70 applications have already be...
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Among them were requests for military research tests, clarifications, and applications for receipt of acts of compliance of rear property with regulatory and technical documentation of the Ministry of Defense. According to the results of the review of applications for acts of conformity, the Ministry of Defense issued 68 positive decisions. Currently, 22 applications are still pending. -The first results of the digital portal -MOU Partner- indicate the interest of manufacturers and suppliers in cooperation with the Ministry of Defense and the willingness of counterparties to meet modern requirements,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. In total, during the period from August 2 to November 18, 4,200 users viewed or used the MOU Partner platform. The main goal of the digital portal is to expand the range of suppliers of high-quality rear property for the needs of the Armed Forces, to establish effective communication between the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and manufacturers (suppliers), as well as to ensure maximum transparency in the procurement process. The Ministry of Defense will continue to improve the platform to ensure even greater efficiency of cooperation with business. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense launched a personal account for suppliers of the Armed Forces on the digital portal -MOU Partner-. Thanks to this, counterparties are able to monitor the status of their applications in real time. In the event of a change in status, the applicant will be notified by e-mail. In addition, the office will allow you to save the entire history of applications. The digital portal also has a chat for direct communication with site administrators.

Title: Hundreds of meters, sometimes meters: the DSHV told what they cost the enemy -meat assaults-
Description: Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Ihor Skybyuk, the enemy's losses are disproportionate to his gains. He -bites-, realizing his numerical advantage, and not surprising with military genius. We must understand that the enemy must be exhausted. -I advised everyone to take a ruler, look in kilometers, in hundreds of meters, sometimes in meters, how far and where the enemy advanced and what it cost him. Yes, it's a shame to retreat, but sometimes the tactical situation requires retreating to certain other lines,- said the commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces were crushed in the Kursk region, the Russians, who went on an assault with a whole convoy of armored vehicles -Akhmat-, named in honor of the father of the current Russian Gauleiter Ichkeria.

Title: Kharkiv is on fire: 10 injured as a result of the attack on the gas station
Description: This was notified by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. In particular, in the city of Kharkiv, the canopy of a gas station and one car were damaged as a result of shelling. 10 people were injured, five of whom were hospitalized. Also today, Russian troops carried out airstrikes near the villages of Chornoglazivka and Myronivka of the Zolochiv community. According to preliminary data, KAB aerial bombs were used. In Kupyansk, as a result of the FAB-1500 strike, at least 12 residential buildings were damaged. According to the head of the OVA, a series of shelling in Kupyansk damaged a private household and an apartment building. Two women, aged 47 and 59, were injured. In addition, as a result of shelling in Kupyansk, the buildings of three enterprises were damaged. Also, an enemy UAV hit an open area within the borders of Kupyansk. During the day, 95 people were evacuated from Kupyansk and Borivsk directions. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops covered Nikopol with -Hurricanes- and -Hrads-.

Title: The commander of the Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine explained how long-range strikes ...
Description: This information was confirmed on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- by Brigadier General Ihor Skybyuk , commander of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Igor Skybyuk, the operational level of the enemy's construction and our operational tasks will now correspond to the range of long-range weapons. -This will greatly complicate the deployment of its logistical bases and forces. This will make it difficult to base his tactical strike aircraft, army aircraft. It will significantly complicate the deployment of its reserves, control points - that is, everything will be within our reach,- said the commander of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. How reported ArmyInform, Lithuanian President Gitanas Nauseda supported the decision to grant Ukraine the right to strike military targets on the territory of the Russian Federation with long-range weapons.

Title: Transport froze, garbage does not disappear: communal collapse in -lnr-
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. According to him, the occupation authorities found a way to make a profit even from their own inaction - to fine local residents for garbage dumps that arose due to the failure of communal services. The crisis also affected transport. The buses that the Russian Federation handed over to Luhansk are parked in garages under the pretext of a lack of drivers — most of them have been forcibly mobilized. Local residents suspect that the equipment may have been partially returned to Russia, as private transporters with dilapidated vehicles that barely work have increased on the streets. The occupation administration demonstrates an inability to provide basic communal services, which only worsens the living conditions of local residents. As reported by ArmyInform, from December 1, 2024, the passports of the so-called LNR, which the Russians have been forcing residents to receive since 2014 will be invalidated.

Title: Border guards interrupted a night rendezvous of two residents of Vinnytsia near the Romanian border
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. A response team immediately went to the area. Thanks to aerial surveillance, the violators were quickly apprehended. They turned out to be residents of the Vinnytsia region, who admitted that they planned to illegally cross the border at night. The detainees were taken to the border unit, where they were brought to administrative responsibility under Article 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses (-Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine-). ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian troops covered Nikopol from -Hurricanes- and -Hrads-
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Destruction was recorded in 10 private houses, two farm buildings and power lines. The explosions damaged the gas station and the gymnasium yard. The attacks were carried out with artillery shells, Grad salvo fire systems, kamikaze drones and ammunition from drones. Nikopol, Myrivska, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska and Pokrovska communities came under attack. On Kryvorizha, the enemy shelled the Zelenodol community. Fortunately, there were no casualties, and experts continue to assess the extent of the damage. On the night of November 20, the occupiers fired at Nikopol from the Uragan anti-aircraft missile system. The destruction of two private houses, two garages and a power line was also recorded in the Dnipro district. There are no dead or injured. Local authorities are urging residents to be cautious and follow safety rules during the shootings. As reported by ArmyInform, Zaporizhzhya 415 times a day shuddered from the Russian blows.

Title: The alarm lasted for more than 11 hours: the consequences of the night drone attack on the Kyiv regi...
Description: This was notified by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. -Air defense forces worked in the region. Enemy targets destroyed. There are no victims among the population. No hits to critical or residential infrastructure were allowed,- the message reads. Currently, a kindergarten, a school, three administrative buildings, two shops, and agricultural machinery have been damaged in one of the settlements as a result of falling fragments of downed enemy targets. Windows, doors and roofs were damaged in the buildings. Operational services continue to work on fixing the consequences of the enemy attack. As reported by ArmyInform, in the evening of November 19, a Russian missile hit the administrative building in Pryluky.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: In uniform and on the training ground: Valery Zaluzhnyi attended the training of the Ukrainian milit...
Description: The Ambassador of Ukraine wrote about this in his Telegram channel. During the visit, high-ranking officials noted the determination and fighting spirit of Ukrainian defenders. The training program, organized by Great Britain in cooperation with other countries, aims to prepare the Ukrainian military to perform the most difficult tasks at the front. This initiative was an important contribution to strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities and increasing the effectiveness of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine is on the decisive stage of its struggle for independence, and Great Britain remains one of the closest allies in this struggle.

Title: The enemy hit Pryluky with a rocket: there is a casualty
Description: This was reported by the head of Chernihiv OVA Vyacheslav Chaus. According to the head of the OVA, there is a wounded person. A 70-year-old man was hospitalized in Prylutsk Central Medical Center. In addition, the impact caused a fire in the administration building, damaged windows, and a car. Rescue workers, medics, and law enforcement officers worked on the spot. As Vyacheslav Chaus noted, the enemy shelled the territory of Chernihiv region 5 times during the day. A total of 22 explosions were recorded. As reported by ArmyInform, two people died in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling.

Title: GUR MOU: The command post of the troop group - north - on the territory of the Russian Federation wa...
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Residents of Gubkin observed thick black smoke, smelled it, and heard loud explosions. The GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reminds that for every crime committed against the Ukrainian people, there will be an adequate and fair retribution. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 19, units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces, caused fire damage to the arsenal of the 1046 logistics center in the district the city of Karachev, Bryansk region of the Russian Federation. On November 12, the Defense Forces inflicted fire damage according to the composition of fuel and lubricants -Oskolneftesnab-, located near the city of Stary Oskol, Belgorod region of the Russian Federation. Damage to such objects creates serious logistical problems for the army of the Russian invaders and significantly reduces their offensive potential.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the Defense Forces stopped 38 enemy attacks — the General Staff of the A...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 8:00 a.m. on November 20. On the Kharkiv direction the enemy unsuccessfully tried five times to penetrate the defenses of our defenders near Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, 11 attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kindrashyvka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Zagryzovo, Pershotravnevo, and Kruglyakivka. The enemy actively used aviation in this direction. In the Lyman direction, the enemy attacked 14 times. Tried to penetrate our defense near Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Hryhorivka, Torske and Terna. There was one skirmish in the Stupochki area in the Kramatorsk direction. Actively using bomber aircraft in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy carried out eight attacks near Toretsk, Druzhba and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 38 assault actions of the aggressor in the districts of Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Novotoretskyi, Yuryivka, Pustinka and Pushkini. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 23 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovoy, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, carried out 15 assaults on our positions near Kostyantynopolsky, Trudovo, Suhy Yaly, Rozdolny and Novodarivka. On the Orihiv direction, the occupiers attacked in the direction of Novoandriivka once without success. In the Dnieper direction in the past day, our defenders stopped two attempts by the Russian invaders to advance, the invaders received a tough repulse, suffered losses, and retreated. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Sumy region, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,690 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 27 armored combat vehicles, 49 artillery systems, 2 air defense systems, 91 operational-tactical UAVs, 2 cruise missiles, 100 vehicles and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: In the Kherson region, two people died as a result of Russian shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Veletenske, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Oleksandrivka, Stanislav, Novovorontsovka, Mykhailivka, Bilozerka, Gavrylivka, Tomarine, Poniativka, Vesele, Kozatske, Tomina Balka, Red Lighthouse, Komyshany, Sadov, Novoraisk, Trifonivka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. and the city of Kherson. The Russian military attacked the critical and social infrastructure of the region; residential quarters of settlements in the region. 5 high-rise buildings and 23 private houses were damaged by the blows. The occupiers also mutilated private cars. During a nighttime drone attack, the Air Defense Forces over the territory of our region destroyed one Shahed-131/136. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 415 strikes in 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Will the armistice save Ukraine: a military historian on a 100% repeat of Russian aggression in the ...
Description: -In this situation, only we can save us. Neither Euro-Atlantic integration nor even the return of territories will save us. We must clearly understand that as long as the Russian Federation exists, it will be an existential threat to us. And, accordingly, it will not disappear even in the event of a truce. I don't say -end of hostilities- because it's not likely to be a peace treaty, it's going to be an armistice. The truce, everyone should understand, is temporary in nature and can be broken for both objective and subjective reasons at any moment. Here it is necessary to understand and immediately prepare for how and for what we will use this truce, because we must clearly understand that any truce ends in the next war. Therefore, in this situation, the Ukrainian population, the Ukrainian political community, and the world community must understand that the time that will appear in our country after the conclusion of the armistice should be used to make the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the military-industrial complex of Ukraine even more powerful Because only this is a guarantee of avoiding possible future aggression of the Russian Federation. It must be said right away that the future aggression of the Russian Federation, or at least an attempt at aggression, is actually a 100% option. And the Russians will not hide even that. They will say that they have completed the objectives of their 1st and then they will start their 2nd. We have already seen this on the example of the anti-terrorist operation that was completed by the Minsk agreements. We know this because the Russians never keep their word and are proud of it. All diplomats in the world know about this. It is written about in all history and diplomatic textbooks, everyone studies it, but no one draws any conclusions. The Victory Plan is the requirements of the President of Ukraine, which are the requirements of the Ukrainian State and are the requirements of the Ukrainian people. There is nothing surprising in these requirements. We simply demand ours back. The question is how we will succeed, how the world community will help us in this. The Victory Plan, most likely, is not an attempt to issue an ultimatum, but actions so that the issue of Ukraine does not disappear from the agenda, so that it is constantly in the circle of interests and in the sphere of interests of the leading states of the world, so that we could continue to resist. No more and no less.

Title: Almost five dozen artillery systems and 1,690 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Uk...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 20.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, The Armed Forces stopped 130 attacks per day: Defense forces exhaust the combat potential of the enemy.

Title: The enemy is concentrating forces in the Black Sea: 6 ships with -Calibers-
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informed about this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, there are 3 enemy ships that are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 24 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 100% will be destroyed: in Russia, they understood the ineffectiveness of -Kalibriv-.

Title: Zaporozhye shuddered 415 times a day from Russian strikes
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 air attacks on Stepnohirsk, Lobkovo and Novodarivka. According to him, 190 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Olgivske and Novodarivka. In addition, 21 shellings from the MLRS covered Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka and Mala Tokmachka. As Ivan Fedorov noted, 200 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Primorsky, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Olhivskyi and Novodarivka. There were also 22 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. In addition, according to Ivan Fedorov's information, the Russians struck a village in the Zaporizhzhia region. Previously, they aimed at residential buildings. The consequences are currently being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, a search operation was completed in Gluhovi: Russian drones killed 12 people.

Title: The Minister of Defense awarded female defenders who shot down the Kh-101 missile
Description: The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov personally thanked the defenders for their contribution to security of the country by presenting them with the Ministry of Defense awards. A heroic operation was performed: -Your work protects our skies and brings victory closer. We are proud of you, your service and indomitability,- Rustem Umyerov noted during the meeting. This event once again emphasized the importance of professional training and coordinated work of the Ukrainian military in countering Russian aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, on the morning of November 17, an anti-aircraft gunner of the anti-aircraft missile unit of the Galicia-Volyn radio engineering brigade Natalia Grabarchuk destroyed a cruise missile from the Igla MANPADS. It was her first combat launch, and her first hit.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 130 attacks per day: the Defense Forces are exhausting the combat potential...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy carried out 51 air strikes (in particular, 78 anti-aircraft missiles were used) and 600 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out almost 3,500 attacks on the positions of our troops. Near Vovchansk in the Kharkiv direction Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units five times. The enemy dropped aerial bombs in the regions of Neskuchny, Visoka Yaruga and Nova Kozachoya. Eleven times the enemy attacked our fortifications on the Kupyansk direction near Kindrashyvka, Lozova, Petropavlivka, Zagryzovo, Pershotravnevo, and Kruglyakivka. Petropavlivka and Lozova were hit by airstrikes. The positions of Ukrainian defenders in the areas of the settlements of Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Hryhorivka, Torske and Terny were stormed by Russian troops 14 times during the day in the Lyman direction. The enemy dropped a KAB in the Raigorodka district. In the Seversk direction, the enemy dropped nine aerial bombs on Seversk and four more on Zakytne, and did not conduct offensive operations. One skirmish took place near Stupochy in the Kramatorsk direction. Stinky and Mykolaivka were hit by airstrikes. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers stormed the Toretsk, Druzhba and Shcherbinivka districts eight times. The opponent had no success. One battle continues in Toretsk. The enemy carried out airstrikes on Romanivka, Kostyantynivka and Sukhiya Balka. In the Pokrovsky direction the enemy carried out 37 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the districts of Promeny, Lysivka, Petrivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Novotoretskyi, Yuryivka, Pustinka and Pushkini. Four skirmishes in the direction are still ongoing. The enemy is intensively attacking our units in the Kurakhiv direction. Currently has 22 attacks. Terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalniy, Elizavetivka, and Antonivka, at the moment there is one battle near Sontsivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor, with the support of aviation, stormed the front edge of our defense 15 times near Kostyantynopolskyi, Trudovoi, Suhy Yalyi, Rozdolnyi, and Novodarivka. Four clashes are still ongoing. The enemy's attempt to advance in the direction of Novoandriivka on the Orichivsk direction ended in vain. In the Dnieper direction two enemy attacks were repulsed, the enemy was unsuccessful. The operation of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region is ongoing. Ukrainian defenders repelled more than 20 attempts by the occupiers to knock our units out of their positions. The department also honored Ukrainian soldiers from the 128th Separate Transcarpathian Mountain Assault Brigade, the 126th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, the 25th Separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade, the 71st Separate Hunter Brigade, and the 38th Separate Marine Brigade, who steadfastly restrain the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade showed >how installing EW helps protect military equipment from Russian kamikaze drones.

Title: In a flock or alone: ​​Israeli aircraft manufacturers are promoting an unmanned missile-carrying hel...
Description: How emphasized in their statement posted on the company's official portal, representatives of the company, this project is an example of unique cooperation between Steadicopter and Rafael and provides fast, maneuverable, accurate capabilities for striking heavy targets for tactical air operations, ArmyInform reports. The Golden Eagle HS unmanned rotorcraft is armed with powerful Spike missiles, which ArmyInform reported in one of its materials, designed for precision strike missions in a variety of environments, from tactical conflict zones to border protection, regional perimeter protection, and urban operations. These capabilities allow the wielder of this weapon to dominate the battlefield, providing an advantage, particularly in difficult or overcrowded areas. Experts of the defense portal Army Recognition point to the fact that, thanks to the integration of the Spike missile, the Golden Eagle HS helicopter ensures prompt and precise strikes on particularly important targets, allowing ground forces to operate from safe positions, regardless of time of day and visibility conditions. The Golden Eagle HS armament uses high-precision Spike missiles with the possibility of using -fire and forget- tactics. Equipped with a powerful warhead, this platform combines enhanced stealth with high combat effectiveness, expanding the tactical capabilities of assault forces. With a total take-off weight of 50 kilograms, Golden Eagle HS is compatible with Spike-SR missiles with a firing range of 2.5 kilometers and Spike-LR2 with a firing range of 5.5 kilometers, providing flexible applications thanks to a data link between the missile's homing head and the operator. These missiles belong to the sixth generation, capable of self-targeting with the help of an infrared homing head. As soon as the missile reaches the target, it destroys it with a powerful anti-tank high-explosive warhead capable of penetrating up to 70 cm of rolled armor. The Golden Eagle HS unmanned aerial vehicle is equipped with an advanced suite of sensors, including a high definition EO/IR tele/thermal imaging system for day and night use with target tracking capability. Integrated with advanced SightX artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the system can seamlessly detect, track and classify targets even in adverse weather conditions or difficult terrain. This advanced method of applying AI can distinguish between different types of targets, whether people or vehicles, providing ground forces with real-time situational awareness. -The launch of Golden Eagle HS in partnership with Rafael Advanced Defense Systems Ltd is an important milestone for Steadicopter,- said Itai Toren, CEO of Steadicopter. This unmanned aerial vehicle meets modern operational requirements, providing exceptional accuracy and the ability to launch strikes in autonomous mode. -Combining experience in the field of unmanned aerial vehicles of the helicopter type with Rafael's extensive experience provides the military with a solution that increases the effectiveness of its use on the battlefield.- In turn, a representative of the Rafael Corporation added: -Our collaboration with Steadicopter in the creation of this unmanned aerial vehicle meets the changing needs of modern warfare, where innovation and advanced capabilities are critical. This partnership will allow current and future users of Spike missiles to be more versatile and effective, potentially game-changing on the modern battlefield.- Golden Eagle HS is capable of operating both independently and as part of inconspicuous swarm groups launched from different points for combined attacks on important targets. This UAV helicopter from Stedicopter is a new step in the development of rotary unmanned systems that combine compactness, autonomy and powerful weapons. With its ability to destroy heavy equipment and provide reliable air support, this drone has every chance of becoming an indispensable tool for today's armed forces. Golden Eagle HS unmanned missile carrier helicopter. Video: Stedicopter

Title: F-16 as an air defense tool: how effective were the Fighting Falcons during the recent shelling of U...
Description: Is it a lot or a little within the limits of the general statistics of Russian air weapons used by the enemy and shot down by the Defense Forces of Ukraine? What enemy munitions could not be shot down by F-16 pilots? How effective are the -Battle Falcons- as a component of air defense assets? ArmyInform answers these questions based on official data of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported President of Ukraine, on the night of November 17, with the help of F-16s, about 10 enemy air targets were shot down, without detailing which exactly the aircraft managed to shoot down the pilots of the Ukrainian -Battle Falcons-. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also noted that, in total, during the previous week, Russia used more than 900 guided aerial bombs, more than 600 attack drones and almost 140 missiles against Ukraine. Of this number, about 120 missiles of various types, including Zircon, Iskander, and Kinjal, as well as about 90 drones, including Shahed, were used by the Russian invaders on the night of November 17. The President informed, that during a massive combined strike on November 17, Ukrainian air defense forces destroyed more than 140 enemy air targets - missiles and drones, and thanked to Ukrainian defenders, separately mentioning military aviation pilots who piloted various types of aircraft, including F -16: -We are grateful to all our air defenses, which were involved in repelling this attack: anti-aircraft missile troops, our aviation - pilots F-16, -susok- and MiGs, mobile fire groups, EW - all worked out in an organized manner. Thank you for the reliable protection!- Official statistics of the results of the combat work of the Air Defense Forces in repelling the record-breaking Russian combined air attack reported in Air The forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces - defenders of the Ukrainian sky shot down 102 missiles of various types and 42 unmanned aerial vehicles. If we take the number of aircraft shot down with the help of F-16 aircraft mentioned by the President - about 10 units - as a basis, we find out that the pilots of the Ukrainian -Fighting Falcons- shot down about 7% of all enemy air targets destroyed on November 17. Is it a lot or a little? Depends on what data we can operate on and what factors should be taken into account. Back in the summer of 2023, the then spokesman of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Yuriy Ignat noted that the F-16 as an air defense vehicle has limitations - fighter jets cannot shoot down ballistic missiles: -It can cover the sky from kamikaze drones and cruise missiles, that is, bring the percentage of shooting down closer to 100, now we have 70-80% - this is with strong Russian attacks, with the F-16 this figure can increase to the maximum Plus, it will allow us to use cheaper missiles.- In view of this, from the general list of munitions used by the enemy, those that the F-16 cannot shoot down should be excluded. These are ballistic, aeroballistic and hypersonic missiles. There are at least 10 of them: It should also be taken into account that a significant proportion of the air strikes used by the enemy on November 17 - 85 units - were Kh-101 and Kalibr cruise missiles. Kh-101 missiles can fire dipole reflectors as obstacles against radar-guided missiles. Missiles with infrared (thermal contrast) guidance on such small targets, equipped with a compact turbojet engine, work much worse than on airplanes and helicopters. One should also take into account the share of F-16 used to repel an enemy attack among other means of the Ukrainian air defense forces, which cannot be significant. In view of the above, the estimated 7% of enemy air targets shot down by F-16s during the massive combined strike of the Russians on Ukraine on November 17 is a significant indicator. It testifies to the high efficiency of the -Battle Falcons- as an air defense vehicle.

Title: A gun from Afghanistan, a 30-grade gunner and dreams of victory: how the calculation of the M777 gun...
Description: While they were waiting, a large shaggy sheepdog came out of the darkness very quietly. The dog sat silently next to us, looked up somewhere. Then he left as silently as the shadow of sadness of a small village of Donetsk region, not far from the front. Here, at night, only the constant cannonade of explosions from the front line and the sound of the engines of military vehicles can be heard. We get into a pickup truck, a car with a night vision camera drives us in the dark to the position of the artillery calculation of the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. We are met by the commander of the calculation on landing, we quickly move to the shelter, highlighting a red flashlight. A large, tidy dugout welcomes you with warmth and light. Two-story beds with dark army mattresses are lined up along one of the walls of the underground shelter. On one of the beds, everything lights up and shines, it is the equipment of a signalman - 45-year-old Taras with the call sign -Tarik-. He himself is from the Poltava region. In civilian life, he worked as a construction worker, installing gas pipelines and heating. He has been serving in the 148th brigade since April 2023. He speaks simply about his duties: there must be communication and light at the position, maintenance of equipment, batteries, generators, and transmitters. - A lot of work. Why might there be no connection? The reasons are different. Something can fly in, fragments can damage the generator, the walkie-talkie will break, the equipment sometimes fails, my job is to make sure everything works properly, - Tarik explains. He adds that civilian work is almost no different from army work. . -It's the same, only a little scarier,- says the operator with a smile. At home, Taras is waiting for his wife and two schoolboy sons. They often talk on the phone, the family supports. He recently returned from vacation, he says that everything is fine, but not enough, he would like to spend more time with his family. - The only wish is for the war to end as soon as possible and to return home. I have many dreams, but the biggest one is victory. Taras's brother approaches us and sits down next to us. He has a gray beard, a red flashlight sparkles on his head, cheerful eyes, as they say, -with beads-, he smiles and introduces himself. Anton is 44 years old, call sign -Baker-, a senior soldier, has the position of senior howitzer gunner M777A1. He has been in positions and performing combat missions for over a year. I joined the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in April 2023, from the city of Berdychiv. — In 2022, I was not drafted into the army, because I have four children, and in 2023, when my eldest son turned 18, according to the first the summons went to the military commissariat. I have an older son and a daughter from my first marriage and two more sons. At the time when I was drafted, my wife and I had not yet been registered, - says the artilleryman. He says that he likes to serve in the artillery. Training with work on this Pekar gun took place in Germany. — The training lasted 10 days. Why so fast? Howitzer M777A1 is easy to maintain. After completing the courses, he received a 30-grade gunner's certificate, he says jokingly. He recalls that he really liked Germany for its order and cleanliness, as well as food for the military. And they were also impressed by the roads. -The baker- was abroad for the first time. He is a bricklayer-plaster by profession, but he was a baker for many years, hence the nickname: -Peak bread, buns, cakes in Berdychiv in a restaurant-. Pekar speaks with pride about the Pekar gun, a very powerful and accurate weapon, everything depends on the gunner and the accuracy of the coordinates. — Zaporizhzhia is beautiful worked, a little less in Donetsk region. It happens differently: mostly 40-50 shots, but when it’s 10. Here you can’t guess how the enemy will attack, there’s an assault, if it’s -forbidden- so that they don’t climb, don’t forget who we are, then a few shots are enough, he explains he. It is admitted that the first time was terrible in the war. Now he already easily distinguishes where the projectile flies, how it flies and where. - At first it was scary. Now it's just flying in, it's commonplace. The hardest part of the job is carrying shells, and also moving from place to place, it's several days with almost no sleep, says the gunner. silhouettes The boys are stomping, because the morning autumn coolness gives the first breaths of the coming winter frosts. A quiet conversation, almost in a whisper, over coffee and a cigarette while waiting for the team to fight. The first, first pink, then more and more saturated yellow rays of dawn. Suddenly, the command: -To battle!- The gunners run to the gun, with coordinated movements everyone does their job: remove the masking, get the coordinates of the target, aim, load — -Shot!- , so as not to interfere with the calculation. Within a minute the gun is cloaked again, everyone goes back to the dugout to talk and finally see each other's faces and take some pictures. One of the guys looks like Jesus from the painting, the other looks like an athlete. They are smoking again, smiling, drinking coffee. 42-year-old sergeant Dmytro with the call sign -Lion- from the city of Dnipro commands the cannon. On May 19, 2022, he went to the Military Commissariat with his brother and best man, applied for the elite troops and got into the DSHV. — I thought that victory would come sooner. I had no idea what it would be like. And everything turned out as it should be, I became the gun commander. First, I got the position of a gunner after training, and then I was in the 95th artillery brigade, which was disbanded, and I was transferred to the 148th brigade. He passed sergeant courses, then training in Germany, he says. -Lev- proudly mentions that the Germans and Americans were shocked that in such a short period the Ukrainians learned everything so quickly. - We have a war, there is no time to study for half a year. We are -rexes- of the DSHV, he says. This is already the third gun of the crew. They worked on the first boy for a long time and even gave her the name -Lyalya-. - She worked like a clock mechanism. She never let me down, unfortunately, she stayed in another unit, that's how it happened. This one is a little cranky. I know that this gun fought in Afghanistan. The barrel was changed, and, consider it as new, some mechanisms were updated, then it will work as it should, says -Lev-. They have been fighting with this team for a year, they went through training in Zhytomyr Oblast. - There is also a young addition, Oleg came to us a week ago, the main thing is that he is motivated, he learned everything quickly. Currently, I can choose people for the team, only those who are needed here. Because an unmotivated person does not have time or energy to shout, argue, explain. This is a war, everyone must clearly understand why he is here, - the commander proves his position. He controls the entire process, records the coordinates, gives orders.
