As reported by ArmyInform, scientists and business have joined forces to clear the territories of mines and pollution.

Title: A shooting occurred in the Kyiv region during the implementation of warning measures
Description: This is inform the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It included, in particular, military personnel of the RTCC and SP, employees of the National Police and the -Municipal Guard- of the community. The alert group checked the documents of drivers and passengers of cars moving on community roads. During one of these checks, it turned out that the driver of the car was wanted for violating the rules of military registration. And the passenger of the same car ran out of it, hit the employee of the municipal guard and started to run away. An employee of the -Municipal Guard- who was hit ran after the man and fired a traumatic weapon. The victims are missing, the man fled in an unknown direction. Currently, all known facts are being checked. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is studying the information a> regarding the incident involving the use of a weapon by an employee of the territorial procurement center in Shchaslyvo.

Title: Digitization of mine action: work on a unified demining database continues
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. A working meeting dedicated to optimizing work in the field of demining was held in the office of mine countermeasures of the State Emergency Service. The event was attended by representatives of various departments, in particular People's Deputy Ihor Gerasimenko, head of the Administration of the DSST Oleksandr Yakovets, representatives of the Ministry of Defense and the State Emergency Service. Vitaliy Myronyuk, the first deputy head of the State Emergency Service, introduced the participants to the work of the office and the achievements in digitalization of the processes of responding to threats related to explosive objects. The main topic of discussion was the exchange of information between mine action actors and the creation of a single database on demining. As a result of the meeting, a number of decisions were made aimed at improving coordination and efficiency in the field of mine action. As reported by ArmyInform, scientists and business have joined forces to clear the territories of mines and pollution.

Title: The President of Ukraine spoke about the key areas of the internal stability plan
Description: About this he declared during the evening address. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized that these two aspects are fundamental for the protection of Ukraine in the face of Russian aggression. He emphasized the importance not only of providing defense but also of preserving and strengthening the nation after the war. The goal, according to the President, is to protect Ukrainians, both military and civilian, and to create conditions for the post-war recovery of the state and its people. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also continued international work, including diplomatic contacts, and noted that today he spoke with students from Latin American universities. The President emphasized the importance of people all over the world understanding the need to restore peace in international relations. As reported by ArmyInform, -Minska-3 will not happen - we need real peace-: The president reacted to the call of Sholcza to Putin.

Title: Digging for history, but digging up suspicion: Putin's archeologist caused damage to Ukraine in the ...
Description: notifies the Security Service of Ukraine about this. We are talking about the head of the archeology sector of the federal institution -State Hermitage- in St. Petersburg. In 2014, he led an expedition that was personally visited by Putin and that has been conducting illegal excavations at a Ukrainian cultural heritage site in Crimea for more than 10 years. In particular, the suspect's group conducted illegal excavations on an area of ​​hundreds of square meters, as a result of which the diggers removed the so-called cultural layer of the Ukrainian peninsula to a depth of almost 2 m. First of all, we are talking about the territory of the Ukrainian archaeological complex -Ancient City of Myrmekii-, located in the Kerch region. As the examination established, during the excavations, the rascals damaged the Ukrainian historical site and caused damage in the amount of more than UAH 200 million. On the basis of the received evidence, the archaeologist was informed in absentia about the suspicion under part. 4 Art. 298 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (illegal conducting of search works on an archaeological heritage site, destruction, destruction or damage of cultural heritage sites, committed for the purpose of searching for movable objects originating from archaeological heritage sites). Currently, the issue of declaring the figure on the international wanted list for prosecution for crimes against the cultural heritage of the thousand-year-old Ukrainian statehood is being resolved. Previously ArmyInform reported that a native of Kherson, who serves in the army of the Russian Federation, will be tried.

Title: The enemy does not stop attacking Nikopolshchyna: a utility company was damaged
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The occupiers shelled Nikopol, Myrivska, Pokrovska, Marganetska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. As a result of the attacks, infrastructure, a utility company and an economic building were damaged. Thanks to operational actions, the victims and victims were avoided. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zaporizhzhia from the Russian attack a man was fatally wounded in his own home.

Title: Occupiers collect money in schools for -their-
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. -Volunteers- from the Russian Federation forcibly collected money from the parents. At the same time, the children of the younger classes traditionally drew postcards to the Russian occupiers under the supervision of their teachers. high school students wrote letters under dictation. The responsibility for the propaganda action lies with the education department of the local occupation administration, as well as the -volunteer company of the fighting brotherhood.- All this is not only a means of brainwashing Ukrainian children, but also a demonstrative campaign of alleged local support for the occupiers. We remind you, military counterintelligence and investigators of the Security Service with the assistance of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the commander of the SSO detained a -de-canned- agent of Russian military intelligence (better known as a game).

Title: -Blood in exchange for territory-: the tactics of the Russians are completely similar to the Soviet ...
Description: Bohdan Petrenko, head of the department, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- communications of the 48th separate artillery brigade. According to Bohdan Petrenko, the invaders want to completely capture southern Donetsk region and advance to the north. To carry out this plan, they kill their soldiers by the hundreds. -This tactic is not much different from the tactics used in the Soviet Union - we throw hats. Blood in exchange on the territory. The only difference is that then it was frontal attacks, and now it is the tactics of small groups,- said Bohdan Petrenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South, the enemy is especially actively storming in the direction of Vremivsk, in the direction of Velika Novosilka.

Title: --Minsk-3- will not happen - we need real peace-: the President reacted to Sholtz's call to Putin
Description: He announced this during the evening address. The President of Ukraine emphasized that Putin's goal is to preserve the possibility of not changing anything in his policy. According to him, such a call may lead to new negotiations, which, in the President's opinion, will not lead to real changes in Russian policy. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that in the conditions of these challenges, Ukraine does not need Minsk-3, but real peace. -We understand all these challenges now. We know how to act. And we want to warn you: -Minsk-3- will not happen - we need real peace,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, in the temporarily occupied territories /->Russians are recruiting workers to assemble drones for their needs army.

Title: From the department to the cell: the associate professor--the thief--received a personal residence f...
Description: reports this by the Security Service of Ukraine. He spied on the Defense Forces and corrected Russian missile and bomb attacks on the city. As the investigation established, the attacker is a 50-year-old associate professor of a local university, who was recruited remotely by the invaders after the start of a full-scale war. His main task was to record the consequences of enemy -arrivals- in order to prepare new and correct repeated attacks by the Rashists in the regional center. The traitor also monitored the movement routes of the Ukrainian troops and the location of warehouses with ammunition of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. He transmitted the received intelligence to his Russian curator via messenger in the form of text messages and marks of potential -targets- on Google maps. SBU counter-intelligence detained the agent at the end of 2023 in his own apartment in Kharkiv. On the basis of the evidence collected by the Security Service, the intruder was found guilty under part. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). According to the SBU materials, the court sentenced him to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. We remind you, breakthrough of the border by the Russian DRG on Chernihiv Oblast was not, as well as -entering the village of Gremyach of Chernihiv Region- with Russian flags.

Title: Oleksandr Marchenko, a journalist and military officer of the Inform Army, was awarded the Order of ...
Description: This is stated in the Decree of the President of Ukraine No. 767/2024 - About the state awards of Ukraine to the employees of the -Ukrainian Radio- directorate of the -National Public Television and Radio Company of Ukraine- Joint Stock Company. So, for a significant personal contribution to the development of radio broadcasting in Ukraine, the popularization of national culture and musical art, significant creative achievements, high professional skill, and on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of Ukrainian Radio, the head of the editorial office of the main editorial board of the thematic programs of the creative -Ukrainian Radio- association of Oleksandr Marchenko. Previously, he worked as a producer of the -UA:Donbas- Regional Directorate. Oleksandr has been a serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine since last year. Olexandr Marchenko is currently part of the creative team of the Armiya Inform information agency.

Title: -The enemy wants to bind his soldiers with blood-: the reasons for show executions by the occupiers ...
Description: Maksym Golubok, head of headquarters, deputy commander of the 13th Brigade of the National Guard -Charter-. According to Maksym Golubek, the enemy wants to bind his soldiers with blood so that they do not surrender. At the same time, to frighten Ukrainian defenders. -They are trying to influence our soldiers psychologically in this way. Highlighting it in their social networks, spreading it through mass media, they think that our soldiers will review it and leave their positions on their own,- said Maksym Golubok. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the border zone in the north of the Kharkiv region, the soldiers of the Defense Forces reliably control tank-dangerous directions of possible enemy assaults.

Title: Norway joins the increased support for the defense industry of Ukraine
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. During the meeting, Rustem Umyerov thanked the government and people of Norway for the comprehensive support that the country provides to Ukraine, in particular for the support of President Volodymyr Zelensky's Victory Plan, which has the full support of all Scandinavian countries. The minister paid special attention to the security aspects of this plan and discussed steps to bring Ukraine closer to NATO. Separately, the issue of further support for the defense industry of Ukraine was discussed, in particular through cooperation within the framework of the -Danish model- of financing purchases of Ukrainian defense products. -This format of cooperation has already proven its effectiveness, and we must jointly strengthen it,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized, noting the importance of further support from Norway in strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov met in Oslo with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Norway Espen Bart Eide to discuss current security issues and further international support for Ukraine. We will remind, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived with a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway, Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system. November 15 Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Har Støre and discussed with him the situation at the front and the key needs of Ukraine, in particular strengthening our air defense ahead of winter.

Title: At TOT, employment centers are campaigning for locals to collect drones for the enemy's army
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. Drones are assembled in workshops at TOT. Employment centers created by the occupiers offer suitable work. Having created a humanitarian crisis in this way, the enemy is trying to use it to his advantage. Note that this is a violation of international law, which forbids the inclusion of residents of occupied territories in working for the invaders. However, the Kremlin once again shows contempt for the laws of war. We remind you that the Russian government has approved resolution on differentiated amounts of payments for combat injuries and mutilations.

Title: The Ministry of Defense published a Voluntary Report in the field of international humanitarian law
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In particular, it is about: Such reports are a global trend in recent years. It was started by Great Britain and continued by more than 15 countries. As the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk emphasized, the product of the Ministry of Defense is unique. Firstly, no state in the world issued this document during ongoing hostilities of such intensity. Secondly, the defense department of any country in the world did not issue it independently, in its own name. Thirdly, such a report demonstrates the openness of the Ministry of Defense policy in the field of IHL. -The Ukrainian Red Cross believes that the practice of writing a voluntary report with IHL is an important tool for ensuring transparency and accountability during armed conflict. As an auxiliary body of the state, we are glad that we were able to support this initiative of the Ministry of Defense,- said Maksym Dotsenko, General Director of the Red Cross Society of Ukraine. An important role in the preparation of the Voluntary Report of the Ministry of Defense was played by the Interdepartmental Commission on IHL of Great Britain. -This is an honor for me personally and the whole team. The publication of such a report, despite the significant challenges of armed conflict, is incredible. Such efforts provide Ukraine with additional tools for building a dialogue with other states and societies, demonstrating what the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is doing in the field of IHL,- said Andrew Murdoch, head of the UK Interagency Commission on IHL. The voluntary report of the Ministry of Defense is addressed to representatives of state authorities, international organizations, and the academic community both in Ukraine and abroad. It was first presented to the international community during the 34th International Conference of the Red Cross and Red Crescent in Geneva. It is the largest humanitarian site held every four years. -125 pages, 50 practical examples in 6 chapters is about systematicity and practice. This is our legal way of demonstrating to our partners the reliability of Ukraine in the use of transferred weapons and military equipment. This is a call for more decisive actions and political decisions regarding the provision of international military assistance to fight for common values,- said the Deputy Head of the Department of International Law of the Department of Legal Support of the Ministry of Defense, Lieutenant Colonel of Justice Inna Zavorotko. Voluntary report of the Ministry of Defense in the field of IHL is available English and in Ukrainian languages . As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense and NAZK developed recommendations for eliminating corruption risks in rear procurement for the Armed Forces.

Title: Business approach to treason: ex-tax employee who worked for the enemy during the occupation of Kupy...
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. According to the investigation, during the capture of Kupyansk, the accused voluntarily went to cooperate with the enemy. At that time, she held the position of senior state inspector of the Kupyan department for work with tax debt of the GU of the State Tax Service in the Kharkiv region. Already under the occupiers, she passed an interview and certification with representatives of the occupying forces for the position of -leading specialist of the department of registration and acceptance of reports of the Tax Service of the Kharkiv region.- She transferred the available data of taxpayers in the territory of the Kupyan district of the Kharkiv region to representatives of the Russian Federation and ensured the maintenance of databases of persons who live in the temporarily occupied territory and are forced to make mandatory payments to representatives of the occupation authorities. The traitor submitted information to the -Register of Entrepreneurs Without Legal Entities Operating in the Kharkiv Region-. If people did not agree to work according to Russian laws, they were warned that there would be trouble: business activities would be stopped, and premises and goods confiscated. In September 2022, before the de-occupation of the Armed Forces of Kharkiv Oblast, the suspect fled to the territory of the Russian Federation. The accused is wanted. She will be tried in absentia at the Chervonozavod District Court. Kharkiv The maximum sanction that threatens the defendant is life imprisonment. We remind you, will try a native of Kherson who serves in the army of the Russian Federation.

Title: The Ukrainian brigade completed training in France and received modern equipment
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. This is the first Ukrainian brigade that not only underwent training, but was also fully equipped by France within the framework of the EU military training mission for Ukraine. The French side provided Ukrainian soldiers with high-quality training: both general and specialized. In addition, the brigade received modern equipment and weapons, including armored personnel carriers, self-propelled artillery installations, trucks, situational awareness systems and other necessary equipment. -I sincerely thank the people of France and Defense Minister Sébastien Lecorne for their leadership and invaluable support. This strengthens Ukraine's defense capability and brings our joint victory closer,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. The minister also recalled that last month he personally met with Ukrainian military personnel who were undergoing training in France, and noted their high fighting spirit and level of training. In conclusion, Rustem Umyerov called on international partners to join such initiatives, taking the example of France: -Together we are stronger!- As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: NATO membership and air defense supply: key topics of Rustem Umerov's talks in Oslo
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov thanked the Norwegian government official for his recent visit to Ukraine and for the active assistance that Norway provides to our country in this difficult time. The parties discussed the prospects of supporting Ukraine on the way to NATO membership. According to Rustem Umyerov, the decision on Ukraine's accession to the Alliance is the best guarantee that Russia will never again pose a threat to our country. During the meeting, special attention was paid to the level of military aid for 2025. Among the issues discussed were the supply of air defense equipment, missiles, as well as the possibility of procurement for the Ukrainian military by the domestic defense industry. The minister emphasized the need for a quick and decisive response from the free world. -Together with our partners, we are able to stop the axis of evil led by Russia,- Rustem Umyerov stressed. As ArmiyaInform reported, Norway will join the -Danish format- of support — direct financing of production in Ukraine. We will remind, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived with a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway, Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system. November 15 Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Har Støre and discussed with him the situation at the front and the key needs of Ukraine, in particular strengthening our air defense ahead of winter.

Title: The paratroopers showed how they rescue the wounded at the checkpoint
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page. Each of their shifts is a struggle for life, moments of tension and concentration that do not allow them to lose any chance of salvation. Here they provide first aid to the wounded, stabilize their condition and prepare for further transportation. Experts tell how it is possible to work on the front lines so that every fighter has a chance to return home alive. It is about courage, resilience and boundless humanity in the most difficult conditions. We remind you, in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy is advancing in small assault groups - they are destroyed by tens or even hundreds.

Title: The attempt to bypass sanctions through the countries of Central Asia does not cover Russia's losses...
Description: About this notifies the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. In 2023, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan and Armenia increased their imports from the EU by an amount almost identical to the growth of their exports to Russia. In 2023, the import of goods from the EU by the EAEU countries increased by 45%, reaching 13 billion US dollars. At the same time, exports from these countries to Russia increased by 43%, reaching about 14.5 billion dollars. USA. In many cases, the goods are physically immediately sent to the Russian Federation, and through the countries of Central Asia, only a formal payment is made in order not to violate European sanctions. Kazakhstan is the best option for organizing parallel imports — the country is closer to Europe and has a long border with Russia. Exports from Kazakhstan to Russia increased by 31.2%, reaching $10.2 billion. USA vs. 7 billion dollars. in 2021. At the same time, in November 2024, Astana increased the terms of making payments from Russian businesses — from seven days to a month, demanding additional documents with data on senders and receivers of money. We remind you that the Russian government has approved resolution on differentiated amounts of payments for combat injuries and mutilations.

Title: In Zaporozhye, a man was fatally wounded in his own home by a Russian strike
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia OVA. According to him, the pensioner was in his house when Russian troops shelled the village. The man suffered fatal injuries as a result of the impact. We will remind, during the day the occupiers struck 466 blows on 12 inhabited points of the Zaporizhzhia region. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian attacks in the Kherson region: dozens of victims.

Title: SSO special operation in Kurshchyna: 16 comrades from the Defense Forces were rescued from the envir...
Description: The relevant video was made public by the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At two o'clock in the morning, SSO operators received the combat task of removing a group of servicemen from friendly units from the encirclement. Within two hours, the operators planned the task and advanced on two armored Humvees to rescue their comrades. The servicemen of the Defense Forces were successfully evacuated, for which they thanked the SSO operators. We remind you, since the beginning of the day, 109 combat clashes have already taken place.

Title: From Sloviansk to Kurakhovo: the President praised the courage of Tavri paratroopers
Description: announced President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The brigade participated in the defense of Slovyansk, Krasny Liman, Debaltsevo and Donetsk airports. At the beginning of the large-scale invasion, its fighters were in Luhansk region, later they inflicted significant losses on the enemy near Siverskodonetsk, defended Lyman and Maryinka. Currently, the soldiers continue to repulse the invaders in the Kurakhiv direction. For its combat merits, the brigade was awarded the honorary award -For courage and bravery-. Their slogan is -Strength in unity!- The President thanked the soldiers for their courage and struggle, which is bringing the victory of Ukraine closer. As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: Battle for the East: more than 100 Russian attacks per day, the Armed Forces repel the onslaught of ...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The situation on the front lines remains difficult. The Defense Forces of Ukraine direct efforts to disrupt the offensive plans of the Russian aggressor and destroy its personnel and equipment. Today, the communities of the settlements of Sumy Oblast, Chernihiv Oblast, and Kharkiv Oblast were affected by enemy artillery and mortar fire, including the settlements of Zhuravka, Leonivka, Grabovskoe, Pokrovka, Volfine, Leonivka, Timofiivka, and Ryzhivka. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy is trying to put pressure on our units in the direction of Visoka Yaruga, where the battle is currently ongoing, and the enemy has also stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region, where three attacks are ongoing. On the Kupyansk direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units five times in the area of ​​Kolisnikivka, Kopanok and Nadia. Four clashes are still ongoing. Ukrainian soldiers continue to maintain their defense. With the support of bomber aircraft in the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out nine attacks on Ukrainian positions near Novoyehorivka, Terni and Torsky. The fighting continues. The invader dropped anti-aircraft missiles on Yampolivka, Terny, Liman and Torske. In the Seversky direction units of the Defense Forces repelled an attack by Russian invaders near Verkhnokamyansk. Siversk and Ryznikivka were hit by enemy aircraft. On the Toretsk direction, eight enemy attacks took place in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka area. Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled six of them, the fighting continues, and the enemy is also actively using bomber aircraft in Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 23 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Petrivka, and Pustinka districts. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 17 enemy attacks, with six engagements still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 26 times near Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka. Ten attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The enemy also carried out an air strike on Kurakhovo, dropping two air bombs. In the Vremivsk direction four skirmishes take place near Trudovoy, Makarivka, Rivnopol and Novodarivka. During the day, five enemy CABs flew over Velika Novosilka. In the Orykhiv direction, the occupation forces are shelling the territory controlled by the Ukrainian government, targeting civilian infrastructure objects and populated areas. Five times the enemy tried to storm our defenders on the Dnieper direction. Operation in Kursk Oblast is ongoing. Enemy aviation and artillery continue to strike their territory. Today, Ukrainian soldiers repelled ten attacks by the invading forces, and clashes are currently ongoing in eleven locations. As reported by ArmyInform, a Ukrainian brigade completed training in France Anna Kyivska-.

Title: The situation in the Pokrovsk community is deteriorating, the enemy is hunting the civilian populati...
Description: head of Pokrovsk MBA Serhiy Dobryak told about it. -The other day, a family was attacked by a UAV. The son died. They were in their own car, which was hit by a drone. There is a hunt for people, so it is extremely dangerous to stay in the community. I will always thank all the residents who evacuated and took the children away,- he said. 11,500 local residents and 49 minors remain in Pokrovsk. As of today, Pokrovsk lives without centralized water supply, in some places without gas and 40% without electricity. There will be no heating season this year either. -The only correct way to save yourself and your loved ones is to evacuate,- added Serhiy Dobryak, the head of the Pokrovskaya MBA. As reported by ArmyInform, our defenders repelled 24 enemy assaults of varying intensity in the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Sukhy Yar, Pushkine, Zhovte and Pustinka settlements.

Title: In Shchaslyv, an employee of the TCC used a weapon: the Ministry of Defense has started an investiga...
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In order to find out the circumstances, the Main Inspection of the Ministry of Defense (GIMO) started checking the legality of the actions of the representative of the TCC and the grounds for using weapons. In the case of establishing the facts of exceeding official authority or identifying signs of a criminal offense, the materials will be directed to law enforcement agencies for further investigation and the adoption of appropriate decisions. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal of disbandment of TCC and SP.

Title: The Ukrainian brigade -Anna Kyivska- completed their studies in France
Description: This was announced by the General Staff of France on the social network Kh. The French side showed training footage and reminded that this is the first Ukrainian brigade trained and equipped in France. — The Joint Staff – Military operations (@FrenchForces) November 15, 2024 -Brigade -Anna -Kyivska-, prepared at the request of the Ukrainian army as part of the EU mission for the training of the Ukrainian military, illustrates France's strong support,- the message says. In the footage, you can see how the military of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are training bojovi-diyi-na-zaporizhzhi-ta-na-shodi/-> shoot from self-propelled guns CAESAR, fire from a machine gun at armored vehicles, with MANPADS, and also practice assault operations. France became the first country to fully prepare and equip an entire brigade of the Armed Forces with weapons and military equipment.

Title: 20 billion hryvnias for food for the Armed Forces: new tenders for 2025 have been announced
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Providing the military with adequate nutrition is not only a matter of health and comfort, but also a factor that directly affects the morale and combat effectiveness of our defenders. We must provide servicemen with high-quality and varied food, in particular by improving its quality and implementing modern standards and the latest technologies. We continue to improve all aspects of rear support so that the army has everything it needs to effectively carry out combat missions,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. Currently, tenders are announced according to the current model: the supplier independently determines the manufacturers of goods for the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At the same time, to improve the quality of products and strengthen control, the new contract already provides for a number of changes: detailing product descriptions, expanding the scope of audits and inspections, updating transportation requirements, revising fines, etc. Subsequently, it is planned to announce procurement for the new pilot procurement model, which was presented in September 2024. Framework agreements have already been announced this week for signal bidding for producers in certain categories, namely: vegetables and fruits, sausage products, meat, dairy products and fish. It is these categories of goods that have been selected as requiring increased attention in terms of quality. The pilot supply project will operate simultaneously with the current model in 2025 in five oblasts: Kyiv, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr, Cherkasy and Kirovohrad. Currently, the DOT is selecting counterparties for further qualification and holding, in fact, signal auctions, which are scheduled for mid-December. -This year, we are announcing purchases in advance, as early as November, to ensure continuity of supply for military personnel. The current logistics model is well-established, familiar and understandable to market participants, so it remains primarily in areas where the collision line passes. At the same time, the -pilot- has a number of advantages, which will allow to increase the quality control of goods and direct contact directly with producers,- said Halyna Litosh, director of the food program of the DOT. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine strengthens cooperation with manufacturers and suppliers of physical support for the Armed Forces.

Title: There is no threat of an invasion of Chernihiv Oblast, there was no breach of the border - CPD
Description: This was reported by the head of the Center for Combating Disinformation, officer of the Defense Forces Andriy Kovalenko. He noted that the Russians did not even cross the destroyed bridge from the border, so the information was a lie from the beginning. He also reminded that in June a very similar story happened with Ryzhivka in Sumy Oblast. -Someone appeared somewhere, took down the flag and ran away. There is no threat of an invasion of Chernihiv Oblast. There is an extremely limited threat of the DRG,- said Andriy Kovalenko. He emphasized that the story about Gremyach is false and is exclusively an information operation of the enemy. -At the same time, after such an informative story with Ryzhivka, the enemy lost Suzha in Kurshchyna,- Andriy Kovalenko recalled. On November 15, Russian propagandists spread information about the alleged -entrance- to the village of Gremyach. The DPSU denied this and noted that the enemy DRG planted a flag near the border on the destroyed bridge over the Sudost River.

Title: The Ministry of Defense explained whether a driver's license can be revoked for failure to appear on...
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In practice, a driver's license cannot be revoked due to such non-appearance. However, the law provides for the following: Temporary restriction of the right to drive can be applied to citizens who evade military duty only by a court decision. For this: The procedure for filing a lawsuit must include a detailed description of the requirements that must be met and documentary evidence of the citizen's evasion of duties. After considering the lawsuit, the court makes a decision on the temporary restriction of the right to drive transport only on condition of confirmation of the fact of evasion and non-fulfillment of military duty by a citizen. Therefore, the decision on the temporary restriction of driver's license is made only after the case is considered in court and upon confirmation of the violation of the requirements for the performance of military duty. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: dead and dozens injured
Description: This is reported by Khersonska ODA. Today, a woman died as a result of shelling in Antonivka. Also, Russian troops attacked the Ship district of Kherson, where a 49-year-old man received an explosive injury and a chest wound. A 74-year-old woman died in Veletenskyi as a result of a fire caused by a drone strike, and a 70-year-old man suffered minor injuries and carbon monoxide poisoning. In addition, the Russians shelled the central part of Kherson. The victim was a 39-year-old woman who was diagnosed with an explosive injury and an arm injury. In the Kherson region, the enemy will continue to strike with drones. A 72-year-old man was wounded in the legs in Odradokamyanka. In Sadovoy, a 44-year-old man suffered from an explosive injury and shrapnel wounds to his legs, and a 74-year-old local resident suffered a leg injury. A 53-year-old woman, injured as a result of a drone attack in Antonivka, went to the hospital. She was diagnosed with a blast injury and shrapnel injuries to her legs. Also, a 52-year-old woman with an explosive injury and contusion after the night shelling of Kherson went to the hospital. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of Russian shelling in the Kherson region last day 5 people were injured.

Title: - Does he drink vodka? And what will you dope the head with?- ― the Russian occupiers ponder over th...
Description: Record published by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In a conversation with characteristic stylistic nuances, the Muscovites also describe the principles of selecting personnel to participate in -meat- assaults - they send first of all those who are -raucous- and talk a lot. The authors of the conversation, it seems, also fully fall under the existing criteria. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense has codified and put into operation in the units of the Defense Forces, the all-wheel-drive armored car with increased cross-country ability -Zubr-.

Title: 155-mm DITA self-propelled guns will strengthen units of the Defense Forces
Description: This is notified by the National Guard of Ukraine. This makes this self-propelled gun effective both in terms of inflicting fire damage on enemy infantry positions and concentrations, and in counter-battery combat. Automation of most processes of control, guidance, charging allows two servicemen to manage it. Projectiles are fed automatically. And the armored crew cabin is additional protection for the personnel. DITA has a fairly high rate of fire — 5 rounds per minute. High cross-country ability makes it possible to quickly change position after completing a fire mission and to have maneuverability in difficult terrain conditions. Artillery units of the National Guard perform tasks on the battlefield quite effectively. The appearance of modern artillery installations such as -Bohdan- and DITA significantly increases the firepower of our forces and the effectiveness of defeating the enemy. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense has codified and put into operation in the units of the Defense Forces, the all-wheel-drive armored car with increased cross-country ability -Zubr-.

Title: The occupiers shelled Donetsk region 15 times a day: one person was wounded
Description: reports this by the head of the Donetsk OVA, Vadym Filashkin. Numerous high-rise buildings and private houses were damaged in Kurakhovo, 13 houses were damaged in Dachny. A house was damaged in Pokrovsk. A house was damaged in Zarichnoy, Lymanska hromada. One object was damaged in Romanivka of Illinivsk community. 9 buildings were damaged in Kostyantynivka, 5 more in Mykolaivka. A person was injured and a house was damaged in Shcherbynivka of the Torecki community. We remind you that in Chasovoy Yaru the enemy continues to invent various attempts to cross the Siverskyi Donets-Donbas channel, along which our line of defense runs.

Title: -Urban battles are hard and dirty work-: every day in Toretsk -minus- up to a hundred occupiers
Description: The spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU told about this on the broadcast of the -Yedini Novosti- marathon - Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, in the Nelipivka district, near Toretsk, the enemy recently used equipment. 12 occupants and 7 light vehicles were destroyed. In the city, the situation is even hotter. -Despite the fact that the equipment is not used in such battles, it does not look as hyped, it is not as impressive, but it is hard and dirty work. So that you understand, in one Toretsk we destroy up to a hundred enemies in one day. That is, 50-70 on average - on some days it is even more,- Anastasiya Bobovnikova said. Previously ArmyInform reported that the situation in Donetsk does not lose its tension - there are street contact battles in Toretsk and Nelipivka.

Title: The enemy tried to break through near Balka Zhuravka: the defense forces repelled the assault
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. The enemy struck the Serebrian Forest with unguided aerial missiles. From the barrel artillery, the enemy aimed at Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka. He directed 47 drones in the direction of these villages, 34 of which were in the Makiivka district. We remind you that on the night of November 15, yurij-ignat/-> Russia launched -Shahedy- over Ukraine, not unmanned drones of an unspecified type, as it has been doing lately.

Title: Norway will finance the production of Ukrainian weapons and equipment
Description: During the visit to Oslo, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov agreed with the Prime Minister of Norway Jonas Har Støre and the Minister of Defense Bjorn Arild Gram, reports MoU. Such an agreement will allow for faster production and delivery of the necessary weapons for our Defense Forces. In addition, the parties discussed a new format of cooperation - the -Norwegian model-. It is about a new model of investing in Ukrainian defense technology companies. Details of cooperation will be announced later. -I am grateful to Norway for its determination to support Ukraine and readiness to deepen our partnership,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived on a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system. November 15 Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Har Støre and discussed with him the situation at the front and key Ukraine's needs, in particular strengthening our air defense on the eve of winter.

Title: Optimizing spending on the Russian military is an indicator of the worsening economic situation in t...
Description: About this notifies the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. In the document, the development of which was responsible for a. civilian is Putin's niece, the maximum specified amount of one-time payment for serious injuries is three million rubles, for light ones - one million rubles, for other injuries - 100 thousand rubles. As a result, the government will save a significant amount of money — the share of payments for injuries in the overall structure of Russian military spending is approximately 12.5%. It should be noted that in 2023, Russian payments for the killed and wounded occupiers amounted to 85.6 billion rubles. Of them, approximately 40 billion rubles. the families of the dead were to receive, and the remaining 45.6 billion - the wounded. Before the adoption of the resolution on the differentiation of payments, each Russian military man had the opportunity to receive three million roubles. rubles regardless of the degree of injury. -Optimization- of military spending is dictated by the Kremlin's desire to save money for the war, and is a direct indication of the approaching economic crisis in the country. We remind you, the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine based on the results of the audit of enterprises and organizations that have the status of critical and have the right to reserve employees, made a decision to change the criteria.

Title: He tortured ATO veterans in the Kharkiv region: a native of Kherson, who serves in the Russian army,...
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. The accused is a native of the city of Kherson, who during the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation became the deputy commander of a separate assault battalion of the 101st rifle regiment of the 1st army corps of the 8th army of the southern military district of the Russian armed forces. Among the occupiers, he is known as -Grumpy-. The figurehead took a direct part in the capture of the Velikiy Burluk village of the Kupyan District. In the settlement, the occupiers set up a torture chamber in the basement of the local police station, where the accused became a -bystander-. He abused and tortured illegally detained ATO veterans and pro-Ukrainian citizens who refused to work for the occupation authorities. The accused beat them with his feet, hands and weapons all over the body, threatening to kill them. -Watcher- starved the detainees and did not give them drinking water. It is known that the figure has been fighting on the side of the Russian invaders since 2014. At the crash site of flight MH17, which was shot down by the occupiers, he presented himself as an employee of the so-called General Prosecutor's Office of the DNR. The accused is wanted. He will be tried in absentia in Chuguyiv city court of Kharkiv region. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of imprisonment from eight to twelve years.

Title: The Ministry of Defense and the Swedish delegation discussed the provision of military assistance in...
Description: This was notified in the MoU. The issues were discussed during a meeting in Kyiv between Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Serhiy Boyev and Brigadier General Johan Axelsson, Director of the Department of Testing and Evaluation of Technical Systems of the Swedish Government Supply Agency FMV. The deputy minister thanked for the military assistance already provided by Sweden. -Weapons and military equipment provided by Sweden have proven themselves excellently on the battlefield,- noted Serhii Boev. In addition, the parties discussed the issue of Ukraine's request for the Northern European countries to equip the units of the Armed Forces with armored vehicles, artillery systems and other weapons. The Ukrainian and Swedish delegations discussed which weapons Sweden can provide to the Armed Forces, in particular, what can be supplied free of charge or purchased and under what conditions. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Prime Minister of Sweden Ulf Kristersson discussed financing of Ukrainian production of long-range missiles and drones and support of the power grid in winter.

Title: Government has updated reservation criteria and criticality criteria: what's changed
Description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal reported this . First of all, the regional and industry criticality criteria of enterprises will now be agreed with the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Economy. Secondly, for the private sector, the salary criterion and the absence of debts to the budget are now mandatory points for the reservation of employees. In particular, the accrued average salary in the enterprise and for the booked employee must be at least 2.5 times the minimum salary. This will reduce the risk of abuse where companies employ a person for a -shadow- booking arrangement. All bookings from December 1 will be made through Diya. Monthly monitoring of enterprises and organizations will take place to ensure that they meet all criteria. The new procedure will be effective from December 1. For all those who already have deferrals, there will be a transition period to the new conditions until February 28. By this date, all businesses must renew their employee bookings according to the new terms, regardless of how and when it was made.

Title: The Ministry of Defense and the National Committee for National Defense have developed recommendatio...
Description: About this notified in the MOU. The Ministry of Defense is actively working to bring rear procurement to NATO standards. Therefore, the developed recommendations take into account the requirements of the Euro-Atlantic integration of Ukraine and are aimed at increasing the efficiency of procurement processes, in particular with an emphasis on ensuring transparency, competitiveness and responsibility. This year, the Ministry of Defense's rear procurement budget reached a record 73 billion UAH. During the martial law, it was possible to save 17.2 billion hryvnias, which made it possible to purchase additional amounts of food, fuel and tangible property. -Thanks to the involvement of 45 new Ukrainian manufacturers, we have strengthened the domestic market, and also laid the foundation for procurement in 2025, which will allow businesses to prepare for future trades. We are actively cooperating with NAKC to receive professional feedback and continue to improve rear procurement processes, increasing their efficiency and transparency,- said Hleb Kanevskyi, Director of the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense. The NAC study also takes into account the development of the Strategic Review of Defense Procurement, developed by the Ministry of Defense in cooperation with international experts within the framework of NATO's Comprehensive Assistance Package for Ukraine. Based on these recommendations, the Ministry of Defense is already forming a detailed action plan for the implementation of new standards that will meet high Euro-Atlantic requirements and help reduce corruption risks. The developed guidelines were prepared with the support of the Center for Integrity in the Defense Sector (CIDS) at the Ministry of Defense of Norway. The full text of the study is available on the NAZK website in Ukrainian and English.

Title: -Attacks under the blankets- instead of zombie assaults: the enemy changes tactics in the Temporal R...
Description: A representative of the press service of the 24th mechanized brigade told about this on the air of -Social News- named after King Danylo Andriy Polukhin. According to Andriy Polukhin, the occupiers are trying to adapt to the Ukrainian position inconspicuously. For this, special raincoats or blankets are used, which cover the thermal signal from Ukrainian drones and thermal imagers. -But when they get through and are able to get a foothold in one of the ruins, they're pretty much stuck. They cannot be approached, nor can they drop any supplies, nor provide any reinforcements,- said a representative of the press service of the 24th Mechanized Brigade named after King Danylo. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar, the Russian occupiers are not able to accumulate equipment - it is impossible to cross the canal, which is under the fire control of units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: President: It is necessary to destroy the instruments of terror on enemy territory
Description: This was stated President Volodymyr Zelensky, commenting on Russian air attacks, in particular, on Odesa. The President noted that Russia does not stop the shelling of Ukraine, the terror of our regions, peaceful cities and communities. Over the past day, the occupiers used artillery, drones and anti-aircraft missiles in Donetsk region, where a drone strike took one life, in Dnipropetrovsk region, Zaporizhzhia, Mykolaiv region, Kharkiv region, Luhansk region, Kherson region, Sumy region, and Chernihiv region. -Yesterday evening there was combined massive attack on Odesa. Missiles and drones. Residential buildings, a heating main, an educational institution, a church were damaged. The territory of the port was also hit. Unfortunately, one person died because of this terror. Ten more people were injured, including two children. We help everyone who needs it. Thank you to everyone who is involved in rescuing our people and eliminating the consequences,- the head of state said. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 14, the enemy poraneni/->delivered a massive blow with rockets and drones in the center of Odesa. As a result of the shelling, one person died and another 10 were injured, and there is destruction.

Title: At night, the Russian Federation attacked Odesa with attack drones, not simulated UAVs — Yuriy Ignat
Description: This was reported by the acting head of the Air Force Communications Department. Armed forces colonel Yuriy Ignat. According to his information, -Shahedy- flew to Odesa across the sea - from the Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation and the temporarily occupied Crimea. -It is the Shahedi, and not the -unidentified type- that constantly flies from the north mixed with real strike drones,- Yuriy Ignat noted. He added that this caused significant consequences from the attack in Odesa, as even downed attack UAVs with warheads pose a danger. -Odessa is attacked often - ballistics, anti-aircraft missiles, cruise missiles and attack UAVs. The densely built-up city and the urbanized area significantly complicate the work of anti-aircraft defense, but the percentage of shooting down remains high. Unfortunately, not everything that flies can be shot down over the sea!-, Yuriy Ignat wrote. He noted that the Air Force continues to inform the population about threats from the air on Telegram and WhatApp. -Since the fate of Telegram in Ukraine is uncertain, we have to provide ourselves with additional platforms for communication and information about aerial threats. The Ministry of Digital Affairs recommended and assured that Viber is now completely safe and does not have Russian control,- – the message says. Therefore, from November 19, 2024, the PS of the Armed Forces will be additionally informed in Viber. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 14, the enemy poraneni/->delivered a massive blow with rockets and drones in the center of Odesa. As a result of the shelling, one person died and another 10 were injured, and there is destruction.

Title: Rustem Umyerov met with the Prime Minister of Norway: they discussed the needs of the Armed Forces o...
Description: This is stated in the minister's message on the Facebook page. The meeting discussed the situation at the front and key needs of Ukraine, including strengthening our air defenses ahead of winter and opportunities for Norwegian investment in the Ukrainian defense industry. Rustem Umerov thanked the head of the government and the people of Norway for the new aid package of 500 million euros. -This is an important support that we greatly appreciate. Norway stands with Ukraine in this difficult time, and we are grateful for their help and solidarity,- – said the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 14, Rustem Umyerov arrived on a working visit to the Kingdom of Norway, where he met with the Minister of Defense of Norway Bjorn Arild Gram. The delegations discussed important issues of bilateral cooperation, in particular, ways to develop and strengthen the Ukrainian air defense system.

Title: The Ministry of Defense allowed the armored car -Zubr- to be used in the Defense Forces
Description: About this reported in MOU. This armored vehicle is multifunctional and distinguished by mobility, maneuverability and compact dimensions. The armored car has a reinforced independent suspension and excellent driving characteristics, which allows it to move at relatively high speeds through difficult terrain. Shallow water obstacles are also not a problem to overcome on this armored car. The armor and design of the -Zubra- ensures the protection of servicemen against damage by small arms and minimizes injuries to the driver and passengers when the car is blown up by a mine or an enemy mine. The design of the car allows you to install additional weapons systems, use it to transport personnel and evacuate the wounded. The Ministry of Defense reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment, who have questions about the codification process, can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine codified and approved for use in units of the Defense Forces, the remote-controlled -Pernach- module of domestic production.

Title: In most cases, 100% will be destroyed: in Russia, they understood the inefficiency of Calibers
Description: This was told by the spokesman of the Naval Forces Ukrainian Armed Forces captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. According to Dmytro Pletenchuk, the enemy is analyzing the situation and has realized that some weapons are ineffective. Yes, Calibers, as a separate type of weapon, are not used for a long time. -Only during combo attacks. When there is an air attack - to supplement it, to load our air defense - they can use Calibers. Knowing perfectly well that in most cases 100% of these missiles will be destroyed,- Dmytro Pletenchuk assured. As reported ArmyInform, Russia is forced to raise large forces for air defense and other military infrastructure to maintain control over the temporary occupied Crimea.

Title: It turned out to be a canned mole: the detained commander of one of the units of the SSO
Description: This is stated in message of the SBU. The attacker turned out to be a lieutenant colonel, commander of one of the units of the Special Operations Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, who was recruited by the occupiers even before the start of a large-scale war. In the spring of 2024, it was remotely -activated- by a personnel employee of the Russian game and defined the task: to transfer the plans of combat operations of the Defense Forces behind enemy lines to the Russians. The aggressor was most interested in intelligence about sabotage and reconnaissance raids by Ukrainian special forces behind the front line in the Zaporizhzhia, Kherson and Crimean directions. To carry out the enemy's task, the -mole- used his official position, thanks to which he received information about the planned routes of movement of the soldiers of the Defense Forces, their weapons and -targets-. The occupiers planned to use this information to eliminate Ukrainian special forces on the front line or outside its borders - in the temporarily captured part of the territory in the south of Ukraine. Also, the agent -leaked- data on other units of the Defense Forces to his Russian curator. As a result of the special operation, the military counter-intelligence of the SBU gradually documented the traitor's crimes and arrested him. At the same time, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the locations of the Defense Forces. According to the investigation, the person involved was recruited by the military intelligence of the Russian Federation through his acquaintances in Russia, with whom he maintained contact. During the searches, conspiratorial means of communication, computer equipment, a mobile phone and data storage devices were seized from the detainee. The investigators of the Security Service informed him of the suspicion under part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property.

Title: -Lined- in -pixel-: invaders dressed in Ukrainian uniforms are effectively detected on the battlefie...
Description: This was told by the commander of the Achilles unmanned aerial systems battalion on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- Captain Yury Fedorenko of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh chieftain Ivan Sirk. — There is an algorithm, I will not tell the general public about it. This is always difficult, but it is achieved through negotiations and tactics on the battlefield, directly taking control of this or that representative who is in the form of a -pixel- but unknown to you, he said. The military man emphasized that the insidious tactic of dressing up in the enemy's military uniform is not new for the Russian military. — This tactic for the enemy is not new. It is used by them from other wars in which the Russian Federation took part, the officer said. The commander of the drones explained the main goal of the invaders. - In the last year, we can watch quite richly when the enemy wears a -pixel- and tries to infiltrate into our rear communications in order to sow chaos in the rear and introduce the maximum imbalance as possible, - said Yuriy Fedorenko. However, occupiers who are -red- in the -pixel- are detected quite effectively. - We know the [enemy's] tactics, so such cases are becoming fewer and fewer every day. Systematic work in order to distinguish between -own and foreign- is carried out and sufficiently well implemented in the Defense Forces. It will be different in each aspect, for the sake of truth, but the vast majority of commanders clearly understand and are aware of how it should be done and how to teach the personnel to distinguish between -own and foreign-, - emphasized the commander of -Achilles-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that under the cover of thick fog, the Russians managed to penetrate to the outskirts of Kupyansk, but all armored vehicles and infantry the enemy landing force in the city destroyed the Defense Forces.

Title: The Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Justice returned almost 3,500 hectares of land and real ...
Description: About this notified in the MOU. The violation was discovered during the systematic monitoring of state registers. To restore legal rights to property, the Main Department of Defense Lands and Funds of the Ministry of Defense sent more than 15 complaints to the Ministry of Justice. As a result of their consideration, the illegal registration actions were canceled, and the land plots returned to the disposal of the defense department. -Protection of state property is one of our priorities. We are making every effort to prevent the illegal alienation of defense lands and other military property belonging to Ukraine. Together with the Ministry of Justice, we are actively working to guarantee the return of these assets to the state,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The head of the Anti-Raiding Office of the Ministry of Justice of Ukraine, Ivan Korodyuk, emphasized that the return of state property, especially defense lands, is a fundamental issue for the protection of Ukraine's national interests in the face of Russia's ongoing armed aggression. -We pay special attention to the consideration of complaints regarding registration actions that could lead to illegal alienation of state assets. The Ministry of Justice, together with the Ministry of Defense, actively uses all available legal mechanisms to return property to the state. We stand guard over the interests of the Ukrainian people and will not allow anyone to seize state resources contrary to the law,- Ivan Korodyuk stressed. Previously, the Ministry of Defense, together with the State Geocadaster, restored the state's rights to 69 land plots illegally removed from the state fund. 30 of them were returned thanks to cooperation with the Ministry of Justice of Ukraine. The Ministry of Defense continues to cooperate with the Ministry of Justice to protect state interests and prevent illegal removal of property from state ownership.

Title: Pilots against saboteurs: DRG break into Sumy Oblast, they are knocked out abroad
Description: About it on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- said Andriy Demchenko, spokesman of the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to Andrii Demchenko, the activity of enemy sabotage and intelligence groups has now decreased, but the enemy has not given up attempts to penetrate. They cross the border most often in Sumshchyna. -All units of different components of the defense forces act together. They use various technical means and surveillance of local areas and unmanned aerial vehicles in order to timely expose such groups and knock them out of our territory,- said Andriy Demchenko. ArmyInform reminds that border guards The Mukachevo detachment detained 11 people who tried to illegally cross the state border in the Ukrainian Carpathians.

Title: How many Russians die in afforestation: the number of enemy corpses per 200 meters was counted in th...
Description: This was told by the commander of the Achilles unmanned aerial systems battalion on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- Captain Yury Fedorenko of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh chieftain Ivan Sirk. — The defense forces, in a united and coordinated work, manage to significantly destroy the enemy's shock-assault potential. In one of the landings, its length is up to 200 meters, 139 occupants were killed during a certain period of time, he said. The military emphasized that such losses of the occupiers are completely disproportionate to the minor tactical successes they manage to achieve. — Now the plantings are very clearly visible, because the leaves have fallen. Imagine what the enemy is suffering while trying to achieve tactical results and tactical successes on the battlefield. The losses are disproportionate to the results the enemy got, the officer emphasized. It should be noted that in the calculation carried out, it is only about the bodies of those dead enemy soldiers that the occupiers did not manage to evacuate. The number of wounded is also not taken into account. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that under the cover of thick fog, the Russians managed to penetrate to the outskirts of Kupyansk, but all armored vehicles and infantry the enemy in the city was destroyed by the Defense Forces.

Title: The Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces told how the Russians collect resources for their defense in ...
Description: This was told by the spokesman of the Armed Forces Navy, captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk on the air -Public Radio-. Dmytro Pletenchuk noted that in connection with this, the Russians are even diverting resources from other directions, trying to protect their strategic infrastructure in Crimea. -They constantly, especially before the period of storms, maximize all means. These are hydrotechnical structures, these are pontoons, these are various extensions. Last year, for example, 10 to 14 ships and boats were guarding the bridge at the same time. Now there are zero of them. They translate that into the aerial component,- he said. According to him, for defense against unmanned boats, the occupiers use, for example, helicopters, first of all. Because they have approximately the same speed and, accordingly, it is easier to patrol such an area on them than on an airplane. Ukrainian troops also continue to work actively to block Russian warships trying to pass through the Kerch Strait. Although Ukraine has officially closed the area to civilian shipping, Russian ports on the Sea of ​​Azov continue to operate, providing international trade. Ukraine, in turn, does not touch civilian vessels that comply with international standards. -This is also an important case, which for some reason is not often mentioned. But trading ports, for example, in the same Temryuk, in Azov, continue to work. Yes, the occupied ports of Berdyansk and Mariupol are illegal, as are the Crimean ports, of course, but those ports on Azov, which officially belong to the Russian Federation, continue international trade. And you see, we do not touch the civilian vessels that enter there. Although it is actually the Kerch Strait, it is officially closed by Ukraine, which had the right to do so,- Dmytro Pletenchuk said. As reported by ArmyInform, the ships of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation >do not enter the waters of the Black Sea due to a number of factors, the enemy uses only aviation.

Title: Kurshchyna: our marines destroy elite Russian soldiers
Description: The destruction of the enemy and equipment was demonstrated by the 36th separate brigade of marines named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi. -Kurshchyna. Russian generals send their elite soldiers to slaughter. We continue to do our hard work,- the message reads. In the footage, you can see the destruction of Russian armored vehicles during an attempt to storm our positions, and the destruction of enemy infantry by drone operators. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the fighters of the 225th assault battalion showed na-kurshhyni/->consequences of the assaults when the command of the Russians sent 5 assault columns one after the other along the same route, observing by the methodical destruction of each.

Title: Up to 70 magnetic -strays- per night: remote mining from a UAV is carried out by -Achilles-
Description: About how mines with magnetic sensors work on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyvi- the commander of the unit told Captain Yury Fedorenko. — This -stray- is not new at all. It was conditionally secret for a very long time, but after certain events that took place, the enemy already understands what we apply, what we use. Therefore, we have come out of the shadows and are already collecting on it officially. It's very simple, he said. The military emphasized how important remote mining is for destroying the enemy. — The amount of equipment the opponent has <…> it is necessary to stop not only FPV drones, night bombers, means of fire influence - guns, anti-tank means. Mining itself plays a very significant role, the officer emphasized. The commander of the drones explained how explosive devices with magnetic sensors work. — Dangerous zones are irradiated, in particular, due to the use of unmanned systems, so as not to risk engineers, sappers, and people. For this, it is necessary to have a certain sensor, which then comes into action when a lightly armored, armored vehicle or just something made of metal passes by, he explained. Yuriy Fedorenko reported how much one sensor costs and how many mines Achilles drones can set per night. — One sensor costs 1,200 hryvnias. Sometimes we can deliver up to 70 min per night. It happens differently. You can calculate the cost yourself, but it is very effective in terms of efficiency, he said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The defense forces reliably control tank-dangerous areas in the north of Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: 5 injured in Kherson Oblast due to Russian shelling
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Sadov, Prydniprovske, Komishany, Inzhenerne, Kizomys, Stanislav, Veletenske, Romashkov, Dar'ivka, Beryslav, Havrylivka, Novovorontsovka, Tomarine, Mykhailivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. the Russian military targeted a critical infrastructure facility, a post office and a store. Hits were also recorded in residential quarters of populated areas of the region, in particular, 12 private houses were damaged. The occupiers mutilated the gas pipeline and the gas distribution station. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 14, the enemy poraneni/->delivered a massive blow with rockets and drones in the center of Odesa. As a result of the shelling, one person died and another 10 were injured, there is destruction.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Two rockets and 29 Shahedovs: the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the details of t...
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy used two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles from the Black Sea area, and also attacked with 29 Shahed type UAVs from the Primorsko-Akhtarsk region - Russian Federation. As of 08:30, the shooting down of one Kh-59/69 guided air missile and 25 attack UAVs was confirmed. The vast majority of air targets were shot down in Odesa. Anti-aircraft defense also worked in the Mykolaiv, Kirovohrad and Ternopil regions. -As a result of the enemy attack in Odesa, houses, cars and property of citizens were damaged, the victims are provided with assistance. Do not ignore the air alert, take care of yourself and your loved ones,- stressed the PS of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, late in the evening of November 14, the enemy poraneni/->delivered a massive blow with rockets and drones in the center of Odesa. As a result of the shelling, one person died and another 10 were injured, there is destruction.

Title: The Russians penetrated to Kupyansk thanks to the fog: the enemy tank, 2 MTLB and the landing party ...
Description: This was told by the commander of the Achilles unmanned aerial systems battalion on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- Captain Yury Fedorenko of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh chieftain Ivan Sirk. — Taking advantage of weather conditions and fog, the enemy managed to drive near a residential building - this is Livoberezhny Kupyansk. But it was detected in time, he said. First, the fighters of the Defense Forces first knocked out the enemy's armored vehicles. — A convoy of three pieces of equipment — one tank and 2 MTLB — were destroyed by the Defense Forces, the commander of the Ukrainian drones reported. Then, within a few hours, the enemy infantry who tried to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the city were also destroyed. Those who managed to hurry were also eliminated within the next 5-6 hours. As of today, there is no enemy in Kupyansk Livoberezhny. The situation is very difficult, but the Defense Forces have it under control, the military officer emphasized. Yuriy Fedorenko reminded that the Russians had already failed to capture Kupyansk by November 1 and now expect to do it at least before the New Year. - Every day and every night there is fierce resistance, because the enemy is trying to complete the task. Initially, he had until November 1 to take control of Kupiansk-Vuzlovi, Kupiansk Livoberezhny. Now the deadlines have shifted, the enemy did not complete this task, now they have to complete the task before the New Year, said the commander of -Achilles-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The defense forces destroyed the invaders , who tried to gain a foothold in Kupyansk.

Title: Defense forces repelled 37 attacks in the Kurakhiv direction
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 08:00 on the 15th November According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy launched one missile attack on the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas, using two missiles, 50 air strikes, using 103 air defense systems. In addition, he fired more than 4,000 shots, 92 of them from MLRS. In the Kharkiv direction four enemy attacks took place in the area of ​​the settlements of Hlyboke and Vovchansk. According to detailed information in the Kupyansk direction the occupiers carried out 11 attacks. The defense forces stopped all enemy assaults in the areas of Golubivka, Petropavlivka, Pischany, Hlushkivka, Zeleny Gayu, Zagryzovy, Kruglyakivka, Pershotravnevoy, and Lozova. In the Lymansky direction, our troops repelled 9 attacks by invaders near the settlements of Katerynivka, Druzhelyubivka, Nevske, Terny and Torske. At the same time, the enemy carried out airstrikes in the area of ​​the Serebryan Forest. On the Severskyi direction Ukrainian defense forces repelled two assaults near Verkhnyokamyanskyi. With the support of aviation in the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy once tried to break through the defenses in the area of ​​the settlement of Predtechine. Near the settlements of Diliivka, Toretsk, and Shcherbynivka in the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched 11 attacks. In addition, he actively used bomber aircraft. Our defenders repelled 24 enemy assaults of varying intensity in the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Sukhy Yar, Pushkine, Zhovte and Pustinka settlements. Enemy attacks on the Kurakhivsk direction The defense forces repelled in the areas of the settlements of Berestki, Sontsivka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Zorya, Dalne and Kostyantynivka, where the occupiers tried to break through the defenses of our troops 37 times. The enemy actively used bomber aircraft in the Vremivsk direction, during which our defenders repelled 12 attacks by the occupiers in the area of ​​Makarivka, Yantarne, Rivnopil, and Novodarivka settlements. On the Orihiv direction, two combat clashes took place near Novodanilivka. Four attacks by the occupiers were unsuccessful in the Dnieper direction. On the Volyn and Polissky directions the operational situation has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. Our soldiers continue to actively inflict losses in manpower and equipment on the invading troops, exhaust the enemy along the entire line of battle and in the deep rear. In general, in the past day, Ukrainian defenders -dobu/->destroyed 1,520 Russian invaders. Also, the enemy lost 11 tanks, 21 armored combat vehicles, 20 artillery systems, 2 air defense systems, 34 operational-tactical UAVs, 1 cruise missile, 77 vehicles and 16 units of special equipment.

Title: The Army+ application has a function of submitting a report on a change of service location
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -Now servicemen of the Armed Forces can quickly and without unnecessary bureaucracy submit a report for transfer to another unit,- the minister noted. The process is as convenient as possible and takes only about 15 minutes. What is important to know: In case of refusal to Army+, clear reasons must be given.
