We have to wait until either the civilian disappears or the enemy moves to another place, - explained the soldier. Moreover, the Russian occupiers deliberately and specifically use civilians as human shields. - Unfortunately, the enemy also knows that we treat our civilians this way. Sometimes it happens that [the enemy] resorts to vile acts, taking cover of civilians, settling in civilian houses. They settle and do not drive civilians out of their houses, they force them to live on, but they themselves settle in basements and in this way protect themselves, because they know that at this time nothing will fly into this house, - said Anton Baev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The defense forces destroyed the invaders , who tried to gain a foothold in Kupyansk.

Title: The President thanked the Sicheslav paratroopers who are holding positions in the Pokrovsky directio...
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state in the telegram channel. The 25th separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade has been on the frontline of Ukraine's defense since 2014. Sicheslav paratroopers are the only ones in Ukraine capable of parachuting almost in full force, together with equipment. Even before the full-scale invasion, the brigade gained considerable combat experience. Battles for Slovyansk, Krasny Liman, Donetsk airport, Avdiivka, Shakhtarsk, liberation of populated areas of Donbas. From February 24, 2022, the 25th Airborne Division is hitting the enemy no less decisively. The soldiers counterattacked in Kharkiv Oblast and liberated Izyum. Now they are fighting in the difficult Pokrovsky direction. -I thank the defenders for their service, for every position they took, no matter how difficult it was. Glory to all who fight for Ukraine!- said the President. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, our defenders repelled 40 attacks on the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance in the vicinity of Sukha Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka.

Title: Ilyinka in Donetsk region is controlled by the Defense Forces of Ukraine — StratCom of the Armed For...
Description: This was reported by StratCom of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the outskirts of Ilyinka, battles with the enemy are constantly ongoing, but our units are firmly holding their positions. It is also reported that information about the alleged presence of Russian troops in the city of Kupyansk, Kharkiv Region not true. -We ask you to carefully check the information and trust only official sources,- - emphasized the StratCom of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, the Russian occupiers -hvyli/->made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyansk direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored combat vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The Defense Forces named the reason that makes it difficult for the enemy to move in the Kharkiv reg...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air -Society.News- Volodymyr Degtyarev, Public Relations Officer of the 13th operational assignment brigade of NSU -Chartiya-. -The weather worsens and makes it difficult for the enemy to move, but at the same time it makes it difficult for both the enemy and us to use UAVs. They are trying to use this to restore their reserves,- he said. The spokesman explained that the units of the brigade constantly monitor such movement of the enemy, destroy his personnel and fortifications. -If we compare with October, when we destroyed 208 enemies, then in just two weeks of November, 40 occupiers were already destroyed and 75 wounded. And given their lack of evacuation, the wounded will turn into the dead,- he said. Volodymyr Degtyarev explained that Ukrainian units are keeping the logistics routes of the occupiers under fire control. In addition, the enemy has limited use of heavy equipment. -There have been no mass attacks for several weeks. We hit the enemy's hidden equipment. They mainly use cars or motorcycles to move,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, enemy propaganda information that the enemy has allegedly gained a foothold in the city of Kupyansk, Kharkiv Region, not true. On November 13, the Russian invaders made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyansk direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored fighting vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Fiery extraction - our drones showed how a damaged Russian armored personnel carrier gets rid of a b...
Description: The video was released on the battalion channel. a Russian armored personnel carrier with a landing party tried to break through to our positions at speed, but was hit and caught fire. By inertia, the armored vehicle continued to move, and Russian attack aircraft began to fall out of it, burning and smoking. Then there were also successful defeats. -All the armored vehicles of the next column of Russians in Kurshchyna were destroyed. Currently, the operation to destroy the remnants of the landing is underway. The battle is held by several brigades of the Defense Forces, cooperating harmoniously and effectively,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 225th assault battalion showed na-kurshhyni/->results of the assaults, when the command of the Russians sent 5 assault columns one after the other along the same route, observing the methodical destruction of each.

Title: FPV application research, training programs for DELTA and -Nettles-: the first successes of the new ...
Description: About this reported in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. During this time, its specialists: In general, specialists of the unit implement projects in 4 areas: training and education, collection and analysis of combat experience, development of concepts and their verification, as well as development of proposals for doctrines and standards. The unit was created as a prototype of the Center of Excellence of Robotic Operations (COE RO, Center of Excellence of Robotic Operations). -Modern warfare requires modern knowledge to create an asymmetric advantage at the front. The Best Practices Unit will help build this advantage. The expertise and suggestions of specialized specialists will help not only to make the work of systems and technologies more efficient, but also to create new tactics to deter Russian invaders,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. The unit and its staff are actively working to provide Ukrainian soldiers with knowledge of the application of information and robotic systems to protect the country. Specialists of the division of advanced experience of robotic operations call for the cooperation of manufacturers of robotic systems for the joint development of the implementation of innovative solutions on the battlefield. E-mail for appeals: coero@cidtd.mil.ua

Title: Defense forces destroyed the invaders who tried to gain a foothold in Kupyansk
Description: This was announced by the head of the Countering Disinformation Center, officer of the Defense Forces Andriy Kovalenko. According to him, enemy units attempted to gain a foothold in the city, but Ukrainian defenders destroyed them. -As of this morning, the situation is under control of the Defense Forces,- Andriy Kovalenko emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, the Russian occupiers -hvyli/->made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyan direction. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored combat vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. Some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Pro-Russian forces are preparing provocations to discredit TCC and SP in Europe
Description: These rallies are planned to be held on November 17 in Dublin and Berlin at the same time as actions of -good Russians- led by Yulia Navalna and Ilya Yashin -against Putin's war-. Therefore, it is possible that the Russians are behind the organization of these provocations and will make the necessary picture for the Russian media with -war-weary- Ukrainian protestors. took place in the capital of Ireland on October 27. Molfar Agency analysts have already identified of pro-Russian protesters who gathered in Dublin. These are separatists who fled Ukraine abroad and are now declaring a dictatorship in the country on social networks and calling international aid to Ukraine -sponsoring Zelenskyi-. that broadcast the narratives of Russian propaganda. Such public events are aimed at discrediting the TCC and SP, the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the state leadership and Ukraine in general.

Title: Here the bombs whistled and aha — our aviation hits the enemy's shelter
Description: The video was published on the Internet. The blow was inflicted on a large farm whose buildings the enemy used to store their equipment and live in personnel. 4 American light high-precision winged bombs GBU-39 (SDB) and one GBU-62 (JDAM-ER) were used for defeat.   As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian MiG-29 released eight high-precision GBU-39/B cruise bombs at the place of concentration of assault groups in the Orichiv direction.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia and Volyn, men were arrested who set fire to a relay cabinet and military vehicles
Description: This was reported to the SBU. Thus, in Zaporizhzhia, a 31-year-old drug addict was detained, who previously spent 6 years in prison for theft, and after his release was remotely recruited by the occupiers. According to their instructions, the recidivist set fire to a service car of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which was undergoing maintenance after combat missions at the front. In addition, the person involved monitored the presence of personnel at the deployment locations of the Defense Forces. According to the available data, the Rashists tried to obtain this information in order to prepare new airstrikes on the city. The police detained the suspect during an attempt to set fire to another car. At the same time, the SBU conducted complex measures to secure the locations of the Defense Forces on the territory of the front-line city. An 18-year-old local resident was arrested in Volyn, who burned down a relay cabinet on a railway line near the regional center. He received such a task from a representative of the special services of the Russian Federation, who remotely engaged the young man to cooperate through Russian telegram channels in search of -easy- earnings. According to the revealed facts, both detainees were notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in Zaporizhzhia and Volhynia regions together with the National Police under the procedural guidance of regional prosecutors' offices.

Title: The occupiers launched an airstrike on Kostyantynivka: there are casualties
Description: This was notified in the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. As a result of enemy shelling, 4 people were injured, 25 private houses, an administrative building and an enterprise were damaged. Rescuers extinguished the fire in the residential building. The day before, Russian troops again struck the city of Kramatorsk. An enemy ammunition hit the territory of one of the general secondary education institutions of the city. As reported by ArmyInform, received injuries in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling on November 13 15 people. 410 shellings were recorded in the Zaporizhzhia region last day >.

Title: The Ministry of Defense codified the remote firing module
Description: reported this in MOU. A 7.62 mm machine gun and a control system unit with a battery and a camera are installed on the Pernacha turret. The operator controls the module from a safe shelter, using a remote control and FPV glasses, which are transmitted from a video camera. The Ministry of Defense reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment, who have questions about the codification process, can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Main Directorate for Support of the Life Cycle of Weapons and Military Equipment of the Ministry of Defense (GU ZSZHC OVT) prepared for developers and manufacturers of a typical package of documents necessary for the codification of a wide range of OVT samples.

Title: Liquidation of the headquarters of the Russian Navy in Sevastopol: what will be the consequences for...
Description: He shared his thoughts on -We are Ukraine-. -The relevant officers are senior personnel. Given the position, these are the people on whom the organizational core of the entire structure rests. The chief of staff is a person who actually manages all processes,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He explained that the commander makes decisions, the general strategy, but all staff work rests with the chief of staff and it can be said that he is an irreplaceable person. -There may be many applicants for such a position, but there may not be people with the appropriate skills and experience. And considering that in the Russian army there is still a problem of cronyism, a component of corruption, such positions may go to people who are not professionals. Any similar cases are positive for us,- Dmytro Pletenchuk emphasized. The spokesman added that part of the command of the Russian fleet had already forcibly moved to Novorossiysk in the Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation. -If I were in their place, I would start to worry, of course. Yes, of course, some part of the leadership should already be in Novorossiysk, just as some families of servicemen have actually moved to Novorossiysk forcibly. Because in fact now both the fleet and the personnel are serving in Novorossiya and I cannot say with any guarantee where exactly their staff is located, but in any case, in the place of his colleagues, one should probably start looking around.- — noted Dmytro Pletenchuk. On November 13, it became known about the liquidation of the chief of staff of the 41st brigade of missile ships and boats of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation Valery Trankovsky. He died as a result of an explosion in a car in temporarily occupied Sevastopol. The Russian captain's legs were torn off by the explosion, he died from blood loss.

Title: Training of military sailors abroad: the Navy of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian SSR revealed the ...
Description: About this on the air -We are Ukraine- said the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine, captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -Training is ongoing, many servicemen are studying abroad, we are talking about hundreds of people. We are mastering new types of equipment, including new ships,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He explained that these ships are not just new types of weapons specifically for Ukraine, they are also different in terms of service. -These ships were built for NATO countries. There, the structure and operation are built differently, the crew composition is different, and the ship service is organized differently,- the spokesman said. Dmytro Pletenchuk said that the learning process is long and begins with language courses. After that, individual training takes place, when military sailors master their specialty — communication, navigation, weapons, etc. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Hetman Ivan Mazepa corvette, built in Turkey, continues to successfully undergo state trials. During artillery fire corvet demonstrated excellent results, accurately hitting air, sea and land targets.

Title: From tanks to motorcycles: in the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy throws all available equipment into ...
Description: A representative of the press service of 79- Orest Drymalovskyi of the Tavrian Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -Our paratroopers are holding the defense in the southeast, in the Kurakhiv direction, maintaining the line of battle. This line has been unchanged for a long time in our area of ​​responsibility, despite the fact that the enemy has concentrated significant forces against us,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. According to him, the enemy carries out constant mechanized and infantry assaults, using a significant amount of equipment. -The enemy throws tanks, armored personnel carriers, infantry fighting vehicles into battle and tries to break through the defense of our brigade using motorcycles, buggies and other tactics. The goal is to break through a number of settlements to Uspenivka, but our paratroopers are firmly holding the defense,- the spokesman emphasized. In addition to assault attacks, the enemy actively uses aviation and artillery. -Effectiveness of enemy artillery remains extremely high. We record from 3 to 10 airstrikes per day carried out by KABs, which greatly complicates the situation, but our soldiers continue to maintain the defense,- added Orest Drymalovskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 13, in the Kurakhiv direction, the occupiers mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->45 times they tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines. The enemy attacked in the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka

Title: Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: enemy aircraft turned the Black Sea into a gray zone
Description: The spokesperson of the Navy of Ukraine, Captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -There is a change in weather conditions, an important role is played by the fact that they put a large amount of the functionality of their ship-boat composition on aviation. From the composition of the Black Sea Fleet and not only,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. He added that Ukraine informs its partners about the presence of Russian aircraft in the waters of the Black and Azov seas. -We are fighting this problem, the Navy is also involved in air defense when it comes to shooting down drones.- The water area that we freed remains a -grey zone- due to aviation, the Russians use the airspace to carry out strikes,- Dmytro Pletenchuk explained. As ArmyInform reported, in the Black and Azov seas as of November 14, enemy ships completely absent.

Title: Once 10 Russians went on an assault - a funny counter about the Russian infantry
Description: The video was released on November 14 on the battalion channel. -Another day passed under the sign of resets. Our aerial bombers dropped some on the heads of the occupiers!- - commented on the video in the battalion. As it should have been according to the plot, none of the enemy attack aircraft survived.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 4th mechanized battalion of the presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi every day make hundreds of ammunition for drones, mine -under the nose- of the occupiers and build targets underground cities.

Title: More than 400 shelling per day in Zaporizhzhia: consequences

The troops of the Russian Federation carried out an air strike on Biloghirya. 251 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 16 shellings from anti-aircraft missiles covered Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka and Mala Tokmachka. 142 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Primorsky, Gulyaipol, Orikhov, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir and Novodarivka. 38 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. As reported by ArmyInform, were wounded in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling on November 13 15 people.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Air defense forces shot down 21 attack UAVs, another 38 were lost to location
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As of 08:30, 21 enemy UAVs were shot down in the Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava and Kyiv regions. 38 enemy drones were lost in location. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost almost 1,700 soldiers and more than 60 artillery systems. 161 combat clashes took place at the front during the day >, mostly in the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions.

Title: 15 injured not in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian shelling

Beryslav, Ponyativka, Stanislav, Tyaginka, Odradokam’yanka, Antonivka, Vesele, Kozatske, Mylove, Kachkarivka, Komyshany, Sadove, Tomyna Balka, Novovorontsovka, Tomarine, Bilozerka, Zelenivka, Inzhenerne and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. the Russian military targeted the utility company and the local fire department; residential quarters of settlements in the region. In particular, a high-rise building and 7 private houses were damaged. Also, the occupiers vandalized an economic building, a garage, a car “fast” and private cars.

Title: Colombia presents — the Armed Forces prepares Latin American drones
Description: Photo preparation was made public on November 14 by the Luhansk operational-tactical group. The Colombian already has a base, but is retraining on the DJI Mavic drone, learning combat experience, how to work in the wind, how to bypass the enemy's EW, how to use the drone as efficiently as possible. -In any case, we show how we do it, some of our views, our features, especially in different sectors there are their own peculiarities, their own problems,- said the platoon commander with the call sign -Chile-. He admits that full wings have an advantage, they fly further, they see targets standing at a distance from the line of combat. But it is Mavik that provides information about what is happening a dozen meters from our infantry. Accordingly, having near-real-time intelligence on what the enemy is doing right in front of you makes it easier to make the right military decision. As reported by ArmyInform, 60 Czechs received permission to join the Armed Forces.

Title: 161 combat clashes took place during the day — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: Operational information as of at 08.00 on November 14 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU . The enemy carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Basivka, Zhuravka, Yunakivka, Velyka Pisarivka, Odnorobivka, Kozacha Lopan, Liptsi, Pischane, Kivsharivka, Zagryzove, Novoosynovka, Kupyansk, Golubivka, Bohuslavka, Serhiivka, Ivanivka, Novoehorivka, Yampolivka, Terny, Siversk, Zvanivka, Mykolaivka, Chasiv Yar, Kramatorsk, Dachne, Katerynivka, Toretsk, Petrivka, Kostyantynivka, Pushkine, Sukha Balka, Myrnograd, Shevchenko, Kurakhove, Velyka Novosilka, Biloghirya, Zelene Pole, Novopil, Natalivka, Zaporizhzhia, Cossack Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces have struck five strikes on areas of concentration of personnel and air defense systems, one on a control point, and two on enemy artillery systems, and another important enemy object was hit by aircraft. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out offensive and assault operations eight times in the areas of Vovchansk and Visoka Yaruga. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyansk direction reached 12. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in the areas of Lozova, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, and Pershotravnevo. In the Lyman direction, our troops stopped eight enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the areas of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Novoyehorivka and Terni settlements. In the Kramatorsk direction, one skirmish took place in the Stupochky area. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy tried to advance seven times in the Toretsk and Nelipivka areas. 40 attacks, this number in the past day were repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance in the vicinity of Sukha Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka. Defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. In the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilyanivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka, the occupiers tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines 45 times. Ten enemy attacks were stopped by our defenders in the areas of settlements of Rivnopil, Novopil, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske and Makarivka in the Vremivsk direction. Enemy units tried three times to advance in the directions of Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka in the Orihiv direction. In the Dnieper direction, the invaders unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops five times. The operational situation on the Volyn and Polissky directions has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, conducts reconnaissance and artillery fire. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk direction, where the enemy has carried out twenty-eight airstrikes over the past day, using 40 guided air bombs, and Ukrainian defenders have also repelled thirteen enemy attacks. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,690 people last day. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 19 tanks, 51 armored combat vehicles, 64 artillery systems, three rocket salvo systems, one air defense vehicle, 54 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, four cruise missiles and 124 cars of the occupiers. -Join the Defense Forces! We will win together!-, - said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost almost 1,700 soldiers and more than 60 artillery systems.

Title: To lie in the ground in Kurshchyna - our marines thinned out enemy assault groups
Description: The video of combat work appeared on November 14 on the brigade's channel. Assault groups of Russians were quickly identified and put to work. The enemy's attempts to hide in bushes or grass did not help: the process of producing -good Russians- continued. -We continue to stuff the enemy in Kurshchyna,- the marines commented on their video. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kursk region, a Russian infantry fighting vehicle tried to storm positions of the 36th Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi.

Title: The Ministry of Defense commented on the mobilization plan until February 2025
Description: The spokesman of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Lazutkin commented on these statements on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- -. -You have to understand, given the information, the Financial Times gives such numbers. Indeed, the mobilization will continue as long as Russian aggression continues,- noted Dmytro Lazutkin. As the spokesman noted, now the front line is more than 1,300 kilometers, where fierce battles are taking place everywhere. Therefore, Ukrainians who are part of the Defense Forces heroically fight for our land and people. -However, now we are dealing with an aggressor who will not stop. The enemy has already proven that there are no principles and rules for waging war for him, so Ukraine must be ready to fight back for a long time and build a defense system that will allow effective recapture of territories,- concluded Dmytro Lazutkin. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal of disbandment of TCC and SP.

Title: Bradley demolishes the roof of armored personnel carriers - new footage of heavy battles in Kurshchy...

Drops on infantry, hitting FPV drones in -armor-, using anti-tank mines, finally, American Bradley infantry fighting vehicles, which spectacularly worked on Russian armored personnel carriers and infantry. -One hundred lost -nedovins-, almost three dozen units of destroyed equipment and not a single successful battle for the 810th brigade of marines of the Russian Federation. Thanks to the coordinated work of the 95th brigade of the Ukrainian Army and with the help of neighboring units, the Ukrainian army destroyed the enemy on its territory,- the brigade commented on the video. The paratroopers thanked the 92nd Assault Brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk, the Special Operations Forces, the 80th Galician Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the 414th unit of the -Birds of Madyar- strike unmanned aerial systems battalion for their support and repulse of assaults and the destruction of the enemy.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 95th Polish Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces repelled massive assaults of the Russians, who threw a large number of armored personnel carriers into battle with landing party

Title: The enemy used 115 anti-aircraft missiles and more than 780 kamikaze drones — General Staff of the A...
Description: Operational information as of at 22.00 on November 13 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces . In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers carried out eight attacks during the day near Vovchansk and Visoka Yaruga. Three clashes are still ongoing. In the Kupian direction, the Defense Forces repelled 12 attacks. The enemy was active in the areas of Lozova, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, and Pershotravnevo. Pišchane, Kivsharivka, Zagryzove and Bohuslavka were hit by airstrikes. Eight times, the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, tried to advance in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Zarichny, Novoyehorivka, and Terni. The enemy attacked Serhiivka, Novoyehorivka, Yampolivka and Terny with KAB and NAR. In the Kramatorsk direction, one skirmish took place in the Stupochky area. Siversk and Zvanivka were hit by KABs. The enemy tried seven times to penetrate our defense in the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked in the districts of Nelipivka and Toretsk. The enemy carried out airstrikes in the districts of Dachnoy, Toretsk, Mykolaivka, Petrivka, Kramatorsk and Kostiantynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, in the areas of Sukhoi Balka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Myrolyubivka, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka, Pustinka, our troops repelled 36 offensive and assault actions of the enemy. One of them is still ongoing. Our troops are taking measures to maintain the designated borders, and are retaliating fiercely. The enemy attacked Pushkina, Myrnograd, Shevchenko and Petrivka with KABs, and hit Sukhiya Balka with NARs. According to preliminary data, the enemy lost more than 400 people killed and wounded today, Ukrainian servicemen also destroyed two tanks, three armored combat vehicles, and ten units of automobile equipment. In addition, two tanks, eight units of automobile equipment were significantly damaged. At this time of the day, there are 40 combat clashes in the Kurakhiv direction. The invaders remain active, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Berestka, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Sontsivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnye, Antonivka, and Katerynivka. Two anti-aircraft missiles were dropped on Kurakhov. According to the available information, the enemy lost two tanks, three armored fighting vehicles, and thirteen units of motor vehicles today in this direction. One tank and three vehicles were also damaged. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers attacked ten times near the settlements of Rivnopil, Novopil, Trudove, Kostiantynopolske and Makarivka. Five attacks have already been repelled. In the Orihiv direction, our troops stopped three enemy attacks in the directions of Novodanilivka and Novoandriivka. The areas of Natalivka and Zaporizhzhia were attacked by four KABs. In the Dnieper direction, the situation has not undergone significant changes, no losses of positions and territories have been allowed. Ukrainian soldiers repelled five assaults by Russian invaders. At the same time, the enemy carried out an airstrike with twenty NARs on Kozatskyi. Today we celebrate the soldiers of the 28th mechanized brigade named after the Knights of the Winter Campaign, the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade, the 68th hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, the 3rd operational brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, the 126th Territorial Defense brigade, who confidently hold the lines and inflict significant losses on the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, the most active enemy in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions.

Title: Repression, torture, executions, a sea of ​​blood: the historian reminds the Zhduns what to expect f...
Description: — We have at least a dozen historical examples, so to speak, of the occupation of Kyiv either by Russians or by Soviet troops. But, unfortunately, the whole experience is exactly the same. It all boils down to the fact that after the occupation of the city, mass repressions take place, both against that part of the population that was ready to resist, and that resisted, and against that population that, in the opinion of the occupiers, was not loyal enough. Therefore, I would like to remind everyone, first of all, to address the so-called -Zhduns- so that they do not have any illusions about how the Russians will behave. They will behave the same as they behaved in 1169, 1659, 1918, 1919. We have many such examples. This will first be the absolutely deliberate destruction of people who take a pro-Ukrainian position, and then they will take care of everything else in order to simply level the landscape and change it, populating the city with its own absolutely loyal population. Therefore, no one should have the illusion that the occupation will be peaceful, that -great Russian culture- will come here, humanists in the form of Leo Tolstoy and others. No, it won't. Absolutely peaceful occupation does not exist. There will be repression, there will be torture, there will be executions, there will be a sea of ​​blood. And Kyiv has already experienced this many times. I hope this will not happen again. For this, we have the Armed Forces of Ukraine and, I hope, the consciousness of our population as a guarantee.

Title: Who can become a combat medic: the takmed instructor -Lastivka- told how much time it takes to prepa...
Description: Lastivka told ArmiyaInform correspondent about how important quality training in tactical medicine is, who can become a combat medic and how much time it takes to train him -from scratch-, as well as when and why practice is more important than theory, and motivation determines the result. The boys gave their callsign while still in the brigade. There were many Russian-speaking boys, so they called me -Lastochka- - Ukrainian -Lastivka-. They said I looked like a swallow - small, thin, fussy, sharp and fast. I fly everywhere, I run everywhere, I try to be in time everywhere. My husband also said that I remind him of a swallow, because he once watched swallows in his childhood and saw how they protect their home, their offspring. The swallow is a small bird, and it fearlessly pounces on any threat much larger than itself. That's why he said that I look like a swallow. In the Armed Forces of Ukraine, I am from a large-scale invasion. I wanted to leave back in 2014, when the anti-terrorist operation began, but my husband did not allow me, he said that someone should stay at home with the child alone. In 2022, the child had already grown up, so it was no longer possible to keep me at home under this pretext. And the threat became much more terrible, so I could not stay at home anymore. I am a doctor by education, by 2022 I already had 21 years of medical experience. I worked in a maternity hospital, helped deliver children. And now my children have to defend their home with automatic weapons and I couldn't help them. I'm not afraid of blood, I'm not afraid of hurting people to make them better, to save them. I had to hurt even newborn babies in order to save their lives. That's why I'm not afraid to hurt an adult to make him feel better, to survive. From March 2022 to February 2024, I was in a combat brigade. At the beginning of the invasion, no one taught us what tactical medicine was, what and how we should do it - there was no time, no opportunity. Now I'm at the training center and I see how high-quality training in tactical medicine has become. Now is the time, there is an opportunity to train people to provide adequate assistance on the battlefield - this is very important. Due to this, we have much better trained combat medics who go to the brigades. There they not only provide medical care, but also train fighters. We are training combat medics - these are the people who will continue to teach the boys tactical medicine in the brigades, because, in my opinion, only the basics of the necessary training are laid down during the BZVP, and they are not enough. Any motivated thinking person can become a combat medic. Medical education would be an advantage, of course, but it is not a mandatory requirement, as we primarily train people who have never worked professionally in medicine. We explain in such a way that our students understand why exactly such actions should be taken in this or that situation. We teach them this and try not to use any complicated medical terms. We always prioritize practice, not theory. If a combat medic can work on an algorithm without thinking about it, it is much more important than when he knows how to beautifully explain what he is doing and why. Our graduates may not remember complex medical terms, but they will determine exactly what should be done and what should not be done in any case. And their hands will never forget how to properly make a bandage or apply a tourniquet. Preparation requires a high-quality material base, equipment, and consumables. We have good sponsors who help a lot with all this. There are necessary mannequins, systems, dummies, turnstiles - everything you need. Of course, it all wears out, runs out, and needs to be replaced and replenished. But in general, everything that is needed for quality education is enough. The most important resource is time. We constantly -drive- and train our students. So that they do not get confused, how and where to turn that bandage or tourniquet, so that it is done at the level of automation. Training a combat medic requires intense training and time to train muscle memory. For this, one month is definitely not enough, two is better and you can manage in general, but the best option is three months for preparation. After completing the training, the combat medic receives the corresponding VOS number with a record in the military ticket that he successfully passed the combat medic course with a positive evaluation, that is, he can assume the position of a combat medic and provide assistance on the battlefield and in shelter conditions. We also train paramedics. They are trained according to a more simplified program, but they also know and are able to do a lot to help the wounded and save his life. The most capable, responsible and motivated can later go to the courses of a senior combat medic, when the training program has already been approved. This will be the next step in professional development. A senior combat medic must know and be able to organize, set up a stabilization point - this is a higher level of knowledge and responsibility when it comes to organizing the care of many wounded in a specially equipped place. Being a combat medic is very responsible, so random people are not needed here. You cannot become a doctor by force. Unmotivated students are very difficult to teach. It's better to spend extra time on a person who really wants to learn, and I'd rather teach them, than to spend time, energy and resources on someone who needs to be forced to learn. Read also: How to survive in a battle, or What useful things will be taught at BZVP: life hacks from a DSHV instructor If a person is eager to learn, works hard, he will succeed. Then my desire to teach her grows exponentially, because you see that work is not in vain, the student needs it and there will be results.

Title: Military at disposal: about the grounds and amount of payments
Description: Most often, servicemen who are on long-term treatment after an injury, or those who have been recognized as unfit or limited fit for service in such a unit, are taken into command. That is, they cannot perform the duties of their position, and at the same time they cannot resign from the Armed Forces. So they have to wait for a certain time, for example, to be released or transferred to other units. Of course, this is not a complete list of grounds for inclusion in the ordinance. For example, this is also allowed if: With in full the list of grounds can be found in the Presidential Decree -On Provisions on the Military Service of Ukrainian Citizens in the Armed Forces of Ukraine-. Servicemen on active duty should receive the following financial support: We would like to remind you that if the removal to service is related to long-term treatment after an injury, during treatment in a hospital, or during the time on leave for treatment, servicemen are paid an additional remuneration of 100,000 hryvnias. You can read more about payments for the wounded here. ♬ original audio recording - armyinform – armyinform In most cases, enlisted servicemen continue their military service. Therefore, they must perform the duties determined by the commander under whose command they fall. Exceptions are military personnel on long-term treatment, parental leave, or those on precautionary measures.

Title: Cheap and can be angry: the Republic of Korea has made cardboard drones for aerial reconnaissance an...
Description: Assaid on the official portal of the Peach development company from South Korea, this fixed-wing drone is designed to perform reconnaissance missions with minimal production and deployment costs, which makes it an attractive solution for military tasks, ArmiyaInform reports. A significant reduction in production costs is achieved due to the materials used, because they are light and cheap, and the drone itself is not large in size. Its wingspan is only 80 centimeters, and the maximum take-off weight is up to 1 kg, so the drone is record small. However, this does not affect its flight capabilities. PapyDrone-800 can be launched manually, that is, simply by the operator, whose hand acts as the -runway-. Once in flight, the drone can reach speeds of up to 100 km/h for a maximum of 20 minutes. The drone is able to provide real-time reconnaissance because it is equipped with a high-quality camera that transmits a video signal in real time and thus gives the operator direct access to information about the environment. At the same time, the control system supports not one, but up to five UAVs. The PapyDrone-800 also has an integrated avionics system that handles navigation and data processing. KCNA/P's built-in authentication module ensures the security and integrity of mission data, preventing tampering or unauthorized access. A high level of data encryption ensures that reconnaissance missions remain confidential and secure, even if the drone is intercepted or shot down. Combined with the low price and ease of production, PapyDrone-800 can be considered as a disposable UAV. It does not require ideal flight conditions and, thanks to the IPX3 standard, it can work effectively in various environments, including high humidity. While many drones used by the military have relatively expensive and labor-intensive systems to maintain, the PapyDrone-800 stands in stark contrast. As defined experts from IKK Defense Express, although the drone is positioned by its developers as a reconnaissance device, it has the description states that the internal volume of the fuselage allows carrying a warhead. -As for operational capabilities, it is declared to be used up to a wind speed of 10 m/s, which is the standard -civilian- limit. As for protection against moisture, the cardboard used has protection at the IPX3 level, and the developers showed the possibility of flying in the rain,- DE experts said. In the promo video, you can also see several details, such as the use of hot-melt glue to attach the fuselage elements, as well as the fact that some power elements of the body are still made of carbon, the equipment compartment is made of foam, and the drone also has metal rods. At the same time, the use of electronic components, as seen in the video, is reduced to a minimum number of boards. It should be noted that the South Korean startup Peach also has a larger development, the Papidrone-1800, the parameters of which are not disclosed, but the payload of the drone is obviously larger. Its conceptual idea is similar - to use the cheapest possible components. Thus, according to defense market analysts, the low price of the PapyDrone-800 allows even small military units to have access to advanced intelligence technologies without the financial burden associated with traditional and more complex unmanned systems. This opens up new opportunities for countries and organizations operating within modest budgets, especially in regions with limited military resources. Video: Presentation of PapyDrone-800 UAV. Video: The Peach Test launch of PapyDrone-800 UAV in adverse weather conditions. Video: The Peach

Title: Fake letters from Freedom House: how Russian propagandists are trying to demoralize the Ukrainian mi...
Description: Letters on behalf of the US non-governmental organization Freedom House with alleged calls to the Ukrainian military to leave the service are fake. Enemy propagandists used a fake email address and logo of an international organization to give the message weight and authenticity. But again, they could not avoid typical language mistakes and Russianisms used by people who do not speak Ukrainian. Freedom House also quickly reacted to this manipulation, calling it part of a campaign to discredit the Ukrainian army: -We have noticed cases of sending fake e-mails pretending to be messages from Freedom House. These letters contain false information directed against the Ukrainian military and are aimed at undermining trust in our organization and the morale of the defenders of Ukraine,- the message reads. According to representatives of the organization, official statements of Freedom House are distributed exclusively through verified channels.

Title: Support for front-line communities: the new budget provides for UAH 14.9 billion in reverse subsidie...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for the Reconstruction of Ukraine - the Minister of Community Development and territory of Ukraine Oleksiy Kuleba. At the meeting chaired by the President of Ukraine, with the participation of representatives of the Government and the Verkhovna Rada, the main indicators of the draft state budget for 2025 were considered. A decision was made to maintain the reverse subsidy in the budgets of communities located in the front-line zone. In particular, the draft budget provides for the redistribution of 14.9 billion hryvnias of the reverse subsidy to support de-occupied and front-line communities, which, according to Kuleba, is -a fair and necessary solution for people working in the most difficult conditions of war.- In addition, an additional 37.5 billion hryvnias are allocated to communities that suffered losses due to Russia's large-scale armed aggression. The Ministry of Development of Communities and Territories also expressed a position regarding the preservation of 64% of the personal income tax (PIT) in the budgets of communities. This solution will contribute to increasing the capacity of local communities and supporting their viability. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine will receive the sixth IRIS-T air defense system from Germany by the end of the year.

Title: President of Ukraine: Our goal is our own production of air defense systems
Description: About this the head of state declared in his evening address. He emphasized the importance of each success in shooting down Russian drones and missiles, in particular noting the shooting down of a ballistic missile in the morning, which saved the lives of Ukrainians. The President thanked international partners for their help in the supply of anti-missile defense systems and expressed hope for an increase in the number of such supplies to strengthen mobile fire groups. Ukraine's strategic goal, according to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, is to establish its own production of air defense and anti-missile systems. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also spoke about his conversation with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz, during which the supply of additional IRIS-T air defense systems was discussed. He emphasized the importance of cooperation in the Rammstein format, which has already brought significant benefits to Ukraine. The head of state paid particular attention to the situation at the front. He received a report from commander Oleksandr Syrsky, where the main emphasis was placed on the situation in Donetsk region and the occupiers' attempts to expand the offensive in the Kupyan direction. The President thanked the Ukrainian brigades for their resilience and praised several units for their courage and efficiency in combat operations. In addition, Volodymyr Zelenskyi reported on active work on the internal Stability Plan of Ukraine, which will complement the Victory Plan presented to the partners. He noted that consultations with government officials and non-governmental organizations will continue to form a comprehensive doctrinal approach for the consolidation of all state forces. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine will receive the sixth IRIS-T air defense system from Germany by the end of the year.

Title: Postponement of online mobilization: the MOU announces the expansion of categories
Description: Dmytro, spokesman for the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novosti- Lazutkin. Dmytro Lazutkin noted that there will only be more recruiting centers in the future. -Recruiting centers are already covering a serious geographical area of ​​Ukraine, several of them are opening in both district and regional centers. Because people should be able to join the army in a definite and conscious way. And to serve in the position they are going to is not in the unknown, but having a certain civilian background with a profession that is consistent with the military position they are applying for,- the spokesman emphasized. Dmytro Lazutkiv emphasized that the opening of several more recruiting centers is forecasted this year, up to 50 in total by the end of 2024. In addition, the spokesman noted that in the Reserve+ application, deferment from mobilization is available for people with disabilities who have a valid pension certificate; students, post-graduate students and doctoral students who study according to a sequential program. -It should be noted that this is only the beginning of digitalization. This will continue and the next release will be available for parents with three or more children. Retesting of this service is currently underway,- Dmytro Lazutkin added. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal of disbandment of TCC and SP.

Title: Relentless offensive: Oleksandr Syrskyi showed how the Armed Forces destroy the occupiers
Description: He published footage of combat work on his channel. In particular, the video shows how the Ukrainian military successfully destroys enemy vehicles, equipment and personnel of the occupiers. -Relentlessly and irrevocably. Our soldiers neutralize the Russian invaders. Glory to Ukraine!- — stressed Oleksandr Syrskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, today, starting at 2:30 p.m., Russian occupiers made an attempt to break through our defenses in the Kupyan direction.

Title: On the ladder to the border: border guards thwarted an attempt to escape to Moldova
Description: About this reported in the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to border guards, residents of Kyiv, Odesa, Luhansk, Kirovohrad and Poltava regions turned to the organizer of the scheme, who through one of the messengers offered them help in illegally crossing the border for a fee. Each of the violators had to pay $10,000 to the organizer's crypto wallet. The attacker prepared a plan, including the purchase of a telescopic ladder, to bypass the anti-traffic ditch at the border. However, during the detention, four men tried to escape, but the border guards reacted quickly and arrested all the violators. The driver, who acted as an accomplice, was sent a notice of suspicion under Art. 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine -Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine.- Regarding all fugitives, administrative offense reports have been drawn up under Art. 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code -Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine.- The cases are referred to the court. The operation was carried out jointly with the Department of the Migration Police of the National Security Service of Ukraine in the Odesa region. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Ministry of Defense commented on the proposal to disband the TCC and JV
Description: About this he told on the air -Suspilne Novosti-. -It is still too early to draw any conclusions. Territorial recruitment and social support centers are working, and this should be treated very carefully. At the moment, their staff is not as large as was stated in the press. After all, rather large numbers were announced,- Dmytro Lazutkin noted. Dmytro Lazutkiv explained that there are 48,000 positions in the TCC. However, 36,000 people actually work there, of which almost 7,000 are civilians. In particular, among the military, 18,500 are disabled and 3,000 are women. If we talk about those with limited fitness, then for many this status was acquired on the battlefield, these people defended the Motherland with weapons in their hands. This should also be taken into account, and these moments should be treated with caution. In addition, the spokesman of the IOU commented on Roman Istomin's statement that it is impossible to create a single brigade from TCC employees. -If you approach purely quantitatively, then it is possible. But these people perform other tasks. You can treat corruption scandals and unpleasant moments in different ways, but if there are any reorganization measures, we will communicate. Currently, they continue to be under the command of the Land Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- Dmytro Lazutkin noted. Also, the spokesman once again emphasized that 18,500 servicemen of the TCC and SP are of limited suitability who have already fought. As reported by ArmyInform, appearance of TCC and police officers in public places are not -raids-, but warning measures, and if the visitor violates the rules of the military accounting or legislation — the police have legal grounds to detain him.

Title: -You will serve in the second line-: the occupiers recruit migrants in -meat assaults-
Description: About informs Center of National Resistance. Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, the Kremlin has imported migrants to TOT as cheap labor to build the houses destroyed by Russia. However, due to the current crisis, the construction industry in the Russian Federation is at a standstill, and migrants are being offered to join the ranks of the enemy's army. Officially, migrants are summoned for interrogations, where they are offered to conclude a contract and promise that they will serve in the second line. However, in fact, after that, they are sent to training grounds located along the line of military contact, and then sent to -meat assaults-. The Center of National Resistance calls for the reporting of all those involved in such recruiting, as well as the location of the gathering of the Russian military, so that the contracts of the occupiers are completed sooner. As reported by ArmyInform, in the temporarily occupied territories, the Russians conducted -dlya-najmancziv-kndr/->lessons of -international friendship-, where children drew cards in support of North Korea.

Title: The army of perverts: the soldier of the Russian Federation who raped a minor in the Kherson region ...
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. Under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office, a serviceman of the 109th Rifle Regiment of the Mobilization Reserve of the 1st Army Corps of the 8th General Army of the Southern Military District of the Russian Federation was identified and informed of the suspicion of violating the laws and customs of war. According to the investigation, in March 2022, the suspect, together with other soldiers of the army of the aggressor state, occupied one of the settlements of the Kherson region. A serviceman of the Russian Federation entered the territory of one of the private houses where local residents and children were hiding. The suspect entered one of the rooms where the underage girl and her sisters were. He asked her how old they were. The suspect ordered the girl to follow him to another room of the house and to undress completely. After receiving a refusal from the victim, he threatened her with murder and rape by other military personnel of the aggressor country. Using physical force, the Russian soldier committed an act of sexual violence against her. As reported by ArmyInform, the DNR militant will be tried who during the occupation of Kharkiv Region raped a woman.

Title: Ukraine will receive the sixth IRIS-T air defense system from Germany by the end of the year
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. Olaf Scholz confirmed that Ukraine will receive the sixth IRIS-T air defense system by the end of the year, and also discussed the delivery of additional systems next year. The leaders coordinated further steps to strengthen defense and political support for Ukraine and agreed on the need to preserve the Ramstein format, including holding another meeting of the coordination group. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized the importance of presenting the Ukrainian vision of a just and lasting peace at the G20 summit in Brazil and thanked Germany for its support in this process. As reported by ArmyInform, Norway and Ukraine join forces for the development of innovative weapons.

Title: -To Comrade Kim with love-: at TOT schoolchildren are forced to draw postcards for North Korean merc...
Description: About informs Center of National Resistance. Children were forced to draw the flag of a communist dictatorial country, as well as joint drawings of Russians and Koreans. In this way, children were shown the supposedly friendly policy of the Russian Federation with other countries. Also, these were, in fact, greeting cards for Russian mercenaries, because the cards were taken from the children and will then be transferred to Kurshchyna through -volunteers-. In this way, the Russians intend to raise the morale of the mercenaries. The department noted that every teacher who takes part in occupation propaganda activities is an accomplice to the crime and will bear responsibility. As reported by ArmyInform, the flow of the subconscious of the international criminal Vladimir Putin will be demonstrated in Ukrainian to schoolchildren in captured schools of the Russian Federation.

Title: Norway and Ukraine are joining forces to develop innovative weapons
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The heads of the agencies signed a document that opens up opportunities for the exchange of information between Ukraine and Norway about current offers on the arms and military equipment market. In addition, there is an opportunity for joint R&D in the field of innovative weapons. According to Dmitry Klimenkov, the expansion of cooperation with Norway is an important stage in the development of our international cooperation in the field of defense procurement, especially in the context of a large-scale invasion. -The exchange of experience between our countries will help to improve the processes of planning and supply of weapons, which is critically important for successfully resisting aggression,- noted the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. Strengthening cooperation with NATO countries is an important focus of the Ministry of Defense and, in particular, the Defense Procurement Agency. -The successful history of the Norwegian agency demonstrates the importance of the contribution to the provision of the armed needs of the state, which is formed by such capable and independent institutions. In the conditions of war, it is critical for us to adopt this experience in a very short time, and we are grateful to Norway for its readiness to provide comprehensive support in this regard,- noted Marina Bezrukova, director of the Defense Procurement Agency. The NMDA team continues to conduct training courses for AOZ employees, which allows adapting the best practices of NATO procurement agencies in Ukraine, taking into account the realities of a full-scale war. -The continued support of the Defense Acquisition Agency is of great importance to us and is one of our top priorities. In addition, the experience of the Ukrainian Agency allows us to understand how the NDMA can function in wartime conditions. This gives us important knowledge to further develop our own processes, and a high rating from the Defense Procurement Agency is a sign of the quality of our organization and our personnel,- said Gru Jare, head of the Norwegian Defense Material Agency. For cooperation between agencies, two project groups have been created - in Oslo and Kyiv. Training has already been conducted, in particular, on contract and project management, risk management, personnel management, international arbitration, etc. This allows for the development of the professional capabilities of the Defense Acquisition Agency. As reported by ArmyInform, the defense procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Norwegian Defense Materials Agency (NDMA) signed a cooperation agreement.

Title: Visual illusion near Vovchansk: -They thought it was Russian attack aircraft, but it turned out to b...
Description: About this told in the DPSU. According to the border guard, this happened during hostilities, when both were under mortar fire. -They thought it was Russian attack aircraft, but it turned out to be pigs,- Lavr recalled this episode with a smile, despite the danger of the situation. Before the large-scale invasion, Lavr was the director of a chain of stores that sold accessories for mobile phones and repaired them. After he received a concussion during a combat mission in Vovchansk, he was transferred to the position of clerk in one of the units of the -Hart- brigade. Thanks to his experience with computers, he quickly learned new responsibilities. But despite all the dangerous moments, Lavr remembers his service in the brigade with humor, talking about the defense of the destroyed Vovchansk, shelters from enemy drones and other trials that he and his comrades had to face.

Title: In Kupyansk, an ambulance driver was hit by a Russian attack
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, on November 13, around 3:30 p.m., the occupiers shelled the city of Kupyansk. An ambulance was hit: a 66-year-old driver was injured. Another hit is on the private housing sector. A 49-year-old man was injured. Houses were damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian drone damaged an ambulance assistance in Kherson Oblast.

Title: In Donetsk region, a huge fragment -Smerchu- was found in the middle of the yard
Description: This is reported by the State Service for Emergency Situations of Ukraine. Specialists quickly removed the dangerous object and destroyed it in a specially designated place, warning of a possible threat to local residents. As reported by ArmiyaInform, new methods of demining de-occupied areas were demonstrated in Kyiv region territory.

Title: In the Lviv region, a very influential woman was detained with a bribe in her hands
Description: This is reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, the woman, who previously worked as a doctor, demanded $5,000 for her influence on MSEK officials. She promised the military to ensure the adoption of a positive decision regarding the provision of the disability group. According to her, without this amount, it would be impossible to get disability in another way. The police detained the woman while receiving the entire amount of the bribe. An investigation is currently underway to identify all those involved in the scheme. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Several communities in Nikopol region came under shelling: property and communications were damaged
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk regional military administration Serhiy Lysak. Shelling hit Nikopol, as well as Marganetska, Pokrovska and Myrivska communities. As a result of the attacks, 14 private houses and 12 farm buildings were damaged. An administrative building, a shop and a car were also vandalized, and power lines were also damaged. In the Kryvorizka district, the Zelenodol community came under enemy fire. Fortunately, there are no victims or victims among local residents. As reported by ArmyInform, today due to shelling Two people died in Donechchyna, seven more were injured.

Title: A woman who pointed Russian rockets at schools and kindergartens was detained in Donetsk region
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, it was on her instructions that in August 2022, the Rashists launched a rocket attack on a local school. As a result of the enemy attack, the building of the educational institution was completely destroyed. After the -arrival-, the agent arrived at the scene of the event to record the extent of the destruction and send the appropriate -report- to the Russian curator. In addition, the agent prepared several more coordinates for fire damage to Ukrainian schools and kindergartens. However, she did not have time to hand them over to the occupiers, as she was detained by SBU counter-intelligence. According to the materials of the Security Service, the court sentenced the perpetrator to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. As the investigation established, the Russian agent is a local unemployed woman who was remotely recruited by the FSB after the start of a full-scale war. In addition to correcting enemy shelling, the woman scouted locations of bases and movements of Ukrainian troops in Kramatorsk, Kostyantynivka and Toretsk regions. The attacker transmitted the received information to the occupiers via messenger. In the case of the capture of the region, the Russian special service promised its accomplice a -position- in the ranks of the occupation administration of the Russian Federation. On the basis of the evidence collected by the investigators of the Security Service, the court found the agent guilty under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in the Vinnytsia region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, an agent of the special services was exposed Russian Federation, which corrected enemy strikes on Chernihiv Oblast.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: the enemy broke through in the Kupyansk direction,...
Description: This was notified by the General Staff of the ZSU. The enemy's assault groups attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in four waves. In total, the enemy used about 15 units of equipment. In particular, tanks, armored combat vehicles and the UR-77 demining installation. -It should be emphasized that some of the Russian soldiers were dressed in uniforms of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. This violates the laws and rules of warfare and is a war crime,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported. With skillful and decisive actions, our defenders stopped the enemy, destroyed all his armored vehicles and eliminated a significant part of the manpower. -It is worth noting the professionalism and coordination of our infantrymen, tankers, gunners and UAV operators,- the General Staff of the Armed Forces added.

Title: Exchange of information on the arms market and joint research: Ukraine and Norway signed an agreemen...
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -The agreement, in particular, opens up new opportunities for the exchange of information on the arms market, joint research and development of innovative military technologies,- the minister noted. Working groups have already been created in Kyiv and Oslo, within which NDMA experts help train Ukrainian specialists in various areas. -I am convinced that deepening cooperation with NATO partners will increase the efficiency of planning and supply of weapons, which is critical for repelling Russian aggression,- added Rustem Umyerov. The minister thanked his Norwegian colleagues for their support and willingness to share their experience: -Together we are strengthening the defense capabilities of Ukraine and the security of the whole of Europe.- As reported by ArmiyaInform, Rustem Umyerov met with Norwegian Defense Minister Bjorn Arild Gram in Odessa. During the meeting joint steps to strengthen air defense were discussed. Norway is ready to co-finance the strengthening of Ukrainian air defense and allocate 118.8 million US dollars for the purchase of weapons systems and spare parts for Ukrainian F-16s within the framework of the US Jumpstart initiative.

Title: Scientists and business have joined forces to clear the territories of mines and pollution
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. Specialists of the Center of Excellence for Mine Action and Environmental Safety recently took part in an exhibition of technologies and equipment for clearing territories, restoring soils and water resources of Ukraine. According to the organizers, a large part of Ukrainian land remains unfit for agriculture due to war damage, such as explosive eruptions, debris, heavy metal and chemical contamination. In addition, toxic elements enter the soil, which complicates the recovery process. Also, hostilities have a negative impact on the quality of water resources, as many pollutants enter the reservoirs. Within the framework of the exhibition, a panel discussion was held, in which officials of the Ministry of Economy, Ministry of Environment, deputies of the Verkhovna Rada, scientists and representatives of public organizations took part. They discussed modern technologies and solutions to minimize this problem. One of the important results of the event was a working meeting of representatives of the Center of Excellence in Mine Action and Environmental Safety with the leadership of the Ukrainian Association of Humanitarian Demining, the Public Union -Mine-clearing Cluster of Ukraine- and the Dropla Tech company. The participants agreed on cooperation in such areas as establishing international partnerships, attracting investments, developing innovations, science and education, as well as increasing the effectiveness of demining and reducing risks. The combination of scientific developments and technological innovations, as well as the experience of the units of the Security and Defense Forces, will help contribute to the sustainable development of mine countermeasures in Ukraine, restoration of the ecological balance, cleaning of territories, water resources and soils. As reported by ArmyInform, a course was held in Kyiv - Results-oriented management in mine action-, organized by the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE).

Title: They want to kill a wedge: in the Zaporizhzhia region, they repel enemy attacks
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny Novyy- told the spokesperson of the OUV -Tavria- - Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. As for the other directions - Gulyaipil and Orihiv, the Russians continue to prepare for activation and conduct reconnaissance there. -However, several assault operations are also carried out every day, trying to probe our front edge, our defenses, and detect fire means. In order to inflict fire damage during the assault,- Vladyslav Voloshyn said. Earlier ArmyInform reported that in the South, the occupiers use different assault tactics.

Title: Assaults: Kurshchyna, Kurakhove, Kharkiv region, Toretsk. Ambush on the Russians: a stream from a fr...
Description: They hijacked their walkie-talkies and listened to their conversations, which allowed our fighters to fully control the situation on the battlefield. Since our attack aircraft knew where and how the Russians were moving, they found them and eliminated the two invaders. The Russians staged a massive offensive in the Kursk direction. It was managed to defeat the 47th -Magura- brigade together with adjacent units. The enemy used more than 30 units of equipment and a whole battalion of Russians. The assault took place in 5 rolls. Only the fighters of the 47th brigade destroyed and finished off 10 units of armored vehicles. Comrades from adjacent brigades worked on other equipment. One for a whole column. Together with the artillery, the crew of the Leopard 2 tank stopped the armored column of the Russians. In Sevastopol, the head of the staff of the missile ships of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation was eliminated - sources of Armiya TV. Today's car bombing in Sevastopol of the head of staff of the 41st Brigade of Missile Ships and Boats of the Russian Black Sea Fleet, Valery Trankovsky, was a successful special operation of the SBU. As a result of the explosion, the Russian captain's legs were torn off, he died from blood loss. Trankovsky is a war criminal who gave orders to launch cruise missiles from the Black Sea at civilian objects in Ukraine. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters, Lt. Col. Serhiy Misyura and Major Andrii Makarenko.

Title: Death and destruction in Donetsk region: shelling claimed the lives of two people
Description: This was reported by the head of the Donetsk regional military administration, Vadym Filashkin. Russian troops killed a 32-year-old woman and wounded a 36-year-old woman in the Shevchenko village of the Komar community. An administration building and a car were also damaged. A 63-year-old man was killed in Novotroitskoy of the Pokrovska hromada, and two more people were injured. In Kostyantynivka, four people were injured, with varying degrees of severity. As a result of the shelling, 21 private houses, an administrative building, an enterprise, as well as three power lines and a gas pipeline were damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, in the afternoon of November 13 Russian troops struck the city of Kramatorsk again Donetsk region.

Title: -We do not perceive restaurants and nightclubs as enemies-: the TCC spoke about Russian frauds and f...
Description: The head of the communication group told about this in an interview with -Suspilne Poltava- Roman Istomin of the Poltava regional territorial center of recruitment and social support. According to Roman Istomin, the visits of the TCC and the police to coffee shops and clubs are regular notification measures. In fact, they can be held at any time and in any public place. -It may sound shocking, but TCCs do not conduct raids at all. The very word -raid- is such an interesting case when the media picked up on a Russian ploy and started spreading information about -raids-, Roman Istomin said. According to Roman Istomin, it is easy not to be afraid of notification measures - to update your data in the TCC. -There is no such thing as a citizen who has clarified his data, who complies with the rules of military registration, and a car suddenly drives up to him and he is detained without checking his documents. How can this be seen on some anonymous Telegram channels,- said the head of the communication group of the Poltava Regional Territorial Center for Recruitment and Social Support. ArmyInform reminds you that you need to update the data in a timely manner, and it is even better to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Karma works - our pilots punished the occupier who abandoned a wounded comrade
Description: The video was released on on the battalion channel. In the first series, we see two Russian attack aircraft hiding in the ruins. Our FPV drone flies in and explodes near one of the Russians. The wounded one is trying to crawl somewhere. At this time, his friend calmly stands aside and does not even try to help. The wounded gradually dies without receiving help.   In the second series, the surviving Russian hides in a hole in the ground and hopes to wait there. But our aerial scouts are outraged by his behavior, so another FPV drone flies in and hits the scoundrel. But in such a way that it breaks his -decision-making center- that he thought of when he went to this war. As a result, minus two occupiers. Profit! As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the unmanned systems battalion Strike Drone Company 47 of the mechanized brigade are aesthetically flawless hit the enemy BMP-3 with landing.

Title: The occupiers hit Kramatorsk, the school was damaged
Description: This was reported by the Kramatorsk City Council. According to preliminary information, an enemy ammunition hit the territory of one of the general secondary education institutions of the city. There was no information about the victims.
