According to him, the victory of Ukraine depends on consistent assistance in the defense sphere, strengthening of defense capabilities for a long time and post-war reconstruction plans. He also emphasized that the joint production of defense products will allow a faster response to challenges, reduce costs and, most importantly, save the lives of Ukrainians. The ambassador thanked the British partners for their willingness to build a peaceful future together with Ukraine and expressed confidence that joint efforts will create a stable and safe world for future generations. As reported by ArmyInform, the third a group of pilots of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine completed training at the base of the Royal Air Force in Cranwell.

Title: With the dearest in the trunk: border guards stopped a non-standard trip to Moldova
Description: About this notified the State Border Service of Ukraine. A 32-year-old resident of Bila Tserkva was found in the trunk of a Ford car driven by a citizen of Moldova. The driver tried to hide his passenger under bags and other things. As it turned out, the men were relatives: the driver, originally from Moldova, tried to help the Ukrainian escape from the country. An administrative protocol was drawn up against the Ukrainian for an attempt to illegally cross the border (Article 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code). The driver faces criminal liability for illegal transportation of persons across the border (Article 332 of the Criminal Code). ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Minister of Defense called on business to support the development of the defense complex
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov emphasized the importance of investments in the defense-industrial complex, which the Ministry of Defense Industry, the Office of the President and the government are working on jointly. The minister noted that a strategy for the development of this sector until 2025 is already being developed. One of the key topics was the reservation of personnel to replenish the ranks of the Defense Forces. According to the minister, the goal is to create a model of cooperation with business that will support both the economy and the defense of the country. The Minister of Defense also expressed gratitude to Ukrainian and international companies for their contribution to strengthening Ukraine's defense and bringing victory closer. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and the USA discussed provision of the Armed Forces until the end of the year.

Title: The OSCE held a course for Ukrainian mine countermeasures specialists
Description: notifies the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The event was held with the support of the Geneva International Center for Humanitarian Demining and brought together representatives of the GU of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The purpose of the course was to improve professional knowledge and skills in planning, evaluating the results of mine action activities and developing strategic planning documents. During the three-day training, the participants learned new strategies for monitoring and managing mine action activities. The deputy head of the Main Department of Mine Action, Colonel Mykhailo Kozytsky, emphasized the importance of constant improvement of the theoretical and practical skills of specialists, especially in the context of strategic planning and implementation of mine action tasks. Upon completion of the course, the trainees received certificates confirming their qualifications and readiness for further work in the field of mine countermeasures. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine was invited to become an associate member of CIOR (La Confédération interalliée des officiers de réserve) — one of the largest world organizations that unites NATO reserve officers and is affiliated with the Alliance.

Title: The Coordinating Headquarters told how the search for the fallen Defenders is going on
Description: bohdan Okhrimenko, head of the Secretariat of the Coordinating Staff for issues of treatment of prisoners of war, told about this. Search operations are conducted only in safe areas that have been previously demined and where there is no threat of hostilities or shelling. At the same time, efforts are underway to organize searches in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. In addition, negotiations for the return of the bodies and remains of fallen Ukrainian soldiers are ongoing. The International Committee of the Red Cross regularly receives information about burial sites in the occupied territories. Citizens are urged to transmit information about the places of disappearance or burial of Ukrainian defenders through the Personal Cabinet or by telephone of the Coordination Headquarters and the Central Department of Civil-Military Cooperation of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, large-scale repatriation: Ukraine returned home 563 soldiers who died on the front line.

Title: The President of Ukraine thanked Canada for supporting NATO membership and allowing the use of long-...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. As Volodymyr Zelenskyy reported, he expressed his gratitude to Canada for comprehensive assistance, in particular for the principled support of the Ukrainian Victory Plan. Particular attention was paid to the issue of Ukraine's membership in NATO. The President emphasized the importance of continuing Canada's efforts to advocate for the first point of this plan — Ukraine receiving an invitation to the Alliance. He urged Justin Trudeau to continue working with allies both in multilateral meetings and in direct negotiations. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also thanked Canada for its public support for the permission to use long-range weapons for military purposes on the territory of Russia. In addition, the parties coordinated positions on the eve of the G20 meeting, where, according to the president, it is important that Ukraine's position on a just and lasting peace be heard. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Justin Trudeau also discussed Ukraine's current defense needs and agreed on further steps to continue defense cooperation between the countries. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky accepted credentials from the new ambassadors of Greece, Albania, Japan and Egypt.

Title: NATO Secretary General: Russia's cooperation with North Korea threatens not only Ukraine, but the wh...
Description: He said this during his visit to Paris. -Russia continues its offensive against Ukraine, while at the same time getting closer to its allies China, Iran and North Korea,- Mark Rutte said. He added that Russia, working together with North Korea, Iran and China, threatens not only Europe, it threatens peace and security in Europe, as well as in the Indo-Pacific region and in North America-, -That is why we must stick together - Europe , North America and our global partners — to keep our peoples safe and prosperous. And at the same time, we must keep our transatlantic alliance strong. It is obvious that the immediate task before us is to support Ukraine,- said the NATO Secretary General. Mark Rutte said that after supplying ammunition and ballistic missiles, North Korea sent its troops to fight and die alongside Russia in its illegal war against Ukraine. -In return, Russia provides North Korea with funding and missile technology. This is of great concern. These missiles pose a direct threat to the continental United States, Europe, the Indo-Pacific region and the wider Euro-Atlantic,- he said. The NATO Secretary General also reminded that Ukrainians are being killed and wounded by the deadly Shahed drones developed and supplied by Iran. With the money received from arms sales to Russia, Iran and its puppets destabilize the Middle East and finance terrorism in other regions. At the same time, China supports Russia's economy, provides its defense industry and strengthens its narrative on the world stage. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 7, President Volodymyr Zelenskyi said that the troops of North Korea u-boyah-na-kurshhyni/-> have already suffered losses in battles with the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation.

Title: A collaborator from Vovchansk will stand trial for serving in the occupation police
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. It is noted that the 45-year-old local resident is accused of voluntary cooperation with the enemy. In April 2022, during the occupation of Vovchansk, the man assumed the -position of precinct commissioner- in the occupation police department controlled by the Russian administration. Before the Armed Forces of Ukraine liberated the city in September 2022, the person involved fled to the Russian Federation together with the Russian military. He is currently wanted, and he will be tried in absentia in the Chuguyiv city court. The accused faces up to 15 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kharkiv court sentenced a local resident to 10 years in prison for actively participating in spreading Kremlin narratives and justifying armed aggression of the Russian Federation.

Title: Vidar Systems has raised funds to improve the technology for detecting artillery positions
Description: This was spoke by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. Funds came from angel investors and the Czech venture fund Presto Ventures. The investment was received thanks to the company's participation in the Brave1 initiative, which constantly presents Ukrainian defense tech companies to investors. An introduction to the Presto Ventures fund took place at the Invest Demo Day organized by Brave1. Funds raised will be used to expand the team and scale the product to improve its effectiveness in combat environments. Mykhailo Fedorov emphasized the importance of the development of the Ukrainian defense tech sector and noted that such investments are proof of the rapid development of this direction in Ukraine. Brave1 continues to support startups in the defense sector, helping them find investors and receive funding to implement innovative solutions. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine became one from the world capitals in the field of drone technology and now offers its experience to Europe as a foundation for European security.

Title: The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and the United States discussed the provision of the Armed Force...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov informed his American colleague about the course of hostilities and the urgent needs of the Ukrainian military. The parties discussed measures to provide Ukrainian soldiers with everything they need until the end of the year. The Minister of Defense expressed gratitude to the United States for its constant support and strong partnership, emphasizing the importance of further cooperation to strengthen Ukraine's defense capabilities in the face of war with Russia. As reported by ArmyInform, the change of service location: Rustem Umyerov explained how the new mechanism will work.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi accepted credentials from the new ambassadors of Greece, Albania, Japan and Egyp...
Description: About informs the Office of the President of Ukraine. The head of state congratulated them on the start of the diplomatic mission in Ukraine and expressed hope for strengthening cooperation between the countries. During the meeting with the Ambassador of Greece, Volodymyr Zelensky noted the high level of bilateral relations and thanked for the defense support. The President talked about the main needs for military aid, primarily in air defense equipment, artillery and armored vehicles, and also emphasized the importance of the practical implementation of reconstruction projects by Greece. -We have very good relations between the countries. Cooperation between our nations is very important to us. I know that your colleagues visited Odesa with an initiative to restore it. Maybe Greece will be able to join other countries and take one of the regions under its patronage,- the head of state said. In a conversation with the Ambassador of Albania, Volodymyr Zelensky noted the opening of the Albanian Embassy in Ukraine, which was evidence of the dynamic development of bilateral relations. The head of state thanked the government and people of Albania for their constant support since the beginning of the full-scale Russian invasion. Separately, he emphasized the importance of signing a bilateral security agreement as soon as possible. -We have had consultations on a bilateral security agreement. We hope that with your help we will prepare the document for signing as soon as possible,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. During the meeting with the Ambassador of Japan, the President noted his country's support for Ukraine and the development of current bilateral cooperation, expressed readiness for further intensification of dialogue at all levels, and also discussed current security challenges for Ukraine. The head of state emphasized that it is important to strengthen cooperation with Japan in the security sphere regarding the exchange of information and ways of joint response to the participation of the North Korean military in the war against Ukraine. -Strong positions have been built between our countries. Our countries have signed an important and strong document on security guarantees. Today, the situation with North Korea and its troops on the Russian side requires a reaction - we need Japan's support,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyy. In a conversation with the Ambassador of Egypt, the President noted that Ukraine is interested in intensifying bilateral dialogue, quickly restoring trade and economic cooperation, as well as implementing specific projects in the field of food security. The head of state also emphasized that it is important to involve Egypt in promoting the Peace Formula, including joining the Joint Communiqué. -I hope, Mr. Ambassador, during your term of office, our relations with Egypt will become stronger. We had a good trade before the war: mostly agricultural products. We now have defensive training and are ready to develop in this direction. We have a food security initiative -Grain from Ukraine-, and we hope that Egypt will join this mission,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, the President spoke about the new system of military transfers without delays and bureaucracy.

Title: He hoped for his brother and got lost in the forest: the unfortunate laborer never reached Poland
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. The incident happened in the border area when a man, trying to get to Poland, lost his orientation and could not find his way for more than a day. According to the DPSU, the man was planning a trip together with his brother, who works in Poland, and offered him a job in Warsaw. However, having no experience in moving through the forest, he quickly lost his way after leaving the car and heading for Slovakia. The border squad of the -Princess- branch found the man in the forest, where he was trying to find his way. The detainee was in satisfactory condition and did not require medical assistance. The man was taken to the border unit, where he will be prosecuted for attempting to cross the border illegally. For violation of part 1 of Art. 204-1 of the Code of Administrative Offenses -Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine- the court will determine the degree of punishment. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The President talked about the new system of military transfers without delays and bureaucracy
Description: The head of state told about this during the evening address. In particular, the Cabinet of Ministers adopted a resolution that provides introduction of a painless transfer process through the Army+ platform. In his address, Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized that the technical functionality is already ready, and the Ministry of Defense will determine how the system will be launched. An important condition is the minimization of bureaucracy - all reports of servicemen must receive clear answers. In addition, all commanders' decisions regarding reports will be carefully monitored to avoid unjustified rejections. The President also noted that the system will operate in a test mode at the first stage, and the details of this process will be clarified by the Ministry of Defense. He expressed his gratitude to everyone involved in the development of the new feature. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also instructed the Ministry of Defense and the General Staff to expand this opportunity to all Defense and Security Forces, including the National Guard and the Border Service. The president emphasized that all soldiers deserve equal respect. As reported by ArmyInform, the change of service location: Rustem Umyerov explained how the new mechanism will work.

Title: The border guards showed the last moments of the Russian armored personnel carrier before its comple...
Description: This was reported by State Border Service of Ukraine. As noted, Ukrainian border guards continue to play an important role in the defense of the country, actively participating in combat operations on the front line. They carry out defensive operations and strike at the enemy in coordination with other units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. In destruction of the enemy BTR-70, the border guards demonstrated high efficiency and accuracy, which allows them to deter the attacks of Russian troops on key directions. The successful actions of the border guards help ensure the security of the Ukrainian border and contribute to the overall success of the country's defense against the aggressor. As reported by ArmyInform, invaders continue to storm the positions of Ukrainian defenders. In total, 110 combat clashes have already taken place since the beginning of the day. Most of the battles were recorded in the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions.

Title: The command of the Ground Forces will conduct an additional check on the interference of a civilian ...
Description: The Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine inform about this. The Command of the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, having studied in detail the conclusions of the Main Directorate of the Military Law and Order Service of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and taking into account their proposals, began an additional examination of the circumstances of the incident between the civil servant O.V. Dmitriev. and military personnel of the Asgard group. Unbiased measures of additional verification were simultaneously initiated in relation to all participants in the incident. In particular, in accordance with Part 1 of Article 68 of the Law of Ukraine -On Civil Service-, a disciplinary proceeding was opened and a disciplinary commission was established in relation to O. V. Dmitriev. At the same time, on the basis of paragraph 15, point 1 of Chapter II of the Procedure for conducting an official investigation in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, approved by the order of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine dated 21.11.2017 No. 608, an official investigation was launched with the aim of clarifying the reasons and conditions that contributed to the offense and establishing the degree of guilt of servicemen. Information on the results will be provided additionally. -We ask the public, until the results of the additional inspection are made public, to refrain from premature conclusions regarding the incident between a civil servant and military personnel from the Asgard group,- the department emphasized. As ArmyInform reported, the Commander of the Ground Forces reacted to the incident regarding the interference of a civilian in the work of the -Asgard- unit.

Title: Nikopol region is under fire: the Rosarmy attacked the district -Grada- and drones
Description: informed the head of the Dnipropetrovsk regional military administration Serhiy Lysak. As a result of shelling, infrastructure, an industrial enterprise, as well as 8 private houses, 5 farm buildings, a garage and a car were damaged. Gas burners and power lines were damaged. Fortunately, no one was hurt. We will remind you that in Kryvyi Rih from the ruins of the house affected by the Russians, the bodies of three children and their mother were unblocked. As reported by ArmyInform, a series of shelling in Kherson Oblast: Russian troops wounded ten civilians.

Title: Nicholas Karma in the forest near the border: how much does Look cost military
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. Border guard Nazar said that his uniform is a state provision, because military personnel are fully supported by the state. The price of purchasing clothes for the military is about five thousand hryvnias. Baghlat about 3 thousand hryvnias, a field suit about 1,500 hryvnias and a hat over 100 hryvnias. The border guard is a canine specialist, so they work as a couple both on duty and in life. Cora the dog is trained to search for explosives and weapons. By the way, in her three years of service, Cora has many cases of detection of prohibited items in her -work-in-progress-. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense invites manufacturers to a meeting on the development and improvement of tangible property for the Armed Forces.

Title: The Secretary General of NATO and the President of France discussed increasing support to Ukraine ah...
Description: This was reported by site of the Alliance. NATO noted that Ukraine may face the harshest winter, as Russia relentlessly attacks its energy infrastructure. Mark Rutte thanked France for training and equipping the Ukrainian brigade of Anne of Kyiv, as well as for the promise to send Mirage fighter jets early next year. -France provided modern artillery guns, air defense systems, cruise missiles and armored vehicles,- he said. The Secretary General also expressed concern about the deepening military ties between Russia, China, Iran and North Korea, which pose a threat to European security and global peace. As ArmiyaInform reported, on the sidelines of the summit in Budapest on November 7, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi held a meeting with -oboronnu-pidtrymku-ukrayiny/->President of France Emmanuel Macron and NATO General Secretary Mark Rutte

Title: Murder of a military man in Kyiv: the culprit was sentenced to 13 years behind bars
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. In support of the public prosecution, the prosecutors of the Holosiiv District Prosecutor's Office found the man guilty of intentional murder and sentenced him to 13 years in prison (Part 2, Article 115 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Two other participants in the incident were found guilty of hooliganism and were sentenced to 3 years in prison each. The incident occurred on October 21, 2022, on Akademik Hlushkov Avenue, when a dispute arose between the driver of a Hyundai (military) car and a Lexus driver regarding the right of way. During the conflict, Lexus passengers beat the Hyundai driver, and his driver shot a soldier. The victim died on the spot from his injuries, and the perpetrators left the scene. As reported by ArmyInform, Kharkiv paliya of the cars of Ukrainian defenders was detained.

Title: A series of shelling in the Kherson region: Russian troops injured ten civilians
Description: This was reported by the Kherson Regional Military Administration. According to preliminary data, a 54-year-old woman suffered an explosive injury, a head injury and a leg injury. An 86-year-old woman received an explosive injury and brain contusion. Both victims were hospitalized for medical treatment. Three more people, including two men aged 31 and 62, were also injured by enemy fire. The 31-year-old woman suffered blast injuries, lacerations and broken legs, while the men suffered blast injuries and contusions. All victims are under medical supervision. In addition, at 11:00 a.m. on the same day, Russian troops attacked Havrylivka with the help of unmanned aerial vehicles. The 77-year-old man received a blast injury, shrapnel wounds to the chest, arms and face, as well as a concussion. The victim was hospitalized. A similar attack took place in Stanislav, where a 70-year-old man was injured during enemy fire. He suffered blast injury, contusion and shrapnel wounds to his head, chest, arms and legs. He is currently in hospital. It also became known about one more victim due to the impact of a Russian UAV. A 44-year-old man, who was at the bus stop at the time of the attack, received a blast injury and shrapnel wounds to his leg. Also, around 3:00 p.m., Russian troops shelled Veletenske, as a result of which a 37-year-old man received an explosive injury, a contusion, and a fragmentary forehead wound. He was admitted to the hospital. In Bilozerka, as a result of enemy fire on November 10, a 72-year-old woman who was on the street was injured. She suffered a blast injury, a concussion and a concussion and was hospitalized. In total, nine victims are known at this time. They are given the necessary medical care. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region during the past day due to Russian aggression two people died and one more was injured.

Title: Damage to the dam of the Kurakhiv Reservoir: Donetsk OVA spoke about the consequences
Description: reported this by the head of the Donetsk Regional State Administration, Vadym Filashkin. As of 16:00 on November 12, 15 million cubic meters of water spilled from the Kurakhiv Reservoir. -Fortunately, the villages on the Vovchii River were not flooded. We continue to monitor the situation. In case of significant changes, I will notify you additionally,- the message reads. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on November 11, occupying Russian troops damaged the dam of the Kurakhiv reservoir . After that, the water level in the river within the Velikonovosilkiv community rose by 1.2 meters. November 12 in the Kurakhiv direction invaders attacked 41 times near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Dalnyi and Antonivka. 17 attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The fighting continues, the hottest at the moment near Illinka and Novoselydivka. Enemy aviation struck Kurakhovo, Dalny and Andriivka, dropping ten air defense systems.

Title: Kyiv, Khmelnytskyi, Cherkasy region: accomplices of the Russian Federation who justified the war aga...
Description: The SBU reported this. A former foreign language teacher who called for support for Putin and the takeover of Ukraine on social networks was exposed in Kyiv. A 36-year-old immigrant from Zaporizhzhia was also detained in the capital, who was -streaming- the geolocation of the Ukrainian military, in particular mobile groups of the TCC, to thematic telegram channels. In Cherkasy region, four administrators of anonymous groups were exposed in messengers, who notified evaders about the addresses of roadblocks and gave advice on how to avoid conscription. An immigrant from Donetsk region was detained in Khmelnytskyi, who justified the missile strike by the Rashists on the Okhmatdyt Children's Hospital on the air of a chat-roulette. On the basis of the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service notified the detainees of suspicion (in accordance with the crimes committed) under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Part 1 of Art. 114-1 (obstructing the legal activities of the Armed Forces and other military formations during a special period); Part 1 of Art. 436-2 (justification, recognition as legitimate, denial of armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, glorification of its participants). They face prison sentences. As ArmiyaInform reported, a local propagandist was sentenced to 10 years in prison in Kharkiv.

Title: the Russians were destroyed at the crossing, assaults in the Kurakhiv direction: a stream from the f...
Description: They fought back with drones, artillery and the Leopard tank. The result: 29 eliminated Russians, 19 wounded, two destroyed tanks and six BBM. The Russians are trying to counterattack in Kurshchyna as well. 225 OSHB and other brigades of the Defense Forces are doing well and restraining the enemy. As in 2022, the Russians are storming in columns on the same road, which has already been well shot by our fighters. Armored vehicles burn right on the road, and drones and mortars destroy the Russians who have scattered around the village. -Wild Hornets- are testing and improving the STING interceptor drone. This drone is supposed to intercept -Shakhedi-. Video of the manufacturing and testing process - watch in the stream. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhiy Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: The Ministry of Defense returned 350 hectares of land in six regions of Ukraine
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. These lands are located in the Ternopil, Vinnytsia, Mykolaiv, Kyiv, Odesa and Kirovohrad regions. During the past years, they were illegally removed from the sphere of management of the Ministry of Defense. Now they will be used to strengthen Ukraine's defense capabilities. -In the conditions of a full-scale invasion of Russia, every hectare of defense land must be used for its intended purpose. Alienation of critically important territories is unacceptable. This is a matter of national security, so we should cooperate with the State Geocadaster in a coordinated manner,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. In order to prevent new cases of illegal alienation of land, during 2023-2024, the Ministry of Defense together with the State Geocadastre conducted a state inventory and registered 84 land plots in the State Land Cadastre. The total area of ​​these territories reaches 7,000 hectares. In addition, the Ministry of Defense with the assistance of the State Geocadastre during 2023-2024 conducted an inventory and registered 223 land plots with a total area of ​​15,000 hectares in the State Land Cadastre. It is planned to register another 4,500 hectares by the end of the year. The Ministry of Defense together with the State Geocadastre plan to continue to take all necessary measures to restore the state's right to defense land. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense returned a property complex and a plot of land in Kyiv worth UAH 300 million.

Title: Change of place of service: Rustem Umyerov explained how the new mechanism will work
Description: This was announced by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -Instead of long approvals, now only a copy of the military ticket (or officer's ID) and a letter of recommendation from the new brigade are required. For private and non-commissioned officers, permission from the acting commander is no longer required,- the minister explained. The personnel center of the Armed Forces processes documents according to a clearly defined procedure within 72 hours. If there are no reasons for refusal, the serviceman receives a notification about the result of the review in the Army+ application. And in the case of a negative decision, a notification of the reasons for refusal. Protection of military rights is also provided for: the Ministry of Defense will review unjustified refusals. Transfer is possible no more than once a year, and after 6 months of service in the current unit. The initiative was developed by the Ministry of Defense together with the Armed Forces and public organizations. -This decision is an opportunity for every soldier to more effectively use his experience and skills where they are most needed,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Government adopted a resolution that introduces a real and transparent transfer mechanism for soldiers between military units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The new procedure is planned to be launched on November 15.

Title: The invaders stepped up their attacks: 110 combat clashes per day, the hottest in two directions
Description: informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. Today, the communities of Pavlivka, Zhuravka, Volfine, Vysoke, Basivka, Novenke, Bachivsk, Budky, Khrinivka, Timofiivka, Studenok, and Vodolagi were affected by enemy artillery and mortar fire in Kharkiv Oblast, Chernihiv Oblast, and Sumy Oblast. Basivka and Yunakivka were hit by airstrikes of the terrorist army. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed the positions of our units four times. There is a battle going on in the Vovchanska region. The enemy also carried out airstrikes by air defense systems on Liptsi and Vilchi region. In the Kupyansk direction, since the beginning of the century, the Russian occupiers have been conducting offensive operations near Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Kruglyakivka, and Lozova. Five skirmishes are ongoing. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked twice near Novomykhailivka and Torsky. Conducted airstrikes on Thorny. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers, with the support of bomber aircraft, tried five times to dislodge our units from their positions in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka districts, and the battle is currently ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy carried out 24 assaults in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Hryhorivka, Pustinka and Novooleksiiivka settlements. The defense forces of Ukraine restrained the onslaught of Russian troops and repelled 13 attacks, currently nine battles are still going on. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 41 times near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Dalny and Antonivka. 17 attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The fighting is ongoing - the hottest at the moment near Illinka and Novoselidovka. Enemy aviation struck Kurakhovo, Dalny and Andriivka, dropping ten anti-aircraft missiles. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy attacked the positions of our defenders near Rivnopol, Novodarivka and Trudovoy nine times. Six battles continue, Temyrivka, Zelene Pole, Velyka Novosilka and Rozdolne were also hit by enemy bombing and attack aircraft. In the Orikhov direction, the activity of enemy aviation is noted, the shelling of populated areas and the positions of our troops does not stop. Zaporizhzhia, Kamianske, Mala Tokmachka and Stepnohirsk were hit. In the Dnieper direction, Ukrainian soldiers repelled two enemy attacks, another battle is ongoing. In Kurshchyna, the defense forces repelled seven enemy attacks, seven clashes are ongoing, today the enemy carried out eight airstrikes, dropping 11 guided air bombs on its territory. In other areas, the situation has not undergone significant changes. As reported by ArmyInform, armored attacks, small groups, landing on the bridgehead: in the South, the occupiers use different tactics.

Title: The enemy attacked Kharkiv with drones, there are wounded
Description: reported this by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. As a result of the impact, two women were injured: 50 years old and 53 years old. They had an acute reaction to stress and light shrapnel injuries, and they had to be hospitalized. The impact of the UAV damaged electrical resistance, window glazing in two high-rise buildings. Later, another drone hit in the Slobid district of Kharkiv. There is damage to an 11-story residential building. A 60-year-old woman was injured as a result of the UAV strike, medical assistance is provided on the spot. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of rocket attacks on Kharkiv in the evening of November 11 three civilians were injured.

Title: Transfer to the Armed Forces through Army+: The government adopted a special resolution
Description: This was announced by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The new transfer mechanism was developed jointly with civil society, the Ministry of Defense and the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The initiative was agreed at the October meeting with civil society organizations and is now being implemented. Transfers will take place through the -Army+- application. The process allows for 72 hours to review the soldier's report, after which he will receive a response in the application. In case of refusal, clear reasons will be provided, and in case of approval, a clear solution. The Ministry of Defense will monitor the effectiveness of the new mechanism, which is planned to be launched from November 15. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense told about the training of volunteers of the Ukrainian Legion.

Title: The Russian army attacked Kharkiv with S-300 and -Grom E-1- missiles
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. According to the investigation, on the evening of November 11, around 10:00 p.m., Russian troops launched a missile attack on the Novobavarsky district of the city. As a result of the attack, windows were broken and facades of apartment buildings were damaged. Three local residents — a 34-year-old woman and two men aged 22 and 38 — suffered acute stress reactions. It was preliminarily established that the attack was caused by a S-300/400 missile. In 10 minutes, at 10:10 p.m., Russian troops carried out an airstrike on Kholodnohirsky district. The rocket hit an open area, damaging residential buildings and a main water pipeline. There are no casualties. According to preliminary data, the attack was carried out by the Grom E-1 hybrid missile. Prosecutors and police investigators continue to document war crimes committed by the Russian military. As reported by ArmyInform, shelling in Donetsk region: the fire caused significant destruction in Kostyantynivka and Pokrovsk.

Title: The Ministry of Defense invites manufacturers to a meeting on the development and improvement of tan...
Description: About this notified in the MOU. -‎The Ministry of Defense is actively working to provide our servicemen with the highest quality uniforms that will correspond to the realities of the modern battlefield,- - emphasized Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. According to him, the latest technologies, in particular in the production of fabrics and materials, will allow not only to increase comfort, but also to ensure maximum efficiency and reliability of the equipment of our defenders. Together with the manufacturers, it is necessary to determine ways to achieve these goals. Among the main tasks of the meeting: Date: November 14, 2024. The place and time of the meeting will be confirmed through the next central department of the development of material support of the Ministry of Defense (067-967-28-65), after confirmation of registration. The Ministry of Defense requests confirmation of participation by November 13, 2024 by phone or e-mail gur_smz@post.mil.gov.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine made changes in the rules of material security of military personnel. In particular, the return of inventory property by military personnel has been simplified. There are also new elements of uniforms that meet NATO standards.

Title: -Wander through mined fields, or hide in holes-: the occupiers continue to senselessly destroy their...
Description: The head of the communications service told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- public relations officer of the 118th separate mechanized brigade, Senior Lieutenant Dmytro Pelikh. According to Dmytro Pelikh, the tactics of the occupiers now consist in the systematic destruction of their own manpower. After all, they continue to send from one to two dozen attack aircraft to our positions every day to a senseless death. -They just go to our positions. They wander through mined fields or hide in small holes until they get to know the work of our gunners, mortars or drone pilots,- said Dmytro Pelikh. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Southern direction, the enemy is especially actively storming in the Vremiv direction - towards Velika Novosilka.

Title: The expositor of the Ministry of Defense, who reduced fines by UAH 93.5 million, was notified of sus...
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, the suspect concluded contracts with enterprises controlled by the Lviv businessman for more than UAH 1.5 billion. According to these contracts, the enterprises were supposed to supply the Ministry of Defense with military clothing within a certain period. However, at that time, these enterprises did not even have the production capacity to fulfill the terms of the contracts in a timely manner. In order to avoid the imposition of large fines, the entrepreneurs asked the suspect to list them and reduce them as much as possible. For this purpose, the official of the Ministry of Defense unnecessarily concluded additional agreements, which extended the terms of delivery of goods. In this way, fines issued for overdue contracts were reduced from almost UAH 98 million to UAH 4.5 million, i.e. by UAH 93.5 million. Currently, the question of selecting a preventive measure for the suspect is being resolved. Pre-trial investigation and operational support is carried out by the SBI. We will remind, according to the Ministry of Defense task, more than a billion hryvnias of damage during the purchase of low-quality clothing for the Armed Forces sudytymut-grupu-postachalnykiv-neyakisnogo-odyagu-dlya-zsu/-> the pretrial investigation of five members of the criminal organization has been completed. It is about a Lviv businessman, his son, two directors and a company representative. The court kept the suspects in custody. zsu/->in the case of the supply of low-quality uniforms for the Armed Forces.

Title: - You will be either for the army or in the army. All. Otherwise we won't survive-: the story of a t...
Description: — 2014 was a shock for everyone. I couldn't understand what was going on. I served and was discharged from the Soviet Army at the turn of the century, 1991-1993. Well, how is it: to find yourself with former comrades in the service on different sides of the barricades? This puzzle did not come together in my head. But time passed and I understood: there is no way back for us. We had perhaps the only chance in history to become a truly independent and integrated state. Because we had no way of dealing with the state. All this time we had small, as I call them, -states-: Khmelnytskyi, Hrushevskyi… Now I understand why, according to history, Khmelnytskyi was framed for us, and not Mazepa, considering him a traitor. Although in reality it was the other way around: it was Peter who betrayed Mazepa, not Mazepa Peter. Peter promised Mazepa a hetmanate and a separate state, but he did not fulfill his promise… Yes, I had volunteer friends. And then I strummed something for myself on the guitar. Well, they persuaded me to go. It was in 2016. I drove it once, drove it twice, and -got sick- of it myself. It's like in zombie movies: I was bitten by a wild volunteer - and became a volunteer myself (laughs - Author). At first, they carried some staples, banner film, and all kinds of things. Well, he sang, of course. And then there was the festival -Songs born in ATO-… — If we take the classic volunteer path, many of the volunteers during the ATO period themselves eventually joined the army for a contract. Didn't think about it then? - I thought. But I was not taken. They said it was old and no one needed it. Yes, I can't run long distances. But I won't run away at the same time (laughs - Author). Therefore, at that time, I only had to ride with songs and raise the fighting spirit. I didn't count how many concerts I did. I just collected chevrons and now I have over 400 of them. I was in some units several times, but I don't count it. All boys are heroes to me. I do not separate combat positions and non-combat positions. Here are the guys at the RAO warehouses. Someone has to ship shells or rockets for -hail-. They have hard labor. But they are often forgotten. Or cooks, drivers. A hungry paratrooper does not win for a long time. And the cook, in order to feed the paratroopers, has to wake up at 4 in the morning, heat up his stove and cook almost until night, regardless of whether something flies nearby or not. People are all wonderful. They just need to be reminded of it. Moral support is very important. People seem to straighten up after stress. Eyes burn again. They approach, thank - and that's it for an hour of the concert. There were units where things were difficult at first. The boys are depressed, depressed. There are commanders who consider it unnecessary to praise or encourage their soldiers. But this is wrong. A person should feel that he is respected, valued. So, along the way, the functions of the MPZ were also replaced somewhere. We drove exclusively on -zeros-. The main condition was that the combat unit had to be. There is enough entertainment in the rear even without us. We used to gather in dugouts, where the booths are 800 meters away. Now the war has moved to a new format - drones, cabs. It is not even possible to go out, not to sing songs. —Nevertheless, now you are a soldier of the Special Presidential Brigade. It's not so old and useless after all? - And it couldn't be any other way. You just do what you have to do. On February 20, 2022, he played a concert at the Docker G pub, returned to Vinnytsia, collected his -anxious suitcase-, documents and began to wait. I didn't know exactly when it would be, but I knew it would happen for sure. On the 24th, my friend helped to take the family to the private sector, and I went to the Public Health Service. Well, as a TrO — in fact, it turned out to be the DFTG under the mayor's command. We were expecting an attack from Moldova, from Transnistria, where Russian troops were. A reserve assault company was formed, somewhere around 60 men, half of whom had fought and half who had not. Those who did not have - took experience from veterans. They fired from automatic weapons, from machine guns, from grenade launchers. Weapons were taken from the TCC. They just came and took boxes. The time was such that everyone understood that we had better not refuse. And in about three months we were disbanded. We surrendered our weapons and went home. I tried to live a normal peaceful life for a while, I went to work. However, I understood - no, I can't. He went to Kyiv, joined the Presidential Brigade and went to the medical commission. - Why did they choose the Presidential Brigade? - Because they have an orchestra. The main thing that motivated me was that I should benefit the army, not be a pawn for it. I can raise the morale of the soldiers, earn money for the brigade, donate to its charity fund. Now the intensity and nature of hostilities is completely different. It is almost impossible for civilians to get to the front lines. And now I ride not just as Sanya Klets, but as a representative of the Special Presidential Brigade, a representative of the Honor Guard Orchestra. - And how did you manage to pass the medical board, if the brothers refused earlier? - The doctor initially refused to sign, saying that you are of limited fitness. I say, I have armor at all, I could sit at home, but I can't. I have to do something. The head of the VLK looked at me and said to the doctor: -Write what is suitable- (laughs - Author). — Has the repertoire changed now compared to the ATO times? — Yes. Of course. Became tougher. I began to hate the Russian woman. The whole If before there was hatred only for the military - for Debaltsevo, for Ilovaisk, then after Buchi, after Irpen, after the people in the wells, I hate them all. Together with civilians. Although I understand that it is better for the military to sing not about hatred, but about life and love, about the same fishing. So that they remember why they are here. That at home they are awaited and loved. The war will affect everyone. There will not be a single family in Ukraine without either a soldier or a volunteer. You will either be for the army or in the army. All. Otherwise, we will not survive. - And what songs are the most popular, the most popular? - -4.5.0- is a popular song. What in the time of ATO, what now. I don't know how many times I've sung it. It is about everything: about love, about war, about brothers. He himself prefers -Envelope- - -envelope in me, envelop yourself, as if there is no other in the world- (sings - Author)… I'm a lyricist at heart. Well, he recently wrote a lullaby for children. —How does a lyricist feel in the army? Don't you feel like you've been a little overheated? Because quite often we had to hear from creative people that they were -not born for war-, that the army is only for warriors, not for poets? - And no one is born for war. War is the opposite of human nature. However, what to do if we have such an annoying neighbor? For which we have no right to exist at all, as a state, as a nation? To obey and become like them? Should I choose my independence? Everyone should do what they can do. You can hold a weapon in your hands - keep it. Can't - help others hold. Now in the army, even in the rear, almost half of the positions are vacant. What, lyricists can't type on a computer? Reports can't type? At the same time, can't MPZ (moral and psychological support - Author) maintain fighting spirit? I got lucky with the crew. Good luck with the commanders. And the brigadier general, and the deputy brigadier general from the MPZ, and the head of the orchestra are all responsible people who do not care what is happening in the unit, who are focused on the development of the unit, and not on any personal career growth. That's why we always find a common language. Our brigade fights in battalions along the entire front line. The boys took part in the toughest competitions: Bakhmut, Klishchiivka, Avdiivka, Soledar, Vovchansk. Pride takes such people! And here's what I would like to say: guys! Don't wait for summons! Now there is an opportunity to mobilize without TCC directly into the brigade. So look for a department you trust, look for a position where you can handle the tasks and where you will be useful. Understand, the way things are going - everyone will fight. Someone to shoot, and someone to carry the cartridges. Now you have the opportunity to choose what you will do. However, when the summons comes, get to where there will be the greatest need for people. So act! This is the greatest challenge of our lives today. We are not fighting for power, not for some amorphous state. We fight to stay who we are. Ihor Zhivytsa for ArmiyaInform

Title: Shelling in Donetsk region: the fire caused significant destruction in Kostyantynivka and Pokrovsk
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky District: In Kurakhovo, the reservoir dam and a significant number of houses were damaged. 8 houses were damaged in Dachny, 3 in Hannivka, and 2 in Veseli Hay. A residential building and a shopping pavilion were also damaged in Pokrovsk. Kramatorsk district: One house was damaged in Lyman, 8 in Kryvyi Luka, and two houses were destroyed in Zakytny. As a result of shelling, one person was injured in Kramatorsk and Bilenky. 22 houses and power lines were damaged in Kostyantynivka, one person was injured and 6 houses were damaged in Mykolaivka. Bakhmut district: In Seversk, two houses were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, a person was injured, 4 private houses, a high-rise building and two industrial buildings were damaged. 257 people, including 16 children, were evacuated from the territory of hostilities. Shelling continues, the situation remains tense.

Title: The Ministry of Defense told about the training of volunteers of the Ukrainian Legion
Description: About this reported in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. After signing the contracts, a group of volunteers went to the military training ground of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Poland to undergo basic military training. According to the representative of the -Ukrainian Legion- command, Lt. Col. Petro Horkusha, the basic training course will last 35 days. After that, servicemen will be able to continue their studies in selected military accounting specialties at NATO bases in Europe. -As of today, the recruiting center of the -Ukrainian Legion- has received almost 700 applications from citizens of Ukraine living in Poland, the Czech Republic, Germany, Ireland and other countries. After passing the military medical commission, relevant checks and signing contracts, they will also join the ranks of the legion,- said Petro Horkusha. Basic training of recruits will be conducted under the leadership of Polish instructors using modern weapons of NATO countries. Commanders of the Armed Forces of Ukraine who have combat experience will also take part in the training. The Consul General of Ukraine in Lublin, Oleg Kuts, commenting on the signing of the contracts of the first group of volunteers, noted: -This is an important step that demonstrates the determination of Ukrainians who, while abroad, are ready to defend their Motherland. Our consulate, together with the embassy and all Ukrainian diplomatic institutions in the world, supports the -Ukrainian Legion- and provides comprehensive support to all those who want to join its ranks. The recruiting center of the -Ukrainian Legion- in Lublin continues to accept applications from citizens of Ukraine for service in the military unit. Applications can be submitted through the official website of the Ukrainian Legion or through Ukrainian consulates and embassies in Europe. ArmyInform reminds you of the opportunity to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine clarified the process of standard tests for weapons and equipment
Description: About this wrote on the website of the Ministry of Defense. Type tests are an important stage in the process of evaluating the effectiveness of changes made to the design or production technology of serial products. They are conducted in order to assess the impact of changes on the technical and tactical operational characteristics of the product. Tests are carried out on samples of OVT, in the design or technology of which the proposed changes have already been made. The scope of such tests is determined by the program and methods developed by the manufacturer in accordance with DSTU B 15.211. Typical tests can be carried out both at the test bases of the manufacturers themselves, and at specialized testing organizations, such as the State Research Institute for Testing and Certification of Armaments and Military Equipment, or at enterprises with an appropriate test base. Test results are recorded in the form of an Act and protocols that reflect all test results. If the results confirm the effectiveness of the changes, they are included in the working design documentation in accordance with DSTU B 15.902. To register changes in the technical conditions for the OVT sample, it is necessary to contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment via e-mail mdalc@mil .ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the first group of volunteers from the Ukrainian Legion zsu/->signed contracts with the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The commanders of the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the Danish Navy discussed joint project...
Description: About this notified the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces . During the meeting, the commanders discussed the current situation in the Azov-Black Sea region and joint steps to strengthen our defense. In particular, the projects are aimed at the development of missile systems, surface and underwater unmanned systems, which are of strategic importance for countering threats at sea. Rear Admiral Henrik Rüberg expressed readiness to deepen cooperation in these areas. Vice-Admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa thanked the Danish delegation for the decisive and consistent support of Ukraine since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. -Denmark is one of our reliable partners, including in strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities. And our cooperation is not just an exchange of experience, but partnership work aimed at defeating the enemy, strengthening Ukraine and protecting our people,- he said. Ukrainian military sailors demonstrated the boat's maneuverability, maneuverability, technical equipment and ability to quickly perform tasks. Also, according to a long-standing tradition, foreign guests together with representatives of the command of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine honored the memory of the fallen heroes who gave their lives for the freedom of Ukraine.

Title: -Urgently increased the recruiting team to process requests-: the brigades are returning en masse fr...
Description: Vyacheslav Smirnov told about this on the -Suspilne Novyni- broadcast. head of the recruiting department of the 47th separate mechanized brigade. According to Vyacheslav Smirnov, the 47th Separate Mechanized Brigade used to receive dozens of appeals every month from military personnel who voluntarily left their units and now wanted to return to service. But there were especially many such appeals when the first statements from the authorities were heard that the brigades would receive a good tool for returns. -And when we got this tool, opened the door and said we're working, I'll tell you this - the request was so effective that we urgently needed to increase the recruiting team. In order to process all requests,- assured Vyacheslav Smirnov. As reported ArmyInform, two mechanized brigades of the Armed Forces of Ukraine appealed to servicemen who voluntarily left their parts, with a call to return to service.

Title: She dreamed of Kharkiv as part of the Russian Federation: the administrator of pro-Russian telegram ...
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. The court found her guilty of disseminating materials calling for actions aimed at changing the borders of the territory and the state border of Ukraine, collaborative activities, production and distribution of materials containing objections to the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine (Part 1 of Article 110, Part Article 111-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine, Part 2, Article 436-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. Prosecutors proved that due to her active participation in anti-Ukrainian chat rooms, the woman from Kharkiv came into the field of view of the special services of the Russian Federation. In January 2023, she received an offer to become the administrator of a number of Telegram channels that spread Kremlin narratives and publish posts justifying the armed aggression of the Russian Federation. In the posts posted by the woman, it was claimed that it was the Ukrainian military that was shelling the residential buildings of civilians. The convict wrote about her dreams of the -liberation- of Kharkiv as soon as possible, identified it as a -Russian city-, praised the soldiers of the Russian Federation and called Russia -mother-. The illegal nature of the convict's statements was confirmed by the conclusion of the semantic-linguistic examination. She was waiting for the trial in custody. During the trial, the woman admitted her guilt in full.

Title: -Pee-pee-vishka and the cry of a tank-: non-standard memories of a Russian prisoner from the Kursk r...
Description: This is reported by the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -First pee-pee-pee, then the tank screamed,- is how a captured Russian soldier described his experience of being captured by Ukrainian rangers. After a powerful tank attack at close range, the Russian remained alive and was captured by our soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, I saw how the heads of our prisoners were cut off - in Kurshchyna, a -very rotten- fighter was captured brigades-

Title: Armored attacks, small groups, landing on a bridgehead: in the South, the occupiers use different ta...
Description: This was told by the spokesman of -Tavria- OUV, Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. According to Vladyslav Voloshyn, the occupiers are trying to attack, but they do it differently at each stage. So, for example, in the Vremivsk direction, groups of infantry, supported by fire from armored vehicles, are attacking. -The enemy is using the so-called infiltration tactics in the Orikhov direction. As for, for example, the island zone, the enemy on watercraft is trying to land inconspicuously on the territory under our control,- Vladyslav Voloshyn said. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the occupiers are accumulating forces and resources, carrying out reconnaissance and advancing to advanced positions in the South of Ukraine.

Title: More than UAH 55 billion have been earmarked for the production of weapons in the 2025 state budget ...
Description: reported the Minister of Strategic Industries of Ukraine Herman Smetanin. -54.55 billion. These funds will go to the development of production, the development and implementation of new technologies, the expansion of production capacities for the manufacture of defense products. This is more than was allocated for 2024 — about 51 billion,- the minister said. Another UAH 500 million has been allocated to the program of affordable loans for defense enterprises. This program was created this year, and allows producers to take loans at 5% per annum. The remaining interest will be covered by the state budget.

Title: The Ukrainian Legion in Poland: the first volunteers signed contracts with the Armed Forces
Description: This was reported by -Ukrinform-. The contract signing procedure took place at the recruiting center at the Consulate General of Ukraine in the Polish city of Lublin. According to the procedure, the head of the recruiting center asked each of the volunteers in turn to sign the contract, which they had read in advance. The representative of the recruiting center, Petro Horkusha, noted that as of today, more than 600 people have applied to join the Ukrainian Legion. The -Ukrainian Legion- initiative, which aims to attract Ukrainians abroad to the Defense Forces of Ukraine, officially began recruiting new recruits in October. After the signing of the contract, the training of volunteers will take place at the training ground deployed by the Polish side. Ukraine provided uniforms and rear support, and Polish partners provided weapons and equipment. The recruiting process takes place through the submission of applications on the official website of the Ukrainian Legion or through consulates and embassies. Volunteers from the Ukrainian Legion can sign a contract either for a fixed term (three years) or until the end of a special period. Detailed information about the conditions for joining the Ukrainian Legion can be found on the official website a>. ArmyInform reminds you of the opportunity to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Rescuers freed two people in Stepnohirsk after a powerful airstrike
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia Regional Military Administration. The rescuers promptly freed the victims, and, fortunately, they did not need medical assistance. It also became known that in Primorsky Russian military attacked a bus with civilians using an FPV drone. The -Bohdan- bus, which was transporting civilians from front-line villages, was damaged. Fortunately, none of the passengers were injured. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Zaporizhzhia region there are more than 430 shellings per day, there are wounded and destruction.

Title: Army athletes won two bronze medals at the World Sambo Championship
Description: This was reported to ArmiyaInform by the Department of Physical Culture and Sports of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -At the World Sambo Championship for men and women, which took place from November 8 to 10, 2024 in the city of Astana (Republic of Kazakhstan), and where athletes from more than 80 countries participated, the athletes-instructors of the masters team from individual Olympic sports of the 7th sports club (Bila Tserkva), senior lieutenant Nataliya Smal (weight category 72 kg) and chief sergeant Maria Buyok (weight category 50 kg) won two bronze awards,- the message says.

Title: The Ministry of Defense called for the acceleration of the second tranche of funds from the frozen a...
Description: About this declared the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Serhiy Boev during the meeting of the directors of defense policy of the EU countries in Brussels. Serhii Boev thanked the countries that have already invested in the Ukrainian defense industry and called on other states to actively participate. He emphasized that 400 million euros from the first tranche of frozen Russian assets have already been directed to support the -Danish model- of production, and the expected second tranche in the amount of 1.9 billion euros can significantly increase Ukraine's ability to produce ammunition, air defense systems and missiles. During the speech, Serhii Boyev also introduced European partners to the key points of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi's Victory Plan and informed about the situation at the front, in particular, the active participation of the DPRK in the military escalation in Ukraine. He emphasized that in October, Russia launched more than 2,000 Shahed drones, which once again emphasizes the need to increase the number of air defense systems and ammunition. The deputy minister thanked the European Union for the supply of artillery ammunition and the adoption of the Ammunition Production Support Act, which will contribute to the increase of production capacity in Europe and help Ukraine replenish stocks. In addition, Serhii Boev expressed his gratitude for the extension of the mandate of the EU mission to train the Ukrainian military and called to consider the possibility of expanding this mission to the territory of Ukraine, which would reduce the logistical burden and improve the effectiveness of the exercises. During the meeting, they also discussed the issue of blocked aid from the European Peace Fund in the amount of 6.6 billion euros, which should be received by EU countries to compensate for the costs of armed support to Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian intelligence gets access to space images.

Title: -We heard four terrible explosions-: in the suburb of Kramatorsk, the occupiers hit a school and doz...
Description: The shelling around 4:10 p.m. on November 11 was repeated, as a result of desyatky-budynkiv/->first strike with three UMPB D-30SN air bombs destroyed dozens of private houses in the city. According to the information of Kramatorsk of the City Council during the second shelling four hits occurred, about 30 buildings were damaged by the explosions. One casualty was reported, a 16-year-old boy who was treated. Correspondents of ArmiyaInform visited the place of the event. Several private estates at the sites of the explosions were almost completely destroyed. The power of the explosions is evidenced by fragments of bricks and glass scattered over dozens of meters, mutilated and burnt cars. -We heard four terrible explosions,- said a local resident. - This house was completely destroyed, and in all around us, the slate on the roofs was broken, the windows were broken. I hope they will help us with something to cover the destruction, give us materials. Utility workers, emergency crews of gas workers and electricians are already working at the sites of enemy strikes. They remove debris and construction debris, detect possible gas leaks, and fix broken power lines. One of the munitions hit the sports field in the yard of a local school. At the site of the explosion, there is a deep hole in the asphalt surface. The chemical stench of the explosives had already dissipated overnight, but was still noticeable. The school building was seriously damaged. The blast waves from the impacts from different sides of the school — in the private residential sector and on the sports field — were of such force that they not only broke the windows, but also tore out the glass panes from the windows and bent the front doors. School staff, teachers and parents have already gathered to help clear the debris and temporarily cover windows. -The school is in a village, the school is beautiful - walk through the classrooms and see for yourself,- says Olena Kushnyrenko, who acts as the school's director. Bright, tidy classrooms with recent repairs, new furniture and educational equipment, numerous books testify to the teacher's words. At the time of the explosions, only the person on duty was in the school. Fortunately, the teachers had already left at that moment. - There was nothing and no one here. -There were no soldiers at the school or near us,- says the woman. — I don't see a motive, I don't see any reason either. It is noticeable how she and her colleagues are hurting because of the destruction. She talks about the school as her own home - dignity, just as a local resident talked about her own dilapidated house. While we are talking, a few more people come up to us, say hello and get to work. After a rough night of shelling, they all face a long, hard day of rescuing a ruined building. Earlier, ArmyInform published photos of the consequences shelling of Kramatorsk with three UMPB D-30SN aerial bombs, as a result of which dozens of houses were damaged. Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: President: No rescue service has faced such challenges as Ukrainian ones
Description: The head of state wrote about this in his Telegram channel. He emphasized that no rescue service in the world faced such challenges as Ukrainian rescue services. Every day, they work in extremely difficult conditions, often under fire or the threat of repeated strikes, but continue to respond immediately to any challenge. Volodymyr Zelenskyy thanked everyone who saves lives, clears rubble, provides first aid, extinguishes fires and eliminates the consequences of enemy attacks in order to protect people and preserve their lives. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kryvyi Rih from the ruins of the house damaged by the Russians, the bodies of three children and their mother were unblocked.

Title: Ukrainian intelligence gets access to space pictures
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. Ukraine signed a strategic contract with the ICEYE company, which is a leader in the field of SAR satellites. Thanks to this agreement, the Ukrainian military will have access to high-precision space images with full coverage of the combat area. According to the head of the defense department, this will allow the command to quickly determine priority surveillance areas and quickly receive up-to-date data to improve the effectiveness of combat operations. The contract was made possible thanks to the support of the German government and the Rheinmetall concern, which took part in the agreement. The Minister of Defense thanked international partners for their help and trust. -The introduction of advanced space intelligence technologies creates a technological advantage, increasing the combat capability of our military and protecting them on the battlefield,- Rustem Umyerov noted. As ArmyInform reported, Rustem Umyerov told of the EU delegation about the possibilities of Ukrainian production of UAVs.

Title: Massive night strike: Ukraine repelled an attack by 110 enemy drones
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. Also, the enemy attacked with 110 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of an unknown type from the Kursk, Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Bryansk regions - Russian Federation. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, units of electronic warfare, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 11:00 a.m., the downing of 46 enemy UAVs in Kyiv, Zhytomyr, Poltava, Sumy, Kharkiv, Cherkasy, Zaporizhzhya, Chernihiv, Dnipropetrovsk, and Mykolaiv regions was confirmed. In addition, 60 enemy drones were lost in different regions of Ukraine, two Russian UAVs left Ukrainian airspace in the direction of Belarus. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kryvyi Rih from the ruins of the house damaged by the Russians, the bodies of three children and their mother were unblocked.

Title: -The enemy is actually demobilizing its combat-ready units-: many of the enemy's attack aircraft are...
Description: Orest Drymalovskyi, a representative of the press service, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- 79th Airborne Assault Brigade of the Tavriya Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to Orest Drymalovskyi, the positions of the 79th brigade – this is actually the point of the main attack of the Russian forces in the direction. The enemy attacks to level their front line. -The enemy is actually demobilizing its combat-ready units in these battles. Many units have already lost combat capability and have been rotated or regrouped. Other cannon fodder is coming in, armored vehicles are being replenished and they are continuing to storm the positions of the 79th in this area,- said a representative of the press service of the 79th Tavrian Assault Brigade of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of the Ukrainian SSR. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupying Russian troops are trying push through the defenses around the city of Kurakhove and break through to the settlement of Uspenivka.

Title: Two Ukrainian prisoners of war were killed by Russians: details of the crime
Description: This was reported by the Coordinating Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. Crimes against Ukrainian prisoners have become regular: almost every week there are new reports of murders committed by the Russian military. Such actions are a gross violation of international humanitarian law and qualify as war crimes that do not have a statute of limitations. Modern means of surveillance make it possible to document these crimes and identify the perpetrators. All collected evidence, including statements of released prisoners, video recordings and radio intercepts, is handed over to the Security Service of Ukraine, the National Police and the Prosecutor General's Office for investigation and prosecution. The coordination headquarters also emphasized that orders to kill Ukrainian prisoners are given by commanders, who thus endanger the lives of their own subordinates, because they are afraid to surrender, realizing the consequences of their actions. All cases of war crimes are thoroughly investigated, and criminals will be punished in accordance with international and Ukrainian law. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on November 11, during the monitoring of information in social networks a publication with a video recording of the alleged shooting of two unarmed Ukrainian servicemen by representatives of the Soviet Union of the Russian Federation in the Kursk direction was discovered.

Title: -Black day for the Russian occupiers-: in the Kursk region -Magura- staged a massacre of stormtroope...
Description: Anastasiya Blyshchyk, press officer, told about this on the air of the -Edyny Novyny- telethon 47th separate mechanized brigade. According to Anastasia Blyshchyk, the Russians attacked on a large scale and brazenly - they tried to -fly in- on airborne vehicles into populated areas. -Yesterday was a rainy day for the Russian invaders, who tried to storm in 5-6 rounds. 10 units of armored vehicles were destroyed. Three armored personnel carriers were blown up by mines, other equipment was destroyed with the help of FPV drones, as well as an anti-tank missile “Stugna,'- said the press officer of the 47th separate mechanized brigade. As reported ArmyInform, fighters of the 47th mechanized brigade captured a Russian from the 155th brigade Marines of the Pacific Fleet on the territory of Kurshchyna. According to him, he witnessed the execution of soldiers of the Defense Forces.

Title: Ukraine has created an Interagency Group for Maritime Security Coordination
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The group will work as a focal point, bringing together the efforts of various departments and experts. This will make it possible to ensure a systematic approach to the implementation of the maritime security policy and effectively implement strategic decisions. The key directions of the group's work are: The group will have the authority to organize expert discussions, involve specialists and analyze the implementation of the Strategy. Not only representatives of state bodies, but also local self-government representatives and independent experts can be involved in its work. Special attention will be paid to international cooperation. The group will contribute to studying the experience of leading maritime states and establishing partnerships with international organizations. This will help implement the best global practices in the field of maritime security and strengthen international support for Ukraine. The Ministry of Defense will coordinate the work of the group. The interdepartmental working group was created to implement the decision of the NSDC dated July 17, 2024 -On the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine-, approved by the Decree of the President of Ukraine No. 468/2024. Group meetings will be held at least quarterly, with the possibility of online meetings to respond promptly to urgent issues. As reported by ArmyInform, Rustem Umyerov told of the EU delegation about the possibilities of Ukrainian production of UAVs.

Title: In the Kupyan region, a corrections officer was detained, who leaked the combat positions of the Arm...
Description: The SBU reported this. The main targets of the enemy were the headquarters, fortified areas and firing positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the front zone. As the investigation established, the adjuster turned out to be a local unemployed man who was -noticed- by the FSB because of his pro-Kremlin comments on Russian Telegram channels. After recruitment, the traitor went around the district center and the surrounding territory, where he secretly recorded the location and movement routes of the Ukrainian defenders. For each -merged- location of the Defense Forces, the occupiers promised a monetary reward, but the agent never received the enemy's funds. The SBU employees exposed the adjuster in advance and detained him in his own apartment. During the search, a mobile phone with evidence of his communication with the FSB was seized from the suspect. Investigators of the Security Service informed the agent of suspicion under part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The investigation is ongoing. The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property.

Title: Operation -Disposal-: enemy attack aircraft in the Seversky direction are destroyed in a -non-stop- ...
Description: said Stepan Barna, platoon commander, UAV of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss-.
