According to Stepan Barna, among other things, units of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss- manage to replenish the exchange fund with prisoners. Prisoners of different nationalities and different social statuses — from emigrants to Wagner prisoners. Everyone's motivation is the same - to make money, but not everyone manages to get paid for murders. -On average, 5 to 10 people are successfully disposed of every day. They are trying to gain a foothold - we successfully destroy them with the help of unmanned aerial systems. And so it happens without stopping,- assured the commander of the UAV platoon 10 OGSHBr. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Severskyi direction, operators of the -GALA drones company- of the -Revenge- offensive guard brigade and the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss- burned T-90M and BMP-2.

Title: -Soldiers took away chainsaws, new shoes-, ― interception of GUR about the looting of Russians in th...
Description: This was reported by GUR MOU. Also, a local man is outraged by the order to pay for the gas consumed by the Russian military, who expelled the villagers and occupied their houses. -They kicked us out and made us pay. We don't live there - what are we going to pay for? -They went to...y,- the resident of Belgorod region reasonably remarked. -The GUR MOU reminds that there will be a fair retribution for every war crime committed against Ukraine,- the intelligence officers emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensbky stated that Ukrainian forces are now holding back a 50,000-strong Russian group in Kruska Oblast.

Title: Estonia announced a new package of military aid to Ukraine
Description: This is stated in the minister's post on the social network Kh. Hanno Pevkur also announced new aid packages for the coming year. 0.25% of the country's GDP will be allocated to them. The relevant provisions were recorded in the bilateral security agreement. -Met with the President of Ukraine and confirmed our further military support. On the way to his office, he also electronically signed a new package of military aid — clothing, small arms, etc. New packages will arrive next year (0.25% of GDP),- the message reads. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Hanno Pevkur the day before met in Kyiv with the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The ministers discussed the possibilities of attracting additional funding for the development of our defense production. Estonian partners emphasized their willingness to invest more and work on speeding up the conclusion of relevant agreements.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi met with volunteers Igor Lachenkov and Serhiy Sternenko
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At the meeting, they discussed a number of issues that are urgent for the daily life of all members of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Starting from the technological innovations implemented in the military, to the current problems of the consolidation of society around the army. The participants of the conversation agreed that such meetings are useful, given the possibility of constructive discussion. -Such a practice will contribute to the leveling of the enemy's destructive influence on the personnel and Ukrainian society in the future,- – noted in the General Staff of the Armed Forces. The meeting was held under the coordination and assistance of Dmytro Lytvyn, adviser to the President of Ukraine on communications. The meeting was also attended by the head of the Military Law and Order Service of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Vitaly Levchenko, and the head of the Main Department of Psychological Support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Andriy Martynov.

Title: Two people died in Kherson Oblast due to Russian strikes
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Mykhailivka, Stanislav, Beryslav, Antonivka, Mykilske, Sablukivka, Odradrokam’yanka, Vesele, Sadove, Sofiivka, Osokorivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. the Russian military targeted educational and medical institutions and a cultural institution; residential quarters of populated areas of the region, in particular, damaged a high-rise building and 8 private houses. The occupiers also vandalized the garage and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers rushinavannya/->fired 432 blows on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region, two people were injured.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: In the Zaporizhzhia region, there are more than 430 shellings per day, there are injuries and destru...
Description: Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya Regional State Administration, announced this. A 30-year-old man and a 71-year-old woman were injured as a result of Russian attacks in the Vasyliv district. Russian troops carried out three air strikes on Zaporozhye. 235 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghira and Olgivske. 13 shellings from multiple rocket launchers covered Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Novodarivka and Mala Tokmachka. 181 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghir, and Olhivsko. 41 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kryvyi Rih as a result of a Russian attack -materi-ta-3-yiyi-ditej/->three children and their mother died.

Title: At the front, there were 187 combat clashes per day, most of them in two directions
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces as of 08:00 on November 12. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy launched four missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas, using four missiles, as well as 84 airstrikes, dropping 145 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, he carried out more than five thousand attacks on populated areas and positions of our troops, 107 of them from rocket salvo systems, and involved about one and a half thousand kamikaze drones for destruction. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units in the Vovchansk area eight times without success. The settlement of Kozacha Lopan was hit by an airstrike, on which the enemy dropped two guided bombs. In the Kupyansk direction three attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kindrashyvka, Novoplatonivka, and Kolisnikivka. The enemy actively used aviation in the Lyman direction, the settlements of Zarichne, Lyman and Yampolivka were hit by guided aerial bombs, in addition, the invaders attacked the positions of Ukrainian defenders ten times. They tried to penetrate our defense near the settlements of Grekivka, Nevske, Terny, Novomykhailivka, and Serebryanka. In the Siversk direction, one assault by Russian invaders was repulsed near Vyimka, besides, terrorists carried out airstrikes in the districts of Zakitny, Dronivka, and Siversk. Actively using aviation in the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked three times in the areas of Chasovoy Yar. They had no success. During the past day in the Toretsk direction, the occupiers stormed the positions of our defenders in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka districts four times. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 50 offensive actions of the aggressor in the Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Hryhorivka, Krutoy Yar, Petrivka, Pustinka, Ukrainka and Lysivka districts. The main efforts of enemy attacks were concentrated in the direction of Selidove and Promin settlements. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 57 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Vozdvizhenka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, Katerynivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Sontsivka, Zora, and Kurakhovo. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 14 assaults on our positions in the districts of Trudovoy, Makarivka, Novodarivka and Rivnopoly. Actively engaged bomber and assault aircraft for strikes on the direction. With the support of aviation in the Orykhiv direction last day, the enemy once attacked the positions of our defenders near Novoandriivka. The invaders unsuccessfully tried five times to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their positions in the Dnieper direction. In addition, the enemy attacked the settlements of Odradokamyanka and Vesele with unguided air missiles. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation uses artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,950 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 23 tanks, 81 armored combat vehicles, 38 artillery systems, four anti-aircraft guns, 61 operational-tactical UAVs, 68 vehicles and 6 units of special equipment.

Title: In Kryvyi Rih, the bodies of a mother and her 3 children were unblocked from the ruins of a house da...
Description: Oleksandr Vilkul, head of the Kryvyi Rih Defense Council, announced this on the morning of November 12. -The body of the third child was found. May the occupiers be cursed!- Oleksandr Vilkul wrote. In total, about 40 residential buildings, a medical facility, 2 educational institutions, business facilities, and 11 cars were damaged in the city. All these are exclusively civilian objects. The number of damaged windows is more than 600, the roofs of 14 houses were damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, the President said that every day, every night president/->Russia commits the same terror.

Title: Almost 2,000 soldiers and more than 80 armored vehicles — the enemy's record losses per day
Description: This was announced on the morning of November 12 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 12.11.24 are estimated to be: The data is being verified… As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->attacked 36 times.

Title: You can't beat it like that - the Baba Yaga drone survived a direct hit by an FPV drone
Description: The drone war video was released on November 12. A heavy Ukrainian drone, which the enemy calls -Baba Yaga- with respect and fear, lined up a target over enemy positions and was spotted by enemy pilots. The Russians aimed their FPV drone at Baba Yaga, hit it and, apparently, had time to celebrate the victory. But when the smoke from the explosion dissipated, it became clear that -Baba Yaga- somehow managed to survive the explosion, did not lose control and continues to fly. As reported by ArmyInform, our air defense has become more frequent strike with FPV-drones the enemy UAV kamikaze -Gerber-, which the occupiers did while staring at the Iranian shahed.

Title: The enemy threatens with missiles from the Mediterranean Sea
Description: as of 06:00 on November 12 the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov seas. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 1 vessel, which continued its movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov — 4 vessels, of which 2 were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians hid their ships at the bases.

Title: They looked for Russian mines, but found Soviet ones - sappers eliminated a surprise from the last w...
Description: The video of the combat work of sappers was released on the brigade's channel. Only 203 pieces of large-caliber ammunition were unearthed, and many small ones were not counted. The rusty, deadly pile didn't even fit in the dug hole. Everything was blown up with two TM-62 anti-tank mines. -Someone, but the sappers of the Iron Brigade are always ready for surprises. And they themselves are masters of explosive -gifts- to pig dogs. For an illustration, let's take a look at the workshop of the engineering and sapper company, where bombs are prepared for people's drones,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Crazy Cats group of the rifle battalion of the 3rd Tank Iron Brigade are not just hit enemy equipment, but also received pleasant surprises.

Title: In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy attacked 36 times — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of U...
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on November 11 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The defense forces are directing efforts to disrupt the execution of the Russian invaders' offensive plans and exhaust their combat potential. In the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units in the Vovchansk district eight times without success. The settlement of Kozacha Lopan was hit by an airstrike, on which the enemy dropped two guided bombs. Three times the enemy attacked our fortifications in the Kupyansk direction in the areas of Kindrashyvka, Novoplatonivka, and Kolisnikivka. Ten attacks by the occupiers were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers near Grekivka, Nevsky, Terni, Novomykhailivka, and Serebryanka in the Lymansky direction. The settlements of Zarichne, Lyman and Yampolivka were hit by guided aerial bombs. In the Siversk direction, the enemy made one attempt to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the area of ​​the village of Vyimka, and also launched an air strike on the districts of Zakitny, Dronivka, and Siversk. In the Kramatorsk direction, three attempts by the invaders to advance near Chasovoy Yar ended in failure, the enemy also struck with unguided rockets in the vicinity of the settlement of Novomarkove, bombarded Kramatorsk and Chasovoy Yar. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers stormed the positions of our defenders in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka districts four times today. The defense forces steadily restrained the onslaught, repelling all enemy attacks. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. During the day, the enemy carried out 36 offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Hryhorivka, Krutoy Yar, Petrivka, Pustinka, Ukrainka, and Lysivka districts. Our defenders bravely hold the lines, repulsed 32 enemy attacks, four combats are still ongoing. The settlement of Myrnograd was bombed, on which terrorists dropped one guided aerial bomb. According to preliminary calculations, today our soldiers eliminated 119 and injured 153 occupiers. One tank, six armored fighting vehicles, one unit of automobile equipment, four motorcycles and one Russian mortar were destroyed. One armored combat vehicle and two artillery systems were also damaged. At this time of the day, there are 49 combat clashes in the Kurakhiv direction. The terrorists, with the support of aviation, tried to advance in the areas of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Vozdvizhenka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalniy, Antonivka, Katerynivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Sontsivka, Zori, and Kurakhovo. 16 clashes are still ongoing. Our defenders in this direction eliminated 79 and wounded 139 occupiers, and also neutralized four tanks, one armored combat vehicle and one anti-tank missile system of the enemy. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy became more active, during the day eight attacks by enemy units were repulsed in the areas of Trudovoy, Makarivka, Novodarivka, and Rivnopoly. There are four fights so far. During the offensive, the enemy actively used aviation in the areas of settlements of Novodonetske, Maksimivka, Velyka Novosilka and Zelene Pole. The enemy did not conduct offensive operations in the Gulyaipil direction. Near Novoandriivka, our defenders successfully repulsed one Russian attack in the Orihiv direction. In the Dnieper direction, five enemy assaults failed. In addition, the enemy attacked the settlements of Odradokamyanka and Vesele with unguided air missiles. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. Today, we will celebrate the Ukrainian soldiers of the 44th separate artillery brigade named after Hetman Danylo Apostol, the 126th separate territorial defense brigade, the 25th separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade, the 79th separate Tavrian Assault Brigade, and the 425th separate assault battalion, who steadfastly restrained the onslaught of the overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the day at the front 125 battles took place collisions. Our defenders stop the enemy, hold the lines and destroy the plans of the Russians.

Title: The crew destroyed two Russian tanks with three shots, the Leopard survived 8 drone hits: -Marine- a...
Description: Andrii meets the ArmiyaInform correspondent at dawn. The training ground spread across the boundless steppe, illuminated by the golden glow of the morning sun, glistening with the pinkness of the grass. The feeling of being in a fairy tale... But this fairy tale quickly ends when a giant car drives up with a roar, the military installs equipment on the muzzle, sets up a box of shells and one by one begins to look into the device, exclaiming crew teams. After the exercise is completed, the tank fires several shots. Andriy is in charge of the entire process. Andriy explains that the boys are currently engaged in calibration and firing of shells. The fact is that Ukraine receives various ammunition from its partners, each EU country has its own factories. Each country has its own gunpowder, its own shell, its own metal quality, ballistics are different. —Unfortunately, a batch of ammunition does not always come with the appropriate documents, so calibration and firing is a mandatory procedure in order to clearly target the enemy during a combat mission, he notes. - Also, each cannon has its own shot. The more the cannon fire, the greater the error. And that is why we are now using practical shooting to reveal the size of this error. Look, now they were shooting at a target - a circle with a diameter of 30 cm, from a distance of one and a half kilometers. Two shots with armor-piercing projectiles were clearly hit, this was confirmed by our drones that monitor the work. Although these are shells manufactured in the 80s, the quality is impressive! According to Andriy, it is important to coordinate crews so that everyone knows what and how to do in certain combat conditions. — And it's not the way we were taught in Europe. The instructors there are theorists, most of whom have no idea of ​​real combat, especially in our conditions. They say: you should come to the training ground, check from right to left, the targets should clearly be 90 degrees, level. And we are in hostilities, we don't have that. Therefore, we should listen to their advice and at the same time learn and develop on our own, - he explains. This crew, which was the first to work on the training ground today, has to its credit destroyed enemy BMPs, and literally a week ago it eliminated an enemy tank. In addition, the tankers also work on foot, that is, they come and dismantle dugouts from 10-15 meters up close. — The main job of a tank is to destroy the enemy, the enemy can be different. We have a trump card on these tanks: speed and accuracy, the tankers explain. Andrii's call sign is -Marine-, because he actually started in the marines. At one time, he served his military service, then, during the anti-terrorist operation/OOS, he got into the sixth wave, served for a year and three months, and was a marine in an amphibious assault company. — At the beginning of the large-scale invasion in 2022, he got into the 95th Battalion of the Reserve Corps, and there were only conscripts there. There is a war going on in the country, and they have a temporary war there. You get up in the morning, and there the curbs in the yard are white. We wanted to fight, defend our country, decided to move. Then the combatant says: -Do you want to transfer? Everything, no questions asked.- Only me and my godfather were transferred to tankers. I rode a tank only while participating in anti-terrorist operations. And yes, cleanly on the training ground and just ride on the armor. They translated, and my first thought was: -But where did I end up?-. Well, that is, with my dimensions in the T-72 tank, I did not understand where I was and what I was doing. But our combatant with the call sign -Philosopher- was very good at motivating people, - recalls -Marine-. Later, together with his comrades, he took a direct part in the counteroffensive in the Kherson region, then he got to Donbas, and in the winter of 2023, the crews went to master Leopard tanks. — One group studied in Poland, and I was part of the second, which was studying in Spain. After the exercises, they returned to their 4th tank brigade. Then we were transferred to the newly created 33rd mechanized brigade, specifically to the Leopard, on which we trained. And already during the formation of the brigade, equipment came to us little by little, - says Andriy. According to Andriy, the Russians now keep their more modern tanks, and mostly work with them from afar: they arrived, fired and quickly retreated. — Enemy tanks enter such a sector that it is impractical for us to go to them, so as not to reveal our positions. Because as soon as we start working, -Krasnopoli-, -Lancets- fly out, looking for us. While we were talking here, a -Krasnopol- (radio-controlled projectile of the Russian army. — Ed.) flew over the tank. Thank God, everything is fine, the crew was just leaving, then the projectile just flew by. Because it works only on stationary targets, at a distance of up to 30–40 kilometers, says the tanker. He characterizes the intensity of modern combat as follows: when crews were working under Robotyn (Zaporizhia region), then they were fully loaded - 42 shells. The tank fired these shells in one night and came to the neighboring crews for shells in order to continue working. There were times when 60 shells were fired per battle. The tank of diesel fuel was regularly -left- during the night, and this is more than a ton of fuel. — There was a case that the tank was hit. Well, guys, everyone is alive and well. The difference is that when something hits the Leopard, it is almost impossible to destroy this tank with one shot. Previously, when we did not have active armor, all the destruction was carried out by the enemy anti-tank missile -Kornet-. This is a powerful system. But we started to develop, to change something. And if you hit a Russian car, that's it. My crew destroyed two Russian tanks with three shots. First we hit, stopped the tank, 5–seconds — and the second shot, its turret flies up, and in 15 seconds the second tank leaves. We destroy him with the first shot! In Leopard, there is no such thing as a collapsing tower. There is a problem if they are fired with thermobaric projectiles. But everything is done for the survival of the crew: the tank has a titanium plate that separates the crew from the ammunition, - explains Andriy. With a smile, he adds that you get used to good things quickly. - I I worked first on the T-72, and then the Leopard came, so I say that I will not get into a Soviet tank again. And although I don't have a combat position now, I manage the battle, command the tanks, instruct where to work, from where, at what distance, directions. But if you have to return, then only on Leopard. Just so you understand, it is very difficult to destroy a Leopard. It can be damaged, it will be stopped, it will stand. And then it starts: FPV drones, drops, thermobaric ammunition. We have one tank that was hit by all the FPV drones. We then chased him away, he is currently being repaired and will be restored, says the tanker driver. In the conversation, Andriy also tells how he was injured. Then the task of his crew was to stop the enemy armored group. — We rolled out at the expense of speed and accuracy, fired three shots, destroyed two Russian tanks, began to roll back, and an ATGM came to us. I don't remember how it happened, I was unconscious for some time. Then he came to his senses, we evacuated the tank, quickly got out of it. It turned out that the chargers were also wounded. But all survived, thank God, are already healthy, everything is fine. I underwent rehabilitation at home, in Rivne. I have a wife and two sons there: the eldest is 5 years old, the youngest is 3 months old... Photo — Natalia Kravchuk

Title: Firepower, mobility and protection: the Australians adopted a new howitzer that fires at 60 km
Description: As stated the authors of the publication Defense Connect, Australia will acquire a fleet of 42 AS9 Huntsman and AS10 armored vehicles for the supply of ammunition, which will be built at the Hanwha Defense Australia plant, ArmyInform reports. This is a modern Australian-made self-propelled howitzer, which is based on the South Korean K9 Thunder system, about which ArmyInform already told in one of her publications. This defense original system was developed specifically for Australia based on the Hanwha K9 howitzer, which is currently in service with the artillery forces of South Korea, India, Norway, Poland, Finland, Turkey and Estonia. The Huntsman is equipped with a 155 mm 52 caliber gun, which is in service with many countries and is compatible with all standard NATO-standard 155 mm ammunition. The main purpose of the Australians' adoption of this artillery installation is to provide highly mobile fire support capable of delivering precision strikes at long ranges while maintaining a high level of crew protection and to replace obsolete towed artillery systems General tactical and technical characteristics of the AS9 Huntsman: AS9 Artillery System The Huntsman is equipped with a powerful 155mm cannon capable of firing both conventional and guided projectiles. As inform experts of the defense portal Army Recognition, this weapon provides an effective firing range of up to 40 km using standard ammunition and more than 60 km when using guided projectiles with a rocket engine. The main characteristics of the AS9 Huntsman 155 mm gun: Thanks to its powerful diesel engine and modern suspension, the AS9 Huntsman has excellent cross-country characteristics. This allows the artillery unit to quickly occupy new firing positions and avoid enemy counter-battery fire. The AS9 is equipped with a semi-automatic loading system, which significantly increases the rate of fire, especially during long artillery operations. The machine is equipped with an active protection system and modular armor, which makes it resistant to mortar fire and anti-tank hits. The fire control system is integrated with the GPS and inertial navigation system, which allows for high-precision firing of targets at long distances. In addition, the installation supports network capabilities to coordinate fire with other artillery and infantry units. The AS9 Huntsman is designed to support troops on the battlefield by suppressing enemy artillery, destroying fortified positions and neutralizing enemy fire points. Due to its high mobility and the ability to quickly change positions, the Huntsman can operate in dynamic combat conditions. The Australian howitzer AS9 Huntsman is a modern and technologically advanced self-propelled installation that combines high firepower, mobility and protection. It is ideal for modern combat conditions, providing artillery support with high accuracy and efficiency. Due to its design and capabilities, this system has an important place in Australia's arsenal and may be of interest to other countries looking for effective artillery support. AS9 Huntsman self-propelled howitzer. Video: Journal Military

Title: Fake Telegram bot in action: residents of Sumy are campaigning to evacuate dogs due to the threat of...
Description: On behalf of the Sumy Regional Military Administration and enterprises, institutions and organizations, a fake letter is sent with a request for help to military units. In social networks, information is being spread that Ukrainian volunteers allegedly tried to transport -almost one hundred kilograms of heavy drugs-, which were intended for the 82nd brigade of the Armed Forces. At the same time, residents of Sumy are offered to report stray dogs in a false Telegram bot, ostensibly to evacuate them due to the threat of the arrival of soldiers from the DPRK. the Russians create such fakes to sow panic among the residents of the region, to make them believe that the Ukrainian authorities alone cannot cope with the provision of the Armed Forces forces So that the Ukrainians were afraid that the North Koreans were participating in the war on the side of Russia and agreed to Russia's negotiating terms. Also to discredit the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the eyes of international partners and reduce international support for our state. And the Sumy region is the focus of attention of propagandists precisely because it borders Kursk. The fact that the Armed Forces have been keeping part of the Russian territory under their control for more than three months is very annoying to the Kremlin dictator. The enemy wants to destabilize the situation in Sumy Oblast in order to return Kursh Oblast as soon as possible.

Title: -The enemy sneaks in from all cracks-: the Russians stepped up in the Lyman direction
Description: Maksym Bilousov, head of the communications department of the 60th OMBr, told about this on Army TV . -And it just sneaks into our positions from all the cracks. -They began to bombard us with anti-aircraft guns almost every day, enemy artillery and drones are also working,- he said. Maksym Bilousov suggested that the Russians were probably given the task of achieving a certain goal by a certain date. -What's more, I noticed from the video that quite educated people showed up. But receiving injuries, they began to commit suicide more often. This may indicate that the attitude towards them there is such that they understand that even the wounded will go on an assault later,- he said. The spokesman added that Russian equipment attacks very infrequently, maybe once every two weeks, and this is usually the case for foot assaults without mechanized support. According to the information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces, in the Lyman direction seven combat clashes took place near Grekivka, Nevsky, Terni and Serebryanka. Until now, one battle is ongoing in this direction.

Title: The Defense Forces explained why the enemy uses a minimum of equipment in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: This was reported by a representative of the public relations service on Army TV Serhiy Okishev of the 25th OPDBr. -The enemy does not stop trying to seize our positions, but the paratroopers stand firmly on their lines and repel any attempts of assaults. Our gunners and UAV operators hit all of this on the sly, so now the enemy uses a minimum of equipment, because he knows that it will not reach,- Serhii Okishev said. The spokesman added that the Russians make isolated attempts to land their infantry directly on the positions, but each time it ends fatally for them. -For the most part, they disembark the infantry earlier and they are already moving on foot in small groups,- he explained. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy's activity is currently high /->stored in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity started 14 times today. Currently, the battle is ongoing in the Selidovoy region. 13 attacks were repelled near Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Hryhorivka, and Lysivka.

Title: Rustem Umyerov told the EU delegation about the possibilities of Ukrainian production of UAVs
Description: This was notified in the MoU. -I highly appreciate Mr. Borrell's personal contribution to the diplomatic, economic and military support of Ukraine. As a sign of gratitude for these efforts, which strengthened our defense capabilities, he was awarded the -Cross of Honor,- Rustem Umyerov said. The European Union has already provided Ukraine with military aid in the amount of 44 billion euros and intends to continue increasing its support. One of the most effective steps to help our defenders is investing in the Ukrainian defense industry. Rustem Umyerov told the EU delegation about the possibilities of Ukrainian production of drones, which is currently estimated at $11 billion. Of this, Ukraine can invest about $3 billion on its own, but for the maximum development of our potential, financial support from partners is needed. -We hope that a significant part of the next tranche of frozen Russian assets will be aimed at strengthening our defense-industrial complex. I am deeply grateful to the European Union for its leadership and support in many areas. I believe that our joint efforts will help overcome all challenges on the way to peace in Ukraine and Europe,- said Rustem Umyerov.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Josep Borrell discussed increasing military aid from the EU
Description: This was reported by site of the head of state. -Thank you that during this war you were always one hundred percent absolutely on our side, on the side of Ukraine, on the side of the Ukrainian people. You do not need to tell about the details of this war, because you were constantly in Ukraine during difficult days. We could always count on you,- the President said. He noted that during his visits, Josep Borrell also always visits the regions, in particular, yesterday he visited Chernihiv Oblast. In addition, Volodymyr Zelensky thanked Ukraine for the assistance provided by the European Union and EU member states. Separately, he expressed his gratitude to the European Union for the initiative regarding provision of 1 million artillery ammunition. The partners will fully implement it by the end of this year. The key topics of the meeting are further cooperation between Ukraine and the EU, increasing military aid, lifting restrictions on strikes on military targets on the territory of the Russian Federation, unblocking support within the European Peace Fund and completing all procedures for providing $50 billion to Ukraine in accordance with the G7 decision.

Title: On the way to NATO: Ukrainian officers were invited to associate membership in CIOR
Description: About this reported in the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The corresponding proposal was made during a meeting between the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk, and the person responsible for interaction with the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on behalf of the President of CIOR Toomas Luman. In particular, Toomas Luman invited the Ukrainian side to attend the organization's winter summit and suggested that Ukraine consider the issue of associate membership in the organization. The parties also discussed the issue of involving reserve officers from NATO countries in the training of Ukrainian servicemen in demining and repairing Western military equipment. For its part, CIOR is ready to involve Ukrainian officers in training courses organized by the organization's language academy. This will give our servicemen the opportunity to improve their qualifications in accordance with NATO standards. -It is a great honor for us to host you in Ukraine. Thank you for the offer to train Ukrainian officers who will be able to improve their qualifications in accordance with NATO requirements. Such joint projects must have a successful end result,- emphasized Serhiy Melnyk. CIOR is a non-political and non-profit organization affiliated with NATO, which unites the associations of the national reserves of the member countries of the Alliance. The organization was founded in 1948 and represents the interests of 1.3 million reservists in 27 NATO member countries and beyond.

Title: President: Defense Forces of Ukraine are restraining 50,000 Russian troops in Kurshchyna
Description: About this he said in the evening address. -The front, first of all, is our Kurakhiv direction, other directions are also in Donetsk region,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. There was also a report on the Kursk operation, where the Defense Forces of Ukraine restrained a fairly significant group of Russian troops — 50,000 personnel of the occupying army, who, thanks to the Kursk operation, cannot be directed to other directions of Russian attacks on our territory. -We greatly appreciate the bravery of all our soldiers, every unit involved in these battles,- the President emphasized. The head of state also noted all our forces that strike at Russian bases, logistics, and rear areas. He emphasized that the strikes of our forces on Russian arsenals reduced the amount of artillery used by the occupier, and this is noticeable at the front. -That is why we need far-reaching solutions from our partners - from America, from Britain, from Germany; this is what is vitally necessary. The further our missiles and our drones can hit, the less real combat power Russia will have,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

Title: Investments, training, support for the Victory Plan: Ukraine and Estonia strengthen cooperation
Description: This is stated in the message of the Ministry of Defense. The ministers discussed further steps to strengthen our cooperation: investments in the Ukrainian defense industry, additional packages of military aid, contributions to the IT coalition, training of Ukrainian military personnel. One of the key topics of the meeting was the support of Estonia in the implementation of the Victory Plan of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi. -Special attention was paid to the training of our teams. He offered Estonia to participate in their training and equipping, following the example of other partner countries,- Rustem Umyerov noted. The ministers also discussed the possibilities of attracting additional funding for the development of our defense production. Estonian partners emphasized their willingness to invest more and work on speeding up the conclusion of relevant agreements. Hanno Pevkur shared information about the status of European initiatives in support of Ukraine. -I am grateful to the EU countries for the progress in providing our Defense Forces -> million projectiles by the end of the year, as well as for the decision to direct part of the new tranches of aid from frozen Russian assets to the development of Ukrainian defense production,- Rustem said moderated

Title: The EU reported how many shells were transferred to Ukraine this year
Description: About this in interview - To the European truth,- said EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Josep Borrell. -We have already delivered more than 980,000 shells, and very soon we will hand over 1 million shells. I know that we made a commitment to reach this level by spring - and we failed. But we will be able to by the end of the year. And for this, we have accelerated significantly,- said Josep Borrell. He noted that, in addition, many ammunitions were delivered to Ukraine under bilateral agreements with member countries, as well as within the framework of the Czech initiative. -In general, by the end of the year, we will deliver more than 1.5 million rounds of ammunition to Ukraine,- said the head of EU diplomacy. Josep Borrell also assured that the European Union is doing everything possible to continue supplying Ukraine with the same amount of ammunition next year. -The problem was not in transferring what was available, but in production. When we promised to reach the level of 1 million shells per year by the spring, we did not know what the real production capacity was, and it was not as large as we thought. Now we already have this production capacity,- he explained.

Title: How important are Liptsi for Kharkiv: the Armed Forces spoke about the importance of controlling the...
Description: Control over the village would not only open the way for the invaders to Kharkiv, but would also allow them to shell the city with barrel artillery. About the situation in the Lipetsk section of the Kharkiv direction on the broadcast of the telethon -Suspilne Novosti- the deputy commander of the shock battalion of the BPAK spoke -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirko Oles Malyarevich. — At the beginning of May 24, the enemy wanted to reach Liptsi and move on. This is the shortest way to Kharkiv, he said. The military said what is the importance of control over this settlement for the security of Kharkiv. — If they pass through Liptsi, they receive artillery fire from barrel artillery, which is regular in the city of Kharkiv. This cannot be allowed, because if the city can be affected by conventional barrel artillery, this city will hardly be able to live fully, because it will be a constant shelling, the officer explained. However, despite the fact that the enemy then managed to break through the border, reach and gain a secure foothold in Liptsi, the invaders were not allowed by the Defense Forces, so the invaders' plans were not implemented. — Their task was not accomplished. The situation was stabilized there, the enemy was stopped, destroyed, pushed back. They reached Liptsi a little on the outskirts at the beginning of May, but they were all eliminated, Oles Malyarevich reported. Currently, the line of combat in the Lipetsk section has been stabilized, and the initiative in this section of the Kharkiv direction is entirely on the side of the units of the Defense Forces. — The front line is now passing in the Hlybokoye region. The village of Hlyboke is more north of Liptsi, about 8 kilometers from the border, they are currently located, the military said. Now the drones of the -Achilles- assault air defense battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket commander Ivan Sirk continue to work also on the Lipetsk sector of the front. — The situation there has been quite stable for a long time. The enemy is trying to maneuver, pull up reserves, conduct reconnaissance. Our task there is to identify any movements of the enemy, logistical chains and destroy them so that the situation remains stable and the enemy does not have the opportunity to break through our defenses, said the deputy commander of the Achilles battalion. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, when the Russians postponed their desire to capture Kupyansk.

Title: An investigation has been launched into the alleged shooting of Ukrainian soldiers in Kurshchyna
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. A pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Deliberate killing of prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a grave international crime. As part of criminal proceedings, primary investigative (research) actions are carried out, aimed at establishing the circumstances of the event in order to bring the culprits to justice. The pre-trial investigation is conducted by the Security Service of Ukraine.

Title: With a missile at the landing of the enemy, Bradley mows down the landing, the work of Magyar: a str...
Description: In two days, our paratroopers destroyed 28 units of enemy equipment and more than 100 occupiers, another 100 were injured. A separate mechanized brigade successfully eliminated the Russians in Kurshchyna and 47. Two Bradley crews mowed down the landing in which the enemy landed. The occupiers managed to knock out our infantry vehicles with a grenade launcher and FPV, but the Bradleys continued to move, successfully landed the infantry and returned to our positions. A rocket flies towards the Pskov paratroopers. The occupiers gathered together with military equipment in a forest plantation in the Zaporizhzhia region and were preparing for an offensive. the Russians were discovered by the GUR fighters of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, and the fighters of the -Tavria- anti-aircraft missile defense system fired a rocket with a cluster charge at them. After the arrival, two heavy Russian trawlers and personnel were destroyed. Four more armored personnel carriers with the Pskov landing force tried to escape, but soon they were also attacked. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: Constant duty and -window of opportunity-: how drones work in the Kupyan direction
Description: About this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- telethon told the deputy commander of the 92nd separate -Achilles- air defense battalion Oles Malyarevich of the assault brigade named after Ivan Sirko, the head of the basket. — Most of the unit is working in Kupyansk now. The situation there is much more dynamic and hot. You can see that the enemy has squeezed into the left bank of the Oskol River in the Kruglyakivka area and is now trying to move north and south [along] the Oskol River in order to completely seize the left bank, he said. The current task of the Defense Forces is to prevent the occupation of the left bank of Oskol by the occupiers and to inflict maximum losses on the enemy. In their turn, the occupiers strike in the direction of the positions of the units of the Defense Forces with anti-aircraft guns, artillery, drones and launch infantry assaults. — They use the full spectrum, but the emphasis is usually on guided air bombs, artillery and infantry assaults. Sometimes such armored breakthroughs happen - it happens very powerfully once every 10 days, but the equipment does not survive for a long time, because the air from our side is very saturated with drones - The cheapest resource of the occupiers, according to the military, is their manpower. Unmanned aerial vehicles of various types significantly help destroy the enemy, despite worsening weather conditions. Oles Malyarevich said that Ukrainian drones help the infantry as much as possible, using the smallest window of opportunity: - UAV forces are developing and have priority both for us and for them. These are full spectrums - reconnaissance, bombers, night, FPV, reconnaissance wings, and kamikaze wings. The weather does have an effect, but our calculations are constantly in positions, they don't have someone to look at the weather and they don't go out Constantly on duty, if there is an hour or two somewhere, a window where you can fly and do your work - we do it. Because without air cover, without the support of infantry drones, it is very difficult to hold a defensive line. We understand this and carry out combat tasks to destroy the enemy, and reconnaissance, and we also actively deliver humanitarian cargo every night for our infantry, for our units that are on the ground, we provide them with all the necessary drones. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, when the Russians postponed their desire to capture Kupyansk.

Title: Two dead and five wounded: the enemy shelled Nikopol with artillery
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. As a result of the attack, two local residents were killed. Five people were injured. A residential building, a medical institution, an educational institution, a bank branch, a cafe, shops, and cars were damaged. Under the procedural leadership of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation has been initiated in criminal proceedings on the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Prosecutors, in cooperation with other law enforcement officers, take all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by representatives of the armed forces of the Russian Federation. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of victims as a result of the Russian strike in Kryvyi Rih grew to 11 people, among them two children.

Title: Minus three illegal schemes: MSEK officials and VLK doctors are among the detainees
Description: This was informed in the SBU. Among those detained are officials of medical and social expert commissions and hospitals. For bribes from 2 to 10 thousand US dollars, they helped conscripts avoid the draft on the basis of fictitious medical reports. In Kropyvnytskyi, a surgeon, a member of the VLK, was arrested red-handed when he received a bribe for groundlessly declaring a conscript unfit for service. In the Dnipropetrovsk region, the head of the department of a local hospital was exposed, who took bribes for the diagnosis of serious diseases from close relatives of conscripts. In the future, this allowed evaders to escape from mobilization abroad. In Kharkiv Oblast, another MSEK official was suspected, a participant in a large-scale draft evasion scheme, which the Security Service exposed in October this year. While in the position of a rehabilitation doctor, she falsified the medical history of her clients to assign disability. Based on the revealed facts, the persons involved were notified of suspicion (in accordance with the crimes committed) under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense has already > conducts thorough consultations with the Ministry of Health and the National Health Service of Ukraine in order to implement as soon as possible a function that will allow you to receive a referral to the VLK online.

Title: Kramatorsk is under shelling for the second time in a day, houses and infrastructure are damaged
Description: This was reported by the Kramatorsk City Council. There were four hits. So far, one victim is known. He is a 16-year-old boy who is receiving medical assistance. Firefighters are working to eliminate fires caused by enemy shelling. Currently, it is known that a significant number of privately built buildings and civil infrastructure have been affected. The investigation of the consequences of the shelling continues. It will be recalled that on the morning of November 11, occupying Russian troops attacked the city of Kramatorsk with three UMPB D-30SN bombs. As a result of the impact, about 30 houses were damaged. Read more in the ArmyInform report .

Title: EW, robots, means of communication: participants of the Brave1 cluster have already created more tha...
Description: This was notified in the Ministry of Statistics. The cluster is actively developing innovations at the front and has already issued 373 grants worth more than UAH 382 million for scaling up development. At the same time, thanks to Brave1, Ukrainian developers attracted $25 million in foreign investments for defense technologies. To gain an advantage over the enemy on the battlefield, you need to respond quickly to challenges, create new defensive innovations and stay several steps ahead. Therefore, the goal of Brave1 remains to find and support developers to technologically strengthen the military with innovations on the battlefield. If you want to join the ecosystem of defense tech innovators and have a project that will strengthen our military at the front, there is an opportunity to submit it on the Brave1 platform. As reported by ArmiyaInform, four more ground robotic complexes from participants of the Brave1 program kodifikacziyu/->passed codification according to NATO standards and can now be delivered to the front for combat missions.

Title: The occupiers damaged the Kurakhiv reservoir dam
Description: This was reported by head of the Donetsk Regional State Administration, Vadym Filashkin. This strike potentially threatens residents of settlements on the Vovchii River, both in Donetsk region and in Dnipro region. As of 4:00 p.m., it was established that the water level in the river within the Velikonovosilkiv community rose by 1.2 meters. -At the moment, there have been no records of house fires! We continue to monitor the water level in the river and are ready for any developments,- Vadim Filashkin said. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the situation in the Kurakhiv direction remains difficult. Near Ilyinka, Novoselidivka, Vozdvizheneka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, Katerynivka, and Kurakhovo today Defense Forces repulsed 8 assaults, our defenders are steadily conducting another 13 military clashes.

Title: Online postponement: 100,000 Ukrainians used the Rezerv+ service
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -This is not just a number - it is our joint success in the direction of transparency, saving time and reducing the amount of bureaucracy. These are correct and necessary steps that meet the real demands of citizens,- the minister noted. Today, online deferrals are available for students, graduate students, doctoral students, as well as people with disabilities who have a valid pension certificate. The service will soon be available in the application for parents with many children. -By implementing digital solutions, we are building a convenient and transparent military accounting system for everyone,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. We will remind, in the first week through the Rezerv+ application the Ministry of Defense praczyuye-novyj-servis-minoborony/->received 2,500 applications from those willing to join the Defense Forces.

Title: They didn't manage until November: when the Russians postponed their desire to seize Kupyansk
Description: About the real situation in the Kupyansk direction on the air of the -Espresso- TV channel, told the deputy commander of the BPAK shock battalion -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirko Oles Malyarevich. — In the Kupyan direction, the situation is changing very dynamically, it is tense. Attacks and assaults by the occupiers are constantly taking place. From our side, separate operations are taking place to restore the condition and conditions, he said. The military commented on the situation, drawing attention to the map. - You see on the map how they rested on the left bank of the Oskil River and they had long planned to completely capture it. At the moment, the fighting is going on, if you look at this ridge, north of Kolisnykyvka, the enemy is trying to go there and capture it, the officer explained. However, the enemy does not succeed. - On the left bank on our side there are sufficiently powerful forces and they are doing everything to ensure that they do not spread either down or up there. The task of holding the left bank, the task of preventing the capture of Kupyansk and Kupyansk-Vuzlovoi. The city lives and is holding on, the deputy commander of the drones emphasized. Oles Malyarevich commented on the statements of Russian propagandists about the encirclement of units of the Defense Forces in the Kupyan direction. — We were in danger of losing the possibility of evacuating our settlement. [However], all issues regarding this have been resolved. I will not say how, but we have worked out several protocols in case the situation develops in any direction. So we're holding on to each of our soldiers, protecting our lives and our health, and doing everything we can to keep our work there and our personnel alive. That is, there is no encirclement of our troops, Malyarevich stated. The occupiers did not cope with the task of capturing Kupyansk by the beginning of November, and now they have moved the date of occupation of the right-bank Kupyansk to the New Year. -From the interceptions that we have, and we are constantly conducting reconnaissance, they set themselves the task of capturing even the right-bank Kupyansk by the New Year,- said the military officer. At the same time, in his opinion, the tactics of the enemy will remain unchanged. — If we talk about the Kupyan direction, then on our side it is the Oskil River, on their side it is quite large open spaces along which they move. Tactics will not change, it will be live assaults, it will be sometimes armored breakthroughs, as they did a couple of times, and everything was destroyed on their side, the officer predicted. Oles Malyarevich assumed that the occupiers' tactics will remain unchanged: - They have no options but to attack with infantry. But they are actively working with aviation, they are destroying literally the entire Left Bank - not a single house, not a single building, like theirs in Avdiivka, the whole of Vovchansk. And on the Right Bank it has already been completely transferred from the destroyed Kupyansk, Sinkovo ​​- these are the settlements on the right bank immediately beyond the river. So artillery shelling, air shelling, and -meat- assaults, as they are called, not counting casualties. These are the conditions in which we are working now. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians are trained better, but go to inevitable death just the same.

Title: In which regions are the most women applying to recruiting centers: data from the Ministry of Defens...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this. Chernivtsi (44%) and Chernihiv (39%) regions follow. On average, the share of women among all candidates through recruiting centers is 19% across the country. The recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army offer more than 10,000 vacancies in various military formations: the Armed Forces, the National Guard, the State Border Service and the SBU. Consulting services are provided on the principle of confidentiality. Summons are not distributed in recruiting centers. Today, there are 44 recruiting centers operating in Ukraine. Detailed information and addresses can be found on the official website. ArmyInform also reminds you of the opportunity to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces.

Title: Air defense of the Ground Forces destroyed 187 enemy UAVs in a week
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. Our defenders destroyed 146 attack UAVs of the Shahed-131/136 type, 12 Orlan 10/30 reconnaissance drones and eight Zala reconnaissance drones. Also, six Supercam UAVs, 11 -Lancets-, two -Molniya- drones and two -Privit-82- drones were successfully hit. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 11 The defense forces shot down two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles and 39 enemy UAVs

Title: -Fatality-: Russians are better trained, but they go to inevitable death in the same way
Description: About this on the air of the TV channel -Espresso- told the deputy commander of the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault Oles Malyarevich of the brigade named after the head of the basket Ivan Sirko. — They have now reached 35 thousand mobilized and 25–30 thousand lost -200-–-300- per month. They support these balances. In order to somehow even them out, they brought in more North Korean soldiers, who are mostly used for the second line, he said. The Koreans, he said, can most likely play a supporting role as additional forces so that the Russian command can throw as many of its own soldiers as possible to the front. — I heard that they were engaged in battle somewhere, so we are also waiting in our direction. If they appear, then there will be information immediately, while there is no information, the military said. The Russians are immediately preparing their own soldiers to be sent to the front. -Because they have trained all of their own people who were mobilized - go ahead,- the officer emphasized. According to him, the enemy fighters are trained and equipped better than before, but this does not help them and the tactics of the occupiers remain unchanged - -meat- assaults. — They teach well enough, better than it was a year and a half ago. That is, they are progressing in this aspect, both in terms of military training and technical support. There is no such thing as an inexplicably running [enemy soldier] with a machine gun in some kind of helmet. Their soldiers are fully equipped, although sometimes they fight for a day and a half, no more, - noted Oles Malyarevich. The military man explained that he controls the enemy soldiers: - First of all, they are driven not only by some conditional patriotism, but also by fear. Because if the whole platoon goes forward, and a few turn back, they will be shot. They have -departments-, they really work. At least - to prison, and it is not known what will happen to him there. So they move forward, I think, mostly out of fear. Secondly, indeed, their propaganda worked in such a way that they believe that there are demons on our side, fascists who must be destroyed, and there is a place for heroism. They are determined that in the next life they will be saints there, probably if they destroy at least one Ukrainian there. Earlier, ArmyInform explained why suicide assaults will become more and more difficult for the enemy.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: 125 combat clashes at the front, most of them in t...
Description: This is stated in operational information General Staff of the Armed Forces as of 4:00 p.m. on November 11. In the Kupyan direction, the enemy tried once during the day to advance to our positions in the Kindrasivka area, the attack was successfully repelled, the situation is under control. In the Lyman direction, seven combat encounters took place near Grekivka, Nevsky, Terni and Serebryanka. Until now, one battle is ongoing in this direction. In the Siversk direction, the enemy carried out one offensive action in the area of ​​the village of Vyimka, in addition, it carried out airstrikes with six guided aerial bombs in the areas of Zakitny and Siversk. The enemy struck in the Kramatorsk direction with the use of bombing and assault aircraft in the areas of the settlements of Chasiv Yar, Novomarkove ta Kramatorsk, in addition, in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar, our defenders repelled one attack by the occupiers. In the Toretsk direction, the invaders attacked four times in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka districts. All attacks were successfully repelled by our defenders. The enemy dropped 13 anti-aircraft missiles on the settlements of Toretsk, Katerynivka, Petrivka and Kostyantynivka, and also struck nine unguided aerial missiles at the settlement of Druzhba. High activity of the enemy is currently maintained in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity started 14 times today. Currently, the battle is ongoing in the Selidovoy region. 13 attacks were repelled near Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Hryhorivka, and Lysivka. A difficult situation remains in the Kurakhiv direction. Eight assaults were repulsed near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Vozdvizhenka, Voznesenka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, Katerynivka, and Kurakhovo, and our defenders are steadily fighting another 13 battles. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor attacked 11 times near Trudovoy, Makarivka, Novodarivka, Rivnopol and Zeleny Pol. In the Gulyaipil and Dnieper directions the enemy did not conduct active operations. Our defenders successfully repelled one Russian attack in the Orichiv direction. Ukrainian troops are exhausting the enemy along the entire battle line and in the rear.

Title: The morning scares of the dictator of the Russian Federation did not lead to a volley: a signal to T...
Description: How special were these air maneuvers of the enemy and how it is related to the big world politics, said military expert Petro Chernyk: -A large missile salvo with the use of enemy strategic aircraft Tu-95MS and Tu-22M3 was in August. Since that time, the Russians have accumulated a large combat potential. And here is a very strange moment today: 13 missile carriers and several MiG-31Ks, which are carriers of the Kh-47M2 -Kinjal-, took off - but there was no big volley. This is all tied up in big geopolitics. Trump won the presidential election in America, and Putin is giving him a signal that he may not launch missile strikes on Ukraine, but it is necessary to sit down at the negotiating table and look for some points of contact to freeze the front line in the form in which it is. Did Trump hear this signal?.. Because there is an opinion - I am not a supporter of it, by the way - that allegedly Trump already called Putin. Why I think it didn't happen: Americans don't have the habit of making any very serious decisions before the president takes office. And he will do it only on January 20. So, for the moment, we have pure geopolitics, which has not been implemented into a military tool. I repeat for the second time: this is a signal to Trump. But there is a certain danger here. Nevertheless, Putin believes that it is possible to agree on something with Trump...-.

Title: -Zombie-attacks- and -Zelenka-: why suicide assaults will be more and more difficult for the enemy
Description: However, soon the situation will change not in their favor, because the leaves have almost fallen and it will be almost impossible to take shelter under the trees in the plantations. About this on the air of the TV channel -Espresso- told the deputy commander of the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault Oles Malyarevich of the brigade named after the head of the basket Ivan Sirko. - They continue not to count with [losses] in manpower - they run forward, die and their next soldiers, who run along these same paths, run between their wounded and killed and do not even take them away, run further, - he said. The officer explained the danger of such suicidal enemy attacks. — That is, such -zombie attacks- take place on the part of the occupier, but it is very effective and dangerous, because the occupier, who does not value his own life and also runs with machine guns and grenade launchers, is sometimes a problem to destroy him, to find him, because they crawl through all the basements, burrows, landings, - he explained. However, with the change of season, it will become more difficult for the Russians to storm, because natural shelters will significantly decrease. - However, now the leaves will fall, it will be a little easier, but it will be more difficult for the infantry, because they will be visible even in landings. Earlier, he ran into the landing — and that’s it, he disappeared, because we can’t destroy the entire landing with drones, — noted Oles Malyarevich. Earlier, ArmyInform reported who are the occupiers fighting in Kupyan Oblast .

Title: Forced evacuation of 10 settlements of the Boriv community was announced in Kharkiv region
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kharkiv State Administration Oleg Synegubov. -We announce the forced evacuation of the entire adult population from 10 settlements of the Boriv community, including the village of Borov,- he said. Oleg Synegubov reported that since September 10, as a result of evacuation measures, they have already been evacuated to safe places: It is noted that the Kharkiv OVA provided 2,000 beds for evacuated people in places of temporary resettlement. If necessary, their number will be promptly increased. So far, 1,014 displaced persons have been accommodated in hostels. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces in Kupyan region do not allow the enemy to calmly reach the front even at night.

Title: The President held a Stavka: increasing the number of MVG and significantly strengthening the Kurakh...
Description: He announced this after the Supreme Commander-in-Chief Staff meeting. -Spent Stavka. Heard a report on the further strengthening of air defense. A decision was made to increase the number of mobile fire groups in regions that are priority targets for Russian terror. Implementation of the previous decisions of the Stavka on better training and equipping of the MVG continues,- the message reads. At Stavka there was also a report on a comprehensive program against Russian anti-tank weapons, there are promising technological solutions. There was also a report on the current state of Ukraine's missile program, including the development of its own guided aerial bombs, and a report on three-year contracts for manufacturers of drones and other types of weapons. -At Stavka, I listened to a long, detailed report by Oleksandr Syrskyi. There is a decision of the Central Committee on the significant strengthening of the most difficult directions - Kurakhivskyi and Pokrovskyi. In Kurshchyna, our guys continue to hold back the almost 50,000-strong enemy group outside Ukraine,- the President said.

Title: How many dodgers does it take to cross the Moldovan border? Eight!
Description: This was reported by 11 November State Border Service of Ukraine. As it turned out, residents of Vinnytsia, Volyn, Rivne, and Kyiv regions turned to the Telegram channel administrator for help in order to implement their plan. The latter promised to remotely lay a route to a neighboring country online. In the event of a successful transfer, the organizer would receive $3,000 from each traveler. According to the instructions of the administrator, the men were supposed to meet at a designated place and from there go together to the border. However, the route did not last long. Thanks to the technical means of border protection, the tourists were quickly detained. For the attempted illegal violation of the border against the men, protocols on administrative offenses were drawn up under Part 2 of Article 204-1 of the Code of Administrative Offenses, the cases were sent to court. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the ZSU and recruiting centers.

Title: An investigation into the murder of a civilian in the occupied village near Selidovoy has been launc...
Description: This was announced on November 11 by the Prosecutor General's Office. Today, one of the Telegram channels published information about the alleged murder of a civilian committed by representatives of the armed forces of the Russian Federation in the Pokrovsky district. According to the media, this crime occurred after the capture of the village of Novooleksiiivka, which is located near the city of Selidove in Donetsk region. The published photos show the body of a man lying on the road next to destroyed private houses affected by hostilities. Currently, urgent investigative actions and investigative measures are being carried out to verify information, establish all the circumstances of the event and identify the victim of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, occupiers shot a captured soldier of the ZSU .

Title: Chemical weapons or ammunition with poisonous substances: the Armed Forces explained the difference
Description: About whether it is correct to call them chemical weapons in an interview with ArmiyaInform the spokesman of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told Captain Dmytro Lykhoviy: — This is, in particular, about the enemy's use of hand-held gas grenades of the K-51 and RG-VO types, which are means of fighting riots and are prohibited for use as means of waging war. The definition of -chemical weapons- for these munitions is incorrect, but the use of munitions containing poisonous substances in war is also expressly prohibited by the Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production, Stockpiling, Use and Destruction of Chemical Weapons. Mostly Russians use chloracetophenone. Formally, it is not a chemical weapon. It is a combat toxic irritant. The Chemical Weapons Convention defines chloroacetophenone as a chemical anti-riot agent. It is a chemical that can quickly cause sensory irritation or physical disturbances in the human body, which disappear in a short time after the action ends. That is, tears, snorts, fogging and the like. The enemy, in addition to violating the Convention, is clearly aware of the effectiveness of these applications. Because the very means of fighting street riots is to arm the police to get the protesters to disperse and cease their actions. In the event of the use of dangerous chemicals at the front, the serviceman remains at his position - continues to be in a chemically dangerous environment. These are deliberate actions of the enemy to violate and injure our troops through the use of dangerous chemicals. * * * In an ArmyInform interview with the spokesman of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Captain Dmytro Lykhovy read also about Krynyk, the left bank of the Dnieper in Kherson Oblast, the Gulyaipil and Orihiv directions and the Robotyn ledge. Earlier, ArmyInform published a long interview with Dmitry Lyhovij about how to be a military spokesman, and also about mobilization, civilian media and the meme of the Turkish Olympic shooter.

Title: Get rid of dependence on Chinese drones: demonstration flights of Ukrainian UAVs for reconnaissance ...
Description: It is these UAVs that are used by the Armed Forces at the front, but almost all of them – foreign production, in particular – Chinese Therefore, the issue of development and production of UAVs of this class in Ukraine is one of the most urgent. The other day, the Ministry of Strategy and Industry held an event dedicated to innovations in the field of drones for reconnaissance and correction, where Ukrainian versions of the most common Chinese drone -mavik- on the front were presented. Eight non-state manufacturing firms presented their developments. During the event, the developers demonstrated drone flights, target finding and talked about their developments. One of the -Shmavik- drones has already passed codification and has been approved for purchase by the MoU and for use by the military. Another codified PTAKH-S product (in terms of performance close to DJI Matrice 30 – ed.) was also presented at the event. As noted by the Minister of Strategic Industries of Ukraine, Herman Smetanin, -today, it is impossible to completely replace the fleet of -maviks- that are operated on the territory of Ukraine in a short time, but our gunsmiths already have experience and designs, which satisfy our Security and Defense Forces. Now it is necessary to scale up production and reduce the number of foreign analogues as much as possible and switch to domestic samples. The domestic production of drones will reduce dependence on foreign purchases, as well as leave a large amount of funds in Ukraine, which will be spent on domestic production, on the purchase of weapons for the security and defense forces within our country. It is known that there was already quite a successful experience of financing the production of weapons at the expense of foreign funds, this scheme is possible. Today, both the Government of Ukraine and the Office of the President are working on attracting foreign investment to finance defense enterprises that produce defense products, including reconnaissance drones. We are grateful to our partners for every hryvnia with which they finance the production of domestic weapons.- Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Colonel Andriy Lebedenko noted the importance of the development of Ukrainian drone production: – The Ministry of Strategy and Industry supports the search for new capabilities for units of the Armed Forces in the development of domestically produced unmanned aerial vehicles that can compete with Mavik, which is in great demand today. We need to reduce our dependence on imported supplies, so in order to be able to choose the best manufacturers, we make every effort to codify developments. We have created the entire infrastructure, manufacturers through the Ministry of Strategy and Industry will be sent to specialized institutes for our tests. Today, the system, which has already been built, provides an operational opportunity to check them for the approximate combat conditions, to admit them to a soldier, to an officer who is fighting.

Title: He did not want to return to Russia - the wounded occupier stabbed himself with a knife near Robotyn
Description: The video was released on November 11 on the unit's channel. A Russian attack aircraft was wounded by our FPV drone, but not fatally. He just lay in the pit for a while, then took out his knife, waved it around, and then stabbed himself, first in the leg and then in the neck. After which he died. -Something switched on this cotton head, he took out a knife and began to cut the veins on his leg, and then he stuck it in his throat… A stupid life is to go fight for a squeamish tyrant tsar, a putler, and a stupid death for their palaces and yachts,'' commented the video in the mouth.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the -Ronin- unit of the 65th mechanized brigade were able to rszv/->hunt down and destroy the Russian Uragan multiple launch system.

Title: Cyber ​​hackers hacked 14 Russian websites: they recalled the second anniversary of the liberation o...
Description: The targets of the attack were the executors of the construction of fortifications organized by the occupation administration in the temporarily occupied city and the media, which justified Putin's aggression. Among them are the website of the newspaper -Slovo- (Kurchatov, Kursk region) and the concrete plant -Salyut- (Samara, Russian Federation). Personal data of the Russian military, obtained during the operation, and other potentially interesting data were transferred to the appropriate structures. As a reminder, Kherson was liberated on November 11, 2022. How reported ArmyInform, on June 12, military cybers interfered with the work of websites of companies involved in the enemy's anti-aircraft missile system. Instead of the start pages on these sites, an image of a stylized coffin in the form of a matryoshka with the inscription -Happy Russian Day- appeared.

Title: GUR told about the Russian drones -parody- that fell in Moldova
Description: This was reported to the GUR of the MOU. During October 2024, Russia used more than 2,000 UAVs against Ukraine. About half of these drones are decoys or false targets, with which Russia tries to distract attention and overload Ukrainian air defense. -Parody- is one of the main decoy drones that the aggressor uses en masse in air attacks. These UAVs do not have a combat unit. They are much smaller and cheaper than the Shahed-136/Geranium-2, but due to the Lüneberg lens they mimic them in radar.
