Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and Toretska, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units of the occupiers are well equipped contractors.

Title: Strike drones of the 12th brigade - Azov - work in New York
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page. Rapid and remote destruction of enemy personnel is the key to preserving the infantry of the Defense Forces, which participates in contact battles. No matter how well the enemy hides, drone pilots will find them anywhere. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Armed Forces of Ukraine are holding defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: How the channel helps to protect Chasiv Yar was explained in OTU -Luhansk-
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. — The canal next to Chasiv Yar is a natural fortification that protects Chasiv Yar. In order to cross this channel, [the enemy] needs to build certain crossings and bridges. In order to bring the bridge, at a minimum, there should be no active fire [from the Defense Forces], she said. Gunners of units of the Defense Forces keep the canal under fire control. — We, in our turn, protecting this channel, of course, will not give such an opportunity [to the enemy] and we will take every opportunity to stop the crossings and keep this channel under the watchful eye of our artillery, — Ukrainian drones will also not allow vehicles to cross the enemy channel . — Also, FPV drones work very skillfully. Our drone operators have a very high level of training and also have a very high level of creativity. They are constantly inventing new and new ways that Russia can't chew,- Anastasia Bobovnikova stressed. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and Toretska, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units of the occupiers are well equipped contractors.

Title: Russian troops shelled Kupyansk again: two people were killed, another person was injured
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. The pre-trial investigation established that on November 9, at approximately 11:00 a.m., the Russian Federation launched an airstrike on the city of Kupyansk. Private homes and multi-apartment residential buildings, utility premises were damaged, 15 garages were destroyed, etc. A 61-year-old man was injured. As a result of the shelling, two passers-by - a man and a woman - were hit by wires from the electrical network. A fire broke out. Unfortunately, people died on the spot. Their bodies were badly burned. The data of the dead are being established. Previously, the occupiers hit the city with KAB-1500. Despite the difficult security conditions, prosecutors, together with police investigators, are taking all appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by Russian military personnel. Previously ArmyInform announced that at the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, students' admission to the Kremlin -movement of the first- will become mandatory.

Title: All day long, the aggressor hit Nikopol region, using heavy artillery and kamikaze drones
Description: About this informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. A fire broke out - rescuers extinguished the fire. 16 private houses and 12 commercial structures were damaged. A gas station and an agricultural company were mutilated. Several cars and power lines were affected. People were not injured. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that artillerymen of the -Hart- brigade worked on the positions of the occupiers near Vovchansk.

Title: Polish paratroopers mercilessly destroy the 810th brigade of marines in Kurshchyna
Description: The corresponding video was made public by the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The boy is grounded! Everything will be Ukraine!- - says one of the paratroopers of the 95th brigade of the DSHV. Previously ArmyInform She reported that The Armed Forces maintain the defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: President: The mark of the first one hundred units of missile weapons this year has been crossed
Description: This was announced by the Head of State in his evening address. -This year, we were able to achieve significant results in several areas. This is also our Ukrainian artillery - our shells, our guns. These are drones — of different types, for different tasks — that not only help the front to defend positions and destroy the occupier, but also strike Russia at ever greater depths. We will increase it. We crossed the mark of the first hundred units of missile weapons this year,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized. Also today, the President listened to the reports of the military and the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Oleksandr Syrskyi, Anatoly Barhylevych, and Rustem Umyerov. In addition, he stated that the most attention is currently being paid to the Kurakhiv direction. -Unfortunately, this week brought to Ukraine brutal Russian attacks on Kharkiv, Donetsk region, Sumy region, Odesa, Zaporizhzhia. Virtually daily drone strikes. Also missile strikes. And every meeting, every negotiation with partners who have appropriate air defense systems is always a conversation about additional protection of Ukraine against Russian terror. Thank you to everyone who works for Ukraine, and everyone who fights for our country and our people! Glory to Ukraine!- - added the Head of State. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Armed Forces are holding the defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: In the area of ​​Chasovoy Yaru and Toretsk, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units ...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the Suspilne Novosti telethon. — They gather, as before, a considerable grouping of troops near the time of Chasovoy Yar, as well as near Toretsk. There's a staff unit there, staffed with contractors, and they're well staffed, she said. This indicates that the Russians are able to raise a sufficient number of reserves. — That is, we can say that they are able to bring in reserves, raise personnel, replenish losses in manpower and, unfortunately, have a high level of staffing, she explained. With sufficient manpower, the enemy is trying to build up in the Temporal Ravine area. -They are accumulating personnel who are crossing the canal [in the Chasovoy Yar area], trying to hide in hiding places, gathering in this way for assault actions,- the spokeswoman said. Also, the occupiers are raising equipment, but the enemy does not have the ability to use it on this section of the battle line. -We also see that they are accumulating equipment, but there are no conditions for them to advance with equipment in this area,- noted Anastasia Bobovnikova. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on the Toretsk direction, the enemy is constantly replenishing its personnel - every night it brings in -live meat- and delivers weapons, but it has problems with the supply of food.

Title: Corvette -Ivan Mazepa- during the tests on -excellent- shot at targets
Description: This was announced by the Commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Vice Admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa. During artillery fire, the corvette demonstrated excellent results, accurately hitting air, sea and ground targets. The ship is equipped with modern weapons systems that significantly increase its combat capabilities. All previous technical comments have been taken into account, and the modernization is focused on ensuring maximum efficiency and protection in battle. In particular, anti-aircraft defenses have been strengthened. -Ivan Mazepa- is not only the latest technology, but also a symbol of the indomitable Ukrainian fleet. Confidence in our forces is growing, and we are ready for new challenges of war. Ukraine is an invincible maritime state capable of repelling any threats. ArmyInform told what we should expect an enemy from ADA-type corvettes -Hetman Ivan Mazepa- and -Hetman Ivan Vyhovskyi-, which are being built in Turkey for the needs of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: In the South, the occupiers are preparing for assaults: which areas are most at risk
Description: The most endangered areas on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyni- named the spokesperson of the OUV - Tavria- Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. — At the moment, the situation in general is not much different from the situation that has been here for two or three weeks. The enemy continues shelling, continues strikes. They are shelling not only the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, but also the cities located in the front-line zone and in the South of Ukraine in general, he said. The officer reported that the Russian command is accumulating forces and means with the aim of intensifying assault operations on certain sections of the battle line. — Russian troops, according to our intelligence, are quite actively preparing to conduct assaults on certain sections of the demarcation line. They are carrying out and some have already carried out the occupation of [positions], they have pulled up the replenishment. Ammunition has been received and is being replenished, and engineering and aerial reconnaissance of our positions is being actively conducted, the spokesman said. All this indicates that the enemy is preparing for assaults, and some assault groups have already been moved to advanced positions. — They are preparing to start assault operations. Some assault groups have already been moved to forward positions. This indicates that sometime in the near future the enemy will start storming our positions, the military officer explained. However, according to him, we are talking about some kind of large-scale offensive, namely assault actions in separate local areas. -I don't mean any big offensive, but assault operations will begin on one of the sections of the combat line,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Also, the spokesman of the -Tavria- military command center named the most threatened sections of the combat confrontation line in the South. — The most dangerous look, and we know about it, that the opponents are preparing to carry out assaults there, this is the area in the Vremivsk direction, where the settlements of Levadne and Rivnopil are located. This is a plot near Gulyaipol. This is a section of the battle line, the so-called Robotynsky salient, where our counteroffensive took place and certain territories were liberated, the military said. There, the enemy will try to align the battle line. -In addition, there is certain information that on the coastal territory on the left side of the Dnieper, where Kamianske is located, the enemy is also concentrating a certain amount of forces and means for the preparation of assault groups with further assault actions,- said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV . Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the zone responsibility of the -Tavria- military command center, the Russian command uses a wide variety of units from different military districts of the Russian Federation, the quality of personnel training in which differs significantly.

Title: The defense forces eliminated T-90M and BMP-2 in the Siversk direction
Description: The corresponding video was published by the Luhansk border detachment. Also, the selection of videos illustrates how aerial reconnaissance units of the -GALA drones company- unit of the -Revenge- brigade identify points of accumulation of enemy infantry, their routes and successfully eliminate targets. Previously ArmyInform notified that SBU soldiers in two weeks, 16 Russian -Grads- were hit.

Title: Survival and Fear of the Commander: The motivation and drive of the occupiers remain unchanged
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. -Their basic motivation is survival, their basic driver is fear of the commander and the barriers,- he said. Soldiers of the Russian army do not trust their own commanders and do not expect any help when wounded. Their only chance to stay alive is to surrender in captivity. — They understand that if they are injured, they have virtually no chance of evacuation or quality tactical medicine. Therefore, most of those who come to us to surrender, they come with injuries, expecting that at least here they have a chance to survive, - said the soldier. However, despite a low level of critical thinking and only basic training, the enemy remains dangerous due to its sheer numbers. — The mere fact of having such a mass of people allows them to be used as consumables. In principle, they have minimal functions: to get here and there, to shoot in this direction, - explained Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, who and how who and how is Russia fighting in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Corvette - Ivan Mazepa - continues to successfully pass state tests
Description: reports Oleksiy Neizhpapa.

Title: The last personnel reserve of the Russian Federation: the enemy is recruiting teenagers
Description: notifies the Service of Foreign intelligence of Ukraine. The number of vacancies for teenagers aged 14 to 18 increased by 76% during the year. From July to September 2024, the demand for young professionals increased several times. Minors are most actively employed in large companies. In particular, the number of employees under the age of 18 increased ninefold in the -Magnet- retail chain. At the same time, the number of minors working informally is increasing. There are 6 million citizens aged 15 to 17 in the Russian Federation, but a little more than 1% of them work. By the end of 2023, the number of employed persons aged 15 to 17 increased by 40% to 87,000. In 2022, their number was 61.6 thousand. persons The total shortage of personnel in the Russian Federation reaches 5 million people. The involvement of minors is facilitated by the state policy of the Russian Federation aimed at simplifying the employment procedure for them. Employers, in conditions of acute shortage of personnel, are forced to create jobs that involve part-time employment and a flexible schedule especially for young people. A draft law on easing the admission of minors to harmful and dangerous work has been submitted to the -State Duma- of the Russian Federation. Thus, under the conditions of the war, underage workers became a personnel reserve for the Russian Federation against the background of a serious labor shortage. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that construction of new facilities began to stop at TOT.

Title: Expendable material goes on foot and carries everything on itself: who and how is Russia fighting in...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. — For a long time now, they have mostly been walking. It's about walking quite a long distance to get into the forest strips they still control, he said. The -foot tactics- of the enemy are evidenced by various data, in particular, the losses of the enemy in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade. — If we look at the figures of enemy losses on our site for the past month, we will see that 200 enemies have been destroyed and a total of 20 pieces of equipment. These are mainly light vehicles and light vehicles, motorcycles, ATVs, just one tank. This indicates that, at least in this area, for certain reasons [the technique] is not used, the military said. It is possible to learn about the reasons for the enemy's refusal to use the equipment only on the basis of objective data, since the prisoners that the -charters- manage to capture have an extremely low level of situational awareness. - Why exactly, what are these reasons, we can only make hypotheses, because the captives we take are usually expendable material. All the prisoners we have taken in the last few months are yesterday's prisoners with a very low level of critical thinking. They have no connection with the world, any means of communication is taken away from them. All they know is what their commanders tell them. They get minimal information, the guard explained. The tasks of the enemy soldiers are simple, if not to say primitive - to run to a certain point, deliver some cargo. - Their task is to try to get from point to point where they are met by the next guide and sent on. The calculation is that out of ten, at least a few will make it, and eventually, somewhere in the accumulation point, there will be enough people to make some kind of movement in our direction, Volodymyr Degtyarev said. Equipping such -disposable- enemy combatants is easiest with basic soldier gear. — Basic soldier equipment. Given that they have to carry basically everything on their person, this is the basic small arms. In the forest areas, where they have been for a long time, they have accumulated quite a lot of weapons, which we are trying to track down and destroy. However, in the main, those with whom our fighters face in battle, if we are talking about some shooting battles, are equipped only with basic shooting weapons, the -charter- said. Earlier, ArmyInform explained why the occupiers are saving equipment for Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Artillerymen of the Hart brigade worked on the positions of the occupiers near Vovchansk
Description: Relevant video published by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Artillerymen of the -Hart- brigade in the Vovchansk direction inflicted fire damage on enemy positions. The invaders' strongholds, trench lines and personnel shelters were hit. The destruction of six occupiers was confirmed, and six more were wounded.

Title: At TOT, schoolchildren will be shown a performance by the Russian dictator
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. At the so-called -talks about important things-, the occupiers planned a mandatory review of the main theses of the Russian dictator during his speech in Valdai. Naturally, in this way, the enemy develops a cult of personality among the young generation and at the same time distorts reality by shifting the responsibility for the war to the victim. We remind you that at the TOT of Luhansk region bcyazkovym/-> entry of students into the Kremlin -movement of the first- will become mandatory.

Title: Skala fighters destroy the Russians, the future flagship of the Navy fired: a stream from a front-li...
Description: During artillery fire, it accurately hit air, sea and ground targets. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighters of the 425th OSHB -SKALA- cleared the trenches from the Russians. During the assault, the Russians hit our Bradley BMP twice, but the vehicle withstood the blows, landed the infantry and returned to our positions. Fighters of the Belarusian regiment named after Kastus Kalinovsky defeated the Russian assault group. In this they were helped by the automatic grenade launcher Heckler & Koch GMG. Since the Russians are increasingly attacking with infantry without the cover of armored vehicles, automatic grenade launchers are very effective in destroying them. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: At the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, students' admission to the Kremlin - movement of the first - will beco...
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. Previously, joining the Kremlin's youth control movement was optional, although it was planted in various ways. In particular, students outside the movement were deprived of participation in recreational activities and created obstacles in their studies. However, even this could not attract a large number of participants. Now all students will automatically become members of the movement - the organization responsible for massing during propaganda events. We remind you that drones have become key a> element of success on the battlefield.

Title: Soldiers of the SBU in two weeks hit 16 Russian -Hradiv-
Description: The relevant video was published by the Security Service of Ukraine. Thanks to the fine work of the operators of the attack drones of the CSO -A- of the SBU, these MLRS and their crews will no longer destroy Ukrainian cities and villages. Previously ArmyInform reported that Oleksandr Syrsky showed the work of our soldiers.

Title: Who is in the boat, who is under it: five men tried to conquer the Tisza on a two-seater watercraft
Description: About this reports State Border Service of Ukraine. The incident happened in the evening when the border patrol noticed a group of people moving quickly towards the border. The attackers had already tried to board the boat, but the craft was too small for everyone, so some men jumped into the river, trying to swim across it on their own. Border guards pulled the men out of the cold water, detained them and took them to a unit where they were able to warm up. The detainees were residents of Mykolaiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Cherkasy and Zakarpattia regions. The men said they paid between $8,000 and $11,000 for a -safe- border crossing. After receiving the funds, the shippers reported that they would have to cross the Tisza River in a two-seater rubber boat. Administrative protocols have been drawn up against the detainees for illegally crossing the border. Currently, the identification of persons involved in the organization of this offense is ongoing. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The enemy is increasing its attacks: the Armed Forces are holding the defense in the hottest areas o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the day, a number of settlements of the Sumy and Chernihiv regions were affected by enemy terrorist attacks. The enemy fired artillery at Pavlivka, Volfyny, Velyka Pisarivka, Zhuravka, Bezsalivka, Ugroida and Leonivka; Myropyllya was under air strikes. According to available information, the Russian occupiers carried out nine airstrikes on Kurshchyna today, shooting down 15 anti-aircraft missiles. Also in this direction, Ukrainian soldiers repel enemy attacks, of which there are already 13 today. In the Kupyan direction during the day, the enemy tried to advance to our positions in the areas of Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Lozovoy. Two enemy attacks are still ongoing. In total, four clashes were recorded in the direction. Enemy aviation struck Kupyansk with five guided aerial bombs. The aggressor increased the number of attacks to 14 in the Limansky direction. Fighting took place near Grekivka, Nevsky, Torsky and Bilogorivka. Four clashes are ongoing. Enemy bomber aircraft struck in Terni and Yampolivka districts. In the Siversk direction the enemy advanced near Verkhnokamyansk, carried out airstrikes with guided aerial bombs in the Siversk region. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repelled the attack of the occupiers in the Bila Hora area. The enemy continues to destroy Chasiv Yar with airstrikes, has already dropped nine anti-aircraft missiles today and struck with unguided air missiles. On the Toretsk direction the invader attacked six times in the Toretsk, Dilyivka, Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka regions. Four attacks have been repulsed, two battles are still going on. The enemy dropped two anti-aircraft missiles on Kostyantynivka. High activity of the enemy is currently maintained in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity have started here 28 times today. Fighting is currently ongoing in the Promenya area. The tense situation remains in the Kurakhiv direction. Sixteen assaults were repulsed near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Katerynivka, and Antonivka, and seventeen battles are currently underway. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor is trying to attack the positions of Ukrainian defenders near Bogoyavlenka, Trudovoy and Maksimivka. In the Dnieper direction our defenders repelled one enemy assault. In other directions, the enemy carries out airstrikes and artillery fire at the positions of our troops and populated areas. Ukrainian troops are exhausting the enemy along the entire battle line and in the rear. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General Oleksandr Syrskyi pokazav-robotu-nashyh-voyiniv/->published a video that demonstrates the effective work of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in eliminating Russian invaders and their equipment.

Title: Both during the day and at night, in the snow and in the rain: Oleksandr Syrskyi showed the work of ...
Description: He published footage of combat work on his channel. The video shows how the Ukrainian military successfully destroys enemy vehicles, equipment and personnel of the occupiers. In his comment on the video, General Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized that the Defense Forces continue to operate confidently and continuously, regardless of any weather conditions. -Let's destroy the enemy both during the day and at night, and in the snow and in the rain- Glory to Ukraine!- - emphasized the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned attack air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chief Ivan Sirk hit two TOS-1A -Solntsepok- heavy flamethrower salvo systems at once.

Title: Construction of new facilities began to stop at TOT
Description: informs about this Center of national resistance. Because of the crisis in Russia, the state stopped subsidized mortgages and removed interest control. In this way, developers began to stop the construction of objects. In the TOT of Crimea and Eastern Ukraine, the construction of residential buildings has already stopped. At the same time, construction workers brought to the east from other regions are currently not allowed outside their settlement (dormitories). Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are returning Luhansk region to the era without mobile communication.

Title: Soldiers instead of armor: why the occupiers save equipment in Kharkiv region
Description: This was told on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov. — We observe that the enemy is trying to recruit people to replace the losses he has suffered. He also accumulates ammunition, concentrates equipment in certain areas, but does not use it, but uses infantry assaults. He takes care of equipment, unlike people, he said. The spokesman explained why the Russian command acts in this way. - Because he doesn't have enough equipment. The Ukrainian Defense Forces destroyed a huge number of his armored combat vehicles and he has a shortage of this equipment. He is trying to repair old models, but this process is slower than they burn on Ukrainian soil, Yevgeny Romanov explained. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians stormed five times in the Vovchansk district under the cover of airstrikes.

Title: The Armed Forces responded to Serhiy Sternenko's provocations
Description: The Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. The department noted that in the conditions of confrontation with the enemy, which prevails in manpower and equipment, such assistance is vitally necessary, especially in providing combat units with drones of various modifications. At the same time, the mobilization of specific citizens is carried out by the decision of the territorial recruitment and social support centers, which have the right to issue summonses to conscripts to clarify their registration data, undergo medical examinations and mobilization. According to Art. 65 of the Constitution of Ukraine, protection of the Motherland, independence and territorial integrity of Ukraine is a constitutional duty of Ukrainian citizens. Citizens perform military service in accordance with the law. If a conscripted citizen has health problems, the question of his suitability for military service is decided during the VLK. At the same time, it should also be remembered that a large number of public activists and volunteers have joined the ranks of the Armed Forces and are fulfilling their constitutional duty. After all, only in consolidation and unity is the strength of Ukrainians and the key to victory over the treacherous, ancient Russian enemy.

Title: Instant death in Kharkiv Oblast: wires broken by Russian shelling fell on residents
Description: This is reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. It is noted that on November 9, around 10:20 a.m., Russian troops fired artillery at the village of Prudyanka. Shells hit a private house. The owner, a 60-year-old man, had an acute stress reaction. Other private buildings and cars were also damaged. At approximately 11:00 a.m., an air strike was carried out on the city of Kupyansk. As a result of the bombing, private houses, high-rise buildings, commercial premises were damaged, and 15 garages were destroyed. A 61-year-old man was injured. Two bystanders, a man and a woman, were hit by power lines after the impact, causing a fire. Both died on the spot, their bodies badly burned. Personal data of the deceased are currently being established. According to preliminary data, the occupiers used bombs of the KAB-1500 type. Despite the danger, prosecutors and police investigators continue to document war crimes by the Russian military. As reported by ArmyInform, Grom-E1 rocket bomb over Kharkov: the enemy hit the city with hybrid aerial ammunition.

Title: Defense procurement: priority — drones--deepstrike-
Description: notifies the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine about this. The main task of the Ministry of Defense is procurement planning based on the needs of the General Staff. -We are working in this way in order to form a list of the first and second priorities, for which budget funds are actually allocated. After that, the contracting procedure begins, when the agency is looking for suppliers of the nomenclature necessary for the army: ammunition, unmanned aerial vehicles, EW,- says the director of the Procurement Policy Department, Hleb Kanevskyi. In addition, he noted that speaking purely about weapons, there is contract work. Arms manufacturers and suppliers from all over the world send their commercial offers to the agency, and specialists choose the best conditions for price, quality, speed of delivery and guarantees. -After that, the advance payment and receipt of the goods are already made. At the same time, during the year, the MOU together with the agency are actively working to try to implement the elements of competitive bidding as much as possible. There are the first successful cases. Today, the agency is the leader in the procurement of -maviks- through the Prozorro system. Now we are working on expanding this line,- he noted. We remind you that the Ministry of Defense launched a new function in the Reserve+ application.

Title: Critical situation in Donetsk region: more than 500 civilians were evacuated from the front line
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district: in the city of Kurakhove, one person was killed and another was injured as a result of shelling. Residential buildings, businesses and administrative buildings were damaged. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Udachnenska hromada, and two high-rise buildings and a gas pipeline were damaged in Pokrovsk. Kramatorsky district: one house was destroyed in the village of Yampil of the Lyman community, eight more were damaged. A person was injured in Torsky, Druzhkivska community. Bakhmut district: in the city of Siversk, one person was injured, three houses were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, two people were injured, eight private houses, two high-rise buildings and an infrastructure object were destroyed. In addition, yesterday the enemy struck the village of Torske of the Druzhkiv community. As a result of the shelling, a fire broke out, which damaged agricultural machinery and a hangar on the territory of a local enterprise. As reported by ArmyInform, Grom-E1 rocket bomb over Kharkov: the enemy hit the city with hybrid aerial ammunition.

Title: Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces: Drones have become a key element of success on the battlefie...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. At the monthly meeting with the commanders of the UAV units, General Oleksandr Syrsky listened to the report of the commander of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Vadym Sukharevskiy, about the creation of drone units and the results of their use in combat conditions. The participants discussed the experience of using drones in difficult circumstances, including the use of interceptors and drones for long-range missions, even in the face of Russian electronic warfare. Considerable attention was paid to the implementation of the latest technologies and tactics of using drones. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine thanked the combat commanders of the unmanned units, in particular the crews of the 414th regiment of the CSW BPS and the 412th battalion of the BPS SBS, for their high level of professionalism and efficiency. He emphasized that despite the difficult weather conditions, the UAV units of the Armed Forces demonstrate high efficiency. The biggest impression on the battlefield is made by strike bomber drones, which have completed more than 7,000 combat missions. During October, these complexes struck more than 52,000 targets, including destroying 129 artillery systems, 221 pieces of radio equipment, and more than 4,000 enemy soldiers. -We continue to destroy the enemy 24/7,- concluded General Oleksandr Syrskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov announced the introduction of a new function in the Rezerv+ application, which allows you to get a postponement from mobilization in an online format.

Title: The weather will not stop the enemy's infantry: that will give the defenders the desired result
Description: told about it on the air -Suspilnye News- Captain Yuri Fedorenko, commander of the battalion of unmanned attack air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk. — As long as the enemy has manpower, this will not significantly affect, in my opinion, the conduct of hostilities. Again, where it started is my subjective opinion, for the first time mass assaults in any weather - in snow, in rain, and in mud - were carried out precisely by -Wagner- on the flanks of Bakhmut. It didn't matter then - if the equipment doesn't pass, the infantry soldier passes, he said. This was effective for the enemy, but only up to a certain point - as long as he had enough reserves. — It gave results. Regardless of the fact that the losses were disproportionate, the enemy was still able to push through. But, if you remember, at that time at some point they pearl-pearls, it seemed that there was a very difficult situation, and then at some point -Wagner- ran out. They began to be replaced by -regulars-, and at that time the Defense Forces stabilized the situation, Yuriy Fedorenko said. In the same way, even now the enemy will not be able to carry out shock-assault actions without regular replenishment of manpower, which is massively knocked out by units of the Defense Forces. — It is fundamentally important for them to be fed with additional personnel. For this, they are currently using the services of North Korea and are currently building additional personnel in one way or another in order not to stop pressing, the drone commander explained. How long the Russian command will be able to act in this way depends on many factors, primarily on the effectiveness of the destruction of enemy manpower by units of the Defense Forces not only directly on the battle line, but also in the enemy's rear. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy is storming with active fire support.

Title: Fog, rain, wind, dusk: drones in the Kharkiv region are getting more and more difficult
Description: This was told on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov. — This has a significant impact. This especially applies to the use of unmanned systems, reconnaissance and strike drones, and means of adjusting artillery fire. It feels like it,- he said. The military said what factors affect the effectiveness of UAVs. - Fog, rain, wind, dusk that comes earlier - all this has a significant effect. The weather still makes adjustments and reduces both the enemy's capabilities and certain of our capabilities, Yevgeny Romanov explained. Earlier, ArmyInform explained why in Kharkiv Oblast, Russians walk over their own corpses.

Title: -Tulsk, are you sleeping?-: Defense forces attacked a key chemical plant in the Russian Federation
Description: This is reported by Army TV with reference to its own sources. This night, SBU and SSO drones -visited- the Tula region of the Russian Federation at the Aleksin chemical plant. It is part of the -Rostech- corporation and produces ammunition, gunpowder and materials for the Russian military-industrial complex. From 9:30 p.m., an air alert was announced in various regions of the Russian Federation due to drone flights, and at 3 a.m., local residents began writing about an attack on a chemical plant, explosions, and the movement of fire trucks heading to the scene of the fire. As reported by ArmyInform, our arta hit the command posts of Russian invaders.

Title: From a factory guard to a school director: the collaborator turned Vovchansk into a center of Russif...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. It is noted that an indictment has been sent to the court against a 36-year-old resident of Vovchansk, who is suspected of collaborative activities. According to the investigation, during the occupation of the city of Vovchansk by Russian troops in the summer of 2022, the man agreed to cooperate with the invaders. Before the invasion, he worked as a security guard at a local factory, but after the occupation, he voluntarily took the position of director of school No. 1, created on the basis of the Vovchansky Lyceum. In his new position, the suspect organized the transfer of the educational process to the Russian language and planned to teach Ukrainian schoolchildren according to Russian educational standards. He also collected lists of teachers to send to courses in Belgorod and received methodological recommendations from the occupation administration. In September 2022, before the deoccupation of the city by the Armed Forces, the man fled with the Russian military to the territory of the Russian Federation. He is currently wanted, and his case will be heard in absentia in the Chuguyiv City Court. The suspect faces up to three years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, the man who became the hero of the propaganda video and organized the broadcast of Russian channels.

Title: UAVs, -solntsepok-, FPV-drones: in Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy is storming with active fire support
Description: About this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- spoken the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov. — The enemy does not stop storming the positions of Ukrainian troops in the Vovchansk region. With the support of air strikes, the enemy tried 5 times to storm the positions of Ukrainian servicemen, but all these attempts were in vain. An enemy that advanced like this and was left lying on the battlefield, he said. The spokesman told what forces and means the occupiers use during the assaults — usually they use powerful KAB strikes. Tonight, 5 rockets were used against the TOS-A-1 -Sunset- flamethrower system, FPV drones are used and, of course, artillery fire, the spokesman said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast Ukrainian soldiers burned two enemy heavy flamethrower systems.

Title: Animal fear, 15 kilometers on foot and 90% loss of equipment: why in Kharkiv Oblast Russians walk ov...
Description: told about it on the air -Suspilnye News- Captain Yuri Fedorenko, commander of the battalion of unmanned attack air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk. — [Enemy] tactics remain the same. When the enemy has the opportunity to actively use lightly armored or armored vehicles, he uses them. But the enemy loses a significant amount of this equipment on the battlefield - up to 90%, which is in the zone of damage of both our anti-tank weapons and drones. For long-range logistics, the enemy will use light armored vehicles quite actively, he said. When the enemy's armored vehicles run out, the occupiers switch to motorcycles and buggies, and when they run out, they go on foot. — When the enemy runs out of this technique, he resorts to assaults at the expense of highly maneuverable vehicles - two-wheeled motorcycles, buggies, other pickup-type vehicles. When they are lacking in a moment of time, it is mostly living power. They move along landings, run across a clear field and thus try to shorten the distance as much as possible and accumulate, the military said. In some places, enemy soldiers have to cover very considerable distances on foot just to reach their own forward positions or assault lines. — At some rallies, the enemy went through the entrance to advanced positions in the region of 12-15 kilometers. Step by step, they are trying to reach, accumulate and move to shock-assault actions, Yuriy Fedorenko said. At the same time, the losses of the occupiers are extremely high, but they still continue to go. — During such movements, the enemy suffers very significant losses, indeed very significant losses. The question arises why they stick, why they do not surrender to captivity, which can motivate in a clean field to run from one landing to another, realizing that out of 8 people who run, out of 8 occupants who run, one or two will catch up, they are see what motivates you to move forward? - the officer asked the question and then answered it himself. According to the commander of the drones, the occupiers are driven by an animal fear of their own henchmen. — This is an animal fear of one's spouse. The occupier understands that if he returns to the rear, he will not be able to be heard by his own - he is guaranteed to be either destroyed or publicly punished, and there are still a number of tools and coercion. Therefore, the occupier chooses death on the battlefield rather than returning to his people, he explained. For the first time, the Russians saw the effectiveness of the described tactics and attitude towards their own soldiers under Bakhmut and later scaled it to the entire Russian army. — This tactic gave the enemy results during the Bakhmut campaign, when the -Wagner- was pushed forward. After that, the Russian occupying forces assumed that manpower is the cheapest resource, that this tactic works, and today most units of the Russian occupying forces - both contractors and those that support them - special forces and private military companies of the type -Storm Zet-, Yuriy Fedorenko told. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that mozhe/->in the Kupyan region in the Kharkiv region, the enemy -does everything they can-, suffering colossal losses.

Title: Postponement of online mobilization: the Ministry of Defense has launched a new function in the Rese...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. This innovation is designed to facilitate the process of military registration and reduce the bureaucratic burden for citizens. Now the postponement can be issued: To submit a request, you need to log in to the Reserve+ application and send an application. The system will automatically check the right to postponement and, in case of a positive answer, the status will be displayed in the electronic military document. Umerov noted the importance of this step in the digitization of military records and thanked the Ministry of Education and Science, the Ministry of Social Policy, the Ministry of Justice, the Pension Fund, as well as European partners for supporting this project.

Title: Under the cover of airstrikes: the occupiers stormed the Vovchansk region five times
Description: Details about the situation in the north of Kharkiv region and the losses of the Russian occupiers were informed at Kharkiv OTU. the Russian occupiers carried out 8 airstrikes using 16 guided aerial bombs and 10 unguided aerial missiles, as well as 35 strikes by kamikaze drones, carried out 326 attacks on the positions of the defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses over the past day amounted to 72 creatures, of which 36 were irretrievable, 36 sanitary. Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 37 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition , in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 88 shelters for personnel, 2 UAV launch positions and 2 ammunition storage sites. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast Ukrainian soldiers burned two enemy heavy flamethrower systems.

Title: Payphones on the streets: the occupiers are returning Luhansk region to the era without mobile commu...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, head of the Luhansk OVA. According to him, on November 8, the enemy fired 43 drones at the fortifications near Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka, and also shelled these settlements 16 times with artillery. The enemy tried to storm the positions of the Armed Forces in the regions of Grekivka and Bilogorivka, where he was defeated four times. Artem Lysogor also reported on the replacement of collaborators in the governing bodies of the occupation administrations in Luhansk region. Recently, one of these traitors was replaced in Rubizhnye, and a change of leadership in Markivka is expected from November 11. Collaborators, who hoped for privileges, become useless even to Russians. It is also reported that in occupied cities, in particular in Seversko-Donetsk, the occupiers are installing street payphones due to the lack of mobile communications. They can be used only for calls to emergency services or city numbers, and only at certain times. As reported by ArmyInform, the invaders in Siverskodonetsk are actively block the mobile signal even in remote places, which local residents used in emergencies cases.

Title: With a rocket bomb -grom-e1- on Kharkiv: the enemy hit the city with a hybrid air munition
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, chief of Kharkiv OVA, about the consequences of shelling of populated areas of Kharkiv Oblast by servicemen of the armed forces of Russian intelligence. The enemy hit Kharkiv with a Grom-E1 hybrid air munition on November 9 around 02:50 AM. A rocket bomb hit the roadway. As a result of the shelling, the gas station building, glazing of the buildings, a construction supermarket, a two-story residential building, contact lines of the trolleybus and city lighting were damaged. Fortunately, no one was injured. Photos of the consequences of the airstrike on Kharkiv were made public by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. Also, the Russian military hit a FPV drone near a car the other day. As a result of the shelling, a 44-year-old volunteer was wounded by shrapnel. In the village of Ivashki, Zolochiv community, Bogoduhiv district, as a result of an airstrike, three private houses and farm buildings were destroyed, one private house, farm buildings and a power line were damaged. There are no casualties. Evacuation from dangerous areas continues in Kharkiv region. As a result of intensifying evacuation measures, 56 people, including 2 children, were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the defensive lines of our soldiers near Vovchansk four times. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out offensive assaults 14 times in the districts of Kindrashyvka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, and Berestovo. Ukrainian defenders repelled 13 attacks, another battle near Berestovo is currently ongoing. Areas of the settlements of Kivsharivka, Novoosynove and Boguslavka were hit by airstrikes. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of the attack on Vovchansk a volunteer who helped animals was injured.

Title: Sappers of the Ministry of Defense demined more than 6 thousand hectares of territory in a week
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. More than 29 kilometers of railway tracks and several kilometers of highways and power lines were also cleared. During the week, 1,078 explosive items were removed and destroyed. In total, more than 412,000 explosive devices have been defused since the beginning of the work. Demining continues with the help of special equipment, which makes it possible to more effectively clear areas of threats. As reported by ArmyInform, new methods of demining de-occupied areas were demonstrated in Kyiv region territory.

Title: Disproportionate forces, means and level of losses: in the Kupyan region, the enemy - by all means -
Description: told about it on the air -Suspilnye News- commander of the battalion of unmanned attack aircraft complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk Captain Yury Fedorenko. — At the moment, the past day came without losing positions. The defense forces managed to hold the enemy in those areas where we are carrying out combat missions, he said. However, the situation at different points where the Achilles fighters are defending is different. — This is a shade of Hlyboky, where the initiative is fully in the hands of the Defense Forces. The enemy has not been successful for 3 long months, despite the fact that he is trying to storm, is trying to knock us out of our positions, the officer said. On the other hand, the situation is significantly more difficult in the Kupyan region. -As for Kupyan region, the situation there is much more complicated, using disproportionate forces and means, the enemy does everything he can to carry out the task of carrying out shock-assault actions,- the military officer explained. However, despite significant forces, the enemy did not manage to complete the task of capturing the Left Bank Kupyan region by November 1. — Until November 1, they were not able to implement the task, which is connected with the full occupation of the left-bank Kupyan region, — emphasized the commander of -Achilles-. This determines the current tasks of the occupiers in the Kupyan district. -Accordingly, the command of the Russian occupying forces, despite the potential losses they are currently suffering on the battlefield in both manpower and equipment, is throwing new forces forward in order to realize this task,- Yuriy Fedorenko reported. However, during the past day, despite numerous attempts of assaults, the Russian occupiers did not manage to achieve any success. — Over the past day, the enemy had no success at the rally, managed to repulse numerous attacks and hold all positions. Unlimited thanks to all those with whom we are defending - the boys and girls are as motivated as possible, despite the fact that without sleep, in the cold and in rather difficult conditions, everyone continues to actively perform tasks with maximum selflessness and energy, - assured the commander of the Ukrainian drones. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Belarusian volunteers destroyed the Russian assault group in the Kharkiv direction.

Title: Strategic challenges 2030: Ukraine offers innovative approaches to NATO defense
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. The event was devoted to the discussion of strategic defense perspectives and readiness for the challenges of 2030, as well as the expansion of NATO's defense capabilities. Ukraine shared the experience of modern warfare and outlined trends in the development of technologies on the battlefield, production and innovation. Valery Zaluzhny thanked the generals and officers for discussing these topics and noted that the revolution in military technology, especially in the field of unmanned systems and artificial intelligence, can change approaches to war, emphasizing the depletion of the enemy's resources. He also noted that such changes contribute to the formation of a new strategic approach - the creation of a country's -sustainability- system, which will become the basis of defense and the ability to face future challenges. Valery Zaluzhny emphasized that Ukrainian experience is valuable for allies, helping to understand what defense will be like in the coming decades. -Ukraine expresses its gratitude to its partners who support it on the way to victory and strengthening common security,- the ambassador noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the third a group of pilots of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine completed training at the base of the Royal Air Force in Cranwell.

Title: In the Kherson region, two people were killed and two others were injured due to enemy shelling
Description: This is informs the head of Kherson OVA, Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day Sadov, Stanislav, Inzhenerne, Novodmytrivka, Bilozerka, Shiroka Balka, Oleksandrivka, Mykilske, Tokarivka, Ponyativka, Beryslav, Ukrainka, Mykhailivka, Dudchany, Kachkarivka, Zolota Balka, Odradokamyanka and the city of Kherson were under enemy fire and airstrikes. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military targeted an educational institution, a penitentiary and a store. Oleksandr Prokudin also noted that the occupiers damaged 7 high-rise buildings and 15 private houses in the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region. We will remind, occupiers hit Mykolayiv region with a rocket. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers made 417 strikes on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Our artillery hit the command posts of the Russian invaders
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit two areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, one ammunition depot and two command posts of the Russian invaders. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,660 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 5 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, 49 operational-tactical UAVs, 3 cruise missiles, 66 cars and 2 special equipment units of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, 171 combat clashes were recorded during the past day. The situation at the front remains difficult. Ukrainian defenders steadfastly restrained the onslaught of the occupiers, inflicting significant losses on the enemy.

Title: Consequences of Russia's attack on Odessa: large-scale destruction and injured children
Description: informs the State Emergency Service of Ukraine about this. The attack caused serious damage to the infrastructure: high-rise buildings in two residential complexes, private houses, warehouses and dozens of cars were damaged. A large-scale fire broke out in a residential complex in the village of Avangard due to the fall of a drone, which destroyed about 15 cars and damaged houses. Five people were injured, including one child born in 2020. In Odesa, as a result of shelling, windows were broken in three high-rise buildings, a private house was destroyed and then caught on fire. As a result, the family suffered: the father and 16-year-old son were hospitalized in a moderate condition, the mother, unfortunately, died. During the night, rescuers and volunteers worked non-stop, eliminating the consequences of the impacts. According to the information of the State Emergency Service, pyrotechnicians were working on the site and examined the territory for the presence of explosive objects. Psychologists of the State Emergency Service provided assistance to 25 persons, including one child. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers made 417 strikes on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Ukrainian companies will participate in the production of women's military uniforms for NATO
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This was discussed at a meeting chaired by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk. In particular, Ukrainian manufacturers can participate in the production and supply of a part of women's military uniforms, which will be financed by the countries of the Alliance. It is about more than 10,000 sets of uniforms, shoes and other equipment for female military personnel worth $7 million. US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken announced the transfer of this form earlier. To participate in NATO tenders, Ukrainian manufacturers need to register on the NSPA trading platform, which unites potential suppliers for the Alliance. After agreeing on all organizational issues, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine will be able to provide recommendations to reliable domestic manufacturers for participation in NATO tenders. This will allow faster and better provision of the Defense Forces of Ukraine within the limits of international assistance. Also, during November and December of this year, a number of meetings with NATO representatives are planned, during which the Ukrainian side will discuss opportunities to accelerate the transfer of military uniforms for female military servicemen from partners to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -This cooperation with NATO countries will contribute to attracting additional funds to the Ukrainian economy, which is especially important in terms of repelling a large-scale Russian invasion,- said Deputy Defense Minister Serhiy Melnyk. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense has approved the educational interactive training system UNITS for use in the Defense Forces.

Title: The enemy shelled Dnipropetrovsk region with drones and -Hrads-: two people were wounded
Description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak. In the Nikopol region, Nikopol, Marganetska, Myrivska and Pokrovska communities came under attack. The enemy used kamikaze drones, artillery, Grad MLRS and dropped ammunition from drones. As a result of the attacks, a 42-year-old woman was injured and will be treated on an outpatient basis. Infrastructure objects, an industrial enterprise, a social institution, as well as several vehicles and a power line were damaged. In the Kryvorizka district, the enemy shelled the Hrushivsk community with heavy artillery and drones. Despite the destruction of the infrastructure, human casualties were avoided. At night, the Ukrainian air defense system operated over the region, but the Russian army continued shelling Nikopol from Grady. As a result of the shelling, a 50-year-old man was wounded, he was hospitalized in a moderate condition. A local industrial enterprise was also affected. An enemy attack caused a fire and damaged infrastructure in the Sinelnykiv region. There are no casualties or casualties. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of a day, the occupiers made 417 strikes on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. Earlier, ArmyInform showed the consequences of an airstrike in Sumy Oblast: rescuers pulled out a woman from under the rubble.

Title: The government has changed the rules of electronic recruiting by military units
Description: This was reported by the permanent representative of the government in the Verkhovna Rada, Taras Melnychuk. According to the new rules, the military unit selected by the candidate must clarify his intentions regarding the conclusion of the contract. This happens through the use of a recruiting platform and includes an interview. -It is provided that the military unit chosen by the person, within one working day from the moment of receiving the application using the recruiting platform, will clarify the person's intentions to enter into a contract for military service, in particular, by conducting an interview, and will make a decision on accepting the person for military service under contract,- he noted. According to him, the military unit must inform the person using the recruiting platform about the decision made on the day of its adoption. In the case of a decision to accept a person for military service under a contract, a military service contract is concluded with him at his request. In the case of a refusal decision, the reason for such refusal is reported. As reported by ArmyInform, already 23,596 visitors received consultations in recruiting centers. Of these, 5,797 candidates have begun the process of selecting positions and applying for service in the Defense Forces.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The occupiers hit Mykolaiv Oblast with a rocket
Description: notifies the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim about this. In particular, on November 8, the enemy attacked Kutsurubsk community three times with FPV drones. As a result of shelling, a private house and a car were damaged in the village of Solonchaky. There are no casualties. In the evening, around 7:40 p.m., the enemy launched a rocket attack outside the population centers, no damage to the infrastructure was recorded. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers made 417 strikes on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. Earlier, ArmyInform showed the consequences of the airstrike in Sumy Oblast: rescuers pulled out a woman from under the rubble.

Title: A difficult situation at the front: the Armed Forces stopped more than 170 Russian assaults
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy launched five missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas using seven missiles, as well as 82 airstrikes, dropping 137 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out 4,345 attacks, including 103 from multiple rocket launchers, and engaged 1,333 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Vodolagi, Stetskivka, Khotin, Zhuravka, Krasnopillya, Novoslobidske, Svarkove, Bilovody settlements of the Sumy region; Vovchansk, Bochkove, Kivsharivka, Novoosynove, Boguslavka of the Kharkiv region. Diliivka, Druzhba, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, Petrivka, Zoryane, Balagan, Oleksandropil, Kurakhove, Velyka Novosilka, Yasna Polyana, Suhy Yaly of the Donetsk region also came under attack; Lobkove, Novodarivka, Zaporizhzhia region; Ukrainka, Mykhailivka, Odradokamyanka, Tokarivka, Poniativka of the Kherson region. Using bomber aircraft in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders five times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. In the Kupyan direction, 14 attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kindrashyvka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, Pischany, and Berestovo. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 12 times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Grekivka, Zarichny, Terni, Torsky and Grigorivka. In the Severskyi direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled five assaults by Russian invaders near Bilogorivka and Verkhnokamyansk. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked once in the Bondarny district. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, actively using aviation, carried out ten attacks near the settlements of Dilyivka, Druzhba, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka and Petrovka. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 36 assaults of the aggressor towards the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Novotoretske, Promin, Lysivka, Krutyy Yar, Selidove, Vyshneve and Chumatske. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 40 Russian attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the districts of Illinka, Berestki, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Voznesenka, Maksimivka, Antonivka, Dalniy and Katerynivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out seven assaults on our positions in the Trudovoy, Kostyantinopilsky, and Sukhy Yaly districts. In the Orichivka direction, the occupying troops stormed the positions of the Defense Forces in the Novoandriivka and Novodanilivka districts five times. With the support of bomber and attack aircraft, the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our defenders on the Dnieper direction. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,660 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 5 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, 49 operational-tactical UAVs, 3 cruise missiles, 66 cars and 2 special equipment units of the occupiers.

Title: A large-scale attack on Ukraine: more than 30 UAVs were shot down, the epicenter was Odesa
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, units of electronic defense systems, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 8:00 a.m., the downing of 32 enemy UAVs in Odesa, Mykolaiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya, Donetsk, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Vinnytsia, Cherkasy and Ternopil regions has been confirmed. In addition, 18 enemy drones were lost in different regions of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 1,700 infantrymen and dozens of BBMs: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the losses of the Russian Federation.

Title: 417 strikes on Zaporizhzhia per day: the enemy is attacking the region with all types of weapons
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 airstrikes on Tavriysk and Novodarivka. In addition, 226 UAVs of various modifications attacked Bilenka, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Novodarivka, and Olhivske. According to the head of the OVA8, shelling from the anti-aircraft missile system was carried out on the territory of Lobkovo, Robotyno, Novodanilivka, and Novoandriivka. Ivan Fedorov noted that 179 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Orikhov, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malia Tokmachka, Biloghiri, Robotyn, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olhivka. -We received 65 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- he added. As reported by ArmyInform, the consequences of the airstrike in Sumy Oblast: rescuers pulled out a woman from under the rubble.

Title: Armed Forces Navy: Russian ships in the Black and Mediterranean seas are ready to launch -Calibers-
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers are carrying out a -complex of measures- to protect the Black Sea fleet, which is actually blocked in Novorossiysk.

Title: Enemy attack on Vovchansk: a volunteer helping animals was injured
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. According to the investigation, on November 8 at around 11:50 Russian troops attacked the city of Vovchansk with the help of an FPV drone. The device fell on the road next to a car occupied by a volunteer who regularly comes to the city to feed the animals. As a result of the attack, the man was injured. Law enforcement officers are currently documenting this and other war crimes committed by the Russian military. As reported by ArmyInform, the consequences of the airstrike in Sumy Oblast: rescuers pulled out a woman from under the rubble.

Title: Almost 1,700 infantrymen and dozens of self-propelled guns: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 9, 2024 are approximately: prosunutysya-vglyb-ukrayiny/->The Ukrainian Armed Forces stopped 164 enemy attempts to advance deep into Ukraine.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 164 enemy attempts to advance deep into Ukraine
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The invaders launched 3 missile and 62 air strikes on the territory of Ukraine, using five missiles and dropping 100 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the Russians used 453 kamikaze drones to attack and fired more than three and a half thousand shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the defensive lines of our soldiers near Vovchansk four times. In addition, the Russian invaders carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Vovchansk, Odnorobivka and Kharkiv, dropping eight aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out offensive assaults 14 times in the districts of Kindrashyvka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, and Berestovo. Ukrainian defenders repelled 13 attacks, another battle near Berestovo is currently ongoing. The areas of the settlements of Kivsharivka, Novoosynove and Boguslavka were hit by airstrikes. In the Lyman direction Russian invaders attacked Ukrainian positions 11 times near Grekivka, Zarichny, Terny, Torsky and Grigorivka. One battle continues until now. The defenders of the Ukrainian land are restraining the onslaught of the enemy in the Seversky direction, at the moment they have repelled four enemy attacks in the area of ​​the settlement of Bilogorivka, there is one skirmish near Verkhnyokamyanskyi. In the Kramatorsk direction our defenders stopped one offensive action of the Russians near the settlement of Bondarne. In the Toretsk direction the Russians attacked the Defense Forces 10 times near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka, three clashes are still ongoing. The occupying army actively used aviation, so strikes were made on the districts of the settlements of Diliivka, Druzhba, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, and Petrivka. In the Pokrovsky direction the Russians tried 34 times to break through our defense near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Novotoretske, Promin, Lysivka, Krutyy Yar, Selidove, Vyshneve and Chumatske. Three attacks are still ongoing. The enemy suffers significant losses - 290 occupiers were neutralized in this direction, 133 of them irreversibly. In addition, seven armored combat vehicles, four motorcycles and one dugout were destroyed. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions 40 times near Illinka, Berestki, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Voznesenka, Maksimivka, Antonivka and Katerynivka. According to the updated information, there are still 21 clashes. In this direction, 149 occupants were neutralized, 48 of them were irretrievably destroyed, as well as two BBM units, one car, four motorcycles , one EW station, one generator and one satellite communication station. In the Vremivsk direction the invaders carried out six offensive operations near Trudovoy, Kostyantinopilsky and Sukhy Yaliv. Four attacks have already been repulsed, one battle is ongoing. In the Orichiv direction the enemy is trying to advance near Novoandriivka. Ukrainian defenders have repelled one enemy assault, at this time three more battles remain unfinished. The occupier carried out an airstrike on the districts of Lobkove and Novoandriivka settlements. Three times on the Dnieper direction the Russians were defeated, attacking the defensive lines of the Ukrainians. In other areas, the situation has not undergone significant changes. The department honored the soldiers of the 10th separate mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss-, the 68th separate hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, the 54th separate mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned attack air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chief Ivan Sirk hit two TOS-1A -Solntsepok- heavy flamethrower salvo systems at once.

Title: Consequences of an airstrike in Sumy Oblast: rescuers pulled out a woman from the rubble
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. Rescuers conducted an operation to unblock a woman who was under the rubble of a destroyed house. The victim managed to be saved, she was handed over to medics to provide the necessary assistance. The area of ​​shelling was completely surveyed. In addition, employees of the State Emergency Service worked at the site of a rocket attack on a critical infrastructure object of the Sumy community, eliminating the consequences of the attack. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zaporizhzhia, an emergency rescue operations after airstrikes by Russian troops on November 7.

Title: You can't even call this a drone: the French military is interested in the MALE Aarok UAV weighing 5...
Description: UAV developer Turgis & Gaillard is actively promote to the market its MALE Aarok drone (Medium Altitude Long Endurance, in Ukrainian - great endurance at medium altitude), ArmiyaInform reports. French developers, when presenting the new Aarok drone, immediately called it the first European military drone of the MALE class. MALE is an American acronym for the medium-altitude, long-duration drone community. Thus, Aarok MALE can be considered a direct competitor and analogue of the American reconnaissance and strike drone MQ-9 Reaper (-Reaper-), which our editors detailed told in one of her publications. Interestingly, the French drone is developed by a comparatively small private company, Turgis & Gaillard. The company was founded in 2011, has about 300 employees, and an annual turnover of 50 million euros. The 5.5-ton UAV will stay in the air for 24 hours thanks to a turboprop engine that produces 1,200 horsepower and is relatively quiet. According to unofficial information, the power plant will be the Ardiden 3TP Safran engine. At the air show in France, a model with a PT6 engine from the Canadian branch of Pratt & Whitney. The manufacturer separately emphasizes the high strength characteristics of its drone, which allows it to take off even from unprepared airstrips. It is possible to operate from ground airfields in any weather conditions in the automatic take-off and landing mode. The cruising speed of the French drone is 250 knots - 463 km/h, the cruising altitude is 9150 meters (echelon FL300). Technical characteristics of Aarok: Like the American Reaper, the French drone Aarok can stay in the air for up to one day. This allows the use of UAVs to operate over the open sea for maritime patrol and reconnaissance tasks. The drone is equipped with a retractable landing gear. Among the interesting features, the optical-electronic surveillance station is installed closer to the tail of the drone. The station includes electro-optical and infrared cameras and a laser range finder. Laser target illumination and guidance of guided weapons are possible. In the middle part of the drone's fuselage, a multi-mode radar can be installed, which is used, among other things, for ground surveillance and mapping tasks. It is also possible to search for sea and air targets. The manufacturer reports that the drone can carry up to 4 high-precision guided munitions (GPS-INS, laser or infrared guidance) weighing 250 kg or up to two munitions weighing 500 kg each. The stated target engagement range is 35 km. In addition, the drone can carry up to 16 air-to-ground missiles with a range of up to 15 km. Most likely, we are talking about AGM-114 Hellfire missiles or analogs, specific models are not disclosed. Compared to its competitors, the UAV is much lighter and cheaper than the EuroDrone, which is currently being developed by Airbus Defense & Space. In the future, the French Air Force should receive six EuroDrone systems, currently four copies have been ordered for an amount of approximately 2 billion euros. General Stéphane Mille, chief of staff of France's Air and Space Forces, thinks it is a -quite attractive- aircraft, reported by the Zone Militaire portal. -And I'm willing to pay to see, because there is sometimes a gap between what we announce and what we can do,- he told a parliamentary hearing. -Aarok is a very interesting project, to be very clear. Overall, the work is of a high quality and is carried out in a relationship of trust between Turgis & Gaillard and the departments of the Ministry,- noted the country's Minister of Armed Forces, Sebastien Lecornu. French MALE-class reconnaissance and strike drone — Aarok. Video: HBB Defense Military

Title: Massive attacks by Shaheds: why the enemy chose such tactics and how many reserves he has. Expert op...
Description: -There are several reasons why Russia started to use Shaheda so massively against Ukraine. The first is geopolitics. Elections were held in the USA, there is a new president. And all geopolitics today is built on strength. Putin is showing the collective West and the USA that Ukraine remains important to him and the Russian Federation. And in order to stop this horror of war, he trivially raises the stakes. He wants to be spoken to on the terms he needs. The second point is also related to Donald Trump. During the election campaign, Trump announced that he would end the war in 24 hours, and that he would end aid to Ukraine as such. Russians have a very simple logic. If the US stops helping Ukraine, then missiles for Patriot air defense systems will become less, as well as for all other types of weapons, for example, for Stinger MANPADS. By the way, our defenders perfectly beat the Shaheds with them. That is, the Russians want to use their relatively inexpensive UAVs to deplete the Ukrainian stockpile of anti-aircraft missiles.
