Fewer rockets means a lower knockdown ratio. And then, according to the classics, launch a major missile attack on Kyiv and Ukraine. For the occupiers, our capital is not only the main goal in their war of aggression against Ukraine, it is also a sacred place. They cannot accept that the -Russian city- is resisting. Therefore, daily UAV attacks are another attempt to put constant psychological pressure on the population, with the aim of breaking the motivation for resistance. Rashists think that sooner or later the people of Kyiv will not endure and will start internal riots against Ukrainian statehood itself. He said, it is necessary to end these horrors of war and to agree on something. This is absurd. What is the enemy's logic? Even if at least one -Shahed- has achieved its goal, it does not matter whether it is a critical infrastructure object or a residential building, then the terror must continue. Another goal of the Kremlin is the economic terror of the Kyiv agglomeration, which is the largest in Ukraine. Many large enterprises that pay taxes to the state budget are concentrated here. When an air alert is declared, all these businesses cease operations. Accordingly, output decreases, and this, of course, leads to a decrease in tax revenues. After receiving in the second half of 2022 the first batch of Iranian Shahed UAVs, Russia was able to launch their mass production on its territory, as well as significantly modify them. The enemy managed to increase the production of -Shaheed- to about 2,000 pieces per month. That's a pretty big number. But, I think, they will not go higher. They have the highest explosives production capacity. They managed to raise by 30% the production of alcohol compounds used in explosives, gunpowder and aluminum powder. They also have a problem with the workforce. Of course, there are enough workers. But everything that they could put in order, they have already put in place. Without the direct help of China and Iran, the Russians will not be able to further increase the production of Shaheds.

Title: Subletting and lifting: about the amount of payments and why it is profitable to enter into a contra...
Description: What is the difference between -sub-hire- and -elevation-, and who can receive such assistance, ArmiyaInform tells. This is, in fact, compensation for housing rent at the place of service. It is paid if the serviceman does not have his own housing in this territory. It should be noted right away that the procedure for issuing compensation is not very simple and fast. And it may also require certain costs, in particular for obtaining certificates. The basis for payment is a serviceman's report, as well as list of documents, determined by Cabinet Resolution No. 450. But if you go this way and arrange everything, you can get quite a good amount of compensation. In particular, the following amounts have been set for 2024: For servicemen with three or more family members, compensation amounts will increase by one and a half times. This is the assistance that is provided in the event of the relocation of servicemen to a new place of military service in another settlement in connection with appointment to a military position, enrollment in military educational institutions and military colleges or training centers, the term of study in which is six months and more, without retaining the position at the previous place of service or in connection with the redeployment of the military unit. Or after graduating from military educational institutions with appointment to positions in units in other settlements. More details about who can receive such assistance is prescribed in the Order of the Ministry of Defense No. 45. How much is paid? Moving allowance is paid in the amount of a monthly allowance for a military serviceman and 50 percent of a monthly allowance for each member of his family who moved with him to a new place of military service; Per diems are also paid for each day of stay on the road to a serviceman and each member of his family who moved with him. Who are considered family members? These are the persons listed in the serviceman's personal file, in particular: How many times can you receive in the event of a frequent change of duty station? Moving allowance is paid no more than for two moves of a serviceman during a calendar year. What is needed? They are paid on the basis of the order of the commander of the military unit, which is issued on the basis of the serviceman's report. In addition, the order specifies whether the wife (husband) is a military serviceman. If necessary, the commander can organize verification of the authenticity of data on the relocation of family members of a serviceman. If both the husband and the wife are military servicemen, the lifting allowance for each of them is paid at the new place of military service, for family members - from the monthly allowance of one of them. Currently, this applies to servicemen serving under a contract or enlisted officers. Unfortunately, mobilized servicemen do not have such an opportunity. But this may be one of the motivating factors for signing a contract with the Armed Forces of Ukraine. More about the opportunities provided by the contract service you can read here. And about the peculiarities of concluding a contract martial law actions, here.

Title: Was -Lebedev- became -Lebedenko-: the Russian Federation is spreading a fake about the Ukrainization...
Description: The Ministry of Digital Transformation of Ukraine, which is responsible for the functioning of -Dia-, stated that such messages were not sent and are fake. In addition to the traditional grammatical errors in the text of the screenshot, which indicate a fake, any user of -Actions- will notice a font that is not typical for this application. This fake is another propaganda attempt to discredit the Ukrainian state system and inflame tension in society by spreading false information about the alleged forced imposition of Ukrainian identity on citizens. In addition, the fake name change is a typical example of -mirroring-. For Ukrainians, such practices are absolutely atypical, but for Russians, the compulsion to change names and surnames to ones that are considered Russian is a phenomenon that has been widespread since the 17th century. In the 30s and 40s of the 20th century, the -Russification- of surnames became massive in the USSR: on the one hand, people saved themselves from repression, on the other, they sought career growth, which was impossible with a -non-Russian- surname. Among the most famous examples is the father of the ex-leader of the Ministry of Murder of the Russian Federation, Shoigu Kuzhuget, who, in order to appear more -Russian- and to pursue a party career, changed his first and last name. Even now, the Russians have not given up on this: in the occupied Ukrainian territories, people are encouraged to change their Ukrainian surnames when obtaining Russian passports.

Title: First -calibre-, then -shahed- - the fighter of the fire group Hryhoriy distinguished himself again
Description: This was reported by the Air Force Southern Air Command Armed Forces For Grigoriy, this is not the first destroyed air target: in the summer, the defender shot down a Russian cruise missile -Caliber-. The man was mobilized for the army in the first days of the full-scale Russian invasion, and he joined the mobile fire group last year. -I come from Odesa, so it is a great honor for me to shoot down an enemy evil spirit in the sky over my native land. You too can defend Ukrainian airspace by joining our brigade. I assure you, everyone will find an occupation according to their specialty and to their heart's content. Let's fight for our freedom and independence together, join the anti-aircraft missile brigade named after Hetman Pylyp Orlyk!-, - urged Hryhoriy. According to PvK -Pivden-, on the night of November 8, 2024, a massive enemy drone attack on Odesa region lasted for two hours, during which soldiers of the Odesa anti-aircraft missile brigade destroyed seven shahed-type attack drones. The video shows fragments of detection and destruction of enemy UAVs: Captain Maksym Shchogolev, who served at ZRK S -300PS in the Odesa anti-aircraft missile brigade, told ArmyInform about 30 downed -dryers-, -IL-22- and combat brotherhood.

Title: -Trying to sneak in-: the Russians have changed their tactics to a less brazen one
Description: A representative of the press service of the 24 mechanized Andriy Polukhin of the brigade named after King Danylo. According to Andrii Polukhin, in this way, by hiding and sneaking up, the enemies are trying to get behind our defenders. -If earlier they stormed head-on, now they are trying to sneak in and catch our fighters by surprise. At the moment, they do not manage to gain a foothold, later these small infantry groups are destroyed,- said Andriy Polukhin. As reported ArmyInform, In the vicinity of Chasovoy Yar, the Russians switched from assaults to the tactics of penetration by small infantry groups.

Title: -sunfires- baked — two heavy enemy flamethrower systems were burned in Kharkiv Oblast
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the brigade's channel. In both cases, the -sunshine- were caught changing fire positions during the night. -Properly trained drones and the skill of our operators penetrate any enemy armor,- Achilles commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the air reconnaissance units of the 92nd assault brigade named after Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk were able to shoot footage -providing- the first Russian aid from one invader to another.

Title: We are doing everything to force Russia into normal, meaningful negotiations based on international ...
Description: His appeal was made public in the evening of November 8. -And in general, the development of European policy for the next period should be joint, coordinated and such that it directly helps our partnership in Europe, in the Euro-Atlantic. Just as global affairs decline without a strong America, so without a strong Europe, maintaining stability for European nations is simply impossible. And the next week should also bring relevant results — results in our work with partners,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. He said that he listened to the report of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, today. -Front. The Kurakhiv direction, the Pokrovsky direction are the most difficult now. The military command and brigade command are working on strengthening positions,- the President said. He gave a special mandate to the government to ensure extra payments for all Ukrainian teachers. -Fixed additional payment for all teaching staff of schools: from January one thousand hryvnias for each, from September there will be an increase to 2 thousand hryvnias. The Cabinet of Ministers made this decision today. We all understand that the resources of our state are limited, but the government must help people who work in Ukraine and, of course, for Ukraine. There are funds for this. Government officials are now also preparing other solutions, in particular for the winter support package for Ukrainians, which will be presented this month. I am grateful to everyone who is with Ukraine! Glory to Ukraine!- said the President. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine told a Finnish colleague about the needs of our Air Defense Forces. Also, the President handed 30 certificates for apartments for Heroes of Ukraine and relatives of fallen Heroes.

Title: S-300, a cat and a dog — how animals help the missile division destroy 55 enemy targets already
Description: The division was told by the -West- air command of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -As of now, we have already changed more than 10 combat positions in the Volyn, Ternopil, Khmelnytskyi, and Lviv regions. The unit's combat record includes 55 destroyed enemy targets — 46 Kh-555, Kh-101, Caliber missiles and 9 reconnaissance and attack drones,- says division commander Lt. Col. Vitaly Dugar. The division record is 5 destroyed targets in one anti-aircraft battle. -It's hard work, everything here depends on the people. For us, every battle is the main, main, important one, like the last one. We work to the maximum. In the breaks, we restore weapons and equipment, prepare it, train people. It happened that we would launch ten rockets in five minutes. And then at night we charge the complexes until the morning,- Vitaly Dugar recalls. According to him, the division has a cat, Rocket, and a jack-russell terrier, Jackie, who help relieve the emotional burden of the personnel. -During every combat operation, they follow us to the command post. They are used to the use of weapons, to loud sounds. Real fighters. Probably, each of us thinks about family, relatives. And these animals remind many people of their pets, help us create a family atmosphere when we are far from our homes,- the division commander shares his thoughts. According to him, the mood in the unit is always fighting. -We have nowhere to retreat, this is our land, we just need to go forward, develop, attract more new people to the ranks of the division. The doors of the unit are open. Those who are willing and motivated can come and learn. We are getting new Western anti-aircraft missile systems. And we need operators. Therefore, we invite to us those who wish to undergo training abroad, speak at least a little English, are ready to successfully study, and then return to Ukraine and protect, defend their state, the airspace of their country, get positive emotions from combat work and its results -, Vitaliy Dugar assures. Captain Maxim Shchogolev, who served on the S-300PS air defense system in the Odesa anti-aircraft missile brigade, told ArmyInform about 30 downed -sushky-, -IL -22- and fighting brotherhood.

Title: He became the hero of a propaganda video and organized the broadcast of Russian channels: the man wa...
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. He was sentenced to 11 years of imprisonment with deprivation of the right to hold positions related to the performance of administrative and managerial functions in the provision of services and maintenance of radio and television stations for 10 years with confiscation of property. Prosecutors proved that during the invasion of the armed forces of the Russian Federation on the territory of the Kupyan district, the accused, who worked as an engineer in a local television and radio company, voluntarily went to cooperate with the enemy. In August 2022, the man concluded a -remunerated work performance contract- with representatives of the occupation administration. Having the necessary skills and access to equipment, the collaborator organized the broadcast of Russian TV channels in the territory of Kupyan Oblast, where anti-Ukrainian content was subsequently broadcast. The man received payment in Russian rubles for this. Moreover, the accused himself gave an interview to Mariana Naumova, a Russian propagandist, which was later broadcast on the First Channel. In the recorded video, the man, deliberately distorting the facts, denied the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine. He spoke in support of the enemy's actions, presented the Russian military as -liberators- and told how the aggressor state -cares- about the local population, providing the residents with -human aid-. The man was awaiting trial while in custody. During the trial, the accused pleaded not guilty. Regarding the interview, the man stated that he does not remember whether he made any comments on camera. The guilty verdict was issued by the Chuguyiv city court of the Kharkiv region. We remind you that in the north of Kharkiv Oblast losses of the occupiers decreased.

Title: Plus two prisoners — Transcarpathian attack aircraft distinguished themselves in the South
Description: The video of the battle appeared on November 8 on the brigade channel. Our assault group took control of the landing positions held by the enemy infantry. First, the enemy was covered from the air by FPV drones, while several Russians fled the battlefield. Therefore, our stormtroopers went forward and, approaching the fortifications at close range, forced two infantrymen to surrender with machine gun fire and hand grenades. Now these Russians will replenish the exchange fund.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 128th motorized infantry battalion of the Zakarpattia Mountain Assault Brigade potuzhnyj-shturm/->destroyed tanks, BMPs, armored personnel carriers, trucks and infantry, which took part in a powerful enemy assault.

Title: the Russians are agitating the mobilized conscripts from TOT to conclude a contract
Description: This is reported by a> Center of national resistance. Locals are being mobilized for military service, which they are supposed to do in the occupied Crimea. However, there are training grounds in Crimea before sending contract soldiers to the front. At the same time, conscripts from the TOT in Crimea are campaigned to conclude a contract after their arrival and promise not to send them to the combat zone, but this is a delusion. The Center of National Resistance has already published data on how Russians lure conscripts into the ranks of contract workers and send them to the front. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are cracking down with believers in temporarily occupied Luhansk.

Title: The European Union extended the mandate of the Mission to help Ukraine
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The mission of the European Union to provide military assistance to Ukraine remains a key instrument of military support to Ukraine from the EU, the main purpose of which is to help strengthen the military potential of the Armed Forces. According to today's decision, the European Union Military Assistance Mission to Ukraine will cooperate with NATO, in particular the Security Assistance and Training Command for Ukraine (NSATU), and will exchange information with the latter in a transparent, reciprocal and inclusive manner. On October 17, 2022, the Council of the European Union adopted a decision to establish a European Union Mission to provide military assistance to Ukraine with an initial term of two years. The strategic goal of the mission is to contribute to the strengthening of the military potential of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to restore and effectively conduct operations to allow Ukraine to defend its territorial integrity within internationally recognized borders, effectively exercise its sovereignty and protect the civilian population from armed Russian aggression. So far, the European Union Military Assistance Mission to Ukraine has trained 63,000 soldiers of the Armed Forces. In the coming months, the mission will train an additional 15,000 troops, bringing the total number of trained soldiers to 75,000 by the end of winter 2024/2025. The European Union Military Assistance Mission to Ukraine conducts individual, collective and specialized training of the Armed Forces on the territory of the European Union, as well as coordinates and synchronizes the activities of the member states regarding training. The training is accompanied by the provision of lethal and non-lethal equipment to the Armed Forces. The European Union mission to provide military assistance to Ukraine is financed from the European Peace Fund. The future training objectives of the European Union Military Assistance Mission to Ukraine will be constantly adjusted in terms of the number of troops to be trained and skills in accordance with the combat needs expressed by Ukraine and in coordination with partners. Ensuring Ukraine's military training is one of the areas of activity within the framework of joint security obligations between Ukraine and the EU, signed in June 2024. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine told his Finnish colleague about needs of our Air Defense Forces.

Title: The case is a pipe: the assault group of the Russians was bombed in the collector
Description: The video of the fight was released on November 8 on the unit's channel. The occupiers were piling up in the tunnel to attack at night, but our bomber got ahead of them and made several successful drops with high-powered ammunition. Also, the pilots of the -Raroga- destroyed the dugout of the Russians and their armored personnel carrier. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Rarog- of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo catch up with the equipment and personnel of the Russian invaders, and then destroy them.

Title: The President of Ukraine told his Finnish colleague about the needs of our Air Defense Forces
Description: This became known on the evening of November 8. -I outlined the situation on the battlefield to my colleague. We discussed the threats posed to regional and global security by the involvement of North Korea in Russia's war against Ukraine, and continued defense cooperation between our countries. He conveyed the urgent defense needs of Ukraine regarding the strengthening of air defense and the supply of additional air defense equipment,- the President said. The heads of state also discussed the successful holding of the thematic conference in Helsinki under item eight -Environmental security-, as well as further international efforts necessary to restore a just peace for Ukraine. -I am grateful to Finland for its unwavering support of Ukraine and the Peace Formula and for all concrete steps towards its implementation. Separately, I thanked Alexander Stubb for his active position in promoting peace based on the principles of the UN Charter during communication with the countries of the Global South,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyy. As reported by ArmyInform, President handed over 30 certificates for apartments to Heroes of Ukraine and relatives of fallen Heroes.

Title: Kosyv Yas mowed down the occupiers — Belarusian volunteers destroyed a Russian assault group
Description: The video of the defeat appeared on November 8 on the regiment's channel. Once again, automatic grenade launchers proved to be an effective weapon against the Russian tactics of -meat- assaults, when the enemy tries to attack with infantry without the cover of armored vehicles. The Russian assault group was stopped and then destroyed by several well-hit rounds.   As reported by ArmyInform, in the liberation of the territory of Ukraine near the village of Liptsi in the north of the Kharkiv region bij-vayar%d1%8b-palka-kalino%d1%9eskaga/->participated soldiers of the Kastus Regiment Kalinovsky.

Title: Extorted money from the wounded — the head of the district MSEK in Kirovohrad region was exposed for...
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office on November 8. According to the investigation, the suspect promised a former serviceman of the Armed Forces, who was declared unfit for military service as a result of his injuries, to help establish the II disability group indefinitely. The monetary reward was $2 thousand. Currently, the issue of selecting a preventive measure for her is being resolved. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Health and the Ministry of Statistics within two weeks will develop steps for digitalization of VLK.

Title: Risk and courage: the medics made the most dangerous foray into the position of their comrades
Description: This was reported by 63 separate mechanized brigade. Fortunately, the lives of all the wounded were saved. The rescue operation was carried out by the sanitary instructor -Zavhosp-, the mechanic-driver -Maus- and the senior mechanic-driver -Bzmil-. Previously ArmyInform reported that our drones hit two occupiers from a height of 300 meters.

Title: In Lviv, space was created for the psychological recovery of soldiers and their families
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The main goal of the project is to create conditions for the psychological recovery of soldiers participating in hostilities against Russian aggression, and to help their loved ones. The initiative was made possible thanks to the cooperation of several organizations: the Home of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the charitable foundation -Foundation for the Support of Medicine for the Military-, the Garrison Church of the Holy Apostles Peter and Paul, the Crisis Psychological Service of Lviv and other benefactors from Ukraine and abroad.   The -Choice- space is adapted to the modern needs of the military and provides a creative approach to their psychological recovery, spiritual and cultural development, as well as integration into peaceful life. Meetings with chaplains, famous personalities, medical experts, representatives of culture and art are organized here. -Choice- has become a meeting place for veterans, volunteers and students, where everyone can find support, recover morally, overcome life's difficulties and find inspiration for future achievements and victories. As reported by ArmyInform, the command of the Khortytsia Special Operations Command within the framework of the program of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -Saving the Life and Health of Servicemen- introduced the project -Circle Pokrova-, which provides for the psychological rehabilitation of the military.

Title: New methods of demining de-occupied territories were demonstrated in Kyiv region
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. Recently, a meeting dedicated to the demonstration of new demining methods and practices was held in the Velikodimer Town Council of the Brovar District. Colonel Oleg Shuvarskyi, deputy head of the Main Department of Mine Action, took part in the event, which was organized by the charity fund -Demining of Ukraine-. During the event, the participants were shown modern unmanned ground and aviation complexes for detecting explosive objects, as well as the latest methods of non-technical survey of territories. In particular, an analytical approach was used, which included the analysis of satellite images, interviews with local residents and studies of combat operations that may have left behind minefields or munitions. During the practical part of the meeting, specialists of the -Demining of Ukraine- foundation and colleagues from the -Postup- foundation surveyed the designated area with the help of drones with magnetometers. This technology allows the detection of magnetic anomalies that may indicate the presence of shells, mines or other explosive objects, without risking the lives of deminers. Colonel Oleh Shuvarsky emphasized the importance of observing national and international standards for mine action. He also reported that the number of certified demining operators in Ukraine is growing, and currently there are 64 of them. Thanks to the surveys, 32 thousand square kilometers of the territory were recognized as safe for the civilian population. Exchange of experience in the field of demining remains an important component for the preservation of life and safety of Ukrainian citizens. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation into Ukraine 1,068 people, including 100 children, were injured by mines and explosive remnants of war.

Title: a Russian man pretended to be a tree and died, extreme evacuation of the 63rd brigade: a stream from...
Description: The medics of the 63rd brigade carried out a risky mission to save four wounded. One of our fighters was in serious condition. The M113 evacuation vehicle drove up close to our trenches in broad daylight - the lives of all the wounded were saved. In the Kharkiv Region, the 3rd Assault Brigade repelled several enemy raids. The movement of Russian infantry groups in the thickets was recorded by a thermal imager from the sky. When the occupiers came closer, they were attacked by strikers of the 3rd assault division. Those who had already pretended to be dead were found and destroyed in the bushes. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andrii Makarenko and Captain Artem Golub.

Title: Destroyed battalions and abandoned bodies: the occupiers near Beilohorivka have no chance of victory
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysogor, head of the Luhansk OVA. The occupiers also shelled the fortifications of our military and the surrounding villages with artillery 16 times. The enemy tried to use 46 drones for attacks near Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka. According to Artem Lysohor, the Russian military suffered significant losses during an unsuccessful assault near Beilohorivka last week. The commander of the -123rd Separate Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade- of the 2nd Army Corps -LNR- threw three motorized rifle and one tank battalion into battle without proper fire support. Ukrainian defenders repulsed the assault, and Russian losses in equipment and manpower remain significant. The enemies still have not evacuated the wounded and the bodies of the dead, in particular, forcibly mobilized residents of the occupied territory. Meanwhile, in Luhansk, the invaders have started checking the emergency high-rise buildings, planning to survey 856 buildings. However, the occupation authorities ignore the large-scale destruction in Siverskodonetsk, Lysychansk, Popasnaya and Rubizhny, where hundreds of houses were destroyed during the hostilities.

Title: When -meat assaults- is not a metaphor - impressive shots of bloody Russian attacks
Description: The video appeared on November 8 on the brigade's channel. Enemy attack aircraft were hit by FPV drones and drops from our bombers. The video shows how even mild injuries push Russians to commit suicide. -The enemy continues -meat assaults- on our positions and actively engages in suicide, even in the case of minor injuries,- commented the scary cadres in the brigade.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized brigade of Ingulets were able to record a case from a drone when -na-rozdyaganni-vlasnyh-zagyblyh/-> the Russians took off the pants of the killed siblings.

Title: They entered the territory of Russia, conducted reconnaissance and captured a grenade launcher
Description: The video about it was released on November 8 on the channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Our special forces entered enemy territory, where they scouted enemy positions and mined roads to attack Russian logistics. During this work, the SSO soldiers went to the enemy's position, on which there was an automatic grenade launcher. They took him with them, and soon he was already working from Ukrainian positions against the Russians. The commander of the combat group of the 8th SSO regiment with the call sign -Lancelot- told more about this operation: As reported by ArmyInform, in The SSO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told who and how foiled the enemy's plans to seize the Southern Ukrainian NPP.

Title: -It becomes easier - the use of aviation decreases with the deterioration of the weather-: however, ...
Description: Oleksandr Borodin told about this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- press officer of the Third Assault Brigade. According to Oleksandr Borodin, now the occupiers are saving armored vehicles — tanks and BMPs. However, infantry assaults continue one after the other without stopping. And they hit with artillery, aviation and a huge number of FPV drones - several hundred per day. -Now, with the deterioration of the weather, the number of CABs will decrease a little. In general, the use of aviation decreases as the weather worsens. It becomes easier, because anti-aircraft guns are really a heavy and complex weapon,- stated Oleksandr Borodin. As already reported ArmyInform, in Kharkiv Oblast - intensive assaults, sometimes with the use of mechanized forces, sometimes infantry attacks on strange wheeled vehicles.

Title: Half of the enemy's attacks fell on the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions — the General Staff of the...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on November 8 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the day, a number of settlements near the border with Russia were damaged by enemy terrorist attacks. Thus, the settlements of Novenke, Pavlivka, Volfine, Khotyn, Pokrivka, Zhuravka, Timofiivka, Bilovody, Basivka, Chuykivka of the Sumy region came under artillery fire; Mykhalchyna Sloboda, Chernihiv region; Oleksandrivka, Kharkiv region. The enemy also carried out airstrikes on the settlements of Vodolagi, Stetskivka, Khotyn and Zhuravka, using eight anti-aircraft missiles. Today, in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupiers twice stormed the defense lines of the Ukrainian army in the Vovchansk region. The enemy also dropped eight aerial bombs on Vovchansk, Odnorobivka and Kharkiv. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy actively advanced nine times on the positions of our units in the districts of Kindrashyvka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, and Berestovo. Ukrainian soldiers steadfastly hold the defense, repelling all enemy attacks. In addition, the enemy attacked with eight guided air missiles in the area of ​​Kivsharivka, Novoosynovo and Boguslavka. Today, in the Lyman region, the invading army launched nine attacks on Ukrainian positions near Grekivka, Zarichny, Terny, Torsky, and Hryhorivka. Eight battles ended without success for the enemy, one more is ongoing. Defenders of the Ukrainian land repelled one attack of the occupying army in the Siverskyi direction near the settlement of Bilogorivka, and another skirmish continues to this day. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders are storming the positions of our troops near Bondarny. The situation is under control. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, concentrated its offensive efforts in the Toretsk and Shcherbinivka areas, where four skirmishes took place, which were successfully repulsed by our defenders. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 24 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Novotoretske, Promin, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Selidove, Vyshneve and Chumatske settlements. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught, so far they have repelled 19 enemy attacks, and five clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. Fighting continues near Illinka, Berestki, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Voznesenka, Maksimivka, Antonivka, and Katerynivka in the Kurakhiv direction. According to detailed information, 18 out of 32 attacks of the occupying army have already been repelled in this area. Fierce battles are taking place. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our units near Bogoyavlenka six times. Two skirmishes are ongoing. In the Orihiv direction, the occupiers attacked our units near Novoandriivka. The terrorist army also shelled Lobkovo and Novoandriyivka with unguided aerial missiles, the settlement of Novomykolaivka was hit by a rocket attack, probably by an -Iskander-M- missile. The invaders do not stop trying to knock out our units from their occupied positions in the Dnieper direction. Yes, today they carried out one unsuccessful assault on the positions of our defenders. As reported by ArmiyaInform, over the past day, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have restrained almost /?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->150 Russian assaults.

Title: The kobzon can only be reached on foot - our pilots massacred enemy motorcycles

Title: The President presented 30 certificates for apartments to the Heroes of Ukraine and relatives of the...
Description: This was reported by known on November 8. -For almost a year, at least every month, we have been meeting in the Mariinsky Palace to continue the state's initiative regarding its soldiers. The tradition of special gratitude, respect and attention to the best sons and daughters of Ukraine, the Heroes of Ukraine and the families of our Heroes,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The head of state presented 30 certificates for housing: 25 to soldiers and relatives of fallen soldiers of the Ground Forces, Air Force, Navy, Airborne Assault Forces, Special Operations Forces, Territorial Defense Forces, as well as five to representatives of the National Guard and State Emergency Service . The President emphasized that during the full-scale war, thousands of Ukrainians showed their best virtues, strong will, extraordinary courage and dedication on the battlefield. -Ukraine will certainly achieve its goal of living in real peace, having its own will and its own state. And our future generations, who will live in such a state, will always know and respect the heroes who saved Ukraine, its independence, and the lives of each of us,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The head of state urged never to forget the price of the struggle for freedom. The memory of all defenders who gave their lives for Ukraine was honored with a moment of silence. As reported by ArmyInform, President discussed with the Secretary General of NATO the participation of the North Korean military in the Russian war.

Title: Rescue workers showed the liquidation of the consequences of the Russian shelling in Khmelnytskyi re...
Description: informs the State Emergency Service of Ukraine about this. Fortunately, none of the residents were injured. Rescuers extinguished the fire and provided the necessary assistance to people. We remind you, the enemy is attacking our units chemical munitions: over 320 cases per month.

Title: During 10 months of work, DOT saved 16.7 billion hryvnias
Description: About this notifies the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Such a result was made possible thanks to the high competition in the tenders that DOT conducts through the Prozorro system. The average number of participants in tenders is 4.2 potential counterparties. In particular, in the segment of tangible property purchases, the number of participants reaches 5.4, food supplies – 3.7, fuel and lubricants – 2.3. -Our priority is maximum transparency and efficiency in procurement. High competition at auctions allowed us to get the best offers, which ensured significant savings of budget funds. For example, DOT attracted 45 new suppliers of tangible property. We will continue to improve procurement processes in order to provide our military with everything they need under the best conditions,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine continues to work on increasing the transparency and efficiency of procurement to provide the Armed Forces with everything necessary for the successful performance of combat missions. We remind you, the Ministry of Defense approved the interactive training system UNITS for use in the Defense Forces.

Title: The Ministry of Defense received the first patent for FPV drone detection technology -Vitryak M-
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The development, created by Ukrainian military engineers of the Center for Scaling of Technological Solutions (CMTR), is already being actively implemented in the troops. It is an innovative device that allows you to detect enemy FPV drones, giving you an added advantage on the battlefield. -Windbreaker M- has already been codified and accepted for operation in the Armed Forces. This is the first time that a military unit has developed an OVT sample and successfully codified it as a supply item. The patenting was made possible by the Ministry of Defense Intellectual Property Division, which was established in the General Directorate of Military Justice in September 2024. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense has approved the educational interactive training system UNITS for use in the Defense Forces.

Title: -There is no city, here and there the huts on the outskirts have survived-: fierce battles in the no...
Description: Oleksandr Danylenko, head of the group, told about this on the air of -Social News-. interaction with the media of the -Hart- brigade of the State Border Service. According to Oleksandr Danylenko, the number of enemy manpower is constantly changing in the direction. All because the Russians suffer great losses. However, after some time, reserves come to them, and the assaults resume. Due to fierce fighting, Vovchansk is in ruins. -There is no city, here and there there are surviving huts on the outskirts - more or less survived, let's say. But mostly these are ruins, in which only servicemen, as well as domestic animals, which were not taken out by their owners,- said the head of the media interaction group of the State Border Service -Hart- brigade. Previously, ArmyInform showed how strike drones brigades of the DPSU -Revenge- destroy the equipment, weapons and positions of the occupiers in Luhansk region.

Title: A Russian hunter shot down in Donetsk region: details of the examination of the enemy UAV S-70
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on November 8 with reference to relevant evidence presented on the War&Sanctions portal. In particular, microelectronics and other technological components manufactured by Analog Devices, Texas Instruments and Xilinx-AMD (USA), Infineon Technologies (Germany), STMicroelectronics (Switzerland) were found in the Russian -hunter-. The aggressor state of Russia had four prototypes of the S-70 UAV. The cost of such a Russian -hunter- is about $15 million. The S-70 UAV is, among other things, a carrier of UMPB D-30 aerial bombs, which the Russians drop to destroy the civilian infrastructure of Ukraine. On ArmyInform a report came out from the place where the -hunter- fell in Kostyantynivka.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, rescuers have finished sorting through the rubble: the number of dead has increased
Description: notifies of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. The attack killed 10 people, including a child. 41 people were injured, including four children. Rescuers managed to save three people, two of them children. Currently, the city is carrying out restoration work and providing assistance to the victims . We will remind, the Russians used six anti-aircraft guns in the city, one of them hit the oncology dispensary, where the doctor was seriously injured. Currently, the evacuation of the victims from the cancer center has been completed. Earlier, ArmyInform wrote that the President declared that every Russian strike, rosiyi-stane-spravzhnim-zahystom-zhyttya/->similar to what the Russians have inflicted on Zaporozhye today, not only kills people and destroys life, but also destroys the meaning of any words about what is allegedly missing conversations with Russia, some calls to the Kremlin.

Title: Not dead yet! — speakers were delivered by drones to the occupied Oleshki, from which the National A...
Description: The video of the operation was released on November 8 by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Our drones delivered portable speakers to the city of Oleshka (temporarily occupied part of Zhytomyr Oblast), which were placed in places where they were difficult to reach (water towers). At the right moment, the National Anthem of Ukraine blared from the loudspeakers right in the heart of the temporarily occupied city. -This sound is not just music. This is a symbol of our indomitability and continuous struggle, as well as a reminder to the enemy that Ukraine is near, no matter what they do and no matter how they hide,- the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the 124th separate territorial defense brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine gnizdo-okupantiv/->destroyed the deployment point of enemy forces.

Title: Large-scale repatriation: Ukraine returned home 563 soldiers who died on the front line
Description: This is reported by Coordinating Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. In particular, 320 bodies of soldiers killed in the Donetsk direction and 89 killed in the Bakhmut direction were repatriated. In addition, 154 bodies that were previously in morgues on the territory of the Russian Federation were returned. The return of the fallen defenders was made possible thanks to the cooperation between the Coordination Headquarters, the Joint Center of the Security Service of Ukraine, the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Office of the Verkhovna Rada Commissioner for Human Rights, the Secretariat of the Commissioner for Issues of Persons Missing in Special Circumstances, the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. The International Committee of the Red Cross also provided significant assistance in organizing repatriation. The bodies and remains of the deceased will be transported to designated state institutions, where law enforcement officers and forensic experts will conduct identification procedures. As reported by ArmyInform, the repatriation measures of the bodies of the dead military take place within the framework of the exchange fund of the dead almost every month.

Title: The Ministry of Defense has approved the UNITS educational interactive training system for use in th...
Description: About this reported on November 8 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. During classes at the virtual shooting range, you can use models and modules of several dozens of small arms, grenade launchers, ATGMs, etc. The system is mobile, if necessary, it can be quickly deployed at the selected location. During the simulation of a fire exercise on the simulator has the ability to choose the type of terrain: urban development, forest, field, etc. The target situation, weather conditions, and time of day are also simulated. Using UNITS, you can practice the basic skills of a shooter: correct posture, breathing, weapon retention, aiming, smooth descent , as well as a wide range of situational fire exercises. We remind you that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment who have questions about the codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment at e-mail:mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense allowed the supply to the Defense Forces 70 engineering means.

Title: The enemy is hiding in shelters: in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the losses of the occupiers have de...
Description: Details about the situation in the north of Kharkiv region and the losses of the Russian occupiers were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, three enemy assaults on the positions of our defenders took place in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk in the Kharkiv direction. the Russian occupiers carried out 9 airstrikes using 16 guided aerial bombs and 16 unguided aerial missiles, as well as 47 kamikaze drone strikes. They carried out 370 shellings of the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 57 creatures, of which 10 were irretrievable, 46 were sanitary, 1 were captured. Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 30 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 51 shelters for personnel. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on the border areas north of Kharkiv, the Russian occupiers have no opportunity to build powerful engineering fortifications, as the enemy's rear is under powerful fire control by the Defense Forces of Ukraine at a considerable depth.

Title: They hunted conscripts — racketeers who pretended to be employees of the TCC were detained in Odessa
Description: The Odesa Regional Prosecutor's Office reported this on November 8. Suspicion was reported to four members of a criminal group due to the fact of extortion (Part 4 of Article 189 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). According to the investigation, the suspects tracked down men of conscription age and, posing as employees of the police and TCC and SP, demanded to show their military IDs under the pretext of checking documents. In case of refusal, they threatened with forced delivery to the TCC and demanded money to solve this issue. In one of the cases, the suspects received 38 thousand from the victim. hryvnias, in the rest - almost 39 thousand. UAH After receiving the money, they -reassured- the victims, assuring them that their data would be entered into the -Oberig- database, which allegedly guaranteed them no problems with mobilization. Dilkiv was detained -hot- while extorting and receiving UAH 4,000 and $3,000 from another victim. During the searches, military uniforms, money, weapons and other physical evidence were seized from them. The criminal group included persons with a criminal past, as well as an ex-law enforcement officer who also had problems with the law. Currently, the question of choosing a preventive measure in the form of detention for the suspect is being resolved. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Karma in action - three Russians set fire to a house, and then a drone arrived
Description: The video was published on the unit's channel. Three Russians set fire to an apartment building and for some reason remained standing nearby. Maybe they decided to warm themselves. What they did with the owners of the house is still unknown. While the flames raged, the soldiers talked calmly. Due to the noise of the fire, they did not hear how our bomber arrived and made the drop. It exploded right at the feet of the palii, injuring all three. The two occupiers managed to run away under the nearest tree, where they began to wrap their legs with a Soviet harness. The third remained lying in place, due to severed limbs. Then he was dragged into the basement. We hope that the boys received their tickets to the Kobzon.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Sharp Cartouches- unit of the National Guard during a change of positions -vorozhogo-fpv-drona/->were attacked by the enemy a kamikaze drone, which was stopped only by a backpack with EW equipment.

Title: Occupiers are cracking down on believers in temporarily occupied Luhansk
Description: informs about this Center of national resistance. In the temporarily occupied Luhansk, the prosecutor's office -painted- a case against two members of the religious organization -Jehovah's Witnesses-. The men are accused of distributing -extremist- leaflets that allegedly called for the killing of Orthodox Christians. One of them was forcibly placed in a psychiatric hospital and is undergoing -treatment-. The other was charged with the crime provided for in part 1 of Article 280 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (-Public appeals to carry out extremist activities-). The Kremlin is particularly intolerant of -dissidents-. Persecution and purges of non-Gundyaev sect believers (Moscow Orthodox Church) became systematic in all temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. We remind you that the World Bank > will allocate 750 million dollars to Ukraine to support reforms and reconstruction.

Title: Sniper drop - our drones hit 2 invaders from a height of 300 meters
Description: A video of the combat work was published on the unit's channel. Two Russian attack aircraft were heading towards our positions when were spotted by aerial reconnaissance. We sent our bomber to the spot, which did not descend, but immediately struck. -Maximum top hitting. From a height of 300 meters, it is not so easy to hit the top ten, especially taking into account the wind. Two Russians were neutralized from the first reset,- the unit commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, a fighter with the call sign Tataryn from the 225th assault battalion was able to under heavy fire -tilky-zabraty-poranenyh-ale-j-pidbytogo-kozaka/-> pick up armored car -Cossack- together with wounded comrades.

Title: -Your chance to become a hero-: 5 days to feel like a paratrooper
Description: As reports on the official page 46 of a separate air mobile brigade, the intensive is planned for the period from November 27 to December 1. -It is likely that these five days will radically change your life! Take a step towards yourself - strong, courageous, real! Make the most of your chance! Go to the link or call: (050 ) 739-87-72,- the message reads. ArmyInform already told about recruiting in the 46th brigade of the DSHV, in particular about the way its psychologists prepare recruits for war.

Title: -Rat- in the TCC: a tricolor lover was exposed in Volyn
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the investigation, the agent collected information about the locations of the bases of units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the SBU, and the National Police, using official trips to record military facilities. He also tried to identify radar stations and anti-aircraft missile systems to help Russia plan attacks -bypassing- Ukrainian air defense. He transmitted the information through an anonymous chat in the messenger. The SBU documented his actions and detained him during a special operation conducted together with the command of the Armed Forces. A mobile phone with evidence of his cooperation with Russia was seized from the attacker. According to the investigation, the agent maintained ties with relatives in Russia and shared anti-Ukrainian views, which attracted the attention of the occupiers. He was informed of the suspicion under the article about high treason committed under martial law. He is currently in custody, facing life imprisonment with forfeiture of property. The special operation was conducted under the procedural guidance of the Volyn specialized prosecutor's office in the field of defense. As reported by ArmyInform, Kharkiv paliya of the cars of Ukrainian defenders was detained.

Title: Innovative winter equipment: how the Armed Forces provide clothing for harsh conditions
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -We strive to provide our servicemen with modern, innovative clothing that meets the highest standards of comfort and efficiency. It is important that the winter clothes of our defenders not only keep warm, but also be as functional and comfortable as possible, helping to perform tasks even in conditions of extreme weather phenomena,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The list of the main set of winter clothes includes: The department also talked about the important characteristics of the winter clothes of military personnel. Wind and moisture-proof jacket and pantswinter it is a key piece of kit for the winter period, providing comfort, warmth and camouflage for a soldier. These clothing items come in two types. In the first type, insulation is added to the jacket and pants, and the upper material of the jacket has a microporous foam coating, which additionally protects against moisture and wind. The second type uses fabric with a membrane coating and Omni-Heat, which improves thermoregulation and ensures heat retention. High-top winter boots are made of high-quality materials, equipped with a waterproof and breathable membrane material that provides effective protection against moisture, neoprene and foil insoles to keep warm, as well as a puncture-resistant main insole. The boots are designed with additional toe and rear protection. Scarf-pipe, winter gloves and insulation suit jacket - the main material for their manufacture is a pleasant-to-the-touch knitted pile fabric of the ``fleece'' type. The products prevent hypothermia and ensure the comfort of servicemen at low air temperatures. Warm covers are worn on boots and are used for additional protection from external environmental factors, such as snow, dirt and other negative influences. Underwear for cold weather is made of knitted pile fabric, which effectively retains heat. In addition, servicemen receive a sleeping bag and a field insulating sleeping mat. Currently, a new type of sleeping bag is planned to be issued - it is an innovative set, which consists of an inner sleeping bag of the -cocoon- type, an outer water-repellent cover and a compression bag (packing cover). Also, it is additionally equipped with an insert for hygiene. The design of the bag is designed in such a way that it allows you to place a liner inside the cocoon and a water-repellent cover on the outside. There are also design elements that allow for comfortable use, namely: an internal pocket for storing personal items and a lower pocket that closes with a zipper on the bottom of the item, which allows you to store a sleeping bag liner. In general, the sleeping bag has more completeness, high-quality and modern materials, which allow to ensure complete isolation of the user from the influence of the environment and to use it in different weather conditions and at any time of the year. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense simplified the return of property and introduced new uniforms.

Title: Shelling of Kharkiv region: destruction of infrastructure, evacuation of the population due to the t...
Description: About this informs the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov. In Kharkiv, in particular, in the Shevchenkiv district, several administrative buildings and residential buildings were damaged by shelling of guided aerial bombs. A 12-story building was destroyed, as a result of which 25 people were injured. Six of them were hospitalized, but serious injuries were avoided. Several cars, shopping pavilions and a metro station were also damaged.   In the Saltiv district, shelling partially destroyed the entrance of an apartment building, buildings and vehicles were damaged. In the Dergachiv community, a residential building was damaged as a result of shelling from rocket launchers, and a 19-year-old resident was injured. The village of Postolne in the Bogodukhiv district also came under fire, where the bombardment was carried out in an open area. In addition, during the day, 86 civilians were evacuated from the Kupyan and Boriv directions due to the danger of new shelling. Previously ArmyInform reported that as a result of an attack on Kharkiv, the entrance was destroyed house, among the victims is a three-month-old child.

Title: -There are just a lot of them-: the enemy, using -ant tactics-, is slowly climbing Kurakhov
Description: Oleksandr Nevidimy, press officer, told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novyni- telethon 46 separate air mobile brigade. Despite the fog, rain and snow, the enemy is advancing. According to Oleksandr Nevymyty, the intensity of the fighting is increasing day by day. -There are just a lot of them. Enemies — both from the front, from the south, and from the north — are trying to cut off our logistics routes, and it is this Kurakhove-Zaporizhia route, which is one of the key highways,- said Oleksandr Nevidimy. As reported ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv direction, the occupiers aim to cut off the defenders' logistics routes with key highways, forcing them to withdraw.

Title: During the day, the Russians shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 9 times
Description: reports this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. 8 houses were damaged in Rivne of the Myrnograd community. A house was damaged in Pokrovsk. In Yampol of the Lyman community, 1 house was destroyed, several were damaged. In Mykolaivka, 2 people died and 5 were injured, 5 high-rise buildings and an administrative building were damaged. In Mykolaivka, Kostyantynivska community, a person was injured, 9 private houses and an administrative building were damaged. 2 houses were destroyed in Siversk. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 8 private houses, 2 high-rise buildings and an industrial building were damaged. We remind you that the enemy continues to use special munitions equipped with dangerous chemicals against the Defense Forces.

Title: And the date of birth is not important when there is such love: at the border, another -couple- was ...
Description: This is reported by State border service of Ukraine. In particular, a 40-year-old native of Khmelnytskyi provided documents on marriage with a 35-year-old woman, also from Khmelnytskyi, who has a disability of II group. The couple was traveling by bus through the checkpoint -Krakowec- yesterday evening. A man and a woman were allegedly going to the Czech Republic for treatment of his wife. He said that he was going to treat her autism, and she was going to treat her stomach. In the end, the -newlyweds- did not ask each other's date of birth either. The -couple- were married on 19 September. On the signs of a criminal offense provided for in Art. 332 of the Criminal Code -Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-, operatives of the detachment reported to the National Police. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The World Bank will allocate 750 million dollars to Ukraine to support reforms and reconstruction
Description: reported Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal. According to him, the funds will be provided within the framework of the project -Support for reconstruction through prudent fiscal management- (SURGE), which is aimed at supporting the institutional reforms necessary for joining the European Union. Part of this amount will be allocated from the ADVANCE Ukraine fund, which is supported by the Japanese government. As Denys Shmyhal noted, the implementation of the program will help to strengthen the work of state institutions in the conditions of war, to provide key state services to citizens in full. In particular, the reforms within the project are aimed at improving the efficiency of public investment and public finance management. If necessary, funding can be increased. -We are grateful to the leadership of the World Bank and our international partners for this important support to Ukraine in the conditions of a full-scale war unleashed by Russia,- the Prime Minister noted. As reported by ArmyInform, Great Britain introduced new sanctions against the Russian OPC.

Title: New housing and bases for the military: The Ministry of Defense received more than 100 buildings in ...
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The transfer of the property is in accordance with a memorandum signed between the departments in August last year. Active work is currently underway to transfer more than 100 buildings to the Ministry of Defense. In parallel, the Ministry of Defense together with the State Property Fund conducted a large-scale inventory of military property. According to its results, ownership of more than 300 buildings was registered, and more than 2,000 real estate objects were registered. -During Russia's large-scale invasion of Ukraine, it is critical to provide the Armed Forces with the necessary infrastructure. Cooperation with the State Property Fund contributes to the effective use of available state resources to strengthen defense capabilities,- stressed the head of the Main Department of Defense Lands and Funds of the Ministry of Defense, Borys Zakutniy. The Ministry of Defense will continue active cooperation with the State Property Fund to provide units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with the necessary infrastructure. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine receives new weapons: Estonian anti-drone missiles.

Title: Continuous attacks on Nikopol: Russians used drones and artillery
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. According to him, the communities of Nikopol, Marganetska and Myrivska came under enemy fire. As a result of the shelling, the infrastructure, one of the enterprises, six cars and a private house were damaged. Despite the intensity of the attacks, there were no victims or wounded among the local population. In the evening, the aggressor shelled Nikopol again, firing ten shells from heavy artillery and attacking with a kamikaze drone. In addition, in the morning the city was again hit by a UAV, which resulted in damage to an economic structure. As reported by ArmyInform, the tragedy in Zaporizhia: quantity the dead increased to 8, among them a one-year-old child. We will remind you that the attack on Kharkiv: the entrance to the house was destroyed, -dytyna/->among the injured is a three-month-old child.

Title: -They destroy their own settlements and beat their population-: the Russians do not know how to figh...
Description: About this on the telethon -Edyny Novyny- told the spokesman of OTU -Siversk- - Vadim Mysnyk. In general, according to Vadym Mysnyk, the enemy uses the same tactics as in Donbas and the south of our country. -They destroy their settlements, hit their population, their people's homes, and then carry out these -meat assaults-. Defense forces employ active defense tactics. Taking into account the natural conditions and relief conditions, we inflict maximum damage on the enemy,- said Vadym Mysnyk. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the number of shelling of the northern border is decreasing, and in Kurshchyna - up to 1,000 -arrivals- every day.

Title: The President on the new wave of terror: air defense, long-range, weapons packages, sanctions agains...
Description: This was announced by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. In Odesa region, several residential buildings were damaged by shelling. Unfortunately, one person died, nine people were injured. The President expressed his condolences to the family of the deceased. In Zaporizhzhia, emergency and rescue operations continue after the previous attack. The number of dead as a result of this terror increased to 8 people, more than 40 were injured, including four children. During the night, Ukrainian air defense forces shot down four anti-aircraft missiles and about 60 attack drones launched by Russia against Ukraine. The President expressed his gratitude to the defenders of the sky, as well as to all the rescuers and doctors who help the victims. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized the importance of international support for Ukraine in the fight against Russian terror. He called for joint and decisive action to reduce and block Russia's war-making capacity. According to him, Ukraine needs to strengthen air defense systems, long-range weapons, sanctions against the aggressor, which are necessary steps to achieve a just peace and stop the deaths of Ukrainians. As reported by ArmyInform, the tragedy in Zaporizhia: quantity the dead increased to 8, among them a one-year-old child. We will remind you that the attack on Kharkiv: the entrance to the house was destroyed, -dytyna/->among the injured is a three-month-old child.

Title: Ukraine receives a new weapon: Estonian anti-drone missiles
Description: About this it was discussed at a meeting in Kyiv between the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General Anatoly Klochka, and the management of the specified company. The missiles that Ukraine will test are designed primarily to counter UAVs and are capable of hitting targets at a height of up to 2 km. -Our goal is to help Ukraine win this war. For this, we offer a sample of a new low-cost missile for shooting down aerial targets, primarily unmanned aerial vehicles,- said Frankenburg Technologies CEO Kusti Salm. He added that in the case of successful tests and approval for further use, the production of these missiles can be organized in Ukraine. The parties have previously agreed that the next step may be to agree on the format of financing the production of missiles. Deputy Minister of Defense Anatoly Klochko emphasized that it is extremely important for Ukraine to have the widest possible arsenal of missile weapons to repel Russian aggression. He called on foreign manufacturers of such weapons to provide them in Ukraine and test them in combat conditions. -We are open to cooperation and ready to use various types of modern weapons,- the deputy minister said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov, together with the Chief of the General Staff, Lieutenant General Anatoly Bargilevich, held a meeting with the military to discuss the real needs of the army and further steps for its modernization.

Title: The enemy continues to use special ammunition equipped with dangerous chemicals against the Defense ...
Description: notifies of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In October 2024, the units of radiation, chemical, biological intelligence of the Support Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine recorded 323 such cases. With the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Russia against Ukraine, units of radiation, chemical, and biological intelligence carried out direct recording of cases of use of dangerous chemicals on the battlefield. With this, the Russian Federation grossly violates the rules of warfare, ignores the norms and obligations of the Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production, Stockpiling and Use of Chemical Weapons and on Their Destruction. We remind you that in the Black Sea a Russian ship is on duty, ready to launch Kalibr missiles.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief showed how the Defense Forces burn the enemy in landings
Description: He published the relevant video on his official page. -We monitor, we see, we burn. The skill of Ukrainian soldiers leaves no chance for the Russian occupiers,- he noted. Formerly ArmyInform reported that Russian control points were under attack by the Defense Forces.

Title: Hurivske - a settlement in Odesa region was named in honor of Military Intelligence
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The relevant decision was adopted with the aim of marking the important contribution of the Ukrainian special services to the protection of national interests from external threats, strengthening the defense capabilities of our country and honoring the feats of military intelligence officers. In the explanation of the Institute of National Memory of Ukraine, it is stated that during the large-scale war with Russia, the soldiers of the HUR performed a complex of complex tasks — from strategic intelligence to combat operations to liberate Ukrainian lands, as well as special missions in the occupied territories and behind enemy lines, which undermine the military potential of the aggressor state. -We express our gratitude to the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, the team of the Institute of National Remembrance of Ukraine, and the local community of Hurivskyi for the important decision and commemoration in toponymy of the feat of the HUR soldiers,- the message reads. The name Hurivske, which honors the state rank of the Military Intelligence of Ukraine, is not accidental for Odesa: it symbolizes the persistence of historical traditions in the creation of national special services. For example, it was in Odesa in 1886 that Vsevolod Zmienko (1886-1938), a prominent military figure of the Ukrainian Revolution of 1917-1921, a corporal-general of the Army of the Ukrainian People's Republic, one of the organizers of the military special service of the State Center of the Ukrainian People's Republic in exile, was born. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kyiv Oblast four men were hit by fragments of a downed rocket.

Title: Night attack -Shahedami-: air defense forces shot down 62 enemy UAVs and 4 missiles
Description: This is notified by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Enemy tactical aviation struck Kharkiv Oblast and Sumy Oblast with guided air bombs. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, aviation, EW units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. src=-blob:https://web.telegram.org/dfba184a-0a57-4804-b552-d1324fd3c514- alt=-- /> As of 09:00, the shooting down of 4 guided air missiles Kh-59/69 and 62- x enemy UAVs in Odesa, Mykolaiv, Kyiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Kirovohrad, Zhytomyr, Chernihiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Khmelnytskyi and Ivano-Frankivsk regions. 26 enemy drones were lost in different regions of Ukraine. One is in the airspace of Ukraine. Combat work continues! As a result of the night Russian attack, there were casualties and damage to the houses and property of civilians in Odesa, Kharkiv, Sumy and Khmelnytskyi regions. We remind you that found themselves under the attack of the Defense Forces Russian control points.

Title: Russian control points were attacked by the Defense Forces
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, the operation in the Kursk region is ongoing, during the day the aggressor carried out 28 airstrikes, dropped 41 anti-aircraft missiles. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Yesterday, the aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces made six strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy, hit two control points and two artillery systems. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,580 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 9 tanks, 49 armored combat vehicles, 32 artillery systems, 118 operational-tactical UAVs, 84 vehicles and 6 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, the situation at the front is difficult: The Armed Forces of Ukraine held back almost 150 Russian assaults.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Enemy shelling in the Kherson region: a museum, a pharmacy and a hairdresser were damaged
Description: This is informs the head of the Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Bilozerka, Berislav, Novoberislav, Vesele, Velyka Oleksandrivka, Dudchany, Stanislav, Novooleksandrivka, Zmiivka, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Ukrainka, Mykhailivka, Kizomys and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. In particular, the Russian military targeted a critical infrastructure facility, a museum, a pharmacy and a hair salon. In addition, the occupiers damaged 4 high-rise buildings and 3 houses in the residential quarters of the regional settlements. The Russians also mutilated private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, the tragedy in Zaporizhia: quantity the dead increased to 8, among them a one-year-old child. We will remind you that the attack on Kharkiv: the entrance to the house was destroyed, -dytyna/->among the injured is a three-month-old child.

Title: A Russian ship is on duty in the Black Sea, ready to launch missiles -Kalibre-
Description: This is reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers are carrying out a -complex of measures- to -droniv-zahyshhayut-aviacziyeyu/->to protect the Black Sea Fleet, which is actually blocked in Novorossiysk.

Title: The situation at the front is difficult: the Armed Forces of Ukraine held off almost 150 Russian ass...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, the Russians used almost 1,500 kamikaze drones to destroy them and carried out more than 4,300 attacks, including 100 from rocket launchers. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Yunakivka, Krasnopillya, Myropyllya, Vodolagi, Zhuravka, Basivka, Tsapivka, Kozacha Lopan, Okhrimivka, Vovchansk, Visoka Yaruga, Novovodyane, Terny, Torske, Yampil, Elizavetivka, Rivne. Also under attack were Toretsk, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Antonivka, Velyka Novosilka, Novodarivka, Temyrivka, Novopil, Biloghirya, Zaporizhzhia, Mala Tokmachka, Novopavlivka, Novoandriivka, Stepnohirsk. Three enemy assaults on the positions of our defenders took place in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk in the Kharkiv direction over the past day. In the Kupyansk direction, 12 attacks by occupiers were recorded. The defense forces repulsed the offensive actions of the enemy in the direction of Petropavlivka, Kruglyakivka, Kindrashyvka, Kolisnikivka, and Lozova. The enemy attacked 17 times, in some cases with the support of attack and bomber aircraft, in the Lyman direction. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Makiivka, Katerynivka, Terniv, Torsky, Serebryanka, Bilogorivka, and Grigorivka. In the Seversky direction, our defenders repelled one attack in the Pereizny area. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked seven times in the Stupochky and Bila Hora areas. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, supported by aviation, launched seven attacks near Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 24 offensive actions of the aggressor in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Sukhoi Yar and Selidovoy districts. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 50 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Dalnyi and Katerynivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out five assaults on our positions near Trudovoy, Rozlyv and Sukhy Yali. In the Orikhov direction the enemy did not carry out assault (offensive) actions, but actively used aviation, in particular dropped more than a dozen guided bombs. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions three times. They were fiercely repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,580 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 9 tanks, 49 armored combat vehicles, 32 artillery systems, 118 operational-tactical UAVs, 84 vehicles and 6 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: In the Kyiv region, four men were hit by fragments of a downed rocket
Description: This was reported by the head of Kyiv OVA Ruslan Kravchenko. Car drivers who were near the place where the debris fell were injured.
