One of the men is in a serious condition, two are moderately injured, and one has minor injuries. As of 7:30 a.m., six private houses and four cars were damaged. There was also a fire on the grass floor and a fire in the premises of a defunct gas station, which have already been extinguished. The victims are treated at the scene and taken to a local hospital for further treatment. As reported by ArmyInform, the tragedy in Zaporizhia: quantity the dead increased to 8, among them a one-year-old child. We will remind you that the attack on Kharkiv: the entrance to the house was destroyed, -dytyna/->among the injured is a three-month-old child.

Title: Tragedy in Zaporizhzhia: the number of dead has increased to 8, including a one-year-old child
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 16 airstrikes on Zaporizhzhia, Kushugum, Stepnohirsk, Novoandriivka, Malya Tokmachka, Novodarivka, Robotyn, Novodanilivka, and Biloghir. According to the head of the OVA, 194 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olhivske. As Ivan Fedorov noted, 6 shellings from the RSZV were carried out on the territory of Robotyny, Malaya Tokmachka and Novoandriyivka. Also, 168 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Orikhov, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyno, Malya Tokmachka, Biloghiri, Malynivka, Novodarivka, and Olhivka. -There were 149 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- he added. We will remind, the Russians used six anti-aircraft guns in the city, one of them hit the oncology dispensary, where one of the doctors was seriously injured. Currently, the evacuation of the victims from the cancer center has been completed. Earlier, ArmyInform wrote that the President declared that every Russian strike, rosiyi-stane-spravzhnim-zahystom-zhyttya/->similar to what the Russians inflicted on Zaporizhzhia today, not only kills people and destroys life, but also destroys the meaning of any words about the alleged lack of conversations with Russia, some calls to the Kremlin.

Title: Almost 50 BBM and 1,580 infantrymen: Russia's impressive losses per day
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 08.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the hottest battles near Kurakhovo: the enemy made 50 breakthrough attempts.

Title: Russians hit Odesa: destroyed infrastructure, there are victims
Description: This was informed Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. As a result of the attack by drones in Odesa and neighboring areas, private residential buildings were damaged, some of them started fires. In one of the educational institutions of Odessa, windows were broken and the facade was damaged. Due to shrapnel damage to two gas pipes, they were depressurized and ignited. Windows were also broken in a number of buildings. Emergency services are working to eliminate the consequences. The victims are provided with the necessary assistance, and law enforcement officers record the consequences of the crimes of the Russian military against the civilian population of Odesa. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of an enemy air attack on Zaporizhzhia 40 people were injured, including four children.

Title: The hottest battles near Kurakhovo: the enemy made 50 breakthrough attempts
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The terrorist state carried out 55 airstrikes, dropping 87 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the invaders used 687 kamikaze drones for strikes and fired more than 3,600 shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction Russian terrorists stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk district three times. Twelve times the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyan direction. In the vicinity of Petropavlivka, Kruglyakivka, Kindrashyvka, Kolisnykyvka, and Lozova, units of the Defense Forces repelled all enemy attacks. In the Lyman direction, Russian troops attacked Ukrainian defenders 17 times in the districts of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Makiivka, Katerynivka, Terniv, Torsky, Serebryanka, Bilogorivka, and Grigorivka. In the Seversky direction, our defenders repelled one attack in the Pereizny district. The enemy launched an airstrike in the Zakytny district. In the Kramatorsk direction Ukrainian soldiers repelled six attempts by the invaders to advance in the Stupochky and Bila Hora areas. Another attack is underway. In the Toretsk direction our troops repelled four enemy attacks in the Toretsk area, where he, with the support of aviation, tried to improve his tactical position. There are still two battles going on. In the Pokrovsky direction the aggressor attacked our positions 23 times, in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Hryhorivka, Sukhoi Yar and Selidovoy, our defenders repelled all the assaults of the occupation troops. According to the available information, the occupiers lost 357 people killed and wounded, five armored vehicles were destroyed , a tank, seven vehicles, a cannon, a tank, two cars and two armored fighting vehicles were also damaged. The hottest on the Kurakhiv direction, where the invaders made 50 attempts to advance . The main battle continues near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Dalnyi and Katerynivka. The enemy also carried out airstrikes in the areas of Kurakhovo, Dalnye and Antonivka settlements. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor stormed the front edge of our defense five times in the area of ​​Trudovoy, Rozlyv, and Sukhy Yaliv. The enemy actively used aviation in the areas of settlements of Novopil, Temyrivka, Novodarivka and Velika Novosilka. In the Orykhiv direction, the enemy carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles in the areas of populated areas of Zaporizhzhia, Mala Tokmachka, Novopavlivka, Novoandriivka, Stepnohirsk, dropping nine air bombs. In the Dnieper direction the enemy made three unsuccessful attempts to storm the positions of Ukrainian units. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction. Russian aviation carried out 18 airstrikes against Kurshchyna using 27 anti-aircraft missiles. Soldiers of the 128th Separate Transcarpathian Mountain Assault Brigade, the 126th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, the 25th Separate Sicheslav Airborne Brigade, the 38th Separate Marine Brigade, and the 14th Ivan Operative Brigade were honored for their effective combat work. Bohuna As reported by ArmyInform, about 30% remain unchanged: v-rajoni-tretyny/->irreversible losses of the enemy in the north of Kharkiv Oblast are about a third.

Title: A blow to Kharkiv: the entrance of a house was destroyed, a three-month-old baby was among the injur...
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. The enemy again attacked the Saltiv and Shevchenkiv districts of the city. In the Saltiv district, a 12-story residential building was hit, where rescuers continue to clear the rubble. According to preliminary data, 25 people were injured, five of them were hospitalized, their condition is assessed as medium and light. 30 people were evacuated, including four children. The entrance of the building from the 1st to the 3rd floor was partially destroyed, neighboring residential buildings, five cars and the exits of the metro station were damaged. The youngest boy among the victims is 3 months old and has an acute reaction to stress. Fortunately, there are no injured people in serious condition. In the Shevchenkiv district of the city, Russian aircraft struck an open area, damaging historical buildings, public places and residential buildings. Another hit occurred near residential buildings, where at least six high-rise buildings, shops, shopping pavilions and cars were damaged. The metro station exits were also damaged. According to preliminary data, there are no victims in the central part. Emergency services continue to eliminate the consequences of the shelling and examine the places of hits. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of an enemy air attack on Zaporizhzhia 40 people were injured, including four children.

Title: The F-16 protected Donald Trump, but missed the mark on tenure
Description: About the most famous use of the F-16 fighter during the incident, which could potentially become one of the attempts to assassinate Donald Trump, says ArmyInform. Patrolling of the airspace of the United States of America, including F-16 fighters, is carried out as part of the comprehensive control of North American airspace and airspace, which is provided, implemented and coordinated by the United States and Canada's Joint Aerospace Defense System. The joint US-Canadian air defense and missile defense system is subordinate to the North American Aerospace Defense Command. Abbreviated from the first letters of its name in English, it is known as NORAD. NORAD's headquarters and command center are located at the US Peterson Air Force Base, but the command is joint US-Canadian and is responsible for the airspace security of both countries. There are three regional headquarters under his command: the Alaska NORAD region at Elmendorf Air Force Base; the Canadian NORAD Region in Winnipeg, Manitoba, and the Continental NORAD Region at Tyndall Air Force Base, Florida. An F-16 Fighting Falcon from the Minnesota ANG performs a simulated interception of an aerial target during the EAA AirVenture 2024 air show in Oshkosh, Wisconsin NORAD's primary mission is to protect the sovereign airspaces of both nations by responding to unknown, unwanted, and unauthorized actions in the airspace. and the surrounding area of ​​North America. Forces and assets under NORAD monitor the airspace around the clock with the aim of detecting unauthorized actions, track air targets and, if necessary, carry out a set of measures with the aim of diverting them from their flight path, forcing them to land or destroying them if they can pose a potential threat. NORAD works in close cooperation with the US National Guard, law enforcement agencies, special services and all other components of the security and defense forces of the United States of America and Canada. Patrolling American airspace, NORAD pays increased attention to the places of stay of the President of the United States. The American media has repeatedly drawn attention to the significant increase in costs for the security of the first person of the state, including due to the fact that F-16 fighters must be constantly in the air with the support of refueling aircraft in order to provide combat air patrol (CAP) within the limits of the temporary no-fly zone around the president. During the presidential elections in the United States, the protection of the candidates for the position of the President of the United States is provided not only by the Secret Service, which is responsible for the protection of senior political figures, but also by other components of the security and defense forces of the state. This year, even the Pentagon joined the protection of candidates in the presidential elections. NORAD is also traditionally involved in patrolling the airspace in the places of rallies and other meetings of candidates for the President of the United States of America with voters. This was done both during the recent presidential race and in previous election campaigns. Increased attention to the protection of US presidential candidates is fully justified, because assassination attempts are quite frequent. Among the latest high-profile cases, we can mention the assassination attempt on the now elected US President Donald Trump on July 13, 2024 at a campaign rally in the town of Butler near Pittsburgh in the state of Pennsylvania. Then the bullet hit Trump's ear, which for a while became a symbol of the unity of the electoral core of voters around the figure of a charismatic candidate. Judging by the results of the vote, the shots to the side and next to the candidate for President of the United States ultimately contributed to his victory. However, this is far from the only and not the first time that Donald Trump's life was or could be in potential danger during the election campaign. During one of these incidents, an F-16 patrol fighter of the NORAD mission took a prominent part in preventing a possible attempt on his life. The incident occurred during a Donald Trump campaign rally on October 28, 2020 at Laughlin/Bullhead International Airport in Bullhead City, Arizona, when an unidentified aircraft entered the closed airspace without authorization, creating a potential threat to the then-current To the President of the United States of America. The pilot of the offending aircraft did not communicate with the air traffic controller and did not respond to radio warnings. NORAD's statement on the incident states: -A NORAD F-16 aircraft tracked a general aviation aircraft that failed to communicate with air traffic control and entered the temporary restricted flight area around Bullhead City, Arizona without proper clearance.- Seeing that the offending aircraft did not respond in any way to the initial interception procedures, the F-16 fighter pilot fired a warning shot, using flares to attract attention. After that, it was possible to establish radio communication with the offending aircraft and it was taken out of the prohibited zone. The firing of F-16 flares became a bright part of the pre-election show. The US president and the crowd of protesters in his support were delighted by what they saw, although they did not understand exactly what was happening. -Oh look at that! Look, look, look! They pointed to the future President! How about that?- - shouted Donald Trump, instantly noticing how to take advantage of the situation. After that, the politician, who is prone to outrage and is not picky in his words, did not forget to scold the Democrats and the American media. According to him, they never report or show anything really interesting and important, and even seem to have deliberately turned the cameras in the other direction in order not to film the F-16. It is not difficult to make sure that Donald Trump's statements turned out to be far from reality - the incident was reported in detail by dozens of local and national American media. Instead, the statement that the F-16 pointed to the future President of the United States by firing signal missiles turned out to be quite true, although somewhat premature. Donald Trump lost the 2020 presidential race then but won the current 2024 US Presidential election by a landslide.

Title: It destroys what it cannot seize: the Kremlin already realizes that it will not be able to take Odes...
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk told ArmiyaInform about this: -Ukraine is one of the five largest countries exporting grain and leguminous crops in the world. Almost 500 million people around the world are supplied with Ukrainian grain, primarily African countries. This is a huge number. This is also a serious source of foreign currency income for our state. Therefore, the Russian strikes are aimed at reducing the export potential of Ukraine, which for grain and other crops is carried out mainly by sea. racists want to undermine our country economically. There is an important nuance. Russia is also among the top 5 grain exporting countries. The Russian Federation produces from 70 to 140 million tons per year and sells two thirds of it. So if we do not grow and sell our grain to foreign markets, then Moscow will replace us, enrich itself even more and replenish the budget for military purposes to continue the war of aggression against Ukraine. An interesting point. If the Russians set about destroying our port infrastructure, this is a sign that the Russian Federation will no longer be able to return Ukraine to its circle of interests. If the enemy understood that he could completely return Ukraine, he would not destroy the golden hen that lays the golden eggs. That is, the Kremlin already realizes that it will not be able to take Odeschyna. We need to strengthen our air defense, particularly in the south. There is a reflection on the part of South Korea regarding the transfer of anti-aircraft missile systems of their production to us. This is the Cheolmae-2 medium-range air defense system, a rough analogue of the German IRIS-T system. By the way, the Korean complex was developed using technologies from the Russian S-350 and S-400 air defense systems. Maximum range to the target: 40 km. But, again, we must understand that it will not be possible to completely close the airspace over Ukraine. Even if the maximum number of air defense systems is installed in Ukraine, there will still be a breakthrough.-

Title: -- Russians? Drop your weapon-! They didn't quit. And I shot: as Junior Sergeant Dobosh broke throug...
Description: Mr. Ilya is 48 years old. In the army - since May 2022. Joined the ranks of the 51st separate rifle battalion of the 63rd separate mechanized brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Military accounting specialty is machine gunner. Behind his back is a term of service in the Crimea, in Feodosia, from 1994 to 1996, after Ukraine declared independence. Served in the ranks of the construction battalion. He recalls how his military unit could not -say goodbye- to the Soviet -stars- on their uniforms for a long time - although the neighboring unit had already switched to tridents. In civilian life, he managed to master many professions: a driver, a logger, a security guard, and a forester. Originally from Transcarpathia - from Mukachevo. -Why did I join the army in 2022? Because I understood that if everyone stays at home, then the Russians can be at my doorstep. Besides, my brothers went to war. When I learned about it, I also went to war. Do I regret going into the army all the time of the full-scale war? No,- says the army man. The military man has a number of hot spots behind him, including battles for Bakhmut. Now he is on the difficult Lyman direction. The other day, at the end of October, during combat missions, he destroyed up to 10 enemy personnel and prevented a breakthrough in his position. The military recalls: -I was just at training - mastering a new combat vehicle, MTLB. He came back on Saturday, on Monday he took a turn at the front. And here they go, 20 meters away from me. I ask: -Russians? Drop the weapon!-. They lined up like goslings. The weapon was not thrown. I shot. A few hours later, a new batch arrived. They were also shot,- the unit commander succinctly recalls. The most terrible thing, says Mr. Ilya, during a large-scale invasion was when the brothers were on one side of the battle, and he was on the other. -It was scary whether I would see them again: whether I would survive or they would survive. Then it was really scary. But everyone survived, thank God. It's hard to lose your friends… Recently, I lost a close friend: a landmine flew and he was cut by shrapnel. I pulled him out of the trench, he was dragged into the car on a stretcher, but, unfortunately, he was not taken to the hospital. Three children remained and the wife… -. Mr. Ilya suffered a concussion during those events. Now undergoing treatment. But they try to find time during the war for jokes - where would we go without that. -Once they said to the fellow: -Listen, the commander was urgently looking for you! Run as fast as you can to him!-. He rushed, ran 300 meters, and only then remembered that the commander was on vacation. He stopped and turned around - and my friends and I were lying there, laughing,- Mr. Ilya recalls. The need for people in his department is palpable, says Mr. Ilya. But he emphasizes that reliable fighters are needed. -I have to be sure of my brother - that he will not let me down and will not run away anywhere. As in his commander. And this, in fact, is one of the main tasks of the commander: the fighter should not be afraid of him. He should, by his own behavior, encourage him to perform his duty well, and not to -jump on his skis- and go home. You have to treat your soldiers humanely, otherwise he won't be a good soldier, he won't want to serve.- When asked what victory will be in the Russian-Ukrainian war, Mr. Ilya answers: -When I return to my family. When my brothers, alive and well, return to their families. Someday there will come a time when we will all gather in some cafe and sit together, remember the service, remember those who are not with us. Let's remember all the good and not so much. This will be a victory for me.- Photo from the personal archive of Ilya Dobosh

Title: Seven Major Destructive Mobilization Narratives Spread by the Enemy
Description: We draw your attention to the fact that each of the above phrases is untrue and is being spread with the aim of disrupting the mobilization campaign in Ukraine, spreading panic and mistrust of the Ukrainian authorities and the Armed Forces. We remind you once again that the general mobilization was announced in Ukraine in connection with the beginning of a full-scale invasion of Russia as a forced measure and the only way to save the country from the Kremlin invaders. Employees of the TCC and JV act within the framework of their powers in accordance with current legislation. Conscripts must also be ready to fulfill their constitutional duty and stand up for the defense of the country in case of need.

Title: The President discussed with the Secretary General of NATO the participation of the North Korean mil...
Description: This was reported by the Office of the President. The head of state talked about the situation on the battlefield, in particular about the participation of the North Korean military in the Russian aggression against Ukraine. The President emphasized that a more decisive reaction of the Western countries to the new role of North Korea in the Russian-Ukrainian war is needed. In addition, among the main topics of the meeting is the implementation of the decisions of the Washington NATO summit, in particular regarding the strengthening of air defense, investments in the Ukrainian production of shells, drones and long-range weapons. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that Ukraine needs permission to use long-range weapons on military facilities on the territory of Russia. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on the sidelines of the summit in Budapest, Volodymyr Zelenskyi also held a meeting with dezinformatciyi/->President of Moldova Maya Sandu and Prime Minister of Great Britain Kir Starmer and President of France Emmanuel Macron.

Title: Jumping into holes and pretending to be a hose: the Russians are trying to save themselves somehow
Description: The head of the planning department of the 13th brigade of the operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev. - They have chosen such a system - we partly forced them to this, because during their movement we constantly inflict fire damage on them, constantly hit them. They hide in those -holes- that they equip and dig on the routes of their tracking. A very large number of -burrows-, everywhere along all the routes they mainly use, he said. The guardsman described the usual tactics of the occupiers: - When the fire attack begins, there is a -hole- somewhere, where they all climb. If not everyone climbs there, then they hide under the trees. In the same case, if Russian soldiers are found while moving in open areas where there is no shelter, they fall down and pretend to be dead. — If we find them in some areas where their usual tactics are impossible, then they simply fall down and either pretend to be dead, or just lie there and not move, hoping that they will not be seen. But it doesn't work, the military man emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform explained that prompts Russians to surrender as prisoners in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Volodymyr Zelensky discussed defense support for Ukraine with Emmanuel Macron
Description: This was reported by Office of the President. The Ukrainian head of state thanked the French president for supporting the Victory Plan and emphasized the importance of European unity in supporting Ukraine. One of the topics of the meeting is military aid, in particular training of the Ukrainian brigade -Anna Kyivska-, strengthening of long-range capabilities. The President of Ukraine noted the participation of France in most coalitions of the Rammstein format. Support for Ukraine on the way to NATO is also among the key topics of the negotiations. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized that it is important to give Ukraine an invitation to join the Alliance — this is the first point of the Victory Plan. As reported by ArmyInform, on the sidelines of the summit in Budapest, Volodymyr Zelenskyi also held a meeting with the President of Moldova Maya Sandu and Prime Minister of Great Britain Keir Starmer.

Title: Consequences of the bloody terror: the number of injured children increased in Zaporizhzhia
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Among the victims are children aged 15, 5 and 1, as well as a four-month-old girl, who are under the supervision of doctors. About 30 people are in hospitals in moderate condition. We will remind, the Russians used six anti-aircraft guns in the city, one of them hit the oncology dispensary, where one of the doctors was seriously injured. Currently, the evacuation of the victims from the cancer center has been completed. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of dead as a result of Russian strikes on Zaporizhzhia increased to 4. Earlier ArmyInform wrote that the President declared that every Russian strike, similar to what the Russians have done in Zaporizhzhia today, not only kills people and destroys life, but also destroys the meaning of any words about the alleged lack of conversations with Russia, some calls to the Kremlin.

Title: Victory plan and financial support: the President of Ukraine met with the British Prime Minister
Description: This was reported by /a> Office of the President. The main topic of the meeting is the implementation of the Victory Plan, which the head of state presented to the head of the British government last month in London. -Thank you, Prime Minister, we had frequent discussions and very important decisions regarding the strengthening of Ukraine. I thank you and all the people. We are very proud of such bilateral relations between our nations. Thank you for standing with us in this difficult period,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that it is extremely important to support Ukraine with long-range weapons and to give permission for their use against military targets on Russian territory. The head of state also emphasized the importance of supporting the Ukrainian defense industry, in particular for the production of long-range UAVs and drone missiles. The President thanked the United Kingdom for the recent decision to provide Ukraine with a loan of $3 billion at the expense of profits from the frozen assets of the Russian Federation. This money is part of the $50 billion that the G7 countries have pledged to transfer to Ukraine to strengthen its defense capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, Great Britain announced about the introduction of new sanctions against the Russian military-industrial complex, which further restricts the supply of vital military equipment that the Russian Federation needs for the war in Ukraine.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi: North Korean troops have already suffered losses in battles in Kurshchyna
Description: He said this at a press conference in Budapest after the European Political Community summit. The President reported that as of today, 11,000 North Korean soldiers are present on the territory of the Russian Federation, near the northern border with Ukraine. -Part of these troops have already participated in hostilities against the Ukrainian military. There are already losses, that's a fact,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi, without providing details about these losses. The President of Ukraine emphasized that Russia will resort to much greater use of the North Korean contingent if no retaliatory measures are taken, in particular, the use of appropriate weapons and political pressure on the Russian Federation. -Because Putin is always watching the world's reaction. I believe that today it is insufficient,- added Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, North Koreans will be passed off as Kalmyks, Tuvans and Buryats: it is planned to be used near Suji.

Title: Distrust and trust: what motivates Russians to surrender in Kharkiv Oblast
Description: This was told by the commander of the 13th Brigade of the operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine Colonel Ihor Obolenskyi. — During several months of defense of Kharkiv Oblast, -Charter- fighters took more than a dozen prisoners. Very often, prisoners surrender already during the wounding due to despair in their troops. They understand that there is no turning back for them, so they are doing everything to ensure that our fighters allow them to survive and provide first aid, he said. The officer told the story of one captured Russian who participated in the rebellion of Yevgeny Prigozhin and the march to Moscow. — Recently, we took one captured -Wagnerian- who took part in the campaign to Moscow. In order for him to testify about this, he was given first aid, pulled out, and now he is in places where he can be interrogated and information that will be important to us be taken from him, the military officer said. Captured Russians complain of lack of support from their own Russian people and indifference from henchmen and command. — Very often they cry, complain that no one helps them, that Ukrainians treat them much better than their own people. Unlike the Russians, our soldiers help captured enemy fighters, because we understand that each of them is a possible prisoner exchange. Each of them is a possible life of a Ukrainian soldier who will be returned to our land, Ihor Obolenskyi emphasized. The Charter commander explained how important prisoner exchanges are for every Ukrainian soldier. — When we see that such exchanges happen, when our fighters return home, we see their eyes, their happiness, then for us and for all the soldiers of our brigade, this is a sign that our political power President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi Head of Office Andriy Yermak, Parliament all in order for our fighters to return home. So we are grateful for that, said the soldier. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Kharkiv direction, Russian soldiers are more afraid of their own commanders than of Ukrainian ones of the military, but they surrender only because there is no way out.

Title: The presidents of Ukraine and Moldova discussed countering Russian disinformation
Description: This is stated in the message at website of the head of state. Volodymyr Zelenskyy congratulated Maya Sanda on her victory in the presidential elections and emphasized the importance of coordinating the efforts of Ukraine and Moldova on the way to EU membership. The key topics of discussion are joint security challenges caused by Russian aggression against Ukraine, as well as countering Russian disinformation and its impact on parliamentary elections in Moldova next year. Volodymyr Zelensky invited Maya Sanda to visit Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian propaganda telegram channels spread a video where a friend of a Ukrainian soldier, who was posthumously awarded the Order of Courage III degree, shows help from the state to the family of the deceased. In the video, the family is said to have been given toothpaste, antiseptic, seasoning and a sheet. The man in the video concludes that this is not the kind of help the family really needs.

Title: Reinforced concrete or earth holes: can the enemy gain a foothold in the north of Kharkiv region
Description: The head of the planning department of the 13th brigade of the operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev. - Enter immediately and it is possible to pour concrete if the enemy enters and we do not have a stable line of defense. Currently, there is no such situation in our direction. We see everything that happens. We hold the lines, we are entrenched and equipped, we control all approaches, approaches of armored vehicles for 5-8 kilometers, he said. The military explained that it allows to control the actions of the enemy, who has no way to build powerful fortifications or shelters. — The enemy was forced to walk small for long distances to their positions. Sometimes even the route from point A to point B can take more than 24 hours. We see them, we accompany them. Therefore, we are not talking about any kind of concrete here, - emphasized the officer. However, this does not mean that the occupiers are not trying to fortify themselves - they are constantly digging earthen shelters. - Digging - yes, they dig all the time. They dig with a tool, they dig without a tool, but there is no concrete at the moment, Anton Baev emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the military explained the importance of evacuating civilian residents from the north of Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: The number of victims in Zaporizhzhia increased to 33 people
Description: Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia Regional State Administration, announced this on the telethon Edyny Novyni. -Currently, we know about 33 wounded, of whom three are children, two of them are in serious condition,- said Ivan Fedorov. According to him, the Russians used six anti-tank missiles in the city, one of them hit the oncology dispensary, where one of the doctors was seriously injured. Currently, the evacuation of the victims from the cancer center has been completed. Ivan Fedorov noted that the rescue operation is ongoing and these are not final data yet, as there may be people under the rubble. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of dead as a result of Russian strikes on Zaporizhzhiaincreased to 4.

Title: Shelling of Mykolaivka in Donetsk region: two people died, five were injured
Description: reported this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. A residential building became a target for the enemy. As a result of the enemy attack, two local residents were killed. At least five more civilians, aged between 60 and 77, were injured of various degrees of severity. Four women and a man with mine-explosive injuries and shrapnel injuries were taken to a medical facility, where they are provided with qualified assistance. Apartment buildings and motor vehicles were damaged in the area where the weapons were hit. The type of weapon used is set. Under the procedural leadership of the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation is being conducted in criminal proceedings on the fact of a war crime (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, the number of dead as a result of Russian strikes on Zaporizhzhia increased to 4, 18 people were injured.

Title: The Zaporizhzhia region endured almost 11,000 enemy strikes in October
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. On November 5, eight people were killed, 25 more were injured, nine of them remain in the hospital during a rocket attack on an infrastructure object in Zaporizhzhia. Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, more than 1,700 residents of the Zaporizhia region have been injured, of which 570 have died, including 38 children. As a result of shelling, more than 16 thousand households were damaged and destroyed. The situation in the front-line territories, such as Komyšuvaha, Orihiv, Gulyaipole, remains extremely dangerous. Occupiers use FPV drones to target civilians going about their daily business. To ensure the defense of the Zaporizhzhia region, a record defense fund has been created and units are being actively recruited for combat missions. The region also occupies a leading position in the construction of fortifications. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of dead as a result of Russian strikes on Zaporizhzhia rf/->increased to 4, 18 people were injured.

Title: Property is not worth life: the military explained the importance of evacuation from the north of Kh...
Description: About the importance of timely evacuation on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon the representative of the communications service told Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the -Charter- Brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine. — Liptsi is a strategic settlement, because it is located on commanding heights and from there it is possible to hit Kharkiv with barrel artillery. From there, we managed to knock out the Russians back in May, and we continue to knock them out [further]. However, now it is practically a ghost village with no civilians because it is constantly hit by both FPVs and other means and artillery, he said. The military officer noted that there are no hostilities on the territory of the village itself, but it is absolutely impossible to live in it under constant fire from the Russian military. — There are no hostilities as such, but there is no life there, no population, because all civilians have been evacuated from there. And here I would like to remind you about the importance of evacuation from front-line zones because property is not worth human life - the Guardsman noted that the evacuation of civilians from the zone of active hostilities also significantly facilitates the work of the Ukrainian military and gave a specific example when the absence of civilians made it possible to neutralize a Russian manned aircraft a bomb that did not explode. — It makes it easier to get around, to locate, and basically to work. For example, recently our sappers had to neutralize an unexploded anti-aircraft gun that fell into one of the sheds right in Liptsi. There is no possibility to take out the KAB, that is, they have to be blown up. This is an explosive wave that can reach a quarter, and it is obvious that we definitely need to be sure that there are no civilians nearby, Volodymyr Degtyarev emphasized. Earlier, ArmiyaInform showed how the -Charter- fighters destroyed a 500-kilogram KAB in Liptsi.

Title: The needs of the army, training and innovation: Rustem Umyerov held a meeting with the military
Description: This is stated in a message on Facebook page of the minister. Among the main topics: Supplying the troops. We are working on the shape of a new model together with the military - we take into account their suggestions to make the equipment more comfortable and functional. In addition, at the initiative of our defenders, new standards of military cuisine, as well as modifications and repairs of equipment and weapons are being considered. Ready to test new solutions and scale them to the entire army. Education. Preparation of every soldier for modern conditions of war is a priority. Work continues to improve the effectiveness of training so that the soldiers are as ready as possible for new challenges. Allied Approaches and Innovations. There is an important resource in the form of Nettle and DELTA software that is expanding its use and implementation of modern management approaches that help the military work together and quickly. Reform and improve the Air Force and Unmanned Systems Forces. Changes must be supported by updating doctrines and updating the regulatory framework to prepare our military for modern requirements and capabilities. -Such meetings are becoming regular, and this is important. Together with the military, they agreed to work on the creation of a new coordinating body that will focus on collecting challenges, formulating proposals and monitoring their implementation. We are one team. We are working for a joint victory, step by step bringing Ukraine closer to a strong and professional army of the future,- added Rustem Umyerov.

Title: The fog hides everything: in the north of the Kharkiv region, the enemy is being watched despite the...
Description: The head of the planning department of the 13th brigade of the operational assignment -Charter- of the National Guards of Ukraine Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev. — Weather conditions are changing and are currently changing for the worse. We are seeing more phenomena such as fogs, which last longer during the day and are very disruptive. It starts to get darker earlier, the night part of the day gets longer, more cold comes. That is, the conditions of the war are changing and now everyone is adapting to them, both us and the enemy, he said. However, the activity of the enemy in view of the weather conditions has not decreased - the occupiers are intensively preparing for the onset of winter with further significant cooling. — The enemy is currently accumulating, pulling up its reserves. We see enemy soldiers approaching with heavier loads, gear and equipment. Perhaps they are bringing to their positions and preparing various insulation for winter, the military said. Instead, enemy offensive actions in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade decreased. — The enemy has not carried out offensive actions in the last 2-3 days. Armored vehicles were not recorded, but a lot of movements are recorded, the guardsman noted. The officer explained that the weather affects both sides equally, and who uses it to their advantage depends a lot on planning and preparation. — The weather affects both sides equally: both us and the enemy. How to use it depends on the task and the mind of those who use it. But the fact that it complicates the work is precisely because even the same intelligence - both winged intelligence and intelligence through drones that is taking place - its quality becomes worse, the officer explained. This forces the soldiers of the Defense Forces to look for new ways to detect the enemy, and not just rely on the usual reconnaissance with the help of UAVs. — We understand that we can no longer fly so far, we can't hang for so long, the fog hides everything, that is, thermal imaging devices on drones do not always help. This is a powerful factor that greatly affects intelligence and it is necessary to take it under close control and constantly look for some alternative sources of information and somehow solve it, because there is less information due to the fact that we do not see each other, Anton Baev emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform explained, who will take advantage of the change in weather conditions in the Kharkiv direction.

Title: President: Permission for Ukraine to launch long-range strikes against Russia will be a real defense...
Description: This announced President Volodymyr Zelensky. -Russian troops attacked the city with aerial bombs. Destroyed ordinary residential apartment building, private houses, damaged oncology hospital building. They are looking for people under the rubble. All services are in place,- the head of state wrote. He added that in Russia they get pleasure from the death of people. -And that's why air defense for Ukraine, the ability to destroy Russian military aircraft, permission for Ukraine to launch long-range strikes against the occupier — this is the real protection of life. And I am grateful to everyone in the world who helps with this,- the President emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of dead as a result of Russian strikes on Zaporizhzhia rf/->increased to 4, 18 people were injured.

Title: Baba Yaga blows up dugouts, the Ukrainian Su-25 launches missiles at Russia: a stream from a front-l...
Description: At first, the pilots of the 14th brigade of operational assignment -Chervona Kalina- tracked the enemy's infantry, waited for them to enter the dugout, and after that began to destroy their positions. After the -Baga Yaga- worked, the -dragon drones- began to destroy the Russians. In the Kharkiv region, drone operators from the -Sharp Cartouches- special unit of the NSU -Omega- tracked down three Russians who were calmly chatting near a burning house. Due to the noise from the fire, the enemy did not hear how our drone with a reset hovered above it, so the pilots had enough time to aim. The mine clearly got between the Russians, two of them managed to get away on their own, and one of them landed in the place of the drop. The Ukrainian Su-25 destroys the Russians with four unguided S-24 missiles. Usually S-24 is used to destroy fortifications and manpower in shelters. Fragmentation NARs are better for open terrain, because their warhead has more than 4,000 fragments. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andrii Makarenko and Captain Artem Golub.

Title: The troops of the DPRK and the situation in the Black Sea: Serhii Boev addressed the defense ministe...
Description: This was stated by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine during a speech at the annual meeting of the Council of Defense Ministers of Southeast European countries, reports MOU. -North Korean military personnel are already present in the territories near Ukraine. It is important to react quickly. We must do everything possible to break this dangerous cooperation between Moscow and Pyongyang. First of all, this is possible thanks to the support of Ukraine,- Serhiy Boyev said. He also reminded that Ukraine has developed a Victory Plan, which was presented by President Volodymyr Zelenskyi, for a fair end to the war started by Russia. And the second paragraph of the document contains a clear list of weapons to repel the Russian offensive. Separately, he raised the issue of increasing air defense capabilities in cooperation with neighboring countries to protect the sky over the western regions of Ukraine. -Previously, we presented the idea of ​​creating a -Humanitarian Shield- along the western border of Ukraine, and we hope that this initiative will be implemented,- the Deputy Minister of Defense emphasized. In addition, Serhii Boev drew attention to the fact that many countries in South-Eastern Europe have stockpiles of Soviet-style weapons. It is not modern, but it can be quickly integrated into Ukrainian units. -We urge you to speed up the transfer of these systems from your reserves to Ukraine. They will be able to have an immediate effect on the battlefield,- he emphasized. In addition, the Deputy Minister of Defense called on countries to intensify their participation in coalitions of capabilities to support Ukraine, in particular in the Coalition of Maritime Capabilities. -For our region, the main focus should be on the Black Sea. It is not only a geopolitical hot spot, it is a key strategic region that directly affects the security of all our countries. Ukraine's defense of its sovereignty is the defense of the entire Black Sea region. Therefore, I call on everyone to strengthen cooperation to protect this vital zone,- said Serhiy Boyev. The deputy minister concluded that Ukraine is ready to play an active role in ensuring peace and stability, particularly in South-Eastern Europe. And with the support of partners, it will be possible to create a security architecture that will be stable, adaptive and capable of resisting any threat. The meeting of the Council of Defense Ministers of Southeast European countries was held in the capital of Albania and brought together the defense ministers of Albania, Georgia, Moldova, Romania, Slovenia and other countries of the region.

Title: Drone industry: Ukraine has created more than a thousand models of drones from scratch
Description: This was spoke by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov at the Kyiv International Economic Forum. Mykhailo Fedorov noted that thanks to market opening and well-thought-out policies, Ukraine managed to create a powerful drone industry from scratch. Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, the country has developed more than 1,000 models of unmanned aerial vehicles from more than 500 domestic manufacturers. Ukraine has become not only a testing ground for new technologies, but also a place of policy formation in the field of security, where the state and business constantly cooperate, taking into account each other's needs and creating better conditions for development. According to the minister, the approach tested in the development of drones has already yielded results in other fields, such as electronic warfare (EW) and robotics, and it is planned to be used in the production of missiles next year. Mykhailo Fedorov emphasized that Ukraine's experience combined with European capabilities, technologies and financing is capable of providing Europe with a strategic advantage over world autocracies. As reported by ArmiyaInform, four more ground robotic complexes from participants of the Brave1 program kodifikacziyu/->have been codified according to NATO standards and can now be delivered to the front for combat missions.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, the number of dead and wounded increased after the attack of the Russian Federation
Description: reported this by the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs Ihor Klymenko. Rescuers pulled out two injured children and an injured woman from under the rubble. The victim lived on the third floor, after the collapse of the building she ended up on the second. There may still be people under the rubble. The police have information about persons who do not make contact. The involved services of the Ministry of Internal Affairs are working to help the victims. Thanks to everyone who is close to the victims. Investigators and criminologists are documenting yet another war crime of the occupiers. Earlier it was reported that the enemy today delivered 5 airstrikes on Zaporizhzhia, residential buildings and a hospital were hit. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, November 6, /->occupiers inflicted 299 blows on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Educational programs in Army+: 6,000 servicemen joined in two weeks
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. -Some chose two or even all three available courses. As of today, 2,000 exams have already been completed, 75% of which were successful. This is another step towards the creation of a modern, professional army that is able to quickly adapt and improve,- Rustem Umyerov stressed. The minister said that the first survey on online education showed that 16% of the military are interested in courses on unmanned systems. Therefore, already in the next release, an educational service was launched, including the -UAV Basics- course. The result is that this direction is chosen 60% more often than others. The Ministry of Defense plans to expand the list of courses, launch electronic reports and add new services that will make everyday work easier for the military. Digitization will free servicemen from paper routines so that they can focus on the main thing - the defense of Ukraine. -I am proud of our defenders who, even in difficult conditions, find time for training and self-improvement. Together we are building a professional army of the future of Ukraine,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmiyaInform, in the application -Army+- /-> online training service has been launched. The application became the first state platform where verified educational materials on military affairs are collected.

Title: The more enemies are destroyed in the rear, the fewer will come to the front line: the formula for t...
Description: Yuriy Fedorenko, battalion commander, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the chieftain of Kosh Ivan Sirk. According to Yuriy Fedorenko, the Russians' tactics are unchanged - -human waves- of attack aircraft and airstrikes. Humans are the cheapest resource the occupiers have, and they use it in any weather. You can fight them - with blows to the near and far rear. -It is very important to get permission to use high-precision weapons deep in the Russian Federation in order to be able to influence, in particular, enemy aviation. The formula works quite simply: the more the enemy is destroyed in the rear, the fewer of them will come to the front line, - noted Yuriy Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that it is hot in the Kupyan region - the situation has worsened, the number of assaults has doubled.

Title: The Ministry of Defense has announced a competitive selection for members of the Public Anti-Corrupt...
Description: This is stated in the message at sites MOU. The council will work to identify corruption risks and develop measures to increase transparency and trust in the ministry's activities. The anti-corruption council will become a key platform for combating corruption and developing anti-corruption initiatives in the department. Public associations that have been registered for more than 2 years and have experience in combating corruption can apply. Each NGO can nominate up to 3 candidates. The acceptance of documents will last from November 7 to 17, 2024, and after the verification of candidates, there will be a ranking online vote. According to its results, the Anti-Corruption Council will include 15 people who will work on the development of anti-corruption measures and ensuring the transparency of the Ministry of Defense. This is a unique opportunity for the public to influence important processes and help make the activities of the Ministry of Defense more open and efficient. You can learn more about the conditions of the competition and submit an application at this link . As reported by ArmyInform, Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov stressed on the priority of fighting corruption in all areas for which his department is responsible.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: the occupiers attack the most in the Kurakhiv dire...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 16:00 on November 7. The main efforts of the occupiers continue to be made in the Kurakhiv direction, where almost half of all attacks on the territory of Ukraine were carried out. In addition, the invaders are actively operating in the Pokrovsk and Lyman directions. On the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers twice stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk district. One battle continues, the situation is under control. Also, the enemy hit Tsapivka, Kozachia Lopan with aerial bombs and Vysokaya Yaruza with unguided aerial missiles. Three times the enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyan direction. Ukrainian defenders repulse enemy assaults near Kruglyakivka and Lozova. Battles continue in two locations. On the Lymansky direction enemy units attacked in the areas of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Makiivka, Katerynivka, Terniv, Torsky, Serebryanka, Bilogorivka, and Hryhorivka. Since the beginning of the day, Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled nine attacks, four clashes are ongoing. In the Seversky direction, the battle continues in the area of ​​Pereizny. In the Kramatorsk direction, four assault operations continue near Stupochy and Bila Hora. Two attacks by the occupiers have already been repelled. In the Toretsk direction Ukrainian defenders repelled two enemy attacks in the Toretsk area. Another battle is going on. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 15 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promeny, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar and Selidovoy. The defense forces, restraining the enemy onslaught, have repelled a total of 13 enemy attacks in the direction. Others continue. The enemy suffers significant losses in manpower. The occupiers dropped two KABs on Elizavetivka and Rivne. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders, in some cases with the support of aviation, have already attacked our units 40 times, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Kreminna Balka, Novodmytrivka, Sontsivka, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Dalnye and Katerynivka . Currently, 29 military clashes are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, Russian criminals carried out four attacks on the positions of Ukrainian troops near Trudovoy, Rozlyv, and Suhy Yaliv. Two skirmishes are ongoing. The occupiers carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Velika Novosilka and Novodarivka. In the Orikhov direction, the enemy carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles in the areas of Zaporizhzhia, Mala Tokmachka, Novopavlivka, Novoandriivka, Stepnohirsk, dropping nine air bombs. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy carried out two unsuccessful assaults on the positions of Ukrainian units.

Title: The Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Health and the Ministry of Digital will develop steps for d...
Description: This is stated in the message at sites OP. The main topic of the meeting is the draft law of the Ministry of Health on reforming the system of assigning disability status and liquidating the MSEK, which should soon be considered at a meeting of the Verkhovna Rada. Representatives of the Ministry of Health spoke about the introduction of a system for assessing a person's daily functioning for the purpose of assigning disability. In addition, a plan for digitalization of the corresponding process was proposed. It envisages three stages, the first of which should start on January 1 next year. Special attention was paid at the meeting to the reform of military medical commissions, in particular thanks to the reduction of bureaucracy and the creation of a transparent process of passing the VLK. This will make it possible to shorten queues and relieve commissions. Over the course of two weeks, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Health, and the Ministry of Digital will develop steps to digitize the VLK. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense has already > carries out thorough consultations with the Ministry of Health and the National Health Service of Ukraine in order to implement as soon as possible the functionality that will allow to receive a referral to the VLC online.

Title: Consequences of the Russian attack on Zaporozhye: one dead and 10 injured, significant destruction
Description: This was reported by the head of Zaporizhzhia Regional State Administration, Ivan Fedorov. Among the injured is a one-year-old child. Two people, including an employee of a medical facility, are in serious condition. Doctors provide the victims with all the necessary assistance. It was previously reported that the enemy today /->delivered 5 airstrikes on Zaporizhzhia, residential buildings and a hospital were hit. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, November 6, /->occupiers inflicted 299 blows on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Unchanged about 30%: irreversible losses of the enemy in the north of Kharkiv Oblast make up about a...
Description: Details about the situation in the north of the Kharkiv region and the losses of the Russian occupiers were informed at the Kharkiv OTU. Over the past 24 hours, Ukrainian soldiers repelled enemy assaults near Vovchansk and Staritsa 6 times. the Russian occupiers carried out 4 airstrikes using 10 guided air bombs and 33 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out 301 shellings of the positions of the defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. In addition to the loss of personnel, the enemy also lost destroyed and damaged 50 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 72 shelters for personnel, 2 ammunition storage sites and 1 site storage of fuel and lubricants. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that ->during the last few days, as a result of the change in weather conditions in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the number of military clashes decreased by almost a third, the enemy began to use less equipment, in particular UAVs.

Title: The battlefield in the fog of war: who will take advantage of the change in weather conditions in th...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. — The weather is getting worse, weather conditions are getting more difficult. At night, in the morning and for most of the day, there is fog, which, accordingly, limits the use of UAVs, both reconnaissance and strike, both enemy and ours, he said. The military explained that the more prepared side will be able to take better advantage of the change in weather conditions. - It is clear that this is used by someone who is prepared for it. From our side, we see that the enemy is trying to bring down separate small groups of fighters, to replenish their losses, which they have suffered in recent weeks, in particular in our sector, - said the guardsman. Currently, in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade, the occupiers have practically given up the use of equipment. - They practically do not use trucks, cars, and armored vehicles, because we have successfully burned almost everything that appears in recent weeks. Therefore, their tactic is to move in small groups that carry ammunition, food, rigging groups trying to bring in some fuel, - said Volodymyr Degtyarev. The spokesperson of -Charter- reported that currently, despite the deterioration of weather conditions, the guardsmen continue to effectively destroy the enemy with the help of heavy night drones. - We understand from the intercepts, we hear that they are restless, because, despite the weather, our night drones continue to disturb them, bomb their fortifications every night. They have difficulties with evacuation, because it is practically non-existent, because the equipment does not come, so most of their wounded remain there and sooner or later turn into two hundred, - said the representative of the public relations service. He also spoke about the enemy's losses during October. — If we look at the results of enemy losses for the past month, we can see that we hit a hundred and they will never see this world again, and more than a hundred are wounded. However, it is possible to assume with great probability that these losses are also irreversible, - noted Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Russians are gradually being -pushed out- - from the north of the Kharkiv region - in October, they completed the de-occupation of 400 hectares of forest massif within the boundaries of the Lipetsk community of the Kharkiv region.

Title: -They can sit for weeks without food and water-: the occupiers in Donetsk region have problems with ...
Description: The spokeswoman of the OTU -Luhansk- told about this on the -Suspilne Novyny- broadcast. Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, the occupiers use UAVs to deliver food and water to forward positions. However, it is not always possible to deliver products to the address. -According to the reports of the prisoners and according to intelligence data, the supply of water and food to the advanced positions of the Russians is very difficult and completely irregular. That is, they can sit for weeks without food and water,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. Previously ArmyInform reported that the enemy is accumulating resources in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar, the number of assaults there has decreased. On the other hand, in Toretsk, the intensity of the offensive actions of the occupiers increased.

Title: The Kharkiv paliya of cars of Ukrainian defenders was detained
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. According to the investigation, a resident of Kharkiv, who had previously had problems with the law several times, in August of this year, in search of earnings, went to the -employer- through the Telegram messenger. The curator offered the accused to set fire to cars belonging to Ukrainian defenders, promised 1,500 US dollars for this and provided detailed instructions on how to act. Photo or video recording of the -result- of the completed task was a mandatory condition of cooperation. On August 16, 2024, around 9:00 p.m., a man, while on Traktorobudivniki Avenue, saw a -Mitsubishi Carisma- car, which had visual signs of a military vehicle. After receiving an instruction from the curator to act according to the defined plan, with the help of a pre-prepared incendiary mixture, the accused set the car on fire, which caused it to catch fire. The man filmed his actions on a mobile phone. As a result of Palia's actions, the owner of the car, a former military serviceman, suffered material damage. A few days later, the accused, while on Valentinivska Street, saw a green Volkswagen Transporter T4. After identifying the car as military, the attacker took a picture of it and sent the image to the -employer-, awaiting further instructions from the curator. At that time, the man was noticed by law enforcement officers, who stopped his criminal activities, so he never received money from the -employer-. At the request of the prosecution, the man was remanded in custody. The man will be tried in the Moscow District Court of Kharkiv. The man from Kharkiv faces up to eight years in prison. Earlier ArmyInform reported that an FSB agent on duty was detained for attempting to set fire to the railway.

Title: The enemy carried out 5 airstrikes on Zaporozhye, there are hits on houses and a hospital
Description: This was reported by the head of the Zaporizhzhia Regional State Administration, Ivan Fedorov. -Mass attack on Zaporozhye. The enemy dealt 5 hits. Unfortunately, residential buildings and hospitals were hit,- – the message says. He also added that as a result of the airstrikes there are injured people, the extent of the destruction is being established. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, November 6, occupiers struck 299 blows on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: The President at the summit in Budapest: Russian concessions are a dangerous path for Europe
Description: He announced this during his address to the summit of the European Political Community in Budapest. Volodymyr Zelenskyy reported that he discussed the situation with US President Donald Trump, noting the importance of a strong America for the stability of Europe. In his opinion, only a joint and powerful position will be able to ensure peace and security for EU countries. The President emphasized that since the last summit of the European Political Community, aggression on the part of Russia has significantly increased. He also noted that the military from North Korea is now joining Russia's war against Ukraine, and this is creating new threats to European security. Volodymyr Zelensky condemned any calls for -concessions- to Putin, calling them unacceptable and dangerous. He also emphasized that maintaining peace in Europe is possible only under the conditions of maintaining strength and unity. Russia, in his opinion, seeks not just territory, but the restoration of control over neighboring countries, which is a threat to the entire continent. The head of state called for the strengthening of military support for Ukraine, and also expressed gratitude for the diplomatic efforts that help create the -Peace Formula- with points to achieve a just peace, such as nuclear and food security, the return of deported Ukrainians and compliance with international law. The president also called on European leaders to find a mechanism to use frozen Russian assets to rebuild Ukraine, as Russia has destroyed hundreds of Ukrainian cities and villages, and this requires significant resources. He also emphasized the need for effective sanctions to deprive Russia of resources to continue the war. Volodymyr Zelenskyy ended his speech with a call to unite to protect common interests, which, in his opinion, will be the path to long-term peace and stability in the world. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky congratulated Donald Trump on his victory in the US presidential election, emphasizing the importance of bipartisan support for Ukraine in the United States and expressing hope for continued close cooperation.

Title: The enemy plans to integrate -Cossacks- into fake volunteer battalions on the TOT
Description: About this informs Center of National Resistance. The battalions perform a propaganda function and are designed to create the impression that the local population is voluntarily fighting for the occupiers. A similar function in the Russian Federation is performed by -Cossack communities-, which the Russians set up on the TOT with the same goal. Now the Kremlin has decided to merge these two fake structures. Hoping in this way to at least slightly increase the number of fighters in the -battalions-, as well as to emphasize the narrative that, they say, -Cossacks- support the aggressor. However, all these reorganizations are not successful, because, as mentioned above, these structures are not capable of carrying out combat tasks and are just a mass that lives on grant funds from Moscow. We would like to remind you that in the Russian Federation oil refining is being stopped.

Title: Tiktokertsi, who justified enemy shelling at the Kyiv railway station, was informed of suspicion
Description: This is stated in the message of the SBU. Tiktokerka filmed a provocative stream on the territory of the railway station in Kyiv on October 7 this year. In her video, shot during an air raid, the person involved said that by shelling peaceful cities of Ukraine, -the Russians are giving Ukrainians a rebuff.- In addition, she mocked the citizens of our country who go down to the shelter. Employees of the SBU and the National Police exposed her in hot pursuit immediately after the publication of the video. Now, after conducting independent examinations, which confirmed the composition of the crime in the statements of the accused, the SBU investigators informed her of the suspicion under Art. 2, 3 Art. 436-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (justification, recognition as legitimate, denial of armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, glorification of its participants, committed repeatedly). According to the case file, this provocative video was published by a 23-year-old resident of Makiivka, Donetsk region, who moved to Kyiv a few months ago. She used her Tiktok account to glorify the occupiers, in particular the militants of the Russian private military company Wagner. Also, the perpetrator publicly denied the war crimes committed by the Rashists during the temporary occupation of the Kyiv region. The video of the figure was immediately picked up by Russian propagandists for further -dispersal- through the Kremlin media. During the searches, a mobile phone with evidence of her subversive activities in favor of the Russian Federation was seized from the detainee. The perpetrator faces up to 8 years in prison with confiscation of property.

Title: Veterans are invited to join the changes in the support system of the Armed Forces
Description: About this told on the air -Social News- General Director of DOT Arsen Zhumadilov . According to Zhumadilov, veterans will be useful to the DOT, because, as a rule, they know very well how the defense forces work. They know how logistics and provisioning processes are built. -What are the real problems at ground level, at other locations and facilities, when it comes to provisioning. Accordingly, they can highlight these problems and can better find solutions to such problems,- noted the general director of the State Rear Operator. As reported by ArmyInform, the State Rear Operator (DOT) opens doors for veterans of the Russian-Ukrainian war who are ready to direct their experience to changes in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Minister noted that almost 1 million veterans who return to civilian life after defending our country live in Ukraine today. If you are a veteran ready for new challenges, fill out the form on the official website DOT until December 15, 2024.

Title: Almost 15 occupiers were eliminated: Luhansk border guards are working
Description: The relevant video was published by the Luhansk border detachment. The border guards of the -Phoenix- unit of the RUBpAK eliminated 15 occupiers and wounded another 13 during a few days of work in the Kreminnaya area. Destroyed and damaged: a tank, 2 howitzers, 5 military trucks, 8 cars of the occupiers, a gasoline truck and a warehouse of fuel and lubricants, several ammunition warehouses and a mortar position. Previously ArmyInform notified that Great Britain introduced new sanctions against of the Russian defense industry.

Title: Sanctions work: oil refining stops in the Russian Federation
Description: This is reported by Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The shutdown of the refinery is predicted to have a negative impact on the domestic volumes of oil refining, the fulfillment of export obligations, worsen the situation with the supply of fuel to the domestic market, and increase the costs of maintenance and modernization of enterprises. It is expected that the volume of oil refining capacities during downtime will be 1.8–2 million tons per month. The real reasons for the downtime of the refinery in the Russian Federation are limited access to Western equipment and components due to international sanctions and the impossibility of replacing foreign spare parts necessary for the maintenance and modernization of the refinery. In fact, the Russian import substitution program did not produce significant results. Actually, Russian equipment manufacturers provide only about 30-45% of market needs, and only in some components (pumps, compressors, reactors, etc.). Also, the Russian Federation failed to use China as an alternative supplier of equipment, since Chinese technologies are not always compatible with Russian equipment, which sometimes requires a complete replacement of equipment and significantly increases repair and maintenance costs. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the Russians forcibly throw men from TOT into the infantry in Kurshchyna.

Title: -Oto nakhimichiv-: an FSB agent on duty was detained for attempting to set fire to the railway
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. The attacker, a 48-year-old locksmith of a local enterprise, was initially recorded by the FSB on the location of Ukrainian military units and the consequences of Russian shelling. Later, he received instructions from his supervisor to make and use an ignition device to set fire to military vehicles and Ukrzaliznytsia facilities. The agent independently made a device from flammable mixtures and a detonator with remote control. Before carrying out the terrorist attack, he tested the device near a railway track and informed his supervisor about it. Cyber ​​specialists of the Security Service of Ukraine exposed the agent's activities in advance and arrested him. During the searches, they found a mobile phone with evidence of cooperation with the Russian special services. The detainee was informed of suspicion under the article -Treason under martial law- (Part 2, Article 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). He faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. The special operation took place under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office.

Title: Great Britain introduced new sanctions against the Russian defense industry
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the British government. Sanctions are aimed at key companies that supply weapons, materials and technologies for the military industry of the Russian Federation. In total, the list includes 28 suppliers of machine tools, microelectronics, components for drones and goods for the Russian military-industrial complex. In particular, the list includes Ak Bars, which manufactures ships for the Russian fleet, Radioavtomatika, which produces electronics for military systems, and Almaz-Antey Corporation, which supplies air defense systems. Sanctions also apply to individuals who hold leadership positions in these companies, as well as high-ranking officials involved in military contracts. Sanctions also affect organizations from China, Turkey and Central Asia that help the Russian Federation in the production of weapons.

Title: The occupiers shelled Donetsk region 9 times: one person was wounded
Description: notifies the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin about this. Numerous private houses were damaged in Kurakhovo, a person was injured in Suhy Yaly, and an administrative building was damaged in Dachnoi. Two houses were damaged in the Pokrovsk community: in Shevchenko and Leontovychy. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Liman. An agricultural enterprise and equipment, a warehouse, a cultural institution and a power line were damaged in Nikonorivka of the Mykolaiv community. 8 objects were damaged in Stara Mykolaivka of the Illiniv community. The outskirts of the Kostyantynivska community were shelled. 3 houses were damaged in Siversk. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 5 private houses, a multi-storey building and an industrial building were damaged. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy tried to storm Bilogorivka : The Armed Forces repulsed the attacks.

Title: The Ministry of Defense has purchased more than 11,000 EW devices for the Armed Forces since the beg...
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In particular, only in September-October, several thousand EW facilities were contracted for the amount of more than 1 billion hryvnias. These are mostly portable short-range systems. They can be fitted to vehicles and equipment to protect crews from enemy FPV drones. Or use in positions to detect and suppress drone control channels. In addition, separate means of EW for tactical use were purchased. -The purchase by the state of more than 11,000 EW devices since the beginning of the year allows the Armed Forces of Ukraine to counter enemy drones much more effectively and to protect the lives of our soldiers. Most of the purchased electronic warfare equipment is produced in Ukraine, which contributes to the development of national production and strengthens the military-technical independence of Ukraine in the long term,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. In the case of procurement of EW equipment abroad, contracts are concluded directly with foreign manufacturers, which allows for cost savings and is in line with the policy of the Defense Procurement Agency of the Ministry of Defense to reduce the number of intermediaries. The Director of the Agency, Maryna Bezrukov, emphasized that the priority remains closing the urgent needs of the Armed Forces as soon as possible. -Recent contracts concluded in September and October for 1 billion hryvnias provide for prompt deliveries, some of which have already been completed,- Marina Bezrukova noted. As reported by ArmyInform, the domestic armored car UAT-TISA received the green light for use in the army.

Title: Large-scale drone attack: Air defense forces shot down 74 martyrs
