As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces -vijny/->over 3 thousand -martyrs- were shot down in 3 months.

Title: A man from Kharkiv was detained in Lviv, who made evasioners -volunteers-
Description: This was reported by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region on November 5. The detainee entered data on -clients- into the -Shlyah- system, with the help of which they could enter the European Union countries without hindrance and not return back. It was established that he advised -clients, and sometimes helped to directly transport them through checkpoints in Lviv Oblast and Transcarpathia. The price of -services- ranged from 1 to 7 thousand US dollars. Several episodes of such criminal activity have been documented. The suspect was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine and a preventive measure was chosen. The involvement of other persons in the scheme is currently being investigated. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The number of training flights of cadet pilots will increase, the geography of flights will expand
Description: About the meeting reported on November 5 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As Serhii Melnyk noted, a decision has been made to strengthen the training of Ukrainian cadet pilots. As part of the new program, the number of training flights will increase and the geography of training will expand, which will allow training more highly qualified pilots. In particular, basic flight training for cadets of the Kharkiv National Air Force University will take place at an intensive pace. This is aimed at allowing graduates to move more quickly to training on modern military aircraft, including Western models. -The basic training program should be optimized. This will give us the opportunity to train more pilots to protect our country. Ukrainian combat aircraft should eventually gain air superiority. After all, this is precisely what opens the way to the success of our actions at the front in general,- Serhii Melnyk said. As reported by ArmyInform, during the meeting Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Brigadier General of Justice Serhii Melnyk and representatives of the public discussed, in particular, the procedure for accounting and completing individual first-aid kits and medical backpacks, as well as certification of Ukrainian turnstiles taking into account actual combat experience.

Title: Rustem Umerov discussed the supply of air defense systems with the new NATO special representative i...
Description: About this Minister reported on November 5. -On our way to the Alliance, it is important to interact closely with its representatives to be able to receive advice and adjust our steps. Once again, I congratulated Patrick on his appointment and emphasized our openness to cooperation,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the parties discussed the state of implementation of the agreements reached as a result of the NATO summit in Washington, in particular the issue of the supply of air defense equipment, as well as the implementation of the JATEC and NSATU projects. -I also familiarized the Senior NATO representative with the key priorities of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He emphasized that we work in cooperation with other ministries as a single team, bringing our country closer to joining NATO. Patrick Turner noted significant progress in reforming the Armed Forces of Ukraine, noting that the Ukrainian army has undergone major changes that are obvious,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. The minister additionally informed his colleague about the participation of the North Korean military in the current escalation of aggression against Ukraine and proposed to hold the next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council at the level of defense ministers in Kyiv. -We continue the dialogue with NATO, synchronize joint plans for the end of this year and for 2025. Thank you Mr. Patrick for the important meeting. We will strengthen our cooperation in order to achieve the important goal of Ukraine's membership in NATO,- said Rustem Umyerov. Senior NATO representative in Ukraine at the NATO Representation in Ukraine Patrick Turner /->started his work in September. He headed the PNU and assumed the focus of NATO's interaction with the Ukrainian authorities in Kyiv. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine met in Kyiv with a Lithuanian colleague.

Title: The occupiers shot 6 of our prisoners in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: reported this on November 5 Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office According to operational data, October 23 at 5:17 p.m. , representatives of the Soviet Union of the Russian Federation during the attack on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the area of ​​the city of Selidove captured three Ukrainian servicemen. After some time, the occupiers shot unarmed prisoners of war. In addition, on November 1 at 2:00 p.m., Russian troops committed another crime in the same Pokrovsky direction. During the assault on the fortifications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, three of our soldiers were captured by them, after which they were killed with automatic weapons. -Killing prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and qualifies as a grave international crime,- reminds the prosecutor's office of the Donetsk region. As reported by ArmyInform, the ombudsman reacted to the alleged shooting two women as occupiers.

Title: - Russians are not thrown, but thrown out - the occupiers sacrificed the wounded in order to escape ...
Description: A video with another evidence of the developed empathy of the invaders was released on November 5. On it, the Russian -loaf- was running away from the Ukrainian drone at maximum speed. Imagine the surprise of our pilots when the Russians threw a wounded comrade out of their car at speed. This caused our drone to hesitate a little, but then it caught up and hit the Russians. The fate of the discarded one is unknown, but it is unlikely that anything good happened to him. ArmyInform told how the occupier in the intense struggle took a motorcycle from a wounded comrade.

Title: The head of the NATO Representation in Ukraine arrived in Kyiv
Description: About this Minister reported on November 5. -On our way to the Alliance, it is important to interact closely with its representatives to be able to receive advice and adjust our steps. Once again, I congratulated Patrick on his appointment and emphasized our openness to cooperation,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the parties discussed the state of implementation of the agreements reached as a result of the NATO summit in Washington, in particular the issue of the supply of air defense equipment, as well as the implementation of the JATEC and NSATU projects. -I also familiarized the Senior NATO representative with the key priorities of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He emphasized that we work in cooperation with other ministries as a single team, bringing our country closer to joining NATO. Patrick Turner noted significant progress in reforming the Armed Forces of Ukraine, noting that the Ukrainian army has undergone major changes that are obvious,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. The minister additionally informed his colleague about the participation of the North Korean military in the current escalation of aggression against Ukraine and proposed to hold the next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council at the level of defense ministers in Kyiv. -We continue the dialogue with NATO, synchronize joint plans for the end of this year and for 2025. Thank you Mr. Patrick for the important meeting. We will strengthen our cooperation in order to achieve the important goal of Ukraine's membership in NATO,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine met in Kyiv with a Lithuanian colleague.

Title: One MiG and 8 bombs — in the South, Russians turned out en masse for the Kobzon concert
Description: The video of the strike was released on the Internet. It clearly shows how our plane releases American light high-precision cruise bombs, each of which can strike a separate target. From open sources, the maximum flight range of the GBU-39/B Small Diameter Bomb is 110 km. As reported by ArmyInform, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine carried out an airstrike with high-precision American GBU-39 bombs on a platoon base in the Kursk region.

Title: A group of Ukrainian military personnel completed training in Germany on the Patriot air defense sys...
Description: This is stated in the message of the German Air Force in the social network Kh. -After the successful completion of the training, the air defense of Ukraine will be strengthened, as well as the protection against attacks from aircraft, missiles and cruise missiles,- the message says. The training of Ukrainian servicemen takes place within the framework of the EU mission, the purpose of which is to strengthen the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The EUMAM Ukraine mission successfully trained servicemen to work with the Patriot air defense system, providing them with important skills for protecting the skies and infrastructure. This exercise from the German Air Force strengthens the ability to counter air threats,- the message reads. > missions in the social network X. As reported by ArmyInform, in August, September and October 2024, Russia used in Ukraine 4300 attack UAVs of the shahed type and other types of drones imitating real -shaheds-. Thanks to the coordinated combat work of the Air Defense Forces of Ukraine, it was possible to shoot down 3,063 enemy UAVs, which is 71%.

Title: -They burned riders on motorcycles-: near Kurakhovo, mechanized -rolling- the enemy is repulsed
Description: Press officer of the 79th Airborne Forces told Orest Drymalovskyi of the Taurian Assault Brigade. If the enemy suffers significant losses in armored vehicles during the assaults, Orest Drymalovskyi said, he can pause for a day or two, but continue to attack already with infantry forces. That is, on foot or on motorcycles and ATVs. -And just the day before, our paratroopers repelled one of these motorized attacks, destroyed several stormtroopers - these riders on motorcycles. Their vehicles were burned,- said the press officer of the 79th Tavriy Assault Brigade. Earlier ArmyInform reported that during the last days, the enemy has been actively resorting to mechanized assaults on the positions of the 79th separate amphibious assault brigade of the Taurian Brigade.

Title: The Cabinet of Ministers dismissed Yuriy Dzhigyr from the position of Deputy Minister of Defense
Description: This was informed the government representative in the Verkhovna Rada Taras Melnychuk. Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov signed On October 1, a submission to the Cabinet of Ministers for the dismissal of three of his deputies, in particular Yuriy Dzhigir, who had been in office since September 2023. On the same day, the government made a decision to release Stanislav Heyder from the post of Deputy Minister of Defense. He moved to the head of the Minister's Office. In addition, the government dismissed Lyudmila Daragan from the post of State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Nikita Nikitenko has been temporarily entrusted with the duties of state secretary. As reported by ArmyInform, on October 11, the government appointed two deputies of the Minister of Defense - Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk and Serhiy Boyev, who previously worked as the Deputy Minister of Strategic Industries of Ukraine.

Title: The retired FSB agent dreamed of -evacuation- to Russia and solving material issues
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, the defendant was a military pensioner from the Mykolaiv Oblast, who came into the view of the occupiers during his trips to the Russian Federation even before the large-scale war. After the start of a large-scale invasion, an FSB employee remotely approached the man and offered him cooperation. In exchange for helping the Russians, the man was promised -evacuation- to Russia with further resolution of his material issues. On the instructions of a Russian special service agent, the agent scouted the locations of the Defense Forces, on which the Rashists planned to carry out airstrikes using Shahed-type kamikaze drones and missile weapons. Also, the traitor conducted preliminary reconnaissance at the places of -arrivals- in order to inform the FSB about the consequences of enemy attacks. In order to expand the intelligence capabilities of the FSB and to receive additional intelligence, the person involved was looking for -candidates for new agents of the Russian Federation.- To do this, he tried to -darkly- use his acquaintances - former law enforcement officers, from whom, during everyday conversations, he asked about the mood of current employees. SBU counterintelligence officers documented the agent's crimes and arrested him at his place of residence. During the searches, SIM cards and two mobile phones were seized from him, one of which he used for conspiratorial communication with the occupiers. Investigators of the Security Service informed the suspect of suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in the Mykolaiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, thanks to the evidence base of the Security Service 15 years of imprisonment with confiscation of property was received by an agent of the military intelligence of the Russian Federation (better known as Gru), who operated in Donetsk region.

Title: Waste feed! — in Feodosia, the stern of a large landing ship - Novocherkassk - was raised from the b...
Description: Photos of the remnants of the colors of the Russian Black Sea Fleet were published on the Internet. It is interesting that Russian official channels claimed that -Novocherkassk- only -received damage- in the course of repelling a missile attack. It turns out that breaking a ship into pieces in Russia is called -getting damaged-. With the rise of the remnants of -Novocherkassk-, the powerful underwater grouping of the Russian Federation decreased slightly. As ArmyInform reported, the Black Sea Fleet continues to stay away from the Sea of ​​Azov, in fact, all the time, the fleet, which can be called combat-ready, is in Novorossiysk.

Title: American bombs fly across Russia, the BMP burns out, the enemy dies: a stream from a front-line city
Description: The fighter launched eight high-precision winged bombs at the place where the assault groups were concentrated in the Orihiv direction. In general, this bomb can hit targets at a distance of 110 km. Constant assaults by the Russians in the Kurakhiv direction continue. This time, the 46th separate airmobile brigade repelled two assault attempts at once. The enemy threw into battle two tanks, 11 BMP, one -Shilka-, a total of 14 units. Fighters destroyed one tank and seven -boxes- with artillery and drones. Unfortunately, after damaging part of the Russian equipment, they managed to escape. The GUR drove the Russians into a barn, where they died. Fighters of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine discovered a group of Russian attack aircraft hiding in a house on one of the areas of the front. When it flew over the building, the Russians tried to run into the barn and hide there, however, both the barn itself and the Russians inside were eliminated. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: Over 3,000 shot down -shaheeds- in 3 months — the General Staff published the results of the air war
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this on November 5. Thanks to the coordinated combat work of the Air Defense Forces of Ukraine, it was possible to shoot down 3,063 enemy UAVs, which is 71%. In addition, the Air Force's daily reports were marked as -locationally lost- — that is, disappeared from radar, presumably due to active countermeasures by EW or for other reasons. For the specified period — from August to October 2024 — 1,052 such drones, which is 24%. Therefore, direct hits by enemy UAVs amount to 5%. Also, destruction or damage can be caused due to the fall of UAVs shot down by anti-aircraft defense. It is worth noting that October became a record for the launch of attack enemy drones: – August: 818 – launched, 701 – shot down, 91 – lost in location; – September: 1410 – launched, 1156 – shot down, 201 – lost in location; – October: 2,072 – launched, 1,206 – shot down, 766 – lost to location. During the same period: May, June, and July 2024, 1,133 attack UAVs were launched on the territory of Ukraine. 1055 were shot down by anti-aircraft defense, 10 were lost in location. The percentage of shooting down for the period May–July 2024 is about 94%. Thus, the percentage of direct hits by enemy attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type and drones of other types imitating real -Shaheds- in May-July and August-October 2024 is 6 and 5 percent, respectively. As reported by ArmyInform, the President thanked the defenders of the Ukrainian sky.

Title: More than a hundred soldiers, 10 tanks and 12 BMPs defeated the enemy in the Siversk direction
Description: This was reported to ArmyInform by the operational-tactical group -Luhansk-. The Russian command, hoping for quick success, involved 10 tanks in the battle, including one modern T-90. The occupiers tried to attack in the gap between two Ukrainian armed forces brigades: the 10th mountain assault brigade and the 54th mechanized brigade. But this tactic turned out to be a disaster for them. The Ukrainian military responded promptly to the enemy's maneuvers. Fighters of OTU -Luhansk- delivered a powerful blow to the enemy, destroying 24 units of armored vehicles, of which ten tanks (T-62, T-72, T-90), twelve BMP (infantry fighting vehicles), two MTLB (multi-purpose light armored tractor) and one ZU-23-2 (23-mm paired anti-aircraft gun). The casualties of the occupying personnel are also impressive: more than a hundred Russian soldiers were disabled, more than sixty of them were killed, more than thirty were seriously wounded, and the rest quietly disappeared into the nearest forest or got lost. The decisive role was played by the professional work of Ukrainian artillerymen, who destroyed most of the enemy's armored vehicles with targeted strikes. Operators of anti-tank guided missiles were also distinguished, who eliminated several tanks with accurate shots. -Our fighters showed the enemy that his tactics of numerical superiority do not always work. Each of our soldiers knows what he is fighting for his people and has a clear goal. They once again proved to the Russians that Ukrainian land cannot be broken,- one of the officers of the 10th Mountain Assault Brigade emphasized. -This failure once again demonstrated the weakness of Russian tactics, which are based on numerical superiority and -massive attacks- that disregard the lives of soldiers. The Ukrainian defenders did not just repulse the attack — they once again proved the high level of combat skill and determination of our soldiers, who fearlessly defend every centimeter of Ukrainian land,- reported the Luhansk Technical University. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 10th motorized infantry battalion of the -Edelvejsy- mountain assault brigade made a selection of Russian -armor- burning in front of our positions.

Title: Two-thirds of the enemy's attacks fell on the Kurakhiv direction — the General Staff of the Armed Fo...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on November 5 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Border settlements continue to suffer from cynical shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Starykov, Obody, Pavlivka, Seredyna Buda, Slavhorod, Zarichne, Popivka, Iskryskivshchyna, Myropilske, Oleksandrivka, Novenke, Bachivsk, Bobylivka, Boyaro-Lezhachi of the Sumy region were hit by enemy artillery; Leonivka, Chernihiv region. The invaders carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Velika Pisarivka, Bilovody, Popivka of the Sumy region, dropping 5 KAB and 10 NAR. Also, the Russians have already dropped 21 guided aerial bombs on the Kursk region of the Russian Federation today. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out five assaults near Novoosynovo and Lozova. Three clashes have ended, two more are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked twice near Zagryzovy. Ukrainian defenders repelled one attack, another one continues. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Siversk direction. Two assaults on the positions of our defenders in the Kramatorsk direction near Orihovo-Vasylivka are still ongoing, in addition, the enemy launched airstrikes on Chasovoy Yar and Stupochki. The areas of Toretsk, Kostyantynivka, Druzhba, Petrivka and Sukha Balka settlements in the Toretsk direction suffered from enemy airstrikes, in total the enemy dropped 12 guided air bombs. Since the beginning of the day, with the support of aviation, the occupiers have made 13 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Novogrodivka, Krutiy Yar, Selidove, and Grodivka in the Pokrovsky direction. The defense forces restrained the onslaught of the enemy and repelled seven attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked 53 times near Vovchenko, Stepanivka, Illinka, Berezka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostroy, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Elizavetivka, and Katerynivka. There are currently 26 armed clashes. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers attacked the positions of our troops near Konstantinopolsky and Trudovoy five times. Three clashes are still ongoing. At the same time, the enemy, supporting offensive actions, actively used aviation, engaged 49 unguided missiles. In the direction of Gulyaipil, the settlement of Biloghir was hit by unguided missiles. In the Orichov direction, the invaders made one futile attempt to attack the positions of our defenders near Orichov. In addition, the enemy dropped 14 guided aerial bombs in the areas of the settlements of Mala Tokmachka, Orihiv and Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction, Russian units launched two assaults, which our defenders successfully repulsed. The situation is under control. In other areas of the front, the situation has not undergone significant changes. As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 230 assaults of Russians. The situation at the front remains tense.

Title: Revenge from the sky - our Nemesis drone pilots bombed an enemy tank and trucks
Description: The video of combat work was released on October 5 on the brigade's channel. Our pilots took a responsible approach to the task, then bombed the targets until their guaranteed destruction. For example, as many as 6 ammunition were used on a tank, but it was still turned into scrap. A truck and a car with ammunition were also destroyed. -A beautiful night badaboom to upbeat music,- the team commented on the video. The name of the Nemesis drone comes from the ancient Greek goddess of revenge, Nemesis. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 51st battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade were able to stop the enemy tank attack with prayer and a machine gun.

Title: The vagabond fleet lives in hope: the Russians really want to return to Crimea, but they are afraid
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- spoke the spokesman of the Naval Ukrainian Armed Forces captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. Commenting on the information that the occupiers are restoring the command post of the Russian fleet in Crimea, Dmytro Pletenchuk noted that currently nothing indicates that the Russians have any hope of returning. Although in any case, he reminded, it is customary for Ukrainian intelligence to organize the defeat of the headquarters of the occupiers on the peninsula. -Such cases have already taken place. Let's remember the attack on the command post and headquarters of the Black Sea Fleet. Therefore, in fact, if this information is confirmed officially, it will look a little strange,- Dmytro Pletenchuk noted. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that naval drones are the main factor that forces the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation to still hide at its base.

Title: The occupier dies, the equipment burns - our stormtroopers made a video for meditation
Description: The video of the results of combat work was released on November 5 on the brigade's channel. The enemy armored vehicle was hit and caught fire. Only one occupant was able to get out of it, who tried to crawl away from the equipment that was already preparing to detonate. He was able to crawl away, but not far. In addition, it was controlled by a reset. -Three things to look at forever: Happy watching,- the video captioned the unit. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Black Swan strike group of the 225th assault battalion -poranenyh-vid-odnogo-skydu/->hit Russian soldiers in Kurshchyna.

Title: October results: nearly 20,000 hectares of fields and more than 90 km of roads were demined
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that the results of the work include: During the specified period, sappers discovered and destroyed 8,206 explosive objects. The total number of items neutralized since the beginning of the large-scale invasion has reached 411,225. As of the end of October, the number of certified mine action operators was 64. In a month, their number increased by 8 operators. According to the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, the authorized units of the central executive authorities for the implementation of measures to clear territories from explosive remnants of war include demining groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the State Special Transport Service, explosive units of the National Police and pyrotechnic units State Service of Ukraine for Emergency Situations. In accordance with the Law of Ukraine -On Mine Action in Ukraine-, only mine action operators are involved in humanitarian demining. As reported by ArmyInform, from Since the beginning of the war, 100 children have been injured by mines and explosive objects.

Title: Ukraine and the Czech Republic discussed speeding up the supply of ammunition to the Armed Forces
Description: About this declared the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration issues Serhiy Boyev during a meeting with the Czech delegation headed by the National Security Advisor of the Czech Republic Tomas Poyar. It was also attended by Government Commissioner for Reconstruction of Ukraine Tomas Kopechny and Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Czech Republic to Ukraine Radek Peh. -I thank the -Czech initiative- for the ability to organize partners around me in a difficult time. However, the speed of ammunition deliveries and logistics remain an urgent issue - it is worth finding the most effective ways,- emphasized Serhii Boev. The Deputy Minister also thanked the Czech Republic for its active participation in coalitions of capabilities, including coalitions of aviation capabilities, integrated air defense and anti-missile defense, drones, artillery, armored vehicles and maneuverability, as well as demining. The parties discussed a number of issues that require synchronization. Among them are the training of the Ukrainian military within the framework of the EU EUMAM mission, the provision of material and technical assistance and the prospect of supporting projects in the defense and industrial sphere. As reported by ArmyInform, Australia provides Ukraine 14 boats worth $1 million each.

Title: Australia provides Ukraine with 14 boats worth $1 million each
Description: The message of the embassy appeared on November 5 on the X network. We are very grateful to Australia for providing 14 hard-hull boats worth $14 million, which will strengthen the maritime and coastal defense of Ukraine, an important operational area of ​​the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- our diplomats said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, high-speed armored amphibious assault ships Combat Boat-90 (Stridsbåt 90) provide reinforcement of the operational capabilities of special forces of the Military Intelligence of Ukraine at sea.

Title: One soldier in the trench - our fighter single-handedly stopped the enemy assault. The drones were a...
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 5 on the battalion channel. When the occupiers encountered resistance, they began to retreat. Then the drones of the battalion got involved, who first drove the Russians into the dugout, and then started to finish them off there. But it all started with the courage of our infantryman. -FPV drones are not a panacea! You cannot rely on the birds from the sky to always be able to cover you. It happens in different ways, and this video is a confirmation of that,- commented the cadres at -Force of Freedom-. As reported by ArmyInform, defenders from the -Rubizh- brigade liquidated a group of occupiers in the Lymano-Kupyansk direction.

Title: From Sharm el-Sheikh to -meat assault-: an Egyptian student received Russian citizenship and a summo...
Description: The press officer of the 79th Airborne Division told about this on the -Social News- broadcast. - Orest Drymalovskyi of the Taurian assault brigade. According to Orest Drymalovskyi, paratroopers recently captured an Egyptian who came to Russia to get a higher education in the field of IT technologies. He received Russian citizenship, and with it a summons to the ranks of the Russian army. Already in a month, the student stormed positions in the Kurakhiv direction. -He was lucky, he is, in fact, the only one from the assault group who managed to survive. He was taken prisoner. He is an interesting character - he knows 4 languages, a polyglot. Perhaps it will be possible to exchange him for those Ukrainian boys and girls who are in Russian captivity,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the enemy practices daily mechanized assaults in the Kurakhiv direction.

Title: There are two columns, and the result is one - the paratroopers repelled a powerful armored assault ...
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 5 on the brigade's channel. Two columns went on the assault. In one there was a tank, 5 BMP, 1 ZSU 23-4 -Shilka-, in the second - a tank and 6 BMP. A total of 14 units. -8 units were destroyed by artillery fire and FPV drones: 1 tank and 7 BMPs. Unfortunately, after receiving damage, 4 -bekhs-, a tank and -Shilka- were still able to roll back to the starting positions to lick their wounds. And the operators of drones with resets had only to finish off the infantry, which ran around and lurked, waiting in the forest strips and folds of the terrain for their disastrous and inevitable fate,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, modified FPV drones of 46 separate aeromobile brigades of the Russian Armed Forces -polyuyut-na-rozviduvalni-bpla-rf/->intercept Russian reconnaissance drones such as Zala, Supercam, etc.

Title: The President thanked the defenders of the Ukrainian sky
Description: His acknowledgment was published on November 5. The President reminded that only during the past evening and night our defenders destroyed almost half a hundred enemy UAVs. -And such attacks - relatively. It is important that our soldiers feel the support of their partners in this constant fight against Russian terror. Determination, air defense systems, defense packages, constant pressure on the aggressor. We do everything for this. Thank you to everyone who understands this and helps us defend ourselves,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President added to his speech photographs taken by: Pylyp Dzyuba, Separate Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, 35 Sumy Regiment of the National Guard, Northern Operational-Territorial Unit of the National Guard, 831st Tactical Aviation Brigade, 114th Tactical Aviation Brigade, 18th Slov' Yan Brigade of the National Guard. As reported by ArmyInform, the President conducted the Stavka, dedicated to the strengthening of air defense in the regions and the development of solutions against KABs.

Title: All 5 — the 5th brigade destroyed 5 Russian mortars
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the brigade's channel. Mortars are very disruptive to our infantry, but due to the lack of armor and short firing range, they are completely defenseless against FPV drones. Our pilots took advantage of this and destroyed the enemy's fire support, no matter how the Russians hid their mortars among the ruins and disguised them under a pile of garbage. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 5th Kyiv assault brigade -akuratno-ale-bez-zaproshennya/->continue to destroy enemy forces and equipment in Donetsk region.

Title: The barn, the mountains and the house are on fire: scouts destroyed the barn with the Muscovites
Description: The relevant video was released by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the IOU. After the fire damage to the house where the invaders tried to gain a foothold, the surviving Russians moved to a nearby barn, but it also flew there. So, Muscovites were able to fully understand the temperature of the righteous fire provided by the soldiers of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmyInform reported , that the Defense Forces showed liquidation on a snowy landscape.

Title: Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces: Engineered ammunition must be as smart as drones
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. At the event, servicemen of the Department of Innovation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the General Directorate of Logistics of the General Staff, the Command of the Logistics Forces and the Command of the Support Forces of the Armed Forces presented reports on the prospects for the development of ammunition and explosives. The key needs of the army and the most relevant directions in production were discussed. Special attention was paid to improving the processes of introducing innovative technologies into military units. In particular, it was about speeding up the codification of products and establishing constant feedback between the military and manufacturers. The Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, Colonel Andriy Lebedenko, congratulated the military engineers on their professional holiday and emphasized the need for the development of explosive technologies. He noted that innovations in the production of explosives are no less important than the development of robotic complexes, because effectively organized mine and explosive barriers remain critical in defense conditions. -Engineered munitions, like unmanned systems, must be smart,- emphasized Colonel Andriy Lebedenko. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine simplifies ammunition production: new opportunities for domestic producers.

Title: Tank apocalypse for the occupiers: the Russian army lost an entire battalion in a day
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This year, May 12 became a kind of -tanker's day- for Russians. According to the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, our units hit 31 tanks of the occupiers during the day. So, within one day, the Russian army lost an entire tank battalion destroyed and defeated. Such losses can cost the budget of the aggressor country at least 9 billion US dollars. This is an approximate amount, which is based on calculations based on the average world prices for this type of weapons (according to information from open sources). 9 billion US dollars, for example, is approximately 16 annual budgets of the city of Chelyabinsk, which has the worst environmental situation in the Russian Federation. At the same time, instead of solving internal social problems, the leadership of the aggressor country continues to throw huge sums into the war. As reported by ArmyInform, more than four dozen BBMs and 1,260 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the losses of the enemy.

Title: The name of the laureate of the Mary O'Hagen Award was announced at the Ukrainian Women's Congress
Description: First Lady Olena Zelenska and US Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to Ukraine Bridget Brink addressed the participants of the Congress with welcoming words. The recipient of the Mary O'Hagen Distinguished Achievement in Women's Leadership Award was also announced. She became a well-known public figure, journalist, department manager of the Directorate of Regional Broadcasting of the National Public Television and Radio Company of Ukraine, paramedic of the -Hospitaliers- medical battalion Iryna -Cheka- Tsybukh (posthumously). She was supposed to give a speech at this Congress, but she died on May 29 during a rotation in the Kharkiv direction. Her life, dreams, future were taken away by Russia… Iryna's mother Oksana Tsybukh received the award.

Title: -Creativity, skill, military cunning-: in the Kharkiv region, they try to destroy the enemy creative...
Description: Nadiya Zamryga, head of the department, told about this on the broadcast of -Social News-. of public relations of the 14th separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Roman the Great. According to Nadiya Zamryga, the enemy is trying to find a weak spot, hide, and move forward in small groups of 3-5 people. In turn, the soldiers of the 14th brigade do not allow him to approach the distance of a shooting battle. -That is, when the enemy has already reached the landing, where he can dig in, where he can hide, this is already, let's say, a consequence. We must not let him do it. We try Air reconnaissance works very successfully and efficiently, day and night. FPV drones, drops from UAVs,- said the head of the public relations service of the 14th separate mechanized brigade. Previously ArmyInform reported that the enemy's losses in the Kupyan region are disproportionate to the result.

Title: Digital breakthrough in the Armed Forces: paratroopers became leaders in the use of Army+
Description: About this the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs. It is noted that at least every second of their military units processes reports through Army+. In particular, the share of such parts is 80% in the Russian Navy, 70% in the Navy, and 50% in the Russian Air Force. In total, over three months of the application's operation, more than 1,000 military units have implemented its use and started processing reports of their servicemen in it. The mark of 500 processed reports through Army+ was the first to be crossed by the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Here, the military started with the most common reports, namely for leave and material assistance, and are now starting to process others. According to Kateryna Chernogorenko, these results prove that the revolution in the depaperization of the army is happening right before our eyes. In addition to the 148th Zhytomyr Brigade, we will soon receive the next unit with 500 fully processed reports. -I thank the command of the brigade, in particular its commander Colonel Maksym Lanovy and Chief of Staff Colonel Oleg Zmyslo. And also to Yevhen Kireev, the head of the administrative group, for organizing work on the reception and processing of reports through Army+,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. The agency reminded that the Army+ application was launched at the beginning of August. During this time, 360,000 military personnel were authorized in it, and the number of submitted reports exceeded 15,000. As reported by ArmyInform, started beta testing of delay in the application Rezerv+.

Title: It burns even brighter in the snow: the Defense Forces showed liquidation on a snowy landscape
Description: About this wrote and published the corresponding video in the State Border Service of Ukraine. -The first snow fell in Kharkiv region near Vovchansk. The white canvas helped the aerial scouts of the Kramatorsk Border Detachment to detect the invaders' BMP,- the report says. The departure of the FPV-drone of the border guards was not delayed. The result is a penalty kick for stopping in an illegal place and the inability of enemy vehicles to move on. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy is trying to press near Makiivka and Grekivka.

Title: In Mariupol, the occupiers destroyed monumental panels
Description: Mariupol City Council notifies about this. The panels were created in the assembly hall of school No. 7 in 1990. These were few examples of avant-garde intervention in monumental art. Now, after the -renovation- by the occupiers, the assembly hall has bare white walls. The occupiers destroyed dozens of mosaic panels in the city. In particular, the works of Alla Gorska, Lelya Kuzmenkov, Valentina Konstantinov, Ernst Kotkov, Valery Lamakh and Ivan Lytovchenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy is trying to press near Makeup artists and Grekiv women.

Title: Fire and many victims: the consequences of the Russian attack on the infrastructure of Zaporozhye
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhia OVA. As a result of the attack, six people were killed and nine others were injured. A fire broke out at the site of the impact, which is currently being extinguished by rescuers. The victims receive the necessary medical assistance. Information on the further consequences of the attack is being clarified. Information is being updated. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of the day, the occupiers struck 144 attacks on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: -Electric scooter assaults-: the Russians are forced to go forward at any cost
Description: Oleksandr Borodin, press officer of the third assault brigade. According to Oleksandr Borodin, the mechanized forces — tanks and infantry fighting vehicles — are quite skillfully -dismantled- by Ukrainian FPV drones and artillery. In the same way, enemy infantrymen who go to attack their two, sometimes using exotic wheeled vehicles, are destroyed. -From non-standard -loaves- to very unusual devices such as electric scooters, for example, scooters. The trick is to get to the position as quickly as possible at any cost, so as not to be destroyed by small arms or FPV drones,- said the press officer of the third assault brigade. As reported ArmyInform, the occupiers were going to build a crossing in the Kharkiv Region, but the fighters of the Third Separate Assault Brigade hit their -bridge-builder-.

Title: -I'm alive, I eat porridge, I drink coffee, I shoot-: the story of a paratrooper-artillery -Dragon-
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The -Dragon- gunner is 22 years old. He was a popular football player in civilian life. Then he served conscripted service in our artillery division. There were 21 days left until -Dembele- - and a large-scale war began. The boy immediately signed a contract with the artillery, and admitted this to his parents only during his first vacation. -I explained that they should not completely believe the news, because everything is not as bad as shown on TV. Dad accepted, but mom still worries. I call them and say: -We soaked the gifts! Mom, I'm alive, I drink coffee, I eat porridge, everything is fine.- All the guys with whom I served time signed contracts one by one in our brigade. Sisterhood is an important thing. In the Armed Forces, everything is not as scary as civilians think. Those who came to us with war must be terrible,- says the gunner. -Dragon- admits that he is also sometimes scared: when the enemy fires very hard. And he tells how he escapes from his worries: The personnel remained alive. The M777 gun is also fine. The gunners called her -Marukha-. She has quite a shot – three thousand shots. The gun is operational and was even -wounded- by an enemy lancet, but continues to work effectively. -Dragon- speaks of her with love. -If there were more replacements, we could better drive them further,- adds the fighter. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces told the story of the mechanical engineer Vitaly and how he fought in Ugledar.

Title: Ukraine simplifies ammunition production: new opportunities for domestic manufacturers
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and Technology. Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. One of the main achievements is the simplification of conditions for manufacturers. Now the manufacture, purchase and import of explosives and components do not require licenses and special permits, which opens up new opportunities for expanding production. Important topics were discussed at the meeting: Such events help to create a close connection between manufacturers and the military, which allows a better understanding of the needs of the front. Ukraine has significant potential in the production of ammunition, and the development of this market can become a significant factor in strengthening the country's defense capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, In October, more than 10 private UAV schools in Ukraine successfully passed certification. These schools issue certificates to graduates that allow them to obtain the military accounting specialty of UAV operator.

Title: The enemy once again shelled Donetsk region
Description: reports this by the head of the Donetsk OVA, Vadym Filashkin. There was no information about the victims during the day. In Kurakhovo, numerous high-rise buildings were damaged, and Vovchenko was shelled. Pokrovsk and the village of Shevchenko are under fire. A house was damaged in Myrnograd. An industrial building was damaged in Kostyantynivka. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 11 private houses, 2 high-rise buildings and 2 industrial buildings were damaged. 2 houses were damaged in Siversk, 2 more in Serebryanka.

Title: The Defense Forces told the story of Vitaly, a mechanical engineer, and how he fought in Ugledar
Description: informs about this 72 separate mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets.

Title: Airstrikes in Kharkiv region: two women and teenagers were injured, residential buildings were damag...
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. Last day, the enemy carried out 4 tactical aviation operations in the region, dropped 11 air defense systems, including at least three over Kharkiv. Thus, three apartment buildings were damaged in the Shevchenkiv district of Kharkiv as a result of an airstrike by a guided aerial bomb. Two women aged 39 and 40 were injured. The explosion occurred at 00:40. It is known that a 39-year-old woman was injured by glass, she was taken to the hospital, another 50-year-old woman suffered an acute reaction to stress. A little earlier, at 00:30, in the Kyiv district of the city, a private house was damaged by an impact on an open area. Also, at 4:34, the enemy shelled the open territories of the villages of Udy and Odnorobivka of the Zolochiv community. At 3:30 p.m., an unknown object exploded in the village of Husarivka of the Barvinki community of the Izyum district. As a result, two teenagers aged 12 and 13 were injured. During the day, 127 people were evacuated from the Kupyansky and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian troops once again shelled the Kherson region. Due to Russian aggression, one person was injured.

Title: The enemy is trying to press near Makiivka and Grekivka
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. Makiivka and the surrounding area were fired upon twice from Hradivi. The occupiers also targeted this village and neighboring Balka Zhuravtsi with barrel artillery and unmanned aerial vehicles. In addition, the invaders unsuccessfully stormed our positions in Bilogorivka. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the occupiers shelled the Kherson region: there is a wounded person.

Title: He would like to live in Majorca, but she was a bad actress: another -heart in love- was detained at...
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. It is noted that men, having married women with disabilities, tried to leave abroad illegally in this way. A 34-year-old native of Ternopil region married a 35-year-old woman from Ivano-Frankivsk region, who has a disability of the II group. At night at the -Krakivets- checkpoint, they tried to cross the border, saying that they were going to Mallorca for permanent residence. However, during communication with border guards, the woman could not even answer the question where her -husband- lives. Another -couple- was discovered at the Hrushiv checkpoint. A 33-year-old man, married to a 37-year-old woman with II group disability, tried to leave for Warsaw, allegedly to visit his sister. The border guards found out that the husband does not know either the year of birth of his -wife- or the reason for her disability. Both marriages were concluded on the same day - June 22 this year. On the signs of a criminal offense provided for in Art. 332 of the Criminal Code (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-), operatives of the detachment reported to the National Police. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The defense forces struck the area where enemy personnel were concentrated
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, an operation is ongoing in the Kursk region, during the past day the enemy has carried out 127 artillery attacks on populated areas. Our defenders inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit one area of ​​concentration of personnel of the Russian invaders. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,260 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 15 tanks, 43 armored combat vehicles, 29 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 29 operational-tactical UAVs, 2 cruise missiles and 41 cars of the occupiers. As ArmiyaInform reported, The Armed Forces stopped 230 assaults by Russians: the situation at the front remains tense.

Title: 48 of 79 shot down: Air Force details of night attack
Description: This is notified by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, aviation, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 08:30, the downing of two Kh-59/69 guided air missiles and 48 enemy UAVs in Odesa, Kyiv, Sumy, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Cherkasy, Chernihiv and Khmelnytskyi regions. 30 enemy drones were lost in various regions of Ukraine, one more returned to Russia.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The occupiers shelled the Kherson region: there is a wounded person
Description: About this informs the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day, Bilozerka, Veletenske, Beryslav, Havrylivka, Mykolaivka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. the Russian military damaged 4 private houses, a gas pipeline, an outbuilding and a garage in the region. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the number of enemy attacks decreased in Zaporizhzhia: 144 shellings per day.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 230 Russian assaults: the situation at the front remains tense
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, it carried out 2,640 attacks, 95 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and also used to destroy 763 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Diliivka, Shcherbynivka, Kalinove, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Tavriyske, Mala Tokmachka and Mykolaivka. Actively using aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy attacked 10 times near Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, 21 attacks by occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Kindrashyvka, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Vyshnevoy, Pischany, Druzhelyubivka, Lozova, Kruglyakivka. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 32 times. He tried to advance in the districts of Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Kolisnikivka, Katerynivka, Makiivka, Terniv, Zarichny, and Torsky. In the Severskyi direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled one assault of the Russian invaders near Bilogorivka. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked five times in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and Stupochki. The enemy tried seven times to wedge into our defenses on the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked in the districts of Dachny, Toretsk, and Shcherbynivka, at the moment, one battle is taking place near Shcherbynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 22 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Selidove, Yuryivka and Vyshneve. The situation was tense in the Kurakhiv direction, where the Defense Forces repelled 84 attacks on positions in the direction of the settlements of Vovchenka, Illinka, Kreminna Balka, Hannivka, Kurakhove, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimivka, Antonivka, Dalnye, Katerynivka and Elizavetivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 17 attacks on our positions in the districts of Trudovoy, Velikay Novosilka, Urozhainy, Rozdolny, Sukhy Yaliv, and Maksimivka. In the Orichivka direction our troops stopped six enemy attacks in the directions of Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka, Maly Shcherbakiv and Orichov. In the Dnieper direction, the operational situation has not changed significantly. The enemy conducted three unsuccessful assaults. On the Volyn and Poliske directions, no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,260 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 15 tanks, 43 armored combat vehicles, 29 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 29 operational-tactical UAVs, 2 cruise missiles, and 41 vehicles of the occupiers.

Title: BZVP of students: when and from what course will universities teach how to defend Ukraine
Description: Mykhailo Vinnytskyi, Deputy Deputy Minister of Education and Science of Ukraine, told about this on the air of Novosti.LIVE . — The adopted law obliges us to introduce basic general military training in institutions of higher education in 2025. Obviously, this does not apply to freshmen, because they are mostly seventeen years old. It is most likely that it will be the third year, where the students have already reached 19-20 years of age and are of legal age, he said. Educational innovation, according to the deputy minister, is in no way connected with mobilization. — The mobilization age remains 25 [years]. It's just that a person who graduates from higher education should be able to handle a weapon, know where meetings are held in case of need, how to defend themselves in case of need, how to provide first aid with tactical medicine in case of need. All these things are included in basic general military training, explained the Deputy Minister of Education and Science of Ukraine. Currently, the system is being developed, training grounds are being prepared, and from January 2025, the training of instructors will begin. — This is a continuation of the initiatives that the Ministry of Education has now introduced to reformat -Defense of Ukraine- as a subject in high school, Mykhailo Vinnytskyi emphasized. The Deputy Minister also announced that in 2025, the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine will develop a project for the training of reserve officers. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Defense Forces participate in the reform of the school course -Defense of Ukraine-, The Cabinet of Ministers will finance the purchase of modern equipment for the updated course, and military training teachers in schools under the project of the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Veterans will become war veterans.

Title: Since the beginning of the war, 100 children have been injured by mines and explosive objects
Description: This is reported by Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. This data is published as of November 1, 2024. Farmers (199 people), unemployed (96 people), pensioners (80 people), critical infrastructure workers (112 people), drivers (79 people) and students (90 people) were the most affected. The collection of information on such incidents is carried out on the basis of data received from local executive authorities. Monitoring and verification is carried out by the Main Mine Action Directorate, which also serves as the secretariat of the National Mine Action Authority. Data collection is carried out in accordance with the implementation plan of the Ottawa Convention, which prohibits the use of anti-personnel mines. Every case of detonation of Ukrainian civilians on mines is documented by law enforcement agencies, which open criminal proceedings for violations of the Russian rules of warfare. The created database and interactive map help government and humanitarian organizations to inform the public about the risks associated with explosive objects, as well as to provide assistance to victims of mine-explosive injuries. As reported by ArmiyaInform, a solemn handover to the Defense Forces of Ukraine of the automobile took place in Kyiv techniques and equipment for demining.

Title: Missile danger: an enemy ship is patrolling the Black Sea
Description: This is reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine liquidated more than 2.5 thousand Russian military personnel.

Title: More than four dozen BBMs and 1,260 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine an...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 05.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the escalation at the front: for a day our soldiers stopped 226 attacks on key directions.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, the number of enemy attacks decreased: 144 shellings per day
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhia OVA. According to him, Russian troops carried out 5 airstrikes on Tavriyskyi and Malya Tokmachka. In addition, 43 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Olhivske. According to the head of the OVA, 9 rounds of anti-aircraft fire were fired on the territory of Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, and Robotyny. -87 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Maly Shcherbaki, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyn, Malya Tokmachka, Biloghiri and Olhivskoe,- noted Ivan Fedorov. There were also 13 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day, November 3, occupiers struck 304 blows on 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Aggravation at the front: during the day, our soldiers stopped 226 attacks in key directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In the Kharkiv direction, the invaders carried out eight attacks near Vovchansk during the day. In the Kupyan direction, the defense forces repelled 19 attacks. The enemy was active in the districts of Kindrashyvka, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovo, Veshenevo, Pischanoy, Druzhelyubivka, Lozova, Kruglyakivka. 31 times the enemy attacked in the Lymansky direction, tried to advance in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Kolisnikivka, Katerynivka, Makiivka, Terniv, Zarichny, and Torsky. In the Seversky direction, the invaders once unsuccessfully stormed the position of our defenders in the Bilogorivka area. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked five times in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. Two clashes are still ongoing. The enemy, with the support of aviation, tried seven times to wedge into our defense in the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked in the districts of Dachny, Toretsk, and Shcherbynivka, at the moment, one battle is taking place near Shcherbynivka. In the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Promin, Lysivka, Selidove, Yuryivka and Vyshnevo settlements, our troops repelled 21 offensive and assault actions of the enemy. Four of them are still ongoing. Our troops are taking measures to maintain the designated borders, and are retaliating fiercely. according to data, the enemy lost 260 people killed and wounded, Ukrainian servicemen also destroyed one tank, two armored fighting vehicles, two armored personnel carriers and two cars. In addition, a cannon, one armored personnel carrier and one car were significantly damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction there were 84 combat clashes. The invaders remain active, trying to move forward in the direction of the settlements of Vovchenka, Illinka, Kreminna Balka, Hannivka, Kurakhove, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimivka, Antonivka, Dalnye, Katerynivka and Elizavetivka. the enemy lost four armored fighting vehicles, five infantry fighting vehicles and one tank in this direction. One tank, four armored combat vehicles, two infantry combat vehicles and one anti-aircraft gun were also damaged. In the Vremivsk direction the occupiers attacked 16 times near Trudovoy, Velikay Novosilka, Urozhany, Rozdolnoy, Suhy Yalyv and Maksimivka. All attacks were repelled. In the Orichivka direction our troops stopped six enemy attacks in the directions of Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka, Maly Shcherbakiv and Orichov. In the Dnieper direction, the situation has not undergone significant changes, no losses of positions and territories have been allowed. Ukrainian soldiers repelled three assaults by Russian invaders. Soldiers of the 102nd Separate Territorial Defense Brigade, the 406th Separate Artillery Brigade named after Colonel-General Oleksiy Almazov, the 57th Separate Motorized Infantry Brigade named after Kosh Ataman Kostya Gordienko, the 100th Separate Mechanized Brigade, and the 14th Operational Brigade were honored in the department name Ivan Bohun, who confidently hold the lines and inflict significant losses on the invaders. As reported by ArmyInform, according to Volodymyr Zelenskyi 11,000 North Korean soldiers have already accumulated in the Kursk region.

Title: From the steering wheel -medevak- to the NRK remote control. A frank conversation with a stormtroope...
Description: We met with him not far from the combat mission area and talked about the war for an hour and a half. Let's quote the direct language of -Makara-. I grew up in such an environment, had such an upbringing that for me the question did not arise when the war began: to go or not to go. The answer was self-evident. There was only a question of where to go, with whom to move and to which part of the front. There were calls, they said, let's go abroad. But I didn't get into such conversations, I clearly understood what I wanted and where I was needed. It would be a breach of conscience for me not to get involved in the problem that exists at this stage of history. My field of activity changed every year: in the Kyiv campaign I was an infantryman, in the Zaporizhzhia direction - a driver of a -medevak-. During the Bakhmut campaign, he was transferred to the assault company to the position of a machine gunner, then he was a mechvod, an M113 gunner. The commander of the assault group in the end. The most difficult was in Avdiivka, it cannot be compared with anything. Now I am responsible for a completely new direction for us - ground robotic complexes. It just needs good infantry experience, an understanding of the battlefield, tactics and how everything is arranged on the front line. I was always interested in developing something new. All these positions, it was not in the format that I was forcibly placed, given an order. It was a choice moment. I could stay and continue to work in the medical service, I could remain the same machine gunner, driver mechanic. In our team, you can choose what you want to do. I have a lot of people now who are not directly involved in the battlefield, but they are as useful as possible to support the infantry, in general, to the life of the battalion. We understand that there will be no benefit from a person who does not have the desire to do this or that. At the very beginning of the great war, motivation was very powerful. I went to war with the thought that I would not last more than two weeks here. Nevertheless, I will do something useful and right, even if it leads to my death. Then this motivation changed: the more professional I become, the longer I will live on the battlefield and in this war in general. And the more good things, actions that lead to victory, I will be able to do. After the loss of my brothers, the motivation changed dramatically, and now I want to avenge these guys. War is constantly changing: almost every six months there is a different style, character, technology, opportunities for conducting both defensive and offensive actions. Both with us and with the enemy. The armed forces are developing very quickly. We have surface drones, our own long-range drones that attack the Russian Federation. But still, the human resource on the battlefield will be the main one, because everything is focused on the fact that the same FPVs, drop systems, ground reconnaissance complexes, everything is adjusted to destroy the infantry that holds the lines. But we can do everything with the help of technology to help the infantry do their jobs. Infantry will be the main factor on the battlefield in any case. The infantry will always be the most important argument, because if there is a person there, then it cannot be assumed that it is our line. It will never be possible to completely replace a person in the trenches of work. We've had cases recently where most of the enemy's infantry simply didn't make it to our front lines simply because they were being maxed out by drops and FPV drones. Out of 100% of personnel, 10% reached the front line. This already simplifies the infantry's work as much as possible. She already has less impact on her positions and it's easier for her to do her job.     A post shared by Kolya Makarov (@_kolya_makarov) 70% of my unit consists of fighters with assault infantry experience. And there is a young addition with no combat experience that just makes up for it. There are young guys 19-20 years old, and there are men who are already 30-40 years old. But in general, we do not have an age barrier. Age does not matter here, at all. It is decided by your experience, your ability to act, and the level of your motivation. And it very often happens that the commander of the department is a young guy, and he has men under his command who are 45 years old. They listen to him and do what he says. They consider him their commander and do not want anyone else. There are also girls in the teams, they are mostly in the positions of BpLA operators, NRK operators. But there are other examples. I was once given an infantry assault unit with a seconded group. There was a girl who had never been in battle before. And I had never been on the defensive with girls before and had never attacked. And the boys were critical of her. But literally a day or two later, everyone was in shock, because she dug trenches better than everyone else, carried out night combat duty better than everyone else, performed tasks better than everyone else. And later, already in her battalion, during the assault, this girl was left alone in the position, holding the defense herself. When reinforcements arrived, she led the group she was given. It was her third or fourth combat appearance. This shows that not everything depends on age and gender in war. Discipline, motivation and your inner core decide here. We need to put a new cadre of officers on their feet - young, active ones who have come through modern battles. Because what we are seeing now on the front line is largely the fault of the commanders. We can do the right thing in current situations, but we need a modern approach. In our brigade, there are only those people who came up from the infantry in commanding positions. A year or two ago, you were doing your job in the trenches, storming, defending, and now you are a platoon, company, battalion commander. Most of them are people aged 30-35. We have quite a few young group commanders in our battalion, who are 18-20 years old, and they show themselves very cool on the battlefield as commanders. A leader generally has a very strong influence on a team. It may be that the group is not motivated. But if the commander knows how to present information well, teach well, show people that they are important to him, he is ready to go with them to the end, and that it is really important to him that they know how, whether they have learned it, then the group becomes motivated .   They understand that no one is going to abandon them just like that. And they are ready to work. I recently sent a very powerful cool branch commander to where he will grow and develop even more. He went to a higher position than mine, in fact, but I see that it was useful for everyone. Civilians do not fully understand what is happening here. In their eyes, everything looks like a person was stuffed into a -bus- and immediately taken to war. People do not understand what the front is like, what front-line cities are like, how the principle of work in the army is arranged, that not everyone is fighting on the front lines here. People need to be told more about how the army is organized. When they understand this and know what functionality awaits them in the service, the number of people who will voluntarily go to the army will increase. The rear and the front are different worlds, of course, it always has been. But I began to notice that when I see acquaintances, friends in the rear, they have a certain fear of communication, a certain fear of conversation, because they do not know what to talk about. And it is felt very strongly. I'm not pissed off by people in the back, I'm pissed off by people who aren't doing anything to win. When friends ask: -Well, what should we do?-. I say: just ask yourself a question every morning when you wake up. He set himself a goal and a task to do something for the country. I would like the civilians to understand: we can live in peace here in the rear only because there is someone who holds the defense, who died at night so that I could live this day. I would advise civilians to prepare. Medicine should be studied at least minimally. Tactics. We somehow didn't think about it. There are many opportunities for this in the country. When you are ready for something, you feel more confident. We have a test week of the attack aircraft, there is a cool FPV school. Come at least to talk to the military simply. In addition to the BZVP, we also have training at the brigade, battalion, and unit levels. When a person comes to me, he has time to join the team, to get used to it. If I see that a person is not ready, he will not go to the battlefield. A person must be prepared, and I can never ask a person to do something that I have not taught him myself. He was, is and always will be. Don't be afraid only of fools. During hostilities, fear goes overboard, but you need to be able to adjust it correctly and understand that on the battlefield there is only you, the enemy and death. And now you have such a game, who will throw this death into whose basket. And that nothing will help you at that moment, except yourself. Therefore, fear should be put in the background and act. If you give in to fear, then 100% you will not return from the battlefield. Or die in the next battles. It is necessary to understand that it is necessary to act now and already. And everything will depend on how you act. When you defeat yourself inside, break through all these moments of hesitation, then, in principle, not a single challenge will be scary for you. Fantastic question. Very often plans get in the way of work. We will plan when everything is over. My plans for now are to make sure that as few parents as possible cry for their sons who are forever in the war. Because this is the most difficult, the most painful moment - to look into the eyes of the parents of their brothers whom they buried. And at that moment you realize that you are ready to give everything so that all of this does not happen. Therefore, I advise all commanders, if you lose your soldiers, to go to their funerals and talk to their parents. This then gives a very great motivation to work even better, deal with personnel, do everything more professionally in order not to make even small mistakes on the battlefield. To save personnel as much as possible and to perform the combat task as efficiently as possible.

Title: -Iron Fist- will provide Bradley: the US has ordered an active defense system
Description: As informs the official portal of the US Department of Defense, profile an agreement was signed with General Dynamics Ordnance and Tactical Systems, which will install active defense systems. The total cost of the work is $191.2 million for BBM equipment with an unspecified number of these systems, ArmyInform reports. And the direct manufacturer of this equipment is one of the leading Israeli gunsmithing companies, Elbit Systems. Her site in May this year announced that the Haifa-based company has been awarded an initial contract worth approximately $37 million to supply Iron Fist active protection systems (APS) for General Dynamics Ordnance and Tactical Systems (GD-OTS) to upgrade the US Army's Bradley M2A4E1 infantry fighting vehicle (IPV). The contract will be executed within 24 months. Iron Fist (in Ukrainian - -Iron Fist-) APS is an advanced Hard Kill system aimed at increasing the self-defense capabilities of armored platforms against modern threats on the battlefield. It is the second generation APS of the Israel Defense Forces, characterized by high performance and low requirements for volume, weight and power consumption. The system provides armored platforms with 360-degree protection against a wide range of anti-tank threats, such as anti-tank missiles (ATMs), anti-tank guided missiles (ATGMs), unmanned aerial vehicles and threats located both in the open and in urban areas. . Thanks to the use of modern technologies, Iron Fist creates a protected hemisphere around the machine, effectively tracking and destroying threats. At the heart of Iron Fist's operation is the use of radars (Radars) that detect and identify missiles/projectiles/UAVs aimed at an armored vehicle. After detecting an enemy target, the information is transmitted to the on-board electronics, which coordinates the launch of the interceptors. These obstacles, created from flammable materials, minimize the number of fragments during an explosion and neutralize the threat with a powerful shock wave. Therefore, the threat is destroyed or deviated from the flight path, which significantly reduces the risk of hitting the target. Iron Fist has high application flexibility. The system can be installed on various types of armored vehicles, including light vehicles. At most, thanks to the use of electronic-optical sensors, the system is able to determine the location of the shooter, as well as automatically turn the BBM tower towards the threat, if this function is activated by the operator. An additional advantage is the possibility of installing Iron Fist in stationary positions, which makes it a universal means of protecting both mobile and stationary objects. Iron Fist launchers can be adapted to different customer requirements. The standard configuration includes two-charge installations, but options with an increase in the number of interceptors to six or even eight are possible, although the latter have not yet become widespread. For heavy equipment, as a rule, two launchers with different numbers of charges are used. Light vehicles such as the MRAP are equipped with a single installation. To simplify firing in response to light vehicles, you can additionally install a machine gun that will automatically turn towards the enemy object, which greatly facilitates the work of the crew. It should be noted that the first prototypes of the Iron Fist active defense complex were developed in the 2000s and, in addition to being installed on Israel Defense Forces (IDF) vehicles, were also offered for export. The system was primarily created to neutralize guided anti-tank missiles and rocket-propelled grenades, and is currently being tested to intercept armor-piercing feathered sub-caliber projectiles. Yehuda (Udi) Vered, General Manager of Elbit Systems Land: -Our Iron Fist active defense systems represent the highest level of innovation, offering comprehensive protection against emerging threats on the modern battlefield.
